story:
Invite your friends and get a belt for free

We've got a great offer for you: you can get the belt for free... If you help us out a little. If you sign up on Indiegogo and share the link with your friends, Indiegogo tracks how many people used your link to kick start the project. What we're offering is to give one belt to our top referrer. For free. How about that?

At Triposo we make apps that let you travel like a local. Travel guides with smart suggestions, local events and offline maps help you feel free to roam the streets and explore. But you won't really look like a local if you have to consult your phone the whole time, so we're making a belt that will guide you to your destination by buzzing you around.



  • You open the Triposo app and pick where you want to go.

  • Tap the buzz me there option in the app.

  • The app knows where you are, where you are heading and as soon as you start moving it will send signals to the belt telling you what direction to take.  This will make one of the four vibration motors in the belt buzz left, right, straight or back.

  • The belt comes with a cable to connect the phone to the belt.

  • It uses the headphone jack so it will work with any device that can run our app (iOS and Android).

  • Other apps can use the belt too - the protocol to send it signals is as simple as can be.


It may not be as sophisticated as a turn-by-turn route planner and it might just send you down a couple of streets you had not planned on seeing, but that's part of wandering. And you won't feel like a tourist - no need to get the phone out of your pocket the whole time.



Challenges

The belt in the movie is a working prototype.  We’ve implemented the technology to be able to use the belt with our app by creating a walking route.  However going from there to a real piece of wearable technology that lets you wander presents a few challenges.

The first challenge is to make sure the belt doesn’t drain your battery. By using the audio jack rather than bluetooth, we think we can cover this.

The second challenge is to make sure the belt is comfortable yet durable and also allows the vibrations to be clearly felt. (One of our first prototypes broke within a day.)

Finally, scaling up from one prototype to a sellable product is quite a big challenge. We're partnering with companies that are great at making leather belts and electronic circuits - so we can focus on the part we do best.

Oh and yes, we did check if the belt goes through airport security :-) You have to take it off, of course, but then it passes security checks just fine.  

Thank you

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The WOOLRIOR Story

Hi, this is us, and yes, of course we are all wearing  Woolrior socks.

We live on two continents, separated by an ocean and we work in businesses that are very competitive and difficult, especially having in mind  China produced low quality and low price garments. And on both continents, we suffer the consequences of increasing waste disposal, most of it coming from fast fashion.We decided to join forces and try to develop socks that are eco friendly, socks that are durable, that are made mostly of natural yarn. But not in the cost of NASA project. Socks might be just socks to most people, but the quest to find the longest lasting socks known  has been our driving force for the last few years. After all, why shouldn’t socks last a lifetime? We demanded sock perfection and spent years testing current brands on the market and testing different type of merino wools. At the end we realized that compromising quality isn’t worth it! That's why the wool we chose for our Woolriors is the best on the market - it undergoes "Naturetex plasma treatment" - an award - winning technology which is certified for organic use and ecofriendly because of the applied chlorine free process. The merino wool we use is durable, but gentle to the skin, it is naturally antimicrobial and will keep your feet odorless and dry.

 So now, we are proud to present  our ecofriendly, guaranteed for life  Woolrior socks!

 Our running Woolriors are the ONLY running socks made of Fine Merino wool on 200 needles, guaranteed for life!

 

 

AND WE WENT FURTHER - WE DESIGNED OUR WOOLRIORS  IN BEAUTIFUL COLORS!

 

 

Why Do We Offer A Lifetime Warranty On An Everyday Wear Item?

Well, This Is How We Want To Help You Reduce the amount of garments becoming waste. When your Woolrior socks are worn out, we ask you to send them back to us for a brand new pair. Once we have a large enough stock of old socks, we will send them to our recycling partner, to give those used garments a new purpose, and not have them end up at a landfill.
 Plus, Woolrior socks are very durable!

 

Reducing our clothing impact is one of the many things we can do!

Fast fashion, with it’s rapid production cycles of low quality garments,
contributes to excessive consumption and wastefulness with
worrying impact on Earth.
Worldwide, the fashion industry is the Second dirtiest right after the Oil Industry.

MADE:

  • ​on state-of-the-art equipment abiding by the highest quality standards
  • from plasma treated
  • with chlorine free technology
  • guaranteed for life

Woolrior merino socks are a game changer!​

The world is looking for lasting everything right now. We’re all aware of the
detrimental impact the way we live is having on the environment.
We watch what we throw away more carefully than ever,
and we’re all recycling as much as we can.
Woolrior socks as the name suggests, are hardwearing,
super comfortable footwear that’s designed to last a lifetime.
We’re so confident that they’ll handle wherever your feet take them,
each and every pair comes with a lifetime warranty

 

What Makes Woolrior Stand Out?

 

 Our socks are guaranteed for life!     We provide the best value for your Dollar! 

We use organic certified wool! Environmentally friendly yarn!

 

Gold Award Winner yarn treatment process!

Chlorine-Free wool​​

 

 "HAND -LINKED" TOE PROCESS

 The toe part of an ordinary sock is usually finished /sewn/ by a sewing machine,which normally makes the toe part thicker and inconvenient. Hand-linking is a demanding technique where each single thread on the toe and the sock foot are linked manually. It makes the toe seam totally flat and comfortable.Usually, this work is done by professional workers. The paradox about the manual hand-linking technique is that it can be harmful for the professional worker’s eyes. For WOOLRIOR we use last generation, Italian knitting machines that provide an extraordinary quality of the linking.

                                                     

 

Who'll Wear Woolrior?​

How many times have you reluctantly thrown a favorite pair of socks away because they’ve worn out?
Well, guess what? Woolrior socks will become your new favorite
socks and you’ll never have to throw them out. Ever.
If you get Woolrior socks for Christmas, you’ll be able to cross socks off your
Christmas wish list forever, because you won’t need anymore socks
– unless you want Santa to bring you more pairs of Woolriors!

 

 

Why Woolrior Socks Are The Most Durable Socks You'll Ever Pull On Your Feet

We are only limited by the most advanced materials and technologies.
We bet there are no socks, as fine as ours, in your drawers back home
that come with a lifetime warranty. No socks, made of the highest quality merino,
that will last and last and last, no matter what you put them through.
Isn’t it about time you demanded more durability from your socks?
It’s no longer acceptable for them to wear thin or spring holes after a few wears.
Not when Woolrior socks offer a great alternative with a lifetime guarantee.

 

                                                        

 

A great pair of socks should be as durable as they are comfortable.
We’ve used the Martindale Abrasion Test to compare our product to the
average sock. The average sock breaks at 3,500 cycles,
while Woolrior withstands 12,500 cycles with no sign of damage.

​

Premium wear, easy care

Woolrior combines everything you want in a premium wool sock with the easy care everyone with a busy life needs.​

 

Why We Need Your Backing

We’ve spent years researching and developing Woolrior socks,
to such an extent that we are confident enough in their staying power
to offer a lifetime warranty with every pair. That’s going
to give us something strong to hang our marketing hats on.
And that’s where you come in. Because we need funding to make our
marketing campaigns happen, and to help us move into mass production of our high spec,
long lasting socks. Help us bring socks with warranties to a world that’s ready
for socks that last the distance and won’t get thrown into the trash can like
regular socks.Woolrior socks will be priced to be affordable for everyone.
And remember, they are long-lasting, so you will save on having to buy socks in the future.

Why You Should Back Us

Unless you’re planning to spend the rest of your life living on a beach
wearing flip flops, you’re going to need socks. And why waste money
on socks that won’t last, when you can buy socks that are guaranteed
to last you a lifetime? Socks are the most underrated item of clothing
we wear every day. We take them for granted, but we really notice the
difference when they’re not there. Woolrior socks will always be there.
Let us do the legwork for you, and deliver the best socks you can currently buy!

 

Can't Contribute Right Now?
No Problem...

We get it that not everyone has the spare cash to support our campaign. But you can still help us out by spreading the word about our campaign across social media. 

Our official campaign hashtag is #SocksForLife which sums up the lasting power of Woolrior, and it also refers to the fact that we will donate $1 of every pair of socks we sell to support / diabetes or/ children leukemia research. 

What’s more,  we’re going to offer all active military personnel and police officers a permanent 20% discount on Woolrior socks. Because we think people who spend so much time on their feet deserve to have the best socks on their feet.

 

Risks and challenges

As we all know Our Border And Customs Agencies conduct routine inspections on random shipments entering the Country, and thank God for those. In the unlikely but possible event of that happening to our shipments, please keep in mind that it may take up to 3 weeks for the goods to be processed and released to us for final dispatch to you!

Wa have established great relationships with our suppliers and there are no concerns about demands or production delays, as we are currently able to produce 35,000 pairs per month.

story:
Koko started with the ambition to create a unique product, which would combine sophisticated design, high quality craftsmanship, and sustainability. The materials used for Kokos are leftovers from different furniture manufactures, ensuring that Kokos are sustainably crafted. To ensure that sustainability would be a core aspect of our project, we decided to initiate a program in which one tree would be planted for each pair sold. This is how we ensure that Koko truly is “Sustainability in Action”. 

After conceiving  the idea to make wooden sunglasses from recycled materials, we invested 500 USD (and a lot of time!) to get to our first prototype. We started to sell our sunglasses to friends and family, and then began approaching opticians and boutiques. Now we are ready to take the next step!


Koko is just a tiny brand, but has huge potential. We want to take Koko global, and that’s why we need your support. In exchange you will get an awesome pair of sunglasses at a great price!

Caring about the environment has to go beyond just spoken words and materialize in concrete action. In order to create a sustainable culture we must think about how we consume and produce products. From the beginning, this idea was important to us, which is why we are proud to offer sustainable products, by reusing material from other wood manufacturers. 

WE COOPERATE WITH THE UK-BASED INTERNATIONAL TREE FOUNDATION!

Koko cooperates with the International Tree Foundation in order to plant a tree for every Koko sold! ITF has over 90 years of experience, and Koko is extremely proud to be an official supporter of their projects.

Around the world, 1.6 billion people depend on trees for their livelihoods.

However, deforestation is causing climate change, loss of biodiversity and creating poverty. ITF supports communities to plant, care for and use trees in sustainable ways, improving both lives and habitats.

Koko - sustainability put into action

This is a fixed funding campaign. What does that mean?

Its all or nothing. We really want to start building a proper fanbase outside of Mexico. Hence, we either manage to reach 9500 USD or we will not receive any money at all. Indiegogo will refund your payment if the funding goal is not reached.

Do Kokos protect your eyes?

Yes. All our lenses feature UV400 protection, blocking 100% of harmful rays. Additionally, our sunglasses are polarized, ensuring that sunlight reflections won’t bother you.

What payment options are avialable?

You can make a contribution via PayPal or with your credit card via PayPal´s "Guest Checkout" option. 

When will I receive my Kokos?

You will receive your Kokos by mid-July. Our campaign ends at the end of May, and it will take us two months to produce and deliver your order.

What are the shipping costs?

Shipping in Mexico will be free of charge. For backers in the US and Europe please add $10.  For all other countires, please add $20  to your contribution.

What materials are Kokos made of and how are they made?

Kokos are made from a range of different woods. Due to the nature of the material, not one single Koko is identical to another. In fact, every single pair is truly unique, since every piece of wood has its distinct characteristics. The production process involves laser-cutting technology, as well as a good dose of hands-on craftsmanship. The materials used are leftovers from different furniture manufactures, ensuring that Koko truly is “Sustainability in action”.

A FEW MORE GOOD REASONS TO SUPPORT KOKO!

1.  Beautiful sunglasses crafted in a sustainable manner.

2. You will help us plant a tree for every pair we sell.

3.  Normally our sunglasses cost between 100-125 US Dollars, hence, Indiegogo supporters receive an amazing discount.

4.  Koko has helps smaller Mexican charities to raise money for their causes, and will continue to do so.

5.  Koko is a small Mexican brand trying to go global.


RISK & CHALLENGES
At the beginning of our project we learned a lot about manufacturing processes and are now very familiar with the challenges! We have made arrangements with our manufacturer in order to ensure that there will be enough flexibility to fulfill large quantity orders in a short time. We can't wait to get to work!

WHAT´S NEXT FOR KOKO?

Well, we have loads of plans, but it really depends on how well our campaign turns out. We will definitely keep Koko running and start producing a greater variety of designs if our Indiegogo campaign is a success. 

One thing we would love to do is provide optical eyewear. The production process is a bit tricky, as we would have to introduce a customization process, as well as integrating with a laboratory that produces optical lenses. However, with the right amount of funding, we will definitely approach this idea. 


WE REALLY APPRECIATE YOUR SUPPORT!
Please make as much noise about our campaign as possible! Use the social media tools at the top to share this project with your family and friends!

Thank You! - Maria, Eduardo and Georg

GET IN TOUCH! WE WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU! 

You can reach Georg through the following email: georg.berger@kokomexico.com.mx

Normally our sunglasses cost between 100-125 US Dollars, hence,
Indiegogo supporters receive an amazing discount.
4. 
Koko has
helps smaller Mexican charities to raise money for their causes, and will
continue to do so.
5. 
Koko is a small
Mexican brand trying to go global.
RISK & CHALLENGES
At the beginning of our project we learned a lot about manufacturing processes and are now very familiar with the challenges! We have made arrangements with our manufacturer in order to ensure that there will be enough flexibility to fulfill large quantity orders in a short time. We can't wait to get to work!
WHAT´S NEXT FOR KOKO?
Well, we have loads of plans, but it really depends on how well our campaign turns out. We will definitely keep Koko running and start producing a greater variety of designs if our Indiegogo campaign is a success. 
One thing we would love to do is provide optical eyewear. The production process is a bit tricky, as we would have to introduce a customization process, as well as integrating with a laboratory that produces optical lenses. However, with the right amount of funding, we will definitely approach this idea. 


WE REALLY APPRECIATE YOUR SUPPORT!
Please make as much noise about our campaign as possible! Use the social media tools at the top to share this project with your family and friends!Thank You! - Maria, Eduardo and GeorgGET IN TOUCH! WE WOULD LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU!   

You can reach Georg through the following email: georg.berger@kokomexico.com.mx

story:
Discover the ultimate range of bespoke fashion boxes, keeping you runway ready. Let us introduce you to the first, fully-personalized fashion subscription box for men and women out there: feel the ultimate freedom of choice with our 4 price range options ($49, $69, $99, $299) and treat yourself with the ultimate styling experience.

With Moooh!! you are your own stylist. Reinvent your fashion-self today.

For us Fashion Week lasts all year. We want you to take control over your fashion choices and let us take care of the rest. We believe fashion knows no boundaries, that’s why we ship internationally (from USA, Canada, Europe, Australia & China), whilst being committed to affordable and reliable delivery sources, exquisite customer service, and newest trends. Scroll down for more details!


 

Forget the 'stylist's choice' or 'a piece of the month' add-ons. We give you the ultimate freedom of choice: Mix & match whatever YOU like from our broad selection of men's’ and women’s products. Browse over 5 000 pieces, and style your box the way YOU want it: Visit MOOOH.NET & get our sense of fashion! Once the campaign has ended we will launch a sub-domain letting you style your very own box with pieces featured on our website (and all the upcoming collections).

On a budget? We've got you covered: with options at $49, $69, $99, and $299 you can save around 60 % off what you will normally spend in store or online. Moooh!! boxes are also perfect for going half with your bestie or your bae: mix & match across different styles and collections for the ultimate fashion experience.    

 

VISIT MOOOH.NET TO GET OUR SENSE OF FASHION! 

Decide on your subscription plan! Fancy a try-out round? Try one of ours one-time perks and get yourself hooked on the easiest, most affordable (and stylish!) fashion experience out there. Careful though! One monthly subscription plans offer some seriously awesome perks!



 Get from 3 to 4 pieces (including 1 pair of shoes + free accessories)

 

Get from 4 to 6 pieces (including outerwear, 1 pair of shoes + free accessories)

 Get from 4 to 8 pieces ( including items like handmade tie dye clothes, handmade shoes, brogue shoes, men jackets, valuable dresses and jumpsuits)

 

Get from 6 to 10 pieces (including men suits, brogues, handmade clothes, handmade embroidery clothes,  in house designed clothes made with handwoven cotton and natural dye colours obtained from flowers and fruits).

 

Check out our subscription plan packages and invest in fashion with no boundaries.  


Design your shipping plan: Decide if you want your box delivered on a monthly or biweekly basis!

Forget the long delivery time, expensive returns,  and nearly impossible exchanges. Having our fulfillment centers located all over the world we can commit to making your shopping experience easier, faster, and more enjoyable! Discover our broad range of styles, and re-invent your fashion self, without having to deal with numerous sellers (and various return policies), unmatched discount offers, and lengthy exchange times! 

 

Chose between fast...

or sustainable fashion! 

We add new styles on weekly basis so you can always keep your wardrobe runway ready. Want to add some extra sass? We'll soon be expanding our offer to include homeware,  100% organic cosmetics, beauty products (for women and men), and tech gadgets! New lines will be available for past, current, and future backers. 

Not a match made in heaven?  Let us save you the fashion-headache with our no-fuss return policy. You can return your item for an exchange within 14 days: simply e-mail us at box@moooh.net and we will send you a pre-paid postage label.

(Please, note that all items must be unworn and unwashed, and if it’s shoes, the items haven’t been worn and show no signs of it, otherwise, the item will not be accepted.)

Your exchange items will be shipped out to you within one week, as soon as your exchange package is received by one of our warehouses in Usa, Europe, Canada, Australia.

See more details on our exchange policy in the FAQ section. 

 

 

Simply log in to your Indiegogo account and share the links generated just for you: this way we will know you're awesome! 

 

We are an Italian private online brand serving customers around the world.  Up to dare we’ve shipped more than 70.000 orders and got tons of positive reviews on our products and customer service.  

How is the Moooh!! subscription plan different from a traditional on-line shopping experience? We knew you may ask, and so we put a brief comparison chart highlighting all the differences. See for yourself! 

What exactly are my choices with every box? Can't make up your mind? Check out this handy breakdown of each of our pricing options. No secrets, just chic! 

Why crowdfunding? 

There is several reasons as for why we've decided to launch our service through a crowdfunding campaign: 

1. We want to increase the number of our customer service advisors. Our aim is to deliver 100% satisfaction to our customers no matter where they are.
2. We want to acquire more warehouse space in several countries around the world, including Mexico. This means we can provide faster deliveries and manage the returns for our customers more efficiently. 
3. We want to create several local websites for an easier experience. We want our customers from all over the world to have the opportunity to pay in their local currencies, pay with local debit cards, bank transfer and COD (cash on delivery)
4. We want to launch a localized Referral Loyalty program to let the customers around the world enjoy better savings, free delivery upgrades, birthday freebies, and many, many more!
5. Here at Moooh!! we're all about progress. We want to invest in designing new clothing lines, sourcing & testing new, 100%-natural materials for producing  hand-made, environmentally-friendly, sustainable fashion and lifestyle products.

NOTE: We're hoping to achieve most of our crowdfunding goals during the duration of the campaign and we’ll update you on any progress made via our IGG page, and our social media channels. 

Where are you located?  We launched our business in Guangzhou, China. Due to the continuous interest and support from our customers, we have opened branches in Hong Kong, and been recently incorporated as a part of the USA company, Negozio Inc., to better serve our American and Canadian customers.

Do you offer localized customer support? For a better customer experience, we’ll launch different websites with local product catalogues, payment options in local currencies, faster shipping  from local warehouses and hassle-free return policies to your local warehouse. Customer service will be offered in several languages, such as French, Italian, Spanish and German.

When will I get my first Moooh!! box?  We will be ready to ship within one month after the campaign has ended.

Where will you ship from? Usa, Canada, Australia, Europe, China. Additionally, we’ll soon offer shipping from Singapore and Japan.

What is the shipping cost? You’ll get free shipping from Usa, Canada, Australia, Europe, and China. Soon enough we will also be able to offer free shipping from Singapore and Japan.

Do I have to pay taxes and or duties? You’ll not pay any taxes if you're located  in Usa, Canada, Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Philippines, Thailand, Vietnam and Indonesia. 
South and Central American countries, as well as Middle East and African countries may incur some custom charges. 

Do you support sustainable fashion? We do! Our current offer includes clothes & home accessories made using locally-harvested materials (cotton, bamboo, indigo, mango, ebony fruits, hash from burnt banana trees), made by rural communities in Thailand, Laos and Cambodia.

What if my parcel goes missing? Although this event is not really likely, if that happens we'll send you a replacement box, covering all expenses.   

Can I cancel my subscription plan? Yes, you can cancel at anytime .

Is the exchange/return cost included? Exchanges are free for Usa, Europe, China, Hong Kong and Macao on the $69, $99 and $299 boxes. For boxes at $39 we offer free exchanges for China, Hong Kong and Macao. For Usa and Europe we still offer free exchanges, however, only with our 3 months subscription plans. 

  • Hawaii and Alaska: We’ll apply an extra shipping fee of $15 which will cover both returns and exchange. Customers get free exchanges on $299 boxes. 
  • Canada & Australia: For certain areas within Canada, we’ll apply an extra $15 shipping fee that will cover both returns and exchanges. We’re already working to reduce the return/exchange fee and we’ll give an immediate notice to our bakers via email and trough our social media channels once it happens. Customers get free exchanges on $299 boxes.
  • Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Korea: We are working to offer free exchanges to local warehouse for our customers in Singapore, Malaysia, Japan and Korea. We’ll give an immediate notice to our bakers via email and trough our social media channels once it happens.

If you have more questions on return and exchanges, please email us at service@moooh.net and we’ll answer within 12 hours.

story:
Short Summary

This campaign is to help my family's costuming business expand our services.  We have been in business for over thirty years, vending at Science Fiction conventions and Medieval/Renaissance festivals.  It started out as a hobby, but over the past few years we've been working hard to make this our full time business. 

We offer some embroidery services, and custom embroidery digitizing already, but our equipment just cannot keep up with our ideas and the demand that we have.  We have a lot of great ideas to expand our clothing line, including more high-end garments with tons of embellishments, and for that we need a better embroidery machine.

What We Need

What we need is one or two multi-thread industrial embroidery machines that can handle being run for long periods of time every day.  That can stitch faster, with better quality, without having to be continually supervised by a human.  (Do you have any idea the frustration that develops when one has to constantly put down the project in hand just to deal with a cranky machine that is supposed to run itself?)  We need a machine that will allow us to create larger and more complicated finished pieces in a single session.  We are going to use this campaign to offer preorders of custom embroidered merchandise made with the new machine.

After a lot of research, we have narrowed down our choices to two models

  • the Brother Entrepreneur PR655 (6 needles)
  • the Brother Entrepreneur Pro PR1000e (10 needles)


Our fundraising goals:

  • Goal 1: $14,000 (One 6 needle machine)
  • Goal 2: $18,000 (One 10 needle machine)
  • Goal 3: $29,000 (Two 6 needle machines)
  • Goal 4: $37,000 (Two 10 needle machines)

These fundraising goals cover the price of the machine(s), materials fees and shipping for perks, Indiegogo's fees, and all applicable taxes.  Any money beyond our goal will be used to purchase supplies and accessories for embroidery.  (Extra embroidery hoops, stabilizer, thread, fabric, software upgrades, etc.)

Our Perks

We have many different donation perks available that will be made for you when we hit our funding goal and are able to purchase the embroidery machine.  Bags, patches, masks, custom costumes, even teddy bears!  Get something special made for your friends and family for this holiday season, or just treat yourself.  For whatever perk you choose, with the exception of the mystery swatch, you get to select the colors of the fabric, the embroidered decoration, and the color of the embroidery design.  Pick an embroidery design from our catalog (photos after the perk descriptions) or a monogram.  All of the donation perks at $50 and over come with the option of us creating a custom embroidery design based off of your own artwork!  Shipping fees inside the US are included in the perk prices.  (If you live outside of the United States and want one of our perks, please contact us before you contribute for a shipping estimate.)

$10 - Mystery Swatch

When making new embroidery designs, we have to make a test stitch-out first to check for quality before use on our merchandise.  This results in a LOT of random pieces of embroidery floating around the shop, many of which are on scraps or oddly-shaped pieces of fabric that are too small to be used with our regular garment patterns.  For a $10 donation, we'll send you one of them.  Which design?  What colors?  No peeking, its a surprise!

$15 - Mask

(Above, Fleur dis Lis Mask in various color combinations)

For $15, we will send you one of our embroidered fabric masks.  These are made from cotton, are very comfortable, and as a bonus are machine washable!  Pick from either our fleur dis lis mask, or the vine mask in the colors of your choice.

(Below, the Vine Mask in various color combinations)


$15 - Mini-Pennant / Belt Favor

(Above, Favors on a performer's basket for decoration and as a subtle way to inform that credit cards are accepted.)

Decorate with a small flag embroidered with a design of your choice.  Hang it on the wall, display it on your boat, use your imagination!  Medieval reenactors often like to show household affiliations or personal affections by hanging one of these favors on their belts.  Choose the colors of your choice and a design from our catalog or a custom monogram.

$25 - Drawstring Pouch

Everyone needs something to hold small valuables.  For $25, we will send you a lined drawstring pouch.  This pouch is large enough to hold a deck of cards, your wallet and phone, a large number of dice, or whatever other small treasures you can think of.  You get to pick an embroidered design from our catalog or a custom monogram, with embroidery and fabric in the color your choosing.

$30 - Teddy Bear

We rescue orphaned teddy bears.  Loveable as they are, we can't keep them all!  Surely you can help provide a home for one, two, or even ten.  Everyone needs a cuddly companion.  Bears are good company for your children, they can watch your office desk while you are out to lunch.  For a $30 adoption fee, we will send you a 12" teddy bear with a tunic.  (We can't have bare bears running around!)  Pick an embroidery design from our catalog or a custom monogram, and the colors of your choice, and when this campaign is a success you will provide a home for a sweet bear.


$15 - Iron-on Patch

$50 - Iron-on Patches (set of 6)

(Above and below, Sample patches)

One of the requests that we've been getting constantly ever since we started embroidering our merchandise has been for patches.  Especially for this campaign we are going to make them!  For $15 we will make a 3" diameter iron-on patch in your choice of colors and with a monogram or design from our catalog.  For $50, you will get a matching set of six patches, and you also have the option of sending us your artwork for a custom embroidery design.


$50 - Embroidered Shoulder Bag

(Above, a shoulder bag with a giant wolf)
 Everyone needs something to carry their belongings in!  Why not one of our shoulder bags, in the colors and with a large embroidery design of your choice from our catalog?  As an alternative, we can embroider it with your name or a custom monogram instead.

$100 - Embroidered Men's Surcoat

(Above, a pair of members from House Selohaar in men's surcoats.)

Here are a couple of our happy customers wearing matching men's surcoats that we made for them with their house symbol embroidered on the left breast.  The sleeveless surcoat is suitable for wearing over your regular garb, and sturdy enough to be worn over armor while in combat (depending on the fabric of course!) 

We offer surcoats either party-colored (two-tone, as above) or solid colored (One fabric color).  For the embroidery, you can either choose one of our stock designs, or send us a graphic and we will make a custom design.  The fabrics you may pick from are regular cotton, heavy cotton twill, or trigger (a poly-cotton blend.) 

This is a one-size-fits-most garment, after all there is no such thing as one-size-fits-all!  As you can see in the photo above, when worn with a belt our men's surcoat looks fantastic on many body types.  We will contact you after the campaign has succeeded to get your preferences on fabric, colors, and the embroidery design.

(Below, a men's surcoat and a matching teddy bear we made for an EMT)

$500 Men's Houppelande

(Left, a black and green houppelande.  Right, a black and red houppelande in combat.)

With full sleeves, decorated with square dags, our men's houppelande is a fancy Medieval overshirt fine enough to wear before the king (in fact they have been worn by Kings in the SCA), yet sturdy enough to wear over armor and take into combat.  Worn with a belt, this men’s garment emphasizes the shoulders, while allowing you to show off your legs for the ladies.  It can be worn alone, or over one of our collared tunics and a pair of hose.  Our most popular garment, we’ve sold hundreds of these over the years with many satisfied customers in the Society for Creative Anachronism, at medieval events, and Renaissance faires.  We are offering them at a special price just for our Indiegogo backers.  You can see more photos of houppelandes that we've made over the years on Hobbitronics' houppelande page.

Our dagged houppelande can be two-toned (as in the photos) or solid colored with a contrasting sleeve lining.  We can can make them in cotton, trigger, linen, wool, or silk.  Pick your colors, and we will decorate the dags (square tabs) on the sleeves with the design of your choice.

(Below, a custom black and white houppelande with ermines decorating the black dags.)


$800 - Custom Angel-Wing Dress


(Prototype custom-embroidered Angelwing Dress)

Our highest level perk, the custom Angelwing Dress.  For a special price just for our Indiegogo backers we will make this dress out of high-quality linen, wool, heavy cotton, or silk.  Normally a commissioned piece like this would run between $1,000 and $1,500.  It will be embroidered around the neck, sleeves, and hem with the motif(s) of your choice, we can even make embroidery designs with your custom artwork!  The prototype above uses five different embroidered designs from our catalog.  After the campaign is over we will contact you to get your size information and color preferences.

(Below, sleeve detail of the prototype.  Compass stars and Celtic knotwork crescent moons in metallic thread.)

The Impact

We have been building our following by vending at more and more shows over the past couple of years.  The Maryland Faerie Festival, the Medieval Festival at Ft. Tyron Park, Estrella War, Gulf Wars, ShadowCon, are some of the events we have attended.  We have been merchanting at the Pennsic War for well over twenty years.

An industrial embroidery machine will not only allow us to make custom embellished garments in a practical time frame, it will make stockpiling smaller items such as bags, teddy bears, and bibs far easier.  We will be able to reach out to retail stores with the ability to wholesale.  Our accessories line will expand, as we will be able to add embroidered lace items, custom embroidered corsets, and prototype other ideas more quickly.  We are a small shop, and a reliable embroidery machine will free up our stitchers' time to work on the mainstay of our business, quality costumes.  With the ability to make more and better merchandise in the same amount of time, we will be able to attend larger shows and be more successful.

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help us out more?  Just know that your friends would love our perks?  Don't have any money but want to help anyway?  Then spread the word by sharing this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, or other social media account.

Our Embroidery Designs

Here are some of the embroidery designs we have available in our growing catalog that you can use on your purchase, in whatever colors you want.  You can also see many of these designs, as well as others, in better detail at the embroidery design store Knotty Rose Designs.

If there is something that you want embroidered on your donation perk that is not pictured here, please contact us.  All of the donation perks at $50 and above come with free custom digitizing (making a new embroidery design from your artwork) which is normally an extra fee.

Celtic Designs

Animals

Floral Designs

Crosses

Mystical Designs

African Designs

Medieval Designs

Tribal Designs

Mottos and Phrases

Miscellaneous Designs

We are also giving you the option of a custom monogram for many of our perks.  The fonts we are offering are Tiffany, Eliza, Medley, Pawprint, Elder Futhark (runes), and Klingon.


If there is something that you want embroidered on your donation perk that is not pictured here, please contact us.  All donations of $50 and up come with free digitizing (making a new embroidery design from artwork) which is normally an extra fee.

Goal 2: $18,000 (One 10 needle machine)

Goal 3: $29,000 (Two 6 needle machines)
Goal 4: $37,000 (Two 10 needle machines)

These fundraising goals cover the price of the machine(s), materials fees and shipping for perks, Indiegogo's fees, and all applicable taxes.  Any money beyond our goal will be used to purchase supplies and accessories for embroidery.  (Extra embroidery hoops, stabilizer, thread, fabric, software upgrades, etc.)
Our Perks
We have many different donation perks available that will be made for you when we hit our funding goal and are able to purchase the embroidery machine.  Bags, patches, masks, custom costumes, even teddy bears!  Get something special made for your friends and family for this holiday season, or just treat yourself.  For whatever perk you choose, with the exception of the mystery swatch, you get to select the colors of the fabric, the embroidered decoration, and the color of the embroidery design.  Pick an embroidery design from our catalog (photos after the perk descriptions) or a monogram.  All of the donation perks at $50 and over come with the option of us creating a custom embroidery design based off of your own artwork!  Shipping fees inside the US are included in the perk prices.  (If you live outside of the United States and want one of our perks, please contact us before you contribute for a shipping estimate.)
$10 - Mystery Swatch
When making new embroidery designs, we have to make a test stitch-out first to check for quality before use on our merchandise.  This results in a LOT of random pieces of embroidery floating around the shop, many of which are on scraps or oddly-shaped pieces of fabric that are too small to be used with our regular garment patterns.  For a $10 donation, we'll send you one of them.  Which design?  What colors?  No peeking, its a surprise!
$15 - Mask
(Above, Fleur dis Lis Mask in various color combinations)
For $15, we will send you one of our embroidered fabric masks.  These are made from cotton, are very comfortable, and as a bonus are machine washable!  Pick from either our fleur dis lis mask, or the vine mask in the colors of your choice.
(Below, the Vine Mask in various color combinations)

$15 - Mini-Pennant / Belt Favor

(Above, Favors on a performer's basket for decoration and as a subtle way to inform that credit cards are accepted.)Decorate with a small flag embroidered with a design of your choice.  Hang it on the wall, display it on your boat, use your imagination!  Medieval reenactors often like to show household affiliations or personal affections by hanging one of these favors on their belts.  Choose the colors of your choice and a design from our catalog or a custom monogram.
$25 - Drawstring Pouch


Everyone needs something to hold small valuables.  For $25, we will send you a lined drawstring pouch.  This pouch is large enough to hold a deck of cards, your wallet and phone, a large number of dice, or whatever other small treasures you can think of.  You get to pick an embroidered design from our catalog or a custom monogram, with embroidery and fabric in the color your choosing.
$30 - Teddy Bear

We rescue orphaned teddy bears.  Loveable as they are, we can't keep them all!  Surely you can help provide a home for one, two, or even ten.  Everyone needs a cuddly companion.  Bears are good company for your children, they can watch your office desk while you are out to lunch.  For a $30 adoption fee, we will send you a 12" teddy bear with a tunic.  (We can't have bare bears running around!)  Pick an embroidery design from our catalog or a custom monogram, and the colors of your choice, and when this campaign is a success you will provide a home for a sweet bear.


$15 - Iron-on Patch
$50 - Iron-on Patches (set of 6)
(Above and below, Sample patches)
One of the requests that we've been getting constantly ever since we started embroidering our merchandise has been for patches.  Especially for this campaign we are going to make them!  For $15 we will make a 3" diameter iron-on patch in your choice of colors and with a monogram or design from our catalog.  For $50, you will get a matching set of six patches, and you also have the option of sending us your artwork for a custom embroidery design.

$50 - Embroidered Shoulder Bag

(Above, a shoulder bag with a giant wolf)
Everyone needs something to carry their belongings in!  Why not one of our shoulder bags, in the colors and with a large embroidery design of your choice from our catalog?  As an alternative, we can embroider it with your name or a custom monogram instead.
$100 - Embroidered Men's Surcoat

(Above, a pair of members from House Selohaar in men's surcoats.)
Here are a couple of our happy customers wearing matching men's surcoats that we made for them with their house symbol embroidered on the left breast.  The sleeveless surcoat is suitable for wearing over your regular garb, and sturdy enough to be worn over armor while in combat (depending on the fabric of course!)  
We offer surcoats either party-colored (two-tone, as above) or solid colored (One fabric color).  For the embroidery, you can either choose one of our stock designs, or send us a graphic and we will make a custom design.  The fabrics you may pick from are regular cotton, heavy cotton twill, or trigger (a poly-cotton blend.)  
This is a one-size-fits-most garment, after all there is no such thing as one-size-fits-all!  As you can see in the photo above, when worn with a belt our men's surcoat looks fantastic on many body types.  We will contact you after the campaign has succeeded to get your preferences on fabric, colors, and the embroidery design.
(Below, a men's surcoat and a matching teddy bear we made for an EMT)
$500 Men's Houppelande
(Left, a black and green houppelande.  Right, a black and red houppelande in combat.)With full sleeves, decorated with square dags, our men's houppelande is a fancy Medieval overshirt fine enough to wear before the king (in fact they have been worn by Kings in the SCA), yet sturdy enough to wear over armor and take into combat.  Worn with a belt, this men’s garment emphasizes the shoulders, while allowing you to show off your legs for the ladies.  It can be worn alone, or over one of our collared tunics and a pair of hose.  Our most popular garment, we’ve sold hundreds of these over the years with many satisfied customers in the Society for Creative Anachronism, at medieval events, and Renaissance faires.  We are offering them at a special price just for our Indiegogo backers.  You can see more photos of houppelandes that we've made over the years on Hobbitronics' houppelande page.
Our dagged houppelande can be two-toned (as in the photos) or solid colored with a contrasting sleeve lining.  We can can make them in cotton, trigger, linen, wool, or silk.  Pick your colors, and we will decorate the dags (square tabs) on the sleeves with the design of your choice.
(Below, a custom black and white houppelande with ermines decorating the black dags.)

$800 - Custom Angel-Wing Dress

(Prototype custom-embroidered Angelwing Dress)
Our highest level perk, the custom Angelwing Dress.  For a special price just for our Indiegogo backers we will make this dress out of high-quality linen, wool, heavy cotton, or silk.  Normally a commissioned piece like this would run between $1,000 and $1,500.  It will be embroidered around the neck, sleeves, and hem with the motif(s) of your choice, we can even make embroidery designs with your custom artwork!  The prototype above uses five different embroidered designs from our catalog.  After the campaign is over we will contact you to get your size information and color preferences.
(Below, sleeve detail of the prototype.  Compass stars and Celtic knotwork crescent moons in metallic thread.)

The Impact
We have been building our following by vending at more and more shows over the past couple of years.  The Maryland Faerie Festival, the Medieval Festival at Ft. Tyron Park, Estrella War, Gulf Wars, ShadowCon, are some of the events we have attended.  We have been merchanting at the Pennsic War for well over twenty years. An industrial embroidery machine will not only allow us to make custom embellished garments in a practical time frame, it will make stockpiling smaller items such as bags, teddy bears, and bibs far easier.  We will be able to reach out to retail stores with the ability to wholesale.  Our accessories line will expand, as we will be able to add embroidered lace items, custom embroidered corsets, and prototype other ideas more quickly.  We are a small shop, and a reliable embroidery machine will free up our stitchers' time to work on the mainstay of our business, quality costumes.  With the ability to make more and better merchandise in the same amount of time, we will be able to attend larger shows and be more successful.
Other Ways You Can Help 
Want to help us out more?  Just know that your friends would love our perks?  Don't have any money but want to help anyway?  Then spread the word by sharing this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, or other social media account.Our Embroidery Designs
Here are some of the embroidery designs we have available in our growing catalog that you can use on your purchase, in whatever colors you want.  You can also see many of these designs, as well as others, in better detail at the embroidery design store Knotty Rose Designs. 
If there is something that you want embroidered on your donation perk that is not pictured here, please contact us.   All of the donation perks at $50 and above come with free custom digitizing (making a new embroidery design from your artwork) which is normally an extra fee.
Celtic Designs

Animals Floral Designs Crosses
Mystical Designs
African Designs 


Medieval Designs


Tribal Designs

Mottos and Phrases

Miscellaneous Designs
We are also giving you the option of a custom monogram for many of our perks.  The fonts we are offering are Tiffany, Eliza, Medley, Pawprint, Elder Futhark (runes), and Klingon.
If there is something that you want embroidered on your donation perk that is not pictured here, please contact us.  All donations of $50 and up come with free digitizing (making a new embroidery design from artwork) which is normally an extra fee.

story:
For the past 10 years, my mom and I have been making and selling Babushkah™ headscarves. Little did we know that what started as just an alternative to winter hats would turn into an important part of recovery for women dealing with cancer.

The Babushkah Backstory

It all started when I told my mom I wanted a warm bandana that wouldn’t give me “hat head” like so many winter hats did. Surprisingly, we couldn’t find any bandanas made from anything but thin cotton, so she did what any mom who sews would:  She made me one.  It was perfect! It looked stylish and was really warm, with Polar Fleece on one side and pretty velvet on the other.

After getting compliments from strangers in the street and requests from friends to buy them, we decided to try our hand at a mom/daughter fashion accessories business. We poured our time (and savings!) into making what we started calling Babushkahs™ – a line of warm bandanas that were reversible and handmade, with beautiful fashion fabrics (denim, micro-suede, chenille, knits, etc.) backed with Polar Fleece.

It was at an accessories show in New York that we began getting requests from women dealing with hair loss as a result of chemotherapy. They loved our Babushkahs because they didn’t scream “cancer” like other turbans on the market and were more about fashion and style than just a way to hide hair loss.

The outpouring of requests from chemotherapy patients for a larger bandana was so overwhelming that we decided to make a Babushkah Headscarf to serve their needs even better: We added a lightweight version that was backed with wicking material to keep the scalp cool and dry. We chose fabrics that were not only stylish but were also soft and slip-proof. We fine-tuned the shape to make them even easier to tie and to provide full head-coverage if desired. But most of all, we made sure to use contemporary fabrics with a huge array of colors and patterns to flatter every face and personal style.

 

The Impact

Non-profits wanted our Babushkahs for fundraisers. Hospitals wanted them for their boutiques. Patients called asking how they could get them.  It didn’t take long for us to realize that we could help even more women if we started an online store, where women could buy them from the privacy of their own homes. So we did at http://www.headscarves.com.

Quickly we became inundated with thank-you emails and calls from women of all ages dealing with hair loss, from teens to mature women. Here is a sampling of some of the comments we’ve received:

  • "This is my fourth Babushkah. They've given me an absolute new lease on life." – Diane, age 44
  • “I’m 16 and don’t like to wear baseball caps to cover up the hair I’ve lost. But I love my Babushkah! It’s really cool and suits me.” – Stephanie, age 16
  • “My Babushkahs make me feel I’m still attractive even though I’ve lost so much hair.” – Laura, age 52
  • “Babushkahs remind me that I can fight this thing and do it with style. Thanks.” – Pat, age 39
  • “I was almost more afraid of losing my hair than the effects of chemo. But as soon as I put on my first Babushkah, I realized I could handle the hair loss without having to hide out in my house.” – Arlene, age 61
  • “I know I wear my Babushkah to cover hair loss. But everyone else thinks I’ve just got great taste and gorgeous accessories! Makes me smile.” – Kathy, age 49
  • “Thank you for my Babushkah. Can you believe that I’m actually excited to put it on in the morning? The chemo-turbans I used to wear made me feel like I belonged on Little House on the Prairie!” - Jill, age 47

Frankly, we had no idea that our little Babushkah would make such a difference! But since then, we’ve learned why. Losing one’s hair during treatment can be so traumatic that it can impede the recovery process.

“For some patients, the fear of treatment-induced alopecia is so significant that some women may refuse potentially curative chemotherapy.” (Tierney and Taylor 1991, Pruzinsky 2004).

In a study about hair loss and the treatment process, one woman said, “[Hair loss] hit me with a bang. I am not too sure if losing the breast affected me as badly. I actually couldn’t get over [my hair loss.] Your confidence is taken away from you without your hair.” (Cancer Nursing Practice, Sept 1998)

Needless to say, doing everything possible to make a patient look better can be critical to recovery. And clearly our Babushkahs help.

The Problem -- and Opportunity

Babushkahs has been a passion of ours – albeit not a profitable one. My mom and I have funded these efforts ourselves -- and we’ve only managed to squeak by. With little money for marketing, we have been forturnate that patients find us through Google, word of mouth and from the support groups and hospitals we partner with. But still, we reach only a fraction of the women we wish we could and consistently hear surprise at the existence of Babushkahs. In fact, many cancer survivors have said to us, "Where were you when I needed you?"

We can't bear to hear that anymore. Every single woman dealing with the side effects of chemo should know we're here. There just is no reason for any woman to look less than beautiful while she's battling something so traumatic.

So it's time to go big or go home. We can't afford to stay in business or grow it if we continue funding it ourselves. That’s where you come in. Your pledge will go towards:

-  relaunching our web store, with a new design and new photography

- increased marketing efforts

- improved production costs

- a new line

Plus, for every pledge received, we will donate headscarves to CancerCare, a premier national support organization (http://www.cancercare.org). Exceeding our goal means more headscarves for more women in need.

We thank you in advance for your support. Together we can make someone look -- and feel -- a bit better during and after treatment.

story:
Welcome to the party, pal!

We are Influx Clothing UK. We make T-Shirts we want to wear. If you want to wear them too then that's even better!
All our T-Shirts are printed using dye sublimation, a technique which allows the fabric to absorb the ink directly.  So no plasticy feel, no colour loss and definitely no flaking away in the wash.
We are passionate about our designs and only print using high quality techniques and the best quality products.  There's nothing worse than buying a T-Shirt you love and only being able to wear it a handful of times before the design begins to diminish or it starts to lose its shape.  Let's face it, we've all encountered the dreaded T-Shirt tail; where the garment loses its shape and flies away at the base of the back.  Don't you just hate that?!  We certainly do.  After all it's a T-Shirt not a T-Skirt!
With Influx Clothing there's no chance of that.  After intensive research and product testing we have found what we believe to be the highest quality dye sublimation garments money can buy.  Combined with the quailty of a dye sublimation print these T-shirts are certainly made to last.

We Need Your Clothes, Your Boots And Your Motorcycle

If you check us out at influxclothinguk.bigcartel.com  you'll see that we already have some awesome tees for sale. And if you want to purchase any of those then we'll happily oblige. However there are a few designs on there that are coming soon and out of stock. And that's where you come in. We want to make those new designs a reality and restock our popular designs.
The funds that we are trying to raise will allow us to purchase enough blank stock and printing consumables which we can then use to launch these products.
The products which we want to launch are:
Man Without Fear

Rust

Gwen Splash


The products we want to restock are:
Startrooper

Ooagachaka


You Shall Not Pass!

We are an already established T-Shirt company and have perfected our printing technique to an exceptionally high standard. The only risk on this fundraising campaign will be if no one wants to see us launch our awesome new designs. And that would be a sad day for humanity.

Keep The Change Ya Filthy Animal.

If you can't contribute to this campaign then that's not a problem. Thanks for taking the time to look. Feel free to follow us on Twitter @influx_clothing and spread the word of Influx.

story:
What is Signature Sparkle?

Getting tired of shopping on the same old fashioned websites, having to take a lengthy quiz just to start shopping? How about just answering three distinct questions in order to help create a style right for you? 

Welcome to Signature Sparkle! Signature Sparkle is a unique, on-line boutique that offers affordable fashion such as clothing, shoes and accessories for a widespread target audience. Why is Signature Sparkle so unique?  

Because we offer exclusive, original designs that are age, style and body type appropriate. Our customers enjoy the opportunity to only have to provide Signature Sparkle with three identifiers to get started; an age range, a personal style and a body type. 

With this information, we are able to provide a variety of customized head to toe looks that will compliment a woman’s age, style and shape. Since we only offer exclusive designs, there will be limited stock and the lines shall change on an ongoing basis to keep things fresh and exciting.

Behind The Scenes

Samantha and Kim are the co-owners of Signature Sparkle.  

Here's a little information about us!

  Samantha:  Hi, I'm Samantha and have been born into a family of entertainers.  I have worked both in front and behind the scenes for many entertainment projects, including working for one of the largest and most well-known modeling/acting training facilities in the country.  This brought me to working extensively in the fashion industry.  Having a knack for fashion, I worked my way up the ladder from assisting in the Costume Department on photo shoots to working as a Costume Designer on larger projects.  When noticing the challenges of dressing clients of different ages, styles and body types to make each one look the best she can be, I knew I was onto something, hence the idea of Signature Sparkle.

  Kim:  Hey there, I'm Kim and have studied the very nature of marketing and business from an early age. With a Bachelor Degree in Marketing, I worked in Professional Sales to understand the concept of target markets and customer relations.  Moving along, I obtained a Master Degree in Project Management concentrating on Marketing and Human Resources.  I helped create client success with organizational development and restructuring management. Needing to feed my creative outlet, I decided to stir things up a bit and joined IATSE as a Costumer to work with several celebrity Costume Designers on many popular television shows and films.  It was inevitable that I wanted to combine my business and fashion experience and geared up with Samantha for Signature Sparkle! 

What Are We Looking For?

We only need the startup costs to get the business going.  We already have our business plan, marketing plan and financial projection figures to date.  We also have several fashion designers ready to start supplying us with fantastic looks!

The startup costs will help with the design, programming, implementation and maintenance of our website, some office space and related equipment, inventory costs, various inventory management and miscellaneous software, shipping and receiving, marketing and promotions and other various operating costs.  

In reference to our prior calculations, our overhead will be fairly low to allow for higher profits.  Once the business grows, we plan to expand to a more complex business model.  

What's In It For You?

The best part is that whether you're a lady or gentleman, you can benefit from the launch of Signature Sparkle.  We have some great perks that leaves something for everyone!  Now that's definintely something to get excited about!

Customer Service Revived!

This business structure is unique and quite different than other online boutiques. Signature Sparkle not only provides quality products and services, but provides a simple tool to allow a woman to look her best at any age, style or body type. 

By seeing what an outfit looks like on a fashion model with similar criteria, the customer will have an idea of how that outfit will look on her. Signature Sparkle takes the online boutique one step further. 

The customer will be able eliminate the frustration of trying to figure out what actually looks good on her.

Spread The Word!

If you're able to donate to our campaign, that's great!  Thank you so kindly!

If funds are tight, we totally understand, but you can still help spread the word of Signature Sparkle through the Indiegogo share tools!

All assistance is appreciated!

Bachelor Degree in Marketing, I worked in Professional
Sales to understand the concept of target markets and customer relations.  Moving along, I obtained a Master Degree in
Project Management concentrating on Marketing and Human Resources.  I helped create client success with organizational
development and restructuring management. Needing to feed my creative outlet, I decided to stir things up a bit and joined IATSE as a Costumer to work with several celebrity
Costume Designers on many popular television shows and films.  It was inevitable that I wanted to combine my business and fashion experience and geared up with Samantha for Signature Sparkle! 


What Are We Looking For?
We only need the startup costs to get the business going.  We already have our business plan, marketing plan and financial projection figures to date.  We also have several fashion designers ready to start supplying us with fantastic looks!
The startup costs will help with the design, programming, implementation and maintenance of our website, some office space and related equipment, inventory costs, various inventory management and miscellaneous software, shipping and receiving, marketing and promotions and other various operating costs.  
In reference to our prior calculations, our overhead will be fairly low to allow for higher profits.  Once the business grows, we plan to expand to a more complex business model.  
What's In It For You?
The best part is that whether you're a lady or gentleman, you can benefit from the launch of Signature Sparkle.  We have some great perks that leaves something for everyone!  Now that's definintely something to get excited about!
Customer Service Revived!

This business structure is unique and quite different than other
online boutiques. Signature Sparkle not only provides quality products and
services, but provides a simple tool to allow a woman to look her best at any
age, style or body type. 


By seeing what an outfit looks like on a fashion model
with similar criteria, the customer will have an idea of how that outfit will
look on her. Signature Sparkle takes the online boutique one step further. 


The
customer will be able eliminate the frustration of trying to figure out what
actually looks good on her.

Spread The Word!
If you're able to donate to our campaign, that's great!  Thank you so kindly!
If funds are tight, we totally understand, but you can still help spread the word of Signature Sparkle through the Indiegogo share tools!
All assistance is appreciated!

story:
MINIM · The wallet

A minimalist wallet constructed from soft Italian leather and high-quality elastic.


MINIM it's not just a wallet, it's a new experience to carry your cards, keys or even a pendrive.

  • Tight performance
  • No limit of cards, unless you carry more than 30 !!!
  • Never forget your wallet or keys
  • Fashionable and minimalist
  • Hand-crafted in Barcelona
  • High quality elements. Genuine Italian Leather with High-Quality elastic
  • Make your pants fit better, or your butt look nicer
  • New minimalist wallet, but very resistant

Looks too small, but holds all you need.

Fashionable, modern, minimalist and exclusive.

High capacity

Colors


Production Plan

We're partnering with a small company in Barcelona that will help promote, manufacture and deliver rewards.  This partner is a small company that manufactures various leather and other material products.  
We have calculated one person can manufacture 30 wallets per hour, so we hope to reach a minimum goal of 500 units.

story:
-  FEATURES THAT WORK HARD -

( SO YOU DON'T HAVE TO )


- AVAILABLE IN FIVE LUXURIOUS COLOURS - 

( IN BEAUTIFUL SOFT CALFSKIN )



Imagine knowing where your travel card is every time you need it.  With the Model KT (and Mini KT) hands free travel card system you don't even have to get your card out - just place the flap on the card reader and go!


      


                                     

The model KT is your perfect travel companion, fitting neatly into an overhead locker, or under the seat in front of you.  The zip off clutch secures your Model KT to the top of a wheel bag, giving you hands free access to everything you need in the station or airport.  Once aboard your flight or train, your zip off clutch means that you can have your essentials with you whilst you relax with your other bags safely stowed.

      

   


Lunch dates and after work drinks are effortlessly stylish with the Model KT zip off clutch bag.

      



- 17 ORGANISATION SPACES-

( FOR EVERYTHING YOU NEED)

Pockets for everything that you need to carry; your laptop (up to 15 inches), books, pens, tablet, chargers, make-up... everything.

 - Book pockets and card slots -- Valuables zip pocket - 

- Sunglasses pocket -

- Pen pockets, slip pockets and zip pockets -

- And a USB power charger pocket-

(Power charger inclusive with Model KT POWER)


A few more features we shouldn't miss...

- Reusable shopping bag - 

(tucked in its own pocket of course) 

- Key Clip -

- Tidy wires pouch -

(Which can of course be used for anything you desire)



Jennifer Hamley England designs for the stylish, high performing women of today.  Women who live life by their own rules, who work hard & follow their dreams.

The Model K.T. Capsule Collection is synonymous with these women; fashion forward, hard working and full of personality.  The Collection was inspired by these women and it focuses on enabling them to be the best versions of themselves.

The final designs are unparalleled in terms of organisation, they'll make your life simpler and easier, without compromising luxurious materials and eye-catching design.




Now we need your help to make the collection a reality.  Your investment will mean that we can put the Capsule Collection into production, giving Jennifer Hamley England the boost it needs to get into the market place and thrive.  To thank you for being an early investor in the company, we have a selection of rewards that we will send out once we are fully funded (along with our thanks of course!)


ALL INVESTOR PERKS BELOW, SCROLL DOWN TO CHOOSE YOUR FAVOURITE!


The Model K.T.Winner of two awards at the Independent Handbag Designer Awards in New York 2015, the Model K.T. is the centrepiece of the collection. Combining luxury quality & design, with everyday organisation. 

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)

Length 38cm, Height 28cm, Depth 12cm.

Available in Black, Chocolate, Aubergine, Salamander and Teal


Click the video below for a tour of the Model KT - early bird offer £100 off!!




Our beautifully branded canvas reusable shopping bag, printed with the Jennifer Hamley England pattern, plus a signed thank you card from Jennifer herself!

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)


Click the video below for a 3D tour of our exclusive canvas shopping bag




Lightweight and compact, the Sakura coin purse fits neatly into your pocket or favourite handbag. Made from soft calfskin and featuring separate sections for your coins and cards. Length 13cm, width 9cm.

We will email for your colour choice at the end of the campaign - so change your mind as often as you like!

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)

               


Click the video below to see the Sakura purse in action - 20% discount for Earlybirds!






Already a favourite with style bloggers and 30% the size of the Model KT, the Mini KT is the answer to lighter workdays and stylish weekend wear. It features the same luxurious calfskin leather and intuitive zip off clutch to carry you seamlessly from your desk to dinner. Length 27cm, Height 21cm, Depth 7.5.  

I'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to find out what colour bag you want - so change your mind as often as you want until then!  Available in Teal, Aubergine and Black.   

      (FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)              


Click the video below for a tour of the Mini KT - 20% off right now for Early birds!



Always running out of battery when you are on the go?  I was, so I designed The Model K.T. Power, which comes with our own USB power pack that will charge most phones up to 4 times! It's ideal if you're always on the go and struggle to find the nearest power source! Plus it's compatible with almost any device!

I'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to find out what colour bag you want - so change your mind as often as you want until then.  Available in Teal, Chocolate, Salamander, Aubergine and Black.

Save £150 early bird!

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)




Want the whole collection?  No problem!  Make great savings by ordering all three pieces right now.  Feel free to mix and match your leather colours too to make the collection your own.

I'll be in touch at the end of the campaign to find out what colour bags you want - so change your mind as often as you want until then.  The Model KT is available in Teal, Chocolate, Salamander, Aubergine and Black.  The Sakura and Mini KT available in Teal, Aubergine and Black.

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)




Limited: COLLECTORS EDITION 

(FREE shipping to USA, EU and Canada)

A beautiful Hand Painted Model K.T. bag, painted by Jennifer herself - Any design you choose.  Jennifer will meet/speak with you to discuss your artwork and then create your exclusive one-of-a-kind piece.  One to treasure for years and years to come.

Available in Teal, Chocolate, Salamander, Aubergine and Black.

RRP: priceless

Click the video below to see the moment that Jennifer decided that she would paint ANYTHING on your Collectors Edition Model KT work bag for you!



Want to be an early founder of Jennifer Hamley England AND be one of the first to stock our growing brand?   The retail package is priced to give a 2.5 mark up and is our best value reward tier including 5 Model K.T. bags in any colour of your choice (Available in Teal, Chocolate, Salamander, Aubergine and Black) 5 mini K.T. workbags in any colour of your choice (Available in Teal, Aubergine and Black) and 15 Sakura Coin purses, again in any colour of your choice! (Available in Teal, Aubergine and Black)







Up until about two years ago I was running a different business. I was the designer and maker of creative feather hair accessories.

I’ve always wanted to work for myself and have always been a creative, so it was the perfect venture for me at the time. 

At the same time I was getting tired and restless with what I was making – I wanted to escape from the wedding industry and instead start doing what I’ve always wanted to do; Design luxury handbags for women that WORK. My desire to achieve more led me to the London College of Fashion and to a course in Handbag design.

I was thrilled and I was terrified. I knew I wanted to make a change, but how would I take on the world of handbags? It was such a huge leap for me!

Then one weekend in February 2014 I attended a weekend course called ‘Unlocking the Will to Act’ and I spoke to the trainer’s daughter. She asked me what my plans were for the future. I told her that I had a business, but that one day my big dream was to have my own high-end handbag label. She then asked me these magic questions which changed everything. 

‘When? ’ and ‘Why not now? '


The Model KT work bag is named after this lady, Katie as she was the catalyst that made me take the enormous leap of faith.


Within a few of months, I had closed down my last business and had started developing my new venture. It was scary, but I kept on going. I attended more and more conferences and seminars and started to make connections with strong and driven entrepreneurs and business women.


These women were a different breed of human, they were exciting, they believed in themselves, they thought that anything was possible and they were passionate – I wanted to be near them, I wanted to be one of them and I soon realised that I wanted to design my bags for them. I wanted to design handbags that would help them to be the best version of themselves. I was inspired to create designs that would make their lives easier without compromising luxury style, so they could focus on being incredible!




Our team, led by designer and founder Jennifer Hamley, is dedicated to delivering high-quality work bags to all our customers.  We're truly grateful for your interest in our campaign and the Model KT work bag, the Mini KT and the Sakura coin purse.

In preparation for this campaign, we have selected manufacturers that meet our standards of production and we have had numerous samples made by them which have been thoroughly tested. We are very happy with the craftsmanship and quality delivered by them.  Members of our team have visited the manufacturers, quality checked and made sure that their practices are professional, precise and ethical; matching our own brand values.

We have a reliable relationship with our shipping company and a team of hardworking individuals to fulfil orders when the rewards are ready to send out. Your reward will arrive with you beautifully packaged by the team.

Once we get the go-ahead, everyone will be ready to leap into action!  All of our partners have many years of experience in what they do.

Everyone will be doing everything to deliver your rewards within the timescales above. We promise to keep you up to date as things happen and you can rest safe in the knowledge that your rewards will be insured against loss or damage. 

In the time that the team have worked in the fashion industry, they have learnt that delays are sometimes inevitable.  Our delivery timeline is accurate to account for slight hiccups, though if everything runs smoothly we hope to be able to ship out rewards early.  Fingers crossed! 

We will cover shipping for all rewards (ain’t that nice!)  Backers living outside of the UK may be subject to import duty and local taxes on delivery of your reward and will be responsible for these locally.  This campaign does not cover local duties and taxes in your own country. 

The rewards pictured in the campaign are our final samples from our manufacturers.  Your reward will be the same high-quality materials, but will look even better, we can’t wait for you to receive it.

Thank you so much!

Jennifer Hamley
