story:
The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes are the world's first Intel™  powered smart shoes to maximize athletic training, running and weight loss. Embedded with the Intel®️ Curie™️, the shoes monitor your daily activity and store relevant data from your exercises - distance, speed, calories burned, and types of movement. Fitness tracking in recent times has consisted of incorporating a wearable device such as a wristband or smartwatch into your routine, but The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes eliminates this need. 

 

"With anti-skid features, air cushions, soles with arch support, and antibacterial insoles, this wouldn’t be an uncomfortable pair of sneakers to have around" - Digital Trends

"Powered by Intel, they look treadfully good" - Wareable

"This could be an ideal product for someone who does not like to wear any activity bands or fitness trackers" - Gizmo Report​​

 



90FUN Smart Sport Shoe's built-in sensors give runners a more ergonomic and intuitive training experience. You’ll see how well your workout has improved via the app and without the need for other wearable devices. Data is stored and synced through Bluetooth LE, even when you don’t bring your phone with you. The'll help you reach your goals, improve your running pace and performance. They are ideal for a marathon or long distance training and overall improvement of a daily fitness regime.


90FUN Smart Sport Shoes help runners track workouts without needing a mobile device or wearable activity tracker. Intel®️ Curie™️ chip stores fitness data in real time, and counts your steps, distance covered, speed, and calories burned, all the while sitting in your shoe and being barely noticeable. The Intel®️ Curie™️ is more accurate than a fitness band or smartwatch as it literally tracks your activity step-by-step.

Detects Your Type Of Movement

The shoes can detect whether you're walking, running, cycling or even climbing. At the end of each day you’ll get a report of your distance traveled, speed and calories burned on the Mi Home app.
 

Intel®️ Curie™️ Chip

The smarts behind the 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes is the Intel®️ Curie™️, a coin-sized 32-bit SoC based on the Quark SE platform that has a 6-axis sensor, accelerometer, and a gyroscope. The module’s battery runs for up to 60 days and holds enough computing power to crunch all of the data recorded from your workout and transmit it over Bluetooth LE to your phone.

The smart chip is similar to an ARM chip found in most fitness trackers. The Intel®️ Curie™️ stands apart by using the x86 instruction set -the kind you’d find in a desktop CPU- and has 384 kB of flash memory and 80 KB of SRAM.

The module is IP67 water-resistant and is inserted into the right shoe. The system is similar to the Nike+ sensor except it does a better job of cataloging and tracking your data.

It’s battery life can last up to 60 days on a single charge or an average of 800 km of running. It is easily charged by USB and is placed in either shoe to track your training data. 

Mi Home App

Connecting your smart shoes to your phone is done easily through the Mi Home app.


The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes are made from a foam-like material for additional comfort which soaks in the impact from your feet hitting the ground. The multiple layers give runners total comfort and provide lasting durability. They have heel-piece air cushions, antibacterial removable insoles, scattering heel-piece landing impact, and spring-back energy to keep your feet healthy.

The 90FUN Smart Shoes feature an arc design so that the soles of your feet are always looked after.

 

Another impressive feature which sets these shoes apart is their anti-skid functionality. Due to using highly specialized rubber the shoes do not skid or slip.

These brilliant shoes are designed for training and movement. The ankles and heel of the shoes contain a soft velvet composite SBR (high-elastic styrene-butadiene rubber) which helps stabilize their fit and prevents them from slipping off. The body of the shoe is made from a mixture of fabric and synthetic leather, which acts as a cushion and soaks in the impact generated from your foot hitting the ground. The super breathable mesh cloth has excellent expansibility and helps keep shoes lightweight, soft, and suitable for both daily wear and training.

Our special blue edition variant shoe features reflective high-vis materials on the shoe bottom, back, and laces, making runners more visible at night. It is only available for men.

 

Developed in China as the flagship brand of Shanghai Runmi Technology Co Ltd; who are known providers of suitcases, bags, clothes, shoes and other travel and fashion products. This is the second generation of smart shoes Runmi has produced, and the first pair powered by the Intel®️ Curie™️.

Shanghai Runmi Technology Co Ltd acquired an investment from Xiaomi in 2015, becoming the first internet textile-brand start-up company in the Xiaomi eco-chain system.

Runmi is a subsidiary of Anhui Korrun Stock (200577) who has over 10 years of experience in the traditional textile industry, manufacturing backpacks for international brands such as Decathlon, Dell, and Lenovo.

​

Is the Intel®️ Curie™️ waterproof?
-The module is IP67 water-resistant and has water resistant soles. This means they are protected from dust and capable of being immersed from 15 cm to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes.

How do you charge the shoes?
-The processor derives its power from a coin sized battery that should last up to 60 days. The shoes are shipped with a USB charger so you can just plug it into the wall when the battery is low.

What devices does the app support?
-The app is supported on iOS and Android.

What smartphones are compatible with the shoe?
-Any smartphone running an iOS or Android OS and featuring Bluetooth LE is able to sync with the shoes.

How does it analyze my movement type?
-The Intel®️ Curie™️ is able to measure the movement and speed of the shoes and tell whether you are walking, running, cycling, or climbing stairs.

What battery does the Intel®️ Curie™️ use?
-The Intel®️ Curie™️ uses a small lithium battery.

How do I access my running data and analytics?
-Through the companion app: Mi Home.

Do I have to bring my phone with me to get the full features of the shoes?
-No. The Intel®️ Curie™️ inside the shoes stores the data, allowing you to leave your phone at home and connect to it when your run is over.

Are the shoes available for children?
-No, the smallest shoe sizes currently available are US 6/EUR 38.5 for men and US 4.5 /EUR 35 for women.

For Customer Support Questions:

If you have any customer support related inquiries, please email us at 90FUNshoes@gmail.com
story_txt: The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes are the world's first Intel™  powered smart shoes to maximize athletic training, running and weight loss. Embedded with the Intel®️ Curie™️, the shoes monitor your daily activity and store relevant data from your exercises - distance, speed, calories burned, and types of movement. Fitness tracking in recent times has consisted of incorporating a wearable device such as a wristband or smartwatch into your routine, but The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes eliminates this need.  "With anti-skid features, air cushions, soles with arch support, and antibacterial insoles, this wouldn’t be an uncomfortable pair of sneakers to have around" - Digital Trends"Powered by Intel, they look treadfully good" - Wareable"This could be an ideal product for someone who does not like to wear any activity bands or fitness trackers" - Gizmo Report​​ 90FUN Smart Sport Shoe's built-in sensors give runners a more ergonomic and intuitive training experience. You’ll see how well your workout has improved via the app and without the need for other wearable devices. Data is stored and synced through Bluetooth LE, even when you don’t bring your phone with you. The'll help you reach your goals, improve your running pace and performance. They are ideal for a marathon or long distance training and overall improvement of a daily fitness regime.90FUN Smart Sport Shoes help runners track workouts without needing a mobile device or wearable activity tracker. Intel®️ Curie™️ chip stores fitness data in real time, and counts your steps, distance covered, speed, and calories burned, all the while sitting in your shoe and being barely noticeable. The Intel®️ Curie™️ is more accurate than a fitness band or smartwatch as it literally tracks your activity step-by-step.Detects Your Type Of MovementThe shoes can detect whether you're walking, running, cycling or even climbing. At the end of each day you’ll get a report of your distance traveled, speed and calories burned on the Mi Home app. Intel®️ Curie™️ ChipThe smarts behind the 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes is the Intel®️ Curie™️, a coin-sized 32-bit SoC based on the Quark SE platform that has a 6-axis sensor, accelerometer, and a gyroscope. The module’s battery runs for up to 60 days and holds enough computing power to crunch all of the data recorded from your workout and transmit it over Bluetooth LE to your phone.The smart chip is similar to an ARM chip found in most fitness trackers. The Intel®️ Curie™️ stands apart by using the x86 instruction set -the kind you’d find in a desktop CPU- and has 384 kB of flash memory and 80 KB of SRAM.The module is IP67 water-resistant and is inserted into the right shoe. The system is similar to the Nike+ sensor except it does a better job of cataloging and tracking your data.It’s battery life can last up to 60 days on a single charge or an average of 800 km of running. It is easily charged by USB and is placed in either shoe to track your training data. Mi Home AppConnecting your smart shoes to your phone is done easily through the Mi Home app.The 90FUN Smart Sport Shoes are made from a foam-like material for additional comfort which soaks in the impact from your feet hitting the ground. The multiple layers give runners total comfort and provide lasting durability. They have heel-piece air cushions, antibacterial removable insoles, scattering heel-piece landing impact, and spring-back energy to keep your feet healthy.The 90FUN Smart Shoes feature an arc design so that the soles of your feet are always looked after. Another impressive feature which sets these shoes apart is their anti-skid functionality. Due to using highly specialized rubber the shoes do not skid or slip.These brilliant shoes are designed for training and movement. The ankles and heel of the shoes contain a soft velvet composite SBR (high-elastic styrene-butadiene rubber) which helps stabilize their fit and prevents them from slipping off. The body of the shoe is made from a mixture of fabric and synthetic leather, which acts as a cushion and soaks in the impact generated from your foot hitting the ground. The super breathable mesh cloth has excellent expansibility and helps keep shoes lightweight, soft, and suitable for both daily wear and training.Our special blue edition variant shoe features reflective high-vis materials on the shoe bottom, back, and laces, making runners more visible at night. It is only available for men. Developed in China as the flagship brand of Shanghai Runmi Technology Co Ltd; who are known providers of suitcases, bags, clothes, shoes and other travel and fashion products. This is the second generation of smart shoes Runmi has produced, and the first pair powered by the Intel®️ Curie™️.Shanghai Runmi Technology Co Ltd acquired an investment from Xiaomi in 2015, becoming the first internet textile-brand start-up company in the Xiaomi eco-chain system.Runmi is a subsidiary of Anhui Korrun Stock (200577) who has over 10 years of experience in the traditional textile industry, manufacturing backpacks for international brands such as Decathlon, Dell, and Lenovo.​Is the Intel®️ Curie™️ waterproof?-The module is IP67 water-resistant and has water resistant soles. This means they are protected from dust and capable of being immersed from 15 cm to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes.How do you charge the shoes?-The processor derives its power from a coin sized battery that should last up to 60 days. The shoes are shipped with a USB charger so you can just plug it into the wall when the battery is low.What devices does the app support?-The app is supported on iOS and Android.What smartphones are compatible with the shoe?-Any smartphone running an iOS or Android OS and featuring Bluetooth LE is able to sync with the shoes.How does it analyze my movement type?-The Intel®️ Curie™️ is able to measure the movement and speed of the shoes and tell whether you are walking, running, cycling, or climbing stairs.What battery does the Intel®️ Curie™️ use?-The Intel®️ Curie™️ uses a small lithium battery.How do I access my running data and analytics?-Through the companion app: Mi Home.Do I have to bring my phone with me to get the full features of the shoes?-No. The Intel®️ Curie™️ inside the shoes stores the data, allowing you to leave your phone at home and connect to it when your run is over.Are the shoes available for children?-No, the smallest shoe sizes currently available are US 6/EUR 38.5 for men and US 4.5 /EUR 35 for women.For Customer Support Questions:If you have any customer support related inquiries, please email us at 90FUNshoes@gmail.com

story:
Quite simply, the best invention ever...  

The CowBro is a combination of trucker cap and cowboy hat.  It has a white foam front and red mesh back, just like your favorite trucker cap.  A blue, wire brim allows you to shape it any way you like, to perfect your look.  A stretch liner fits comfortably around any head size.  You can beat this thing up and it will never lose it's shape, cause it's Country Strong!  Complete the look with a "USA" logo on the crown and you are good to go! 

One size fits most!

Buy yours today and be one of the first people to rock the CowBro, just in time for festival season!!!  Oh Baby!

Find Your Inner CowBro!

story:
THE DETAILS

Why Aioga ("Why I Yoga")

  • Improved brain function
  • Better sleep
  • Improved eating habits
  • Decreased stress & anxiety
  • Increased focus & concentration
  • Improved heart function
  • Increased libido and sexual function
  • Better posture
  • Increased bone density
  • Decreased susceptibility to depression
  • Improved lung capacity
  • Relief from chronic neck and back pain
  • Increased strength & flexibility

The list of indisputable, scientifically proven benefits of yoga practice is long and continuously growing by the day. The evidence of yoga as a means to a happier, healthier life is beyond compelling.

Yet, despite this fact, the stereotypes and stigmas surrounding the practice continue to dissuade many from even giving it a shot.

This tragic dichotomy was the impetus for Aioga - and this essentially defined our mission: To demystify yoga... to help people understand that they don't have to change anything about themselves or leave anything behind in order to take up the practice. Come as you are.

Every path and every practice is unique.



What we want to communicate most of all is that, with Aioga in your corner, you don't have to give up any part of yourself or to change a thing in order to bring all the incredible benefits of yoga practice into your life. Come as you are.

We live in a moment in time when we, as a society, are beginning to understand that we have the capacity to LIVE BETTER than previous generations. With the Aioga tools and resources, you'll have the ability to find those ideas that resonate most with who you are and where you're heading, and you'll have the ability to integrate them into your life in whatever way serves you best.

And, of course, we'll be providing the apparel you'll want with you every step of the way, no matter where your active lifestyle leads you.

WHAT YOU GET!

These logo print designs go a long way to communicate our style and identity, and with your contributions, we'll have the means necessary to take this Aioga aesthetic and translate it into our high quality, high-performance apparel.  

All of our t-shirts, tanks, and sweatshirts are printed on the uber-soft Bella + Canvas garments. Bella + Canvas received a WRAP Gold Rating , ensuring their impeccable dedication to the best business and production standards with regard to the environment, health and safety standards, human resources management, etc. For more information, see the WRAP details below the Aioga  perks section.

After the campaign closes, we will send you a link to a page where you'll choose which of the many color combos you'd prefer.




'Aioga' is not just a brand name... it's a statement.

Inherent in that word, "Aioga" (pronounced "I yoga") is the declaration that "I practice yoga. I'm fully invested in myself and in being the best version of me that I can possibly be."

'Aioga' is a call to action - a lifestyle - a state of being. It's a recognition that Life is a journey - that we never stop learning and we never stop growing - and "I'm on-board for the whole ride."

No longer does Yoga fit into any particular box.

For years, there has seemed to be a particular "type of person" who practiced yoga - and as such, there has been a decidedly narrow perception and aesthetic of the industry.

But those days are behind us.

Today, people of every size, shape, and color are finding their way into the practice of yoga. Not only does practically everyone have a friend, sibling, or partner who swears by it, but we're also seeing doctors prescribe yoga for all manner of physical, psychological, and emotional ailments, and moreover, a growing number of the world's most elite athletes and organizations are integrating yoga and meditation into their workout regiments.


Yoga is SO MUCH MORE than just stretching and contorting our bodies to make shapes in space.

In fact, the physical practice we do in the studio is really just ONE of EIGHT components that, together, make up the traditional system of yoga. The other SEVEN limbs dig into ideas about self-exploration, self-discovery, how to create better relationships with ourselves, our friends, family, communities, and beyond, and that's just to name a few. Yoga helps us to simply LIVE BETTER... to find and maintain balance in mind, body, and soul.

Instead of using concepts of self-empowerment and development as slogans and gimmicks to sell products, at Aioga, these are at the very foundation of what we do and what we believe.

These ARE our products, and our apparel is simply a mechanism by which we invite our customers to embody these concepts and ideas of better living.


This leads us to the two pillars of the Aioga mission:

  1. We are dedicated to creating an endless stream of beautiful, engaging, and information-rich content to help people better understand themselves, their struggles and their strengths - as well as providing the cutting-edge, interactive online tools to support them in integrating these concepts and ideas into their everyday lives, so they can find a more complete sense of health and well-being on a day-to-day basis.

    In addition to yoga videos, we're interviewing doctors and scientists to explain how and why these tools serve us physiologically, biologically, and beyond.

    If you sit in a chair for 8 hours a day, we want you to understand what effect this has on your body, both in the short and the long term, as well as what you can do to counterbalance the negative effects.


    If you're an athlete, we want you to understand how yoga will take you to the next level, no matter what sport you play. There's a reason the world's most elite athletes and organizations are integrating yoga and mindfulness into their mandatory regiments. We'll break it down for you.

    If you twist an ankle or break a bone, we want you to have a better sense as to how this is not an isolated event, but that the detrimental effects reverberate throughout your entire body... and we'll share tips and tools for how you can reclaim balance and autonomy in your body during and after recovery.

    We're digging deep into nutrition and wellness in an effort to help you stay better informed about how you feed and sustain yourself, as well as sharing recipes and meal plans to make it easier to plan and create healthy meals for you and your family.

    We'll be constructing an online platform for you to connect with the studios, instructors, and yoga community in your neighborhood and beyond.

    And this is just the beginning of an endless supply of ideas, interviews, tools, and information we're creating to make your life easier, happier, and more complete.



  2. Secondly, with this more complete view of yoga as our inspiration, we're designing an edgier, urban-inspired alternative to the status quo. Our impeccably-designed activewear will not only provide all the comfort and functionality you'll need to hit the studio or the gym, but we're dedicated to making sure our Aioga gear will leave you feeling equally as comfortable while you're working out as you will running errands around town, grabbing a drink with friends, or hitting the skatepark to kick it for a few hours after work.

                       

    The second collection of Aioga apparel, our "Off the Mat" series, will be designed to take your favorite everyday staples from your wardrobe - your jeans, cords, skirts, dresses, etc - but to construct them using activewear materials and functionality, so you can look and feel like yourself and never feel like you have to hold back from any activity, no matter where your active lifestyle takes you.


WHAT WE NEED

Of course, starting an apparel brand and building online tools and resources all cost a lot of money.

We need $50,000 to get this thing off the ground.

As the apparel will be our primary source of monetization, the majority of this funding will go toward the design and production of our first collections of clothing. This approach will allow us to use the proceeds from our apparel as the fuel to construct the online tools and resources to keep you perpetually learning and endlessly engaged, as well as to continually creating and innovating the clothes and apparel to support your active lifestyle.


RISKS & CHALLENGES

Of course, there's inherent risk in any endeavor, and jumping into the yoga apparel market is no small hurdle.  It's a supersaturated market with some HUGE players and DEEP pockets.

With that said, we're beyond confident that we can carve out a healthy niche for ourselves by doing exactly what we do best:

  1. Creating highly functional gear for guys to practice in that they’ll feel cool and comfortable in. Somehow, nobody has done this yet... at least not effectively... which is why dudes usually show up to class in a ratty pair of high school gym shorts and a worn out t-shirt from the 2008 company picnic.



  2. For the ladies, we’ll provide an urban-inspired alternative to the monotonous cutesy-lycra look that dominates the industry today… something with a little more edge and personality. Something that suits the stylish, contemporary woman you already are.


  3. While all of our studio wear will be specifically designed to translate seamlessly to your everyday wardrobe, we’ll also create a line of denim jeans, cords, flannels, sweaters, hoodies, etc., all of which will look like your favorite casual wear, but manufactured with high performance active wear to support you perfectly, no matter where your active lifestyle might lead.


THE IMPACT

By no means does our value begin and end with the clothing we provide.

Aioga is SO MUCH MORE than just an apparel company.

What we're most interested in - what we're 100% dedicated to - is helping people live better, happier, healthier lives.

With this broader perspective of yoga serving as the foundation of everything that we do and every decision we make, it's our mission and our intention to bring mindfulness and self-exploration together with fashion and athletics in a way that will be accessible and digestible to different types of people across all walks of Life.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!


So with that, we have to ask you.... WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR!??

MAKE A STATEMENT.

JOIN THE MOVEMENT.


MAKE A PLEDGE and start your Aioga journey TODAY!


And of course, SHARE AIOGA AND THIS CAMPAIGN!!!


TWEET IT.

FACEBOOK IT.

INSTAGRAM IT.

EMAIL IT.

SEND IT VIA MAIL.

BUY A CARRIER PIDGEON.


STUFF IT IN A BOTTLE.


WHATEVER IT TAKES.

JUST SHARE IT.

story:
Be whoever you want to be – literally!


Introducing the DeepYou ONE – a wearable, digital mask that finally allows you to swap your real face for a pile of poo or a famous person like Joey Kelly, or even apply Instagram and Snapchat effects to your actual face in real time.
 


 


 

You’ll never have to be yourself again!

The DeepYou ONE can improve your life in literally any situation. Just to name a few:

  • Skip face care, hair styling or hygiene all-together
  • Pretend your ex is still around
  • Use as Covid-19 mask
  • Solve all the issues of inequality, racism, and sexism – we can finally just all be square-jawed, white males!




 

How does it work?

The DeepYou ONE projects what's on your phone's screen right in front of your face through a set of mirrors. So if, for instance, the camera feature in your Snapchat app transforms you into a laser-eyed toddler, that's what people will see on your mask instead of your real face.
 


 

You can still see the outside through a periscope-like mirror system. We call it our "See-the-outside-X-Ray"-Technology. Barely works, though.
 


 

A ring light makes sure you always look your very best. But that won’t matter so much because the convex mirror deflecting your image gives anyone a potato nose.


 

A small fan prevents the mirrors from fogging up and – because of its deafening humming noise – you from hearing what people on the outside say to you.

 


 

But at least the people on the outside can hear your claustrophobic cries for help via a compact yet powerful bluetooth speaker.
 


 


 

Compare



 

Instagram AR effects

Don't like waiting? With the DeepYou ONE AR effect, you'll be able to pretend to own the device long before it will be shipped. Choose one of the perks including the AR effect and we'll send you a secret link to the unpublished version, weeks before it hits the public Instagram effect gallery.

Or – if you'd really rather wait for the real thing – you may want to get an early version of the "No Means No" filter (as seen in the video) instead.
 




 

Risks and Challenges

The risks vary, depending on your choice of perk: 

If you consider buying access into our Instagram feed, the risk is that you’ll only be mildly impressed by our Making-Of or Behind-The-Scenes footage or even other tech products like the DeepYou ONE (some day in the future). You may also find that we don’t post enough or too much.

If you consider to actually buy the DeepYou ONE (Pro), the risk is that you’ll find the wait for it unbearably long (May 2021!) and when it will have finally arrived, you may find it super bulky and way too complicated to use for more than just a couple of times to impress your friends.



 

Is this a joke?

Well, the DeepYou ONE exists, it works, and a limited quantity (one) can be acquired as part this campaign. But…
 


… the DeepYou ONE is also my debut parody tech product with which I’m launching a “maker” Youtube channel and Instagram account and half of the profits from this campaign will help fund my next project(s). The other half of the profits will be donated to trusted organisations in the areas of Black Lives Matter, gender equality, domestic violence and cyberbullying.

#BLM!

But that won’t matter so much because the convex mirror deflecting your image gives anyone a potato nose. A small fan prevents the mirrors from fogging up and – because of its deafening humming noise – you from hearing what people on the outside say to you.  But at least the people on the outside can hear your claustrophobic cries for help via a compact yet powerful bluetooth speaker.   Compare Instagram AR effectsDon't like waiting? With the DeepYou ONE AR effect, you'll be able to pretend to own the device long before it will be shipped. Choose one of the perks including the AR effect and we'll send you a secret link to the unpublished version, weeks before it hits the public Instagram effect gallery.Or – if you'd really rather wait for the real thing – you may want to get an early version of the "No Means No" filter (as seen in the video) instead.  Risks and ChallengesThe risks vary, depending on your choice of perk: If you consider buying access into our Instagram feed, the risk is that you’ll only be mildly impressed by our Making-Of or Behind-The-Scenes footage or even other tech products like the DeepYou ONE (some day in the future). You may also find that we don’t post enough or too much.If you consider to actually buy the DeepYou ONE (Pro), the risk is that you’ll find the wait for it unbearably long (May 2021!) and when it will have finally arrived, you may find it super bulky and way too complicated to use for more than just a couple of times to impress your friends. Is this a joke?Well, the DeepYou ONE exists, it works, and a limited quantity (one) can be acquired as part this campaign. But… … the DeepYou ONE is also my debut parody tech product with which I’m launching a “maker” Youtube channel and Instagram account and half of the profits from this campaign will help fund my next project(s). The other half of the profits will be donated to trusted organisations in the areas of Black Lives Matter, gender equality, domestic violence and cyberbullying.#BLM!

story:
There are thousands of desired wallets in thousands of people's minds.

Do you need a wallet that can hold coins, business cards, notes, IC cards, keys, SIM cards, earphones, guitar picks, SD cards, rings, necklaces, or condoms?

You would like a wallet that:
Help you to carry all kinds of things you need;
Or with the compact design yet large capacity;
Or slim enough to place in any pocket......

But not a bulky one like this

In the digital era, we bring our smartphones everywhere in our pockets.
A bulky and old-fashioned wallet along with a phone has become a burden to the pocket.
Most of the wallets in the market can hardly balance the size and the capacity.


Today, we have found the solution!!! 

Fold up a piece of leather to create this Handmade No-Sew Wallet

Inspired by the Domino House that was designed by the pioneering architect Le Corbusier, we create a magic loft-style mini wallet. The design has maximized both space utilization and storage capacity that is far beyond imagination. 

We have made the wallet as small as possible and meet the demands of daily life.

Fold the note in half and place it on top of the cards to measure the minimum size. 
Add 5mm stitches and 3mm margin, it becomes 86mm * 94mm in size.

Is this the smallest? 

No, not yet! What not get rid of the 5mm-wide stitches?

Yes, we redesign it and get a folding wallet with 5mm less.
It is made by folding a piece of leather without sewing. 

Our designer has studied and tried many folding methods and finally discovered the best solution.

The “Handmade No-Sew Wallet” set new standards in wallet design. 

The seamless finishing not only reduces the size by 5mm but also makes the design look novel.

This unique folding structure enhances durability and decreases the deformation remarkably.

It is 83×90mm in size, about 16mm in thickness, and about 35g in weight.

The wallet has a slim design yet a large capacity.

You can put 35 pieces of notes, 40 coins, 8 cards, and 16 business cards in it.

A card slot on the front.

The front and back snap buttons are designed for convenient opening and closing. 

It is a little larger than a credit card.

Just fold the note in half and you can easily place it in, and for others, you can fold it into one-third.

Simply place in and quickly take out for convenient use. 

If you unsnap the two snap buttons together, you can simply open the wallet, see what's inside clearer and take out things easier. You can take out anything you need without taking out other things.

With the snap button design, you don’t have to worry about your note getting caught by a zipper.

The outer is made of hardened vegetable-tanned leather, which is firm and durable that can be used for a long time. 

The lining is made of pigskin that is wear-resistant and breathable. 

The leather tanned with tannins extracted from plants is more environmentally friendly and you can enjoy the natural taste of leather. 

The vegetable tanning process results in leather with distinct durability and flexibility, it develops color and taste changes over time with prolonged use and exposure to the environment, it gets more comfortable the longer you use them.

Remove the excess fat and dirt inside the leather, and then put the leather into the vegetable tanned solution. After that, the professional craftsmen carefully process it and start creating products.

It takes a lot of time and effort to tighten the pieces of leather with chemicals, then polish and apply oil times by times. 

The beautifully processed edge brings out unique charms, which only exist in the handmade process that cannot be found in industrial products.


The combo of leather and snap button creates a minimalist wallet that can be used in different scenes.

Before attaching the snap button, the leather is tanned slowly for a long time, and you can feel the charm of leather changing.

Complicated processes make a simple product that has both functionality and innovation. 

It can be placed in any pocket. 

Vegetable tanning is a leather tanning process that uses only vegetable tannins to maximize the original feature of the material. 

The process is time-consuming and expensive due to the specialized craftsmen required, the longer tanning period, and less automation involved.

The natural texture of leather made with this method cannot be obtained by other methods. 

Caution

1. Avoid contact with sharp objects to prevent scratching.

2. Store away from direct sunlight, it may fade or discolor if you leave it in a place with strong ultraviolet rays for a long time.

3. Avoid letting it get wet, it may cause mold and odor if it is stored in a wet or humid environment for a long time.

4. Please quickly use a soft cloth to dry it if it gets wet, and store it in a well-ventilated place for breathability.

story:
Das sind wir, das machen wir:

Die Spitzenunterwäsche von SPITZENJUNGE® für modebewusste Männer ist einzigartig auf dem Deutschen Markt und stellt eine absolute Neuheit dar.

Seit August 2015 stellt der Designer Robert Hebestreit in Berlin hochattraktive Unterwäsche u.a. aus Spitze für den Mann her.

Unteranderem konnte sich die Marke SPITZENJUNGE® durch national bekannte Werbegesichter in der deutschen Modewelt platzieren. Zeitungsberichte, TV-Auftritte und die Eröffnungsshow auf der Berlin Fashion Week im Januar 2016 machten SPITZENJUNGE® in kürzester Zeit populär. 

Dafür stehen wir:

SPITZENJUNGE® steht für Lifestyle und ein Lebensgefühl! Ob moderner Basic, extravaganter Hipster oder Brief mit sinnlicher Spitze - alles ist erlaubt und der modebewusste Mann trägt, was er lebt.

Sei ein spitzen Junge! So lautet die Botschaft und dabei setzt SPITZENJUNGE® auf ein Höchstniveau an Qualität, sowohl bei der Auswahl von Stoffen wie auch bei der Produktion.

Design, Tragegefühl und Qualität sollen sich im Einklang befinden und etwas ganz Besonderes für den Mann sein. 

Kurz und knackig:

Was wollen wir? 

Eine FashionShow zur Präsentation unserer neuen Kollektion im Rahmen der Fashion Week am 27. Juni 2016 in Berlin!

Was springt für dich dabei raus?

Ein tolles Spitzenjunge Feuerzeug!

Ein exklusives SPITZENJUNGE-Shirt in limitierter Auflage!

Ein exklusives Spitzenjunge-Classic Modell!

Die Chance live bei unserem Event dabei zu sein!

VIP-Gast und Plätze in der Front-Row für dich und deine Begleitung!

Die Chance für dieses besondere Event Pate zu werden und uns kennen zu lernen!



Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Wir benötigen für unsere ERSTE eigene Fashion Show, bei der wir die neuste Kollektion vorstellen möchten, 15.000 €. Wir wollen auf unser einzigartiges Label aufmerksam machen und beweisen, das Spitze nicht nur etwas für Frauen ist. Es ist ZEIT für etwas Neues - es ist Zeit für Spitzenjunge. Unser Ziel ist, die Welt ein bisschen zu verschönern. Alle Männer sollen die Möglichkeit erhalten, etwas schönes "drunter" zu tragen.
Die Show soll in einer angesagten Location in Berlin stattfinden. 

Mit den Perks unterstützt Ihr uns und seid hautnah bei unserem ersten Besonderem Event dabei, wenn es heißt: let the show begin!

??
?

Die Folgen

Wann war das letzte Mal, dass Du etwas zum ersten Mal getan hast? Wieso sollte es aufregende, romantische Unterwäsche nur für Frauen geben?
Unser Label zeichnet sich aus, dass wir mit vielen verschiedenen, hochwertigen Stoffen und Spitzen einen angenehmen Tragekomfort gewährleisten und dabei ein angesagtes Design treffen.
Es ist Zeit für eine Revolution! Spitze für Männer! Seid ihr bereit für Spitzenjunge?
Erhaltet einen kleinen Einblick und genießt unsere Opening-Show bei der Fashion Week Berlin im Januar 2016, im folgenden Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NNOLtsfVKhg
?
?

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Als Sponsorenpartner seid Ihr uns wichtig. Wir werben um Euch und nehmen Eure Interessen ernst. Wir stehen für einen erkennbaren Interessenausgleich mit unseren Partnern.

Unser Ziel ist es, zum einen die Attraktivität unserer Veranstaltung mit Eurer Unterstützung zu steigern und Euch zum anderen ausreichendes Potenzial für die eigene Wertschöpfung zu bieten. 

Wir wollen Euch ermutigen, sich bei der großen Show zu engagieren und sich im Moment der höchsten Aufmerksamkeit in das Geschehen einzubringen. Ihr allein bestimmt, wie Ihr werbt. Nach unserer Erfahrung ist die Kombination aus kontinuierlichem Branding und der persönlichen Präsentation nachhaltig.

Neben den klassischen Medienvertretern aus Print und Fernsehen, sowie Bloggern werden auch prominente Gäste anwesend sein. 


?

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Wenn Euch unsere Kampagne gefällt, ihr aber keinen Beitrag leisten könnt, würden wir uns riesig freuen, wenn Ihr ganz viel über unsere Kampagne spricht und sie damit bekannt macht. Ihr könnt dafür super das Indiegogo Tool nutzen.
Wir sind Euch sehr dankbar und freuen uns über jede Unterstützung - ihr seid spitze!
?

story:
**Please note that AFTER the campaign is over, we'll be sending out a survey to everyone so that you can choose the specific item(s) you want.  You do not choose when you initially contribute.  Thanks! 

Simple.  We want to make a difference.  We want to make clothing a symbol of commitment towards a sustainable future.

*All Collections 50% off during this campaign*

BAMBOO SUNGLASSES

The centerpiece of our quest, and the true heart of Kynd Clothing.  Our bamboo sunglasses are simply amazing.  They float in water, making them a must have for water sports enthusiasts.  They feature high-quality polarized and scratch resistant lenses that protect your eyes from UVA, UVB, & UV400 rays.  The frames are made from sustainably raised bamboo, which make them incredibly lightweight, and feature spring-loaded hinges for that ultimate fit to your face.  Every pair comes with a microfiber cleaning cloth, a bag, and a handmade bamboo stash case.

Each of our frame styles have been custom designed with you in mind, like our Heartbreakers - our bamboo heart shaped sunnies. This is our goal here at Kynd, to bring innovation to your face, and take sustainable eye-wear into uncharted waters.

Rx. Need to put your prescription lenses in our frames?  Then grab yourself one of the OGs and take them to your local optometrist.  The OGs are certified Rx-able.

That's right.  With any frame style you choose, you can choose whatever lens color you like!  Oh the possibilities!

This is a limited edition style of The Heartbreakers - available only during this project.  Grab them while you can.

A whole new frame style just for Indiegogo?  Yeah..  You're welcome.

These solar-glowing bamboo shades speak for themselves.  Get them while you can and be the life of the party.  We will only be producing 35.

BAMBOO YOGA PANTS

Ya, we did it.. And they're freaking awesome! Made up primarily of a blend of bamboo and organic cotton, with a tiny hint of spandex to allow for proper flexibility, these yoga pants are incredibly soft and stretchy, ridiculously comfortable, and perfect for the active lifestyle. The natural properties of bamboo will keep your skin protected from gym bacteria the next time you're sweating in a hot yoga session.  You'll look and feel absolutely great wearing our sustainable yoga pants - Namaste.

Pictured here and offered first are our Classic Black pair (our "K logo" is outlined in white on the right thigh just so you know, incase you missed that in the video). Arctic White yoga pants will become available as we hit our stretch goals (with a black outlined "K logo" on the thigh).  And for you folks that like a more sleek look, these are available without the logos.  Sizes S-XXL. 

BAMBOO HOODIES

Be prepared, random strangers will caress you everywhere you go because your hoodie feels that amazing. Made from a heavier (thicker) blend of bamboo and organic cotton.  Our hoodies will keep you warm in the winter, and comfortable in the summer, due to being naturally porous and breathable.  They are durable and allow for flexibility and motion because of their stretchy nature. Perfect for all your daily activities and ready for any curveballs life throws at you.

Available first is our Classic Black color. Arctic White w/ black logos will be available if we can hit our stretch goals.  Like the yoga pants, these are available in a simple style without the logos. Sizes S-XXL. (note there is a small white outline of our "K logo" on the lower right back of the girls hoodie, which you can see in the video!)

HEMP & BAMBOO SHIRTS

Screen-Printed wonders straight off our press.  Our hemp shirts have a more rugged feel to them, while the bamboo shirts feel as soft as the clouds themselves.  Made up of 60/40 hemp/organic cotton and 70/30 bamboo/organic cotton blends, you'll be proud to tell your friends that your shirts are made from sustainable resources.

Available in any design/shirt color combo you like, or with no design at all.  Sizes S-XXL.  All designs are centered on the chest.

BAMBOO SOCKS

Your feet deserve to be treated like royalty, after all the walking around they do for you.  We've partnered with our friends at La Jolla Bamboo to bring you ultra-premium bamboo socks.  These are the pinnacle of comfort and support for those long days spent on your feet. Bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and anti-fungal, meaning it can help protect your feet from bacteria that may cause athlete's foot. Our socks naturally wick moisture, and breathe easily...so no more wet, sweaty socks that can smell or mildew.  Treat your feet to some awesomeness, and show off your Kynd side with these Rasta accented black bamboo socks made in sunny Southern California.  

SOLARCHARGED GLOWBANDS

What are these things?  In short, naturally charging hemp-backed glowing wonder bracelets.  Great for all your fun nighttime adventures - music festivals, hiking, running, walking your dog, riding your bike, surfing, spacewalking.. you name it.  These bracelets will keep you visible at all times, helping ensure you make it safely to your destination.  

Our bracelets charge naturally under any direct light source, sunlight and blacklight work best.   They glow for 3-5 hours on a 5-30 minute charge; brightly for the first 1-2 hours, softer as time wears on.  The more light energy the bracelet receives while charging, the longer and brighter it will glow.  The glow material lasts over 15 years, and the comfortable, durable hemp-backing will last just as long.  No more single use plastic glowsticks or battery powered LEDs, say hello to the sustainable future of glow.

ORGANIC TOTES

100% Organic Cotton Totes.  Great for carrying pretty much everything (Hint: Don't use those damn plastic bags anymore!  They're bad.  Very bad.).

We can't thank you enough for helping us reach our goal and spread our sustainable message.  Below are the options for your support.  After you choose your reward, please share this project with your friends - you'll earn major karma points.  

As a thank you for your support during this project, all of our collections are priced near WHOLESALE!

We do have some awesome stretch goals ready to share with everyone, including multiple color options for the hoodies, yoga pants, and socks!  

At the completion of the project, we'll send you a survey so you can choose your exact rewards.  

If you feel like our products are a great fit for your store, and would like to sample more than 10 items, simply double, triple, quadruple, etc. the pledge amount of $349 and we'll send you 20, 30, 40, etc. of whatever you'd like!  Expect bonuses in your boxes for your generosity.

Why Kynd?  

Currently the clothing industry is one of the leading contributors to resource consumption and environmental pollution in the world.  Much can be done to help curb this problem, but there has yet to be a big commitment towards sustainable practices or the use of sustainable fabrics, especially by bigger brands that have the resources to do so and still choose not to.  More importantly, there has yet to be a revolution of why we wear our clothes - It needs to be a symbol of sustainability, a symbol of commitment to our fellow man and to the betterment of the planet as a whole.  

We firmly believe a shift in the way we think, in the way we act, and in the way we wear clothing is wholly necessary.  There needs to be an alternative that exists in the fashion industry, one that works in cooperation with the earth, not against it. Where people and fair labor are the focus, not profit margins. We believe sustainable education is an integral part of maintaining a beautiful and diverse world.

This is the reason we started Kynd Clothing, to be that responsible approach to sustainable fashion that is much needed in the world.  Let your clothing be a symbol for doing the right thing.  Be Kynd.

How will we accomplish our mission?  

This is the fun part! Our passion is what drives us and allows our creativity and talents to shine best.  Our mission doesn't end at providing sustainable, stylish, and insanely comfortable products, we also educate on the perks & necessities of being a sustainable generation - all while giving back 10% to worthy causes and charities.

We have been involved in fundraising and charity work since day one at Kynd, and that will not be changing any time soon. We use our social media outlets, and our products themselves, to educate on the importance and awesomeness of being Eco-friendly.  10% of the profits from every sale we make are donated to a variety of charities.  Over the past year in our testing phase, we have helped raise money for Community Hope Project, Responsible Runners, Toys for Tots, Norman Music Festival, and Wounded Warriors Bear Mountain Handicap Ski School.  With your help, this list will continue to grow, lending a helping hand to those in need.  After this project, which we're using to produce all of our new lines, we'll be able to resume our charitable contributions from regular sales.  

We need your help to push our sustainable mission into high gear. Money raised from this project will allow us to take all our new lines into production, create more opportunity for education, and allow us to invest in equipment and resources that accomplish more in-house.

Why Hemp & Bamboo?

They are amazing sustainable natural resources, that's why!  Better for the environment, and better for us.  They do not require dangerous chemicals, like pesticides or herbicides. Both plants grow quickly, and use little to no extra water aside from rainfall.  Bamboo is the fastest growing plant on the planet and produces 30% more oxygen and consumes 5x more Carbon than trees, essentially making it a more efficient natural filter.  Both plants prevent soil erosion and have 1000's - yes, THOUSANDS - of other uses besides clothing.  

As far as the fabric goes, both blow cotton and conventional cotton-blends out of the water.  Bamboo feels like a blend of cashmere and silk, while hemp has a stronger, more rugged feel.  Both fabrics are naturally anti-microbial, hypo-allergenic, moisture-wicking, and breathable.  Hemp fabric is UV resistant, making it great for outdoor adventures in the sun.  Our bamboo and hemp clothing will keep you uber-comfortable, protected, and feeling fresh all day, everyday.

Did we mention bamboo floats?  You'll never lose your sunglasses to the water monster again! 

To learn more about the amazing properties of bamboo & hemp, click here.

Risks and Challenges

With a project this big, there will be many challenges along the way. We're ready and psyched for our project to get under way, and we're determined to deliver on time and above expectations.

We've been working with most of our suppliers and manufacturers for over a year now, and have built great relationships with them. They are all aware of this project, and are ready and excited to help us get all of our new lines made. Of course, if any delays do happen to occur for some reason, our backers will be notified immediately, and arrangements will be made to ensure a happy transaction occurs.

We've set the delivery date shortly after the estimated completion date of the last of our items to be produced - our target is to have everything in our backers hand by the end of June! Once we have all items on hand, we'll box the orders up and send them out. With luck, we'll be able to get them out ahead of schedule!
story_txt:
**Please note that AFTER the campaign is over, we'll be sending out a survey to everyone so that you can choose the specific item(s) you want.  You do not choose when you initially contribute.  Thanks! 
Simple.  We want to make a difference.  We want to make clothing a symbol of commitment towards a sustainable future.*All Collections 50% off during this campaign*BAMBOO SUNGLASSESThe centerpiece of our quest, and the true heart of Kynd Clothing.  Our bamboo sunglasses are simply amazing.  They float in water, making them a must have for water sports enthusiasts.  They feature high-quality polarized and scratch resistant lenses that protect your eyes from UVA, UVB, & UV400 rays.  The frames are made from sustainably raised bamboo, which make them incredibly lightweight, and feature spring-loaded hinges for that ultimate fit to your face.  Every pair comes with a microfiber cleaning cloth, a bag, and a handmade bamboo stash case.Each of our frame styles have been custom designed with you in mind, like our Heartbreakers - our bamboo heart shaped sunnies. This is our goal here at Kynd, to bring innovation to your face, and take sustainable eye-wear into uncharted waters.Rx. Need to put your prescription lenses in our frames?  Then grab yourself one of the OGs and take them to your local optometrist.  The OGs are certified Rx-able.That's right.  With any frame style you choose, you can choose whatever lens color you like!  Oh the possibilities!This is a limited edition style of The Heartbreakers - available only during this project.  Grab them while you can.A whole new frame style just for Indiegogo?  Yeah..  You're welcome.These solar-glowing bamboo shades speak for themselves.  Get them while you can and be the life of the party.  We will only be producing 35.BAMBOO YOGA PANTSYa, we did it.. And they're freaking awesome! Made up primarily of a blend of bamboo and organic cotton, with a tiny hint of spandex to allow for proper flexibility, these yoga pants are incredibly soft and stretchy, ridiculously comfortable, and perfect for the active lifestyle. The natural properties of bamboo will keep your skin protected from gym bacteria the next time you're sweating in a hot yoga session.  You'll look and feel absolutely great wearing our sustainable yoga pants - Namaste.Pictured here and offered first are our Classic Black pair (our "K logo" is outlined in white on the right thigh just so you know, incase you missed that in the video). Arctic White yoga pants will become available as we hit our stretch goals (with a black outlined "K logo" on the thigh).  And for you folks that like a more sleek look, these are available without the logos.  Sizes S-XXL. BAMBOO HOODIESBe prepared, random strangers will caress you everywhere you go because your hoodie feels that amazing. Made from a heavier (thicker) blend of bamboo and organic cotton.  Our hoodies will keep you warm in the winter, and comfortable in the summer, due to being naturally porous and breathable.  They are durable and allow for flexibility and motion because of their stretchy nature. Perfect for all your daily activities and ready for any curveballs life throws at you.Available first is our Classic Black color. Arctic White w/ black logos will be available if we can hit our stretch goals.  Like the yoga pants, these are available in a simple style without the logos. Sizes S-XXL. (note there is a small white outline of our "K logo" on the lower right back of the girls hoodie, which you can see in the video!)HEMP & BAMBOO SHIRTSScreen-Printed wonders straight off our press.  Our hemp shirts have a more rugged feel to them, while the bamboo shirts feel as soft as the clouds themselves.  Made up of 60/40 hemp/organic cotton and 70/30 bamboo/organic cotton blends, you'll be proud to tell your friends that your shirts are made from sustainable resources.Available in any design/shirt color combo you like, or with no design at all.  Sizes S-XXL.  All designs are centered on the chest.BAMBOO SOCKSYour feet deserve to be treated like royalty, after all the walking around they do for you.  We've partnered with our friends at La Jolla Bamboo to bring you ultra-premium bamboo socks.  These are the pinnacle of comfort and support for those long days spent on your feet. Bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and anti-fungal, meaning it can help protect your feet from bacteria that may cause athlete's foot. Our socks naturally wick moisture, and breathe easily...so no more wet, sweaty socks that can smell or mildew.  Treat your feet to some awesomeness, and show off your Kynd side with these Rasta accented black bamboo socks made in sunny Southern California.  SOLARCHARGED GLOWBANDSWhat are these things?  In short, naturally charging hemp-backed glowing wonder bracelets.  Great for all your fun nighttime adventures - music festivals, hiking, running, walking your dog, riding your bike, surfing, spacewalking.. you name it.  These bracelets will keep you visible at all times, helping ensure you make it safely to your destination.  Our bracelets charge naturally under any direct light source, sunlight and blacklight work best.   They glow for 3-5 hours on a 5-30 minute charge; brightly for the first 1-2 hours, softer as time wears on.  The more light energy the bracelet receives while charging, the longer and brighter it will glow.  The glow material lasts over 15 years, and the comfortable, durable hemp-backing will last just as long.  No more single use plastic glowsticks or battery powered LEDs, say hello to the sustainable future of glow.ORGANIC TOTES100% Organic Cotton Totes.  Great for carrying pretty much everything (Hint: Don't use those damn plastic bags anymore!  They're bad.  Very bad.).We can't thank you enough for helping us reach our goal and spread our sustainable message.  Below are the options for your support.  After you choose your reward, please share this project with your friends - you'll earn major karma points.  As a thank you for your support during this project, all of our collections are priced near WHOLESALE!We do have some awesome stretch goals ready to share with everyone, including multiple color options for the hoodies, yoga pants, and socks!  At the completion of the project, we'll send you a survey so you can choose your exact rewards.  If you feel like our products are a great fit for your store, and would like to sample more than 10 items, simply double, triple, quadruple, etc. the pledge amount of $349 and we'll send you 20, 30, 40, etc. of whatever you'd like!  Expect bonuses in your boxes for your generosity.Why Kynd?  Currently the clothing industry is one of the leading contributors to resource consumption and environmental pollution in the world.  Much can be done to help curb this problem, but there has yet to be a big commitment towards sustainable practices or the use of sustainable fabrics, especially by bigger brands that have the resources to do so and still choose not to.  More importantly, there has yet to be a revolution of why we wear our clothes - It needs to be a symbol of sustainability, a symbol of commitment to our fellow man and to the betterment of the planet as a whole.  We firmly believe a shift in the way we think, in the way we act, and in the way we wear clothing is wholly necessary.  There needs to be an alternative that exists in the fashion industry, one that works in cooperation with the earth, not against it. Where people and fair labor are the focus, not profit margins. We believe sustainable education is an integral part of maintaining a beautiful and diverse world.This is the reason we started Kynd Clothing, to be that responsible approach to sustainable fashion that is much needed in the world.  Let your clothing be a symbol for doing the right thing.  Be Kynd.How will we accomplish our mission?  This is the fun part! Our passion is what drives us and allows our creativity and talents to shine best.  Our mission doesn't end at providing sustainable, stylish, and insanely comfortable products, we also educate on the perks & necessities of being a sustainable generation - all while giving back 10% to worthy causes and charities.We have been involved in fundraising and charity work since day one at Kynd, and that will not be changing any time soon. We use our social media outlets, and our products themselves, to educate on the importance and awesomeness of being Eco-friendly.  10% of the profits from every sale we make are donated to a variety of charities.  Over the past year in our testing phase, we have helped raise money for Community Hope Project, Responsible Runners, Toys for Tots, Norman Music Festival, and Wounded Warriors Bear Mountain Handicap Ski School.  With your help, this list will continue to grow, lending a helping hand to those in need.  After this project, which we're using to produce all of our new lines, we'll be able to resume our charitable contributions from regular sales.  We need your help to push our sustainable mission into high gear. Money raised from this project will allow us to take all our new lines into production, create more opportunity for education, and allow us to invest in equipment and resources that accomplish more in-house.Why Hemp & Bamboo?They are amazing sustainable natural resources, that's why!  Better for the environment, and better for us.  They do not require dangerous chemicals, like pesticides or herbicides. Both plants grow quickly, and use little to no extra water aside from rainfall.  Bamboo is the fastest growing plant on the planet and produces 30% more oxygen and consumes 5x more Carbon than trees, essentially making it a more efficient natural filter.  Both plants prevent soil erosion and have 1000's - yes, THOUSANDS - of other uses besides clothing.  As far as the fabric goes, both blow cotton and conventional cotton-blends out of the water.  Bamboo feels like a blend of cashmere and silk, while hemp has a stronger, more rugged feel.  Both fabrics are naturally anti-microbial, hypo-allergenic, moisture-wicking, and breathable.  Hemp fabric is UV resistant, making it great for outdoor adventures in the sun.  Our bamboo and hemp clothing will keep you uber-comfortable, protected, and feeling fresh all day, everyday.Did we mention bamboo floats?  You'll never lose your sunglasses to the water monster again! To learn more about the amazing properties of bamboo & hemp, click here.Risks and ChallengesWith a project this big, there will be many challenges along the way. We're ready and psyched for our project to get under way, and we're determined to deliver on time and above expectations.We've been working with most of our suppliers and manufacturers for over a year now, and have built great relationships with them. They are all aware of this project, and are ready and excited to help us get all of our new lines made. Of course, if any delays do happen to occur for some reason, our backers will be notified immediately, and arrangements will be made to ensure a happy transaction occurs.We've set the delivery date shortly after the estimated completion date of the last of our items to be produced - our target is to have everything in our backers hand by the end of June! Once we have all items on hand, we'll box the orders up and send them out. With luck, we'll be able to get them out ahead of schedule!

story:
Ezze Pezze Apparel was started by Joann Dean and DJ White, who both saw a market for clothing that was designed to meet the unique needs of injured people with mobility issues or who have to wear casts due to injury, post op surgical patients, and permanently  disabled.
 
The Problem:
People often can't lift their arms over their head, can't stand with ease or are wearing leg or arm cast and can't get the cast into a pant leg or sleeve.
 
There is nothing to meet this market that is affordable, fashionable and functionally designed for use by the wearer.  Several companies can claim one or two but not all three. With your help we hope to change that!
 
As our sample runs we made clothing that was easy to get on and off opening on both sides.  Reason being our clientele do not have to lift or  raise their arms and legs, or be able to stand up to get dressed. Cast wearers can get clothing over it , and closed over the cast. No gaps. When you are heeled you may want and can wear it for years.
 
DJ White has both a Business and Law Degree and a background of success helping ventures off the ground with funding up to seven figures from different types of funding. After looking at this and the lack of companies making a garment that was affordable, fashionable and functional he became convinced a indigo or kick starter campaign would be successful.  
 

All new companies face risk and challenges. With the funds we receive, our FIRST priority is to fulfill the promised products for those of you who believed in us enough to vote with their dollars.

We produced a variety of clothing. Our samples show what will be our first lines of clothing for men and women. Later Ezze Pezze Apparel will have on-line catalogs, due out three times a year for casual and business wear.  

 
We produced a variety of clothing as our samples which will be our first lines for men and women. Later Ezze Pezze Apparel will have on-line catalogs out 3 times a year for casual and business wear. 
 
If your physical challenge is of a temporary nature, the clothing is designed to still look great and wear just like anything else in your wardrobe. This is part of the affordability. You won't want to stop wearing these great looking garments after rehabilitation.  Once a cast is gone or the restrictions of post op surgeries are behind you, the clothing is still great for everyday use.
 
Testimonial:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=syX7MhOZ-9E&amp...
 

                       Clothing Line(s) Description/ Item Selection for perks

                                                Men’s

 

  • 0020317 M   White long sleeve shirt, contents: 100%, Cotton/Linen blends. Matching magnetic closures, buttons sewn on outside to look like regular garment. Dual openings on both sides and sleeve.  (Second shirt is only shown for color.) That shirt was a early proto-type not being produced now. - too many snaps! LOL

    

 

  • 0040317 M   Black or Pink Linen or pink short sleeve shirt with pockets, Cotton/Linen blends, Matching magnetic closures, buttons sewn on outside to look like regular garment. Dual openings on both sides and sleeve.  .                    

  •    0080317M Camel or black colored Docker type shorts, contents cotton / polyester/ cotton. The Grey was a proto-type , not offered.

 

   Actual color / as Pink short sleeve above is paired with.

  • 00090317    Camel colored Docker pants, contents, polyester, and cotton, dual side opening.

  Actual color

 

            

Women’s

  • 0050317 W   Tan and black cheetah print shirt featuring round neckline, ¾ sleeves and tonal stitching, contents cotton / Lycra with Dual opening sides. Also comes in White with black strip as seen in 0120317W women's sleeveless shirt.

 

 

 

 

  • 0120317W White and black stripe with sleeveless shirt, polyester, rayon, spandex, dual side closures. Also available in Tan and black cheetah print as seen in 0050317 W.  See picture combination below.

 

  • 0110317W Black/White vertical striped woman’s Capri’s, contents, cotton/ rayon / nylon, and Lycra blend, with dual side closures.

 

     0190317W Black/White vertical (ref) striped women pants contents cotton blend / Rayon,/ Lycra, with dual sided closure.

story:
Story

I'm Tamas Wiedemann, I’m 6 feet 6 inches tall. I founded Wiedemann jeans three years ago because I simply couldn’t find a pair of properly-fitting jeans. Today, Wiedemann provides quality products for tall men.

My latest project has been to incorporate anti-radiation pockets in Wiedemann pants in all sizes.

Now, you can keep your phone in your pocket all day long and not worry about the damage caused to your two amigos by prolonged exposure to radiation.

Your wrinklepurse is safe with Wiedemann.

 

Cell phone radiation

Wireless transmission of information and mobile communications are a matter of course nowadays. Among the various wireless technologies used for transmission of information mobile communications is the most widespread one. Phone calls, pictures, music, data and other information are transmitted via high-frequency electromagnetic fields.

Radiofrequency electromagnetic fields are absorbed by the body and may subsequently provoke various effects.

The strength of the energy absorption depends on the strength and the frequency of the electromagnetic fields, but also on the properties and structures of the biological tissue. The potential health effects of high-frequency electromagnetic fields are still debated.

The German Federal Office for Radiation Protection has a database of smartphones and the level of radiation they emit.

The current smartphone creating the highest level of radiation is the Mi A1 from Chinese vendor Xiaomi. Premium Apple phones such as the iPhone 7 and the iPhone 8 are also here to be seen, though, as are the latest Pixel handsets from Google.

 

Wiedemann - the solution

These pockets are made of a special material that reduces body-side radiation exposure without restricting your mobile phone’s outward reception.

No more compromise, don’t fry your tenders. Listen to music, talk on the phone, live your life.

With Wiedemann the radiation decreases to near zero (004 qW/m²).  The inside of the pocket is radiation protected, the outside is made of traditional material, so the phone can be connected at all times

Wiedemann is a premium jeans, made with high-tech performance material for better fitting, better looking pants.

Wiedemann has two styles of pants with antiradiation defense. Dark blue where you need to be more formal. Also sporty and elegant jeans for men. It has a skinny look, with beige double finished and red striched stitching.

And a lighter variation for everyday, casual use. Classic straight jeans for tall men. It has a modern look with the vivid orange stitching.

Both jeans are the perfect fit, made just for you with the highest quality materials. Every stitch, zipper, and button on our jeans was chosen with your utmost comfort in mind.

Easy to choose your size

At Wiedemann we believe the perfect fit can be found for anyone & everyone.

Choose your favorite perk, click on "Select one"!

 

Choose your size, for example W (waist) 32 and L (lenght) 34, click on it. All three rows must be selected because the system will no longer allow it. In addition to the selected size, simply click on "none". And go to payment.

 

We have made sure that shopping online can be made easy with our size guides below!

30 days size guaranteeafter the campaign is complete. If your size is wrong we send you a new product in the right size, free of charge (we do not provide free return labels - so cost of return shipping is your expense).

Easy shipping across the world. Shipping costs is only $20.

story:
Hotwind brings natural beauty to life through the time-honed lineage of Swiss watchmaking. Our goal was to create a timepiece sharing the grace and allure of our better halves to reflect their charm and to exemplify the pleasure of spending time together.

 

Hotwind’s unique face is attention grabbing. Resembling the clarity of flawless diamonds, its distinctive look comes from a refracted window made of fortified mineral crystal. Tested rigorously (from scalpels to razor blade tests) to ensure the highest degree of damage resistance, Hotwind’s face is guaranteed to remain perfect for years to come.

The Hotwind reflects the natural beauty found in gemstones. Every detail captures the fractal beauty and reflects it through craft of Swiss watchmaking. Cast in sleek stainless steel metal with a minimalist dial that utilizes diamonds to mark the hours, the Hotwind lends an artistic touch to your everyday style.

 

The Hotwind’s band is made of soft leather that sits under a breathable mesh to provide a feeling of comfort when resting on your wrist. The default band that comes with the watch is the Silver Grey band seen above.

You can receive a second band made of genuine leather from the color options below through our Indiegogo Special Perk!

 

While you can’t go diving with the Hotwind, it’s 3 ATM water resistance rating means it can withstand up to 30 m of water pressure, so you won’t have to worry if it begins to rain or if it gets wet.

Using a Swiss Ronda 515 diamond quartz for movement, the Hotwind will give you the precise time for many years to come. 

 


 

1. Is it waterproof? What’s the tolerant depth underwater?
Yes, the Hotwind is waterproof up to 30 meters of pressure.

 

2. What’s the material of the watch window? Does it withstand wear and tear?
The watch window is made of fortified mineral glass, the second most resistant type of glass after Sapphire glass. It can withstand high amounts of wear and tear, successfully passing both a scalpel and razor blade scratch test.

 

3. Is the back of the case transparent? Can I see the internal gear movement?
The back of the case is not transparent but is rather a stainless steel plate.


4. What’s the lifespan of the battery?
The lifespan of the battery is 40 months.


5. What battery does it use?
It uses a 371 Renata


6. Does it use quartz hand movement?
Yes, it uses Swiss Ronda 515 Diamond Quartz for internal watch movement.

 

7. Where in Switzerland is the watch made?
Lengua, Switzerland.

 

8. Can I have the Hotwind shipped before 2018?
We can ship the Hotwind Watch to you before the holiday season. If you need a rush on your shipping please let us know by leaving a comment or emailing us at hotwindwatch@gmail.com.

Tested rigorously (from scalpels to razor blade tests) to ensure the highest degree of damage resistance, Hotwind’s face is guaranteed to remain perfect for years to come.The Hotwind reflects the natural beauty found in gemstones. Every detail captures the fractal beauty and reflects it through craft of Swiss watchmaking. Cast in sleek stainless steel metal with a minimalist dial that utilizes diamonds to mark the hours, the Hotwind lends an artistic touch to your everyday style. The Hotwind’s band is made of soft leather that sits under a breathable mesh to provide a feeling of comfort when resting on your wrist. The default band that comes with the watch is the Silver Grey band seen above.You can receive a second band made of genuine leather from the color options below through our Indiegogo Special Perk! While you can’t go diving with the Hotwind, it’s 3 ATM water resistance rating means it can withstand up to 30 m of water pressure, so you won’t have to worry if it begins to rain or if it gets wet.Using a Swiss Ronda 515 diamond quartz for movement, the Hotwind will give you the precise time for many years to come.   1. Is it waterproof? What’s the tolerant depth underwater? Yes, the Hotwind is waterproof up to 30 meters of pressure. 2. What’s the material of the watch window? Does it withstand wear and tear? The watch window is made of fortified mineral glass, the second most resistant type of glass after Sapphire glass. It can withstand high amounts of wear and tear, successfully passing both a scalpel and razor blade scratch test. 3. Is the back of the case transparent? Can I see the internal gear movement?The back of the case is not transparent but is rather a stainless steel plate.4. What’s the lifespan of the battery?The lifespan of the battery is 40 months.5. What battery does it use?It uses a 371 Renata6. Does it use quartz hand movement?Yes, it uses Swiss Ronda 515 Diamond Quartz for internal watch movement. 7. Where in Switzerland is the watch made?Lengua, Switzerland. 8. Can I have the Hotwind shipped before 2018?We can ship the Hotwind Watch to you before the holiday season. If you need a rush on your shipping please let us know by leaving a comment or emailing us at hotwindwatch@gmail.com.

story:
TrackCup is the world's first smart drinking glass. Use TrackCup to monitor your drinking behavior and build custom health plans.

$285,000 USD raised on Kickstarter! Let's beat our record here! 

The TrackCup is loaded with sensory technology. Inside the TrackCup you will find: 

  • Thermometer: This lets TrackCup collect data about the types of drinks you are consuming as well as lets TrackCup record and analyze your favorite drinking temperatures. 
  • Pressure Sensor: The pressure sensor is what lets TrackCup track your water consumption. Our team has developed a sensor that can weigh the liquid to determine quantity. The pressure sensors along the lip of the cup can determine whether the liquid is being consumed by a person or poured out. Water that is not consumed but emptied from the cup will not be calculated as consumed water for the day.
  • GPS: The GPS chip in TrackCup gives you accurate location data on the TrackCup app. You can find your TrackCup at anytime while simply logging in to your account with your mobile phone. 
  • Bluetooth Receiver: The Bluetooth receiver allows your TrackCUp to connect to your phone quickly and efficiently. 
  • Internal Data Storage: We wanted to make sure the TrackCup could be used in all situations and locations. Bluetooth has a reputation for draining your cell phone's battery life throughout the day. TrackCup will continue to collect data even when your smartphone's bluetooth is turned off. All of this data will be stored in the cup's hard drive. Once you connect the cup to Bluetooth again, all the data will sync with your app. 
  • Accelerometer: The accelerator allows TrackCup to better understand and manage your drinking habits. The accelerator also detects when you have went for long periods of time without drinking and sends you a reminder to drink. 
  • Battery: The battery life of TrackCup lasts for 6 months on average. (Continuous daily use) 
  • Chemical Sensor: The chemical sensor is built into the bottom of the cup and allows you to see a full chemical breakdown of common elements found in water. This is a great way to distinguish how safe your drinking water truly is!

 The TrackCup App provides a platform for users to review their data as well as set new drinking goals and track their overall health. The application has many of the same features that other health and fitness apps have on the market, while also giving you full control of your TrackCup. The app features all of the following:

  • Step Counting 
  • Distance traveled 
  • Water consumption goals 
  • Water consumption data 
  • Water chemical breakdown analysis 
  • GPS tracking
  • GPS reminders based on location 
  • Water consumption reminders based on activity 
  • Music integration 
  • Running/workout program 
  • Water consumption and exercise program created by professional nutritionist. 
  • On demand HELP DESK 
  • Optional Personal Trainer chat/custom health plan

 Knowing the contents of your drinking water is an extremely important part of being healthy. Many areas of the world today have drinking water that is filled with microscopic chemicals. TrackCup shows you a chemical breakdown of the water in your cup. This is a great way for you to ensure your water is safe to drink! 

TrackCup Premium comes with a one year subscription to our online personal trainer network. With this, your water consumption data as well as activity data will be sent to a nutritionist and personal trainer for review. Your trainer will be a real person and will provide monthly advice on how you can stay more healthy and active. You can ask this person any question you want about health and fitness! This is an amazing opportunity to consult with a professional and get your body to the place you want it to be! TrackCup Premium is an outstanding value because it provides real and accurate data directly to your trainer. Working with your trainer you can: 

  •  Build custom weight loss plans. 
  • Build custom athlete training plans.
  • Build custom natural diet plans. 
  • Learn about the TrackCup body cleanse. 
  • Build custom muscle development plans.
  • Train for races and marathons.
  • Build plans for disease prevention.
  • Get professional support along the way. 

Risks and challenges

No one wants to see a good idea executed badly. We have worked extremely hard over the last 18 months to deliver a product you will love and we can be proud of. Our strength as a team is many years of experience in designing and mass producing all kinds of products.

PROTOTYPING 
We already built many generations of prototypes and tested TrackCup with real consumers.

MASS PRODUCTION 
There is a huge difference between building few dozens of prototypes and taking a product to mass production. That's why we believe that with your help we can make this happen! Currently, we are finalizing the production molds and technology fulfillment.

FULFILLMENT 
Of course sometimes things may not go as planned: a supplier might miss a deadline, a machine can break down, or a shipment can get lost. We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. This means that our fulfillment should all be on time.

OUR PLEDGE 
If something goes wrong, we promise to be honest and clear, always.

HELP US BRING TRACKCUP TO LIFE 
Every pledge no matter how small brings us closer to our goal. Help us make TrackCup a reality by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.
