story:
Playing the guitar is fun but at Spark Soul we've found a new way to make it even better. With our unique and innovative guitar strap you will define who you are and you will be shining like a star.


Our founder Jason, a fervent electric guitar player, has been in search of a special guitar strap for years, but never found one to suit him. That's why we set about creating our own. This exceptional guitar strap has resulted from our strong passion for music, our strong belief in perfection, and our desire to create something never seen before.


DURABLE LEATHER AND FABRIC

The result is a high-quality strap with unique styling, and glowing all by itself. Using the most state-of-the-art glow-in-the-dark materials and a unique patented lamination method, we've been able to produce straps with the ultimate glowing experience, far brighter and lasting than anything you've ever seen.


BEST GLOWING EXPERIENCE EVER

Compared to normal glow-in-the-dark materials, ours is nearly ten times brighter and will glow more than 5 times as long. What's more, the glow in the dark has been embedded in our graphics to light up only defining areas of the drawings. And it's not just glow or no glow. With varying intensities and gradients of light emission, the graphics look stunning and are still clearly visible even in the dark.

The innovative glow in the dark material only needs to stay under the light for a short time to last very long. Even a flash from a camera is enough to make it glow for up to 30 minutes.


BRIGHTNESS COMPARISON CHART


ORIGINAL UNIQUELY DESIGNED PATTERNS

All the different graphics on the guitar straps were designed and drawn by our talented team of designers. They are completely unique and have been especially enhanced to best suit the glowing effect.


SPECIAL CLEAR COATING ON THE GRAPHIC

A special clear coating gives our graphics a smooth and glossy finish, and provides extra protection to prevent the designs from peeling off.


DETAILED SPECIFICATION

The guitar straps are extremely strong, flexible, and durable, consisting of four layers of materials with a leather suede backing for comfort, finished off with a hand-stitched lock seam.

The straps are 2.75 inches wide and are adjustable in length from 40 to 55 inch (102 to 140cm) to suit every player.

And with a lace enclosed, it's also suitable to be used with acoustic guitars.


After more than a year of development, design and testing, we think we've created the perfect guitar strap and are ready to start our first mass production. However, we can't do this without your support. Please back our project to make the launch of this cool and unique guitar strap a reality. Check the perks for all our backing options with great rewards.


We only offer the best perks to our backers with six different available designs for our backers to choose from after the campaign.

Shipping cost is always the same no matter if you get 1 set or 4 sets. So the more you buy the more you save!





Spark Soul is founded by an enthusiastic team of creators who enjoy music and life! We are a young team of musicians, product developers and designers who are trying to break the traditions. 

We are very excited to bring our first product- the world’s best glowing guitar strap to you. Life is too short to get bored or dark. ;) Let’s put on our Spark Soul strap and rock’n roll.

And we have lots more plans for the future, so stay tuned with us!


We've been developing our guitar strap for over a year, testing many different materials, designs, and manufacturing methods. Especially our unique printing method with glow-in-the-dark embedded in the graphics required extensive experimentation, not without its failures and problems. But with our patented manufacturing method we're confident we've now found the best way to create our amazing guitar strap. The last few months we've already manufactured over a hundred guitar straps without any issues.

Therefore the risk for our backers is minimum. Because we haven't yet produced the straps in very large quantities, there is the possibility of some unexpected problems during mass production. We will do what we can do to keep the delivery date as stated, and immediately inform our backers if there might be any delays. Our quality and our customers are always the first priority. We will make sure to keep everyone updated till you receive your guitar strap!

story:
www.speedupbag.com

The Most Aerodynamic Cycling Bag

  • First aerodynamic cycling handlebar bag
  • New standard in bike bags efficiency
  • Normal (cube shaped) bags are 250% less aerodynamic then Speed up bag
  • 60% lower (improved) drag coefficient then standard (cube shaped) bags
  • 15% lower (improved) air resistance of cyclist
  • 6% higher cycling speeds on average at prototype testing (identified difference between 1.000€ and 5.000€ worth bicycle is 3%)
  • 4L volume
  • Waterproof
  • No batteries needed
  • Color of choice (option)
  • Design of choice (option)
  • Ultra light carbon option
  • Free shipping worldwide for Indiegogo contributors

Why the Speed up bag?

First aerodynamic handlebar bag made for more than just to take care of a baggage.

Specially designed to reduce air resistance of cyclist, to speed up cycling velocity and to increase cycling pleasure.

A new standard in bike bags.

Great also for recreational cycling, cycling tours and cycling adventures. Speed up bag increases your cycling range and reduces effort needed for cycling.

Bag with results. 60% less air resistance then normal (cube shaped) bags. It reduces also an air resistance of a cyclist for 15%. Tests proved 6% higher cycling speeds on average. Up to 10% higher range of electric bicycles.

Color and design of choice. You can choose color and printed design on your Speed up bag. Celebrate diversity and match your Speed up bag to your style.

Ultra light carbon option. You can also have the lightest Speed up bag made of carbon.

International product. Speed up bags will be shipped to our backers worldwide for free.

Most importantly, we really appreciate every support! Be sure to catch your pledge and become part of this bicycle bags revolution.

Why Speed up bag is so efficient?

Classical cyclists' aerodynamic is disastrous so it is possible to reach great impact on air resistance even with simple aerodynamic accessories, while the best aerodynamically constructed bicycles reach more than 90% lower air resistance then standard bicycles. Worlds’ longest distance cycled on one hour for best aerodynamic bicycles is 56.9 miles (91,5km) while the classical bicycle record is only 35 miles (56,3km). That enormous difference in speed and air resistance is now smaller thanks to a Speed up bag.

Revolution in form of bicycle bags. Square shape is not aerodynamic. That is why rockets are not cube shaped, why planes are not square shaped, why cars are no longer square shaped.

The same goes for bags. Still, bike bags did not evolve like other man made products. Square shape is not aerodynamic, quick and we need more energy to move it through air than necessary. Aerodynamic bags just weren’t available until now even though a cube shaped bag is 250% less aerodynamic then Speed up bag.

Revolution in design. Speed up bag is designed to correct the most critical aerodynamic area on a cyclist’s body made of legs and torso. These body parts make a structure in the shape of a parachute.

We can see this parachute even with the best cyclists in the world.

The »Speed up bag« successfully prevents the activity of a parachute made by the cyclist’s body. If there is no Speed up bag fitted on a bicycle, parachute made by cyclist's torso and legs catches air flow freely (left picture). The effect of Speed up bag is seen in the right picture, where the air flow is not caught in a parachute.

Not surprisingly, air resistance of cyclist improves (drops) for up to 15% after the “Speed up bag” is fitted. The better cyclist's technique (body position on bike), the greater Speed up bag impact on air flow.

The fact is that a “speed up bag” heavily reduces air resistance of a cyclist and accelerates speed. Consequently, cyclists will always have a “speed up bag” fitted on a bicycle even if the bag is empty.

4 liters volume. When it comes to cycling, baggage plays an important role, too. Speed up bag provides a 4 litre storage for your belongings.

Choose your Speed up bag

Color of your choice (perk "Color of your choice)

EXAMPLE DESIGN (perk "Design of your choice")


Rewards

How Speed up bag was developed

Before Speed up bag was developed cyclist had to choose between:

  • bags that were slowing down or
  • leaving baggage at home and risks to suffer hunger, thirst, cold, getting flat tires and other problems

Multisport and adventure experiences, past engineering skills and determination helped the inventor to recognize possible solution. After months of development and testing of prototypes, materials, designs, dimensions and other details a Speed up bag team succeed in developing a prototype with desired characteristics.

Tests with different bicycle types provided enough statistical data to prove the speed up effect. After that the Speed up bag team decided to test if there is a big enough market to start production of Speed up bags.

Team of designers, creators, advisors and production experts made the project possible.

We Need Your Support

Our determination, passion and knowledge helped develop a highly technological, efficient and beautifully designed bike bag.

At this point we need your help. To launch production and supply Speed up bags at the lowest price we need funds collected from backers. If you like the idea or would like a Speed up bag or have a friend that might like one, please back us. Make a difference in a world of cycling, promote cycling and help reducing carbon footprint of mankind.

We need help getting word out, too. Please pass the campaign to your friends. Emails, tweets, facebook posts. It all helps! Use Indiegogo sharing tools for sharing a campaign.

Building an international distribution network

If you recognized quality, competitive advantages and selling potential od Speed up bag, you are welcome to become our distributor. Please send us a massage about your interest. You can also become an exclusive distributor for your area.

Production plan

Speed up bag team

We are a team of sport enthusiasts and adventurers from Slovenia - European union:
  • Joze Petkovsek – Speed up bag inventor and project manager
  • Maja Hrovatin Petkovsek – Development and business advisor
  • Marko Petkovsek – Product testing and development

Special thanks to:

  • Video production: Martin Simcic
  • Logo design: Marko Zivkovic
  • MTB images: Hana

Risks and challenges

  • Minor engineering and production challenges are possible.Small adjustments in design are also possible.
  • We depend on a third party for manufacturing and some delays are possible.
  • We included extra time for possible delays in our production plan and we plan to ship Speed up bags on time.

We promise to make sure that you are at all times informed of what is going on.

Petkovsek – Speed up bag inventor and project manager 
Maja Hrovatin Petkovsek –
Development and business advisor 

Marko Petkovsek – Product testing and
development
Special
thanks to:

Video production:
Martin Simcic
Logo design: Marko Zivkovic

MTB images: Hana 

Risks and challenges


Minor
engineering and production challenges are possible.Small adjustments in design
are also possible.
We depend on a third party for manufacturing and some delays are possible. 

We included extra time for possible delays in our production plan and we plan
to ship Speed up bags on time.

We promise
to make sure that you are at all times informed of what is going on.

story:
Short Summary

We are the 'Catalist Team', and we are involved in the production of a mobile web platform, 'La Catalista' Project - a global platform in support of social movement of individuals and personalities (La Catalista Club) in attempt to disrupt social life with different kind of network. We believe our movement can bring some missing elements to the main stream social platforms.

The project we present here, Mannequin Doll, is a single feature included as a micro-service into 'La Catalista' platform.

What We Need & What You Get

What we spend money for:

  1. This micro-service is deployed on Google App Engine - that costs us monthly fee for Virtual Machines, cloud data base and storage. Cloud services can get expensive on production - yet they give us secure and scalable environment.
  2. Our Mannequin productions take professional models, photography staging and sometimes exotic locations. We spend good money to ensure good looking, but we believe it's worth it.

We will keep maintaining all our micro-services regardless the success of this crowdfunding campaign. But with the help of community funding we will develop more, exciting features - dress-up-strip-off games, loyalty shopping coupons, realtime user interactions, live sessions,  models' Story-telling, random events actions, trivia-games, etc.

Crowdfunding will also help us produce and publish many and more exciting Mannequin Dolls - we have plenty of ideas how to mix shopping, fashion and entertainment.

Only Contributors will have access to the more exciting productions. Your contribution will make you part of the Catalista Club. Your Membership status is related to your contribution and will give you corresponding access to our services and special live events during the year (of course you'll also need to be close to our location, but we move a lot)

The Impact

This small feature won't change the world, but: It can entertain and help your fashion and good looks. It can also improve your shopping choices and help you trade better with designers by exchanging your passion for good discounts.

Mannequin Doll is a just a pilot micro-service included into a bigger privately funded project - The Catalista Club, the long term goal of our work. Only Contributors will become members of that club - we keep record of our contributors through the official API.

Risks & Challenges

This is a just a pilot feature from a bigger privately funded project - The Catalista Club. Our goal is to introduce and test some of our digital features as micro-services. Mannequin Doll is just the beginning!

Other Ways You Can Help

If this isn't the project you were looking for please pass the word to your friends - sure some will get entertained

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Digital Playground presents the DickBib. A re-usable and washable receptor for your semen at climax.

Gone are the days of tube socks, and tissue paper. It's time for a washable and re-usable receptor for your love juice. The DickBib will revolutionize the way you masturbate. Not only is it an economical way to save on other receptors, but it is also eco-friendly. Save money on tissues and invest in a DickBib.

Why let something that gives you so much joy, go to waste. Imagine making a mess all over the image of your favorite DP Star, then throwing it in the wash, and doing it all over again.

Made from a special polyester, and adorned with the image of our DP Star Eva Lovia, the DickBib will fasten around your nether region. It will hang lightly around your junk in anticipation of your spunk. 

Through this indiegogo campaign we are looking to crowd fund the manufacturing and distribution of the DickBib. In return for your funding, we have prepared a number of cool perks that will give you more bang for your buck, in every sense of the term.

-  $20 will get you a 1st edition DickBib, right off the production line

-  $30 will get  you a Digital Playground T-Shirt and a DickBib

-  $50 will earn you a Digital Playground DVD and a DickBib

-  $100 will get you a poster signed by a one of our leading ladies, a DVD, and a DickBib

-  $200 will  get you a personalized signed poster, a DVD, and a 1st edition DickBib

-  $500 will earn you a Fleshlight signed by DP Star Eva Lovia, a DVD, and a DickBib

-  $1000 will get you a personalized video by DP Star Eva Lovia, a DVD, and a DickBib

-  $2500 will get your name in the credits as a Producer of a Digital Playground film, get a personalized video by DP Star Eva Lovia, A DP Star Shirt, and a 1st edition DickBib

story:
The Zodiac animals of the Chinese lunar calendar are best portraits of simple rural life in harmony with nature of the “East”. This Zodiac Jewelry Project (“Zodiac”) will have many “firsts” made possible by advances in Technology from the “West”:

  • Conspicuously Inconspicuous whilst Inconspicuously Conspicuous.
  • Global Village of Designers Collective.
  • Contributing to Wildlife Conservation.

The East Meeting the West

This Zodiac Jewelry Project is a special tribute in honor of Master Nguyen Tu Nghiem (Born 1922) who passed away on June 15, 2016 at the ripe old age of 94. The designs by a select group of international artist-designers are "inspired" by gouache Zodiac paintings of Master Nghiem who was hailed as one of the four "masters of Vietnamese modern art".

Considered a national treasure, Nghiem was one of the last graduates of École des beaux-arts du Viêt Nam (formerly known as École Supérieure des Beaux Arts de l’Indochine) in 1945. He began experimenting and mastering painting with lacquer, employing a simple style, harking back to the old greats of his culture.

Art, Fashion & Technology

The possibilities of creation are endless with advances in 3D technology rendering artist-designers breathless in trying to keep up. Zodiac Jewelry is making a statement of the owner’s “desire-to-be-different”, combining modernity with classics, and love of nature, turning art into fashion.

Each designer has created a custom Zodiac jewelry design made up of rings, earrings, pendants, bracelets or accessories, and are produce primarily by 3D-printing made in brass-gold to titanium with some products handcrafted using materials from gold lace threading to fine filigree silver wiring.

The Zodiac Jewelry of limited edition with a maximum 100 pieces produce for each design of which up to 50 are exclusively offered in this crowdfunding initiative before being offered in other planned marketing campaigns of aoku3D. Special price perks and free delivery worldwide are part of the crowdfunding incentives.

Designer Collective: Democratization of Creation

At its heart, Zodiac Jewelry is a “Designer Collective”, bringing together a small group of artist-designers from four corners of Mother Earth free to create and innovate, rendering “Global Village” a reality.

Dr. Lionel T. Dean from the UK is a pioneer in "computational design" having moved away from inventing industrial applications to art and consumer creations using 3D Printing.

Marta Cherednik from Australia is an industrial experimental designer that takes inspirations from science and nature and combines new technologies like 3D printing to produce lighting fixtures, furniture, homewares, fashion accessories and jewelry design objects.

Desmond Chan of Hong Kong took up jewelry making as a hobby as he was unable to find suitable gifts for his wife he decided to try his hand at making unique jewelry using 3D printing.

Ting Tang is the lead designer-founder of Elements Lab in Taiwan, a bespoke jewelry maker that can transform customer designs into high-quality precious metal jewelry pieces with the use of 3D printing.

Tina Koder of Slovenia is a rare innovator who adheres to using traditional 300-year Idrija lace-making techniques to create exceptional jewelry, fashion accessories, home decorations and gift items using the finest of quality materials.

Biljana Klekackoska of Macedonia is a jewelry designer that adopts delicate Filigree jewelry metalwork whose origin may be traced back to Mesopotamia since 3,000 BC to create artistic motifs by mixing new techniques and materials.

Chinese Zodiac & Astrology

By observing the rule of changes between sky and earth and the four seasons, ancient Chinese people created the calendar system as early as 2,700 BC, recording heavenly changes in 60-year cycles made up of ten heavenly stems and twelve earthly branches; thus came the system of counting time which has been passed down through thousands of years.

It may be coincidental that western astrology created by ancient Greek from Babylonian astronomy (circa mid-1st millennium BC) divides a year into 12 periods; and everyone has a corresponding zodiacal sign according to the period their birthday lies.

The Chinese Zodiac is based on the twelve earthly branches with each year corresponding to an animal sign: rat, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon, snake, horse, sheep, monkey, rooster, dog and pig. It is believed that the years represented by the Zodiac animals affect the character and personality of the person born in that year in the same way like the western astrology signs.

It is further believed some signs are perfect matches while some are less compatible or even outright born opponents.

Best matches of the 12 signs:

4 Trines & Associated Personal Characters

According to the soothsaying Chinese Zodiac “Ben Ming Nian”, peoples in their own Zodiac Year of Birth may offend the God of Age “Taisui” that may lead to misfortunes and hardships. Some effective ways to diminish the misfortunes include wearing of jewelry accessories of their Zodiac Year of Birth.

1st Trine - Rat, Dragon, Monkey: great leaders, unpredictable, artistic, aggressive.

       Rats: 1996                               Dragon: 1976                         Monkeys: 2004

2nd Trine – Ox, Snake, Rooster: endurance, meticulous, loyal, judgmental.

Snakes: 2001                            Cows: 1999                           Rooster: 1969

3rd Trine – Tiger, Horse, Dog: love, idealistic, independent, rash, stubborn.

   Tiger: 1974                                 Horses: 2002                             Dogs: 2006

4th Trine – Rabbit, Goat, Pig: calm, intellectual, compassionate, caring, pedantic.

Cats: 1999*                               Goats: 2003                                  Pig: 1995

*Master Nghiem painted cats instead of rabbits as he had never seen rabbits.

It is believed that the years represented by the Zodiac animals affect the character and personality of the person born in that year in the same way like the western astrology signs have a bearing on a person’s life.

    Order Fulfillment Process

    Zodiac Jewelry by 3D-printing or handcrafted of the 12 Chinese Zodiac animals (“Product”) is expected to close it's crowdfunding sales by end of October 2016 or once the minimum crowdfunding target fund goal is reached.

    aoku3D will commence production immediately upon receipt of contributor funds by Indiegogo. Contributors should note the following details as to how their orders will be fulfilled:

    • Each contributor of Zodiac Jewelry products will receive an email from aoku3D to confirm their choice of 3D-printed materials from silver, 14K brass gold plated to titanium and option for specifying sizes for 3D-printed and handcrafted products such as rings and/or bracelets; 
    • For 3D-printed products, the estimated production period is 2 weeks; whereas handcrafted products require a maximum production period of 4 weeks plus estimated shipping time of 1 week so contributors can expect their orders by the 1st week of December 2016;
    • The Zodiac Jewelry will be sold exclusively at specially priced perks as offered in this crowdfunding initiative with each purchase entitled to free delivery worldwide.

    Wildlife Conservation

      

    Adhering to the spirit of the Zodiac, a small part of Zodiac Jewelry sales proceeds will be contributed to Orangutan Outreach who’s mission is to protect orangutans in their native habitat while providing care for orphaned and displaced orangutans until they can be returned to their natural environment and WildAid who’s mission is to end the illegal wildlife trade and reduce global consumption of endangered species products by persuading consumers and strengthening enforcement.

    About aoku3D Limited

    Founded in late 2014, aoku3D (www.aoku3D.com) is an e-boutique of curated premium 3D-printed and handcrafted arts and crafts, connecting artists and designers with enthusiastic-consumers worldwide, primarily targeting affluent professionals shopping for gifts for their special someone as their too busy to go offline to shop.

    aoku meaning “Mysterious Treasures” offers “surprises”, intricate designs by 3D technology or handcrafted production of the highest quality; its mission being the promotion of “Integration of Design, Fashion & Technology”, and its vision being “Personalization on Demand” which is the essence of the Digital Age.

    © 2016 aoku3D Limited. All rights reserved.
    All designs and images used with permission are copyrighted and the property of their respective owners.

story:
Purchase Apparel Credits as you go, and get discounted prices as you gradually move up in rank.  Or, purchase multiple Apparel Credits up front and pay less from the start. Once you've achieved a certain pricing rank, you can never get demoted!

Our goal was to create an online interface and accompanying service that would make dress shirt shopping amazingly simple. In the beginning, we wondered why no one else had done this before. One reason, it turns out, is that creating a simple solution to a complex problem isn't simple at all.

We spent nearly a year developing algorithms that would reliably convert a person's body measurements into ideal shirt measurements, regardless of their proportions. In doing so, we also had to determine what type of fit made people not only look great, but also feel comfortable with their shirt. Accomplishing this on a limited budget required some creativity, and lots of patient test subjects.

We also thought it was critical to create an online platform that was user friendly, and included tools to remove all the obstacles you might face during the shopping process.  With the help of our programmers, we developed a number of helpful features that you can access from your personalized profile page.

We want you to shop fearlessly, and that means leaving nothing to chance.  So, we developed the Tailor's Tool to take the guesswork out of size selection.  

Dress shirt dimensions are unpredictable, and even the best tailor can't make a shirt bigger.  To address this problem, we compiled an extensive database of the exact measurements of hundreds of brands, styles, and sizes of dress shirts. Our programmers used that information to develop a personalized search feature that instantly tells you what size shirt you need to buy, right from your member page.  The size recommendation this tool generates is guaranteed to be large enough to accommodate all parts of your body, but small enough for us to maintain the shirt's basic structure during the alteration process.

We realize that clothing manufacturers make slight changes to the cuts of their shirts from time to time.  So, we are continually updating our database to avoid any sizing errors.  In the unlikely event that you order the size recommended by your Tailor's Tool and it is too small, we'll credit your account with a free Apparel Credit for the inconvenience.  Tell us whether you'd prefer us to return the shirt or exchange it for a larger one, and we'll handle that for you as well.

We also realize that your measurements, and fit issues, can change over time. So, we've made it super simple to instantly adjust your measurement profile, right from your member page.

We also realize that your measurements, and fit issues, can change over time. So, we've made it super simple to instantly adjust your measurement profile, right from your member page.

story:
For thousands of years, humanity has been enamored by the moon’s heavenly dance. The Original S collection takes you back to where horology began, an age when people tracked time by the lunar cycle. These days, premium watches that contain moonphase complications usually reside on the exclusive end of the timepiece spectrum. Now, we are breaking boundaries by bringing you affordable access to this range of timepieces.
 

Chic or classy? No need to choose only one. Designed with reference to vintage codes, the Original S collection will remain timeless and never go out of style. Built to serve you in a lifetime of adventures, the watch offers exceptional performance in addition to its classic design, ideal for daily and formal occasions. 
 

Inspired from the past, made for today. This is our vision when we created Krons Stone Original S collection. Apart from the vintage moonphase complication, you can tell the time with the contemporary calendar display at a glance. The red second hand is an interpretation of speed that captures the adventurous spirit, giving the timepiece an unique identity - Bold, curious, explore the unknown.
 

Swiss automatic movements have been the benchmark in the watch industry for decades. Our goal was to provide these movements at an accessible, down-to-earth price. Krons Stone Original S uses the custom edition of  SW-280 by Sellita, one of the top watch movement makers in the world. Sellita produces more than one million movements each year. The list of its clients is endless, including high-end brands like IWC, Cartier, Titoni, Tag, Oris, and Montblanc. Just to name a few.
 

The Sellita customized SW-280 is a high precision movement that operates at 28,800 vibrations per hour and offers a 42-hour power reserve. Within the movement, 26 rubies are placed at specific points of friction to enhance performance and reduce wear of the metal parts over time. It is a watch that you can wear for decades with the right care.
 

Themed in sunray blue, the chronograph-like dial is designed with a clear calendar display and a modern case size of 41mm, illustrating a sleek and refined look. The constellated double moonphase complication shows moon cycles in northern and southern hemispheres simultaneously, highlighting men's pursuit of a sophisticated lifestyle. The lunar-based indicator is intrinsically poetic in a way that works well with the dial, offering a classic look while appealing to modern tastes.
 

Even with a more down-to-earth price, we only use the finest materials. Each timepiece is crafted with scrupulous detail to ensure unrivaled functionalities and exquisite aesthetics.
 

  • High-degree crystal sapphire 

The case is coated with scratch-resistant sapphire crystal to capture the dial in its most beautiful light. We use a high-degree sapphire crystal to increase light luminosity, creating a radiant effect, and to ensure clear visibility under sunlight from any angle. 
 

  • Hand-crafted Stainless Crown

The ore-like crown is exclusively designed in-house, and hand-finished with traditional horological artistry. Each crown is crafted and polished with 66 irregular flats for a distinctive touch. This craftsmanship individualizes each watch, creating pieces completely unique to you. 
 

  •  Swiss Super-LumiNova®

Even in the darkest of nights, the dial gleams magnificently. We use Swiss-Luminova, a non-radioactive, long-lasting luminescence solution that represents the current state-of-the-art. The indexes and hands are coated in layers of Swiss-Luminova for the ultimate brightness and afterglow effect in the dark.
 

Each Original S model is engraved with a unique serial number. Set yourself apart from the realm of the ordinary and make your mark with a unique, stunning horological timepiece. 
 

Each of our watches is crafted with first-class materials only seen on watches in five-figure price ranges, yet the Original S costs just a fraction. We want you to have unbounded access to the luxury of Swiss quality watches. We are able to do so using a direct-to-consumer business model that cuts out the middlemen costs and unnecessary markups so the savings can be passed on to you. No more breaking the bank.
 

We are a group of like-minded individuals who are passionate about design and luxury watchmaking. Our goal is to break boundaries by making premium watches that are accessible to everyone. 
 

We are designers, engineers, and artisans, each with more than 10 years of international work experience in the creative industry. Our team has been bestowed with numerous awards, including:

IF Awards *2

Red Dot Awards * 4

Good Design Awards * 2

International Design Excellence Awards * 1

Golden Pin Awards * 12
story_txt:
For thousands of years, humanity has been enamored by the moon’s heavenly dance. The Original S collection takes you back to where horology began, an age when people tracked time by the lunar cycle. These days, premium watches that contain moonphase complications usually reside on the exclusive end of the timepiece spectrum. Now, we are breaking boundaries by bringing you affordable access to this range of timepieces. 
 
Chic or classy? No need to choose only one. Designed with reference to vintage codes, the Original S collection will remain timeless and never go out of style. Built to serve you in a lifetime of adventures, the watch offers exceptional performance in addition to its classic design, ideal for daily and formal occasions.  
 
 
 
 
Inspired from the past, made for today. This is our vision when we created Krons Stone Original S collection. Apart from the vintage moonphase complication, you can tell the time with the contemporary calendar display at a glance. The red second hand is an interpretation of speed that captures the adventurous spirit, giving the timepiece an unique identity - Bold, curious, explore the unknown. 
 
 
 
 
Swiss automatic movements have been the benchmark in the watch industry for decades. Our goal was to provide these movements at an accessible, down-to-earth price. Krons Stone Original S uses the custom edition of  SW-280 by Sellita, one of the top watch movement makers in the world. Sellita produces more than one million movements each year. story:
Journey Begins

We started our first project in 2016, giving our backers the choice of wearing a customized time-piece, where we let our backers the choice of personalization on the watch-face and choice of strap. Since then, we have crafted many customized watches, where each watch embodies a story unique to its owner. There is something for horologophiles, gifters, and remembrance of a treasured memory.

 

Inspired by Maya Angelou

Tell the stories of mountains you climbed, the ocean you crossed, the wind you braced. Every story told, is an inspiration, survival guide and the Rainbow in the Clouds for yourself and someone else.

 
 

A powerful story behind a single line of words 

Full story available in our Instagram @madrochood, click the image to view full story.

Customize engraving your story on side leather strip 

 

The latest collection, Perspective, comes with a minimalist design, and a customization aspect which offers backers a selection of style with up to 27 characters for engraving on each leather strip at the side of the watch-case. This can be a catchphrase, mantra, name or any letters, numbers and symbols of choice.

 Each Perspective watch is carefully handcrafted by our team, making each watch as one of a kind uniquely with backer's story. With the niche scale of hand-crafted customization, the Perspective collection is a limited edition with only 300 pieces worldwide.

Backers can choose from P1 to P10 design, and with the choice of words that bring the story to life. 

P1 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P2 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P3 - Customize engraving up to 13 characters (Space included)

P4 - Customize engraving up to 13 characters (Space included)

P5 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P6 (Text will be more obvious with light reflection)

P7 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P8 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P9 - Customize engraving up to 27 characters (Space included)

P10 (Text will be more obvious with light reflection)

 

Hit us up at Facebook shall you have any enquiry!

Build of the watch as follow:  

Lastly, the 39mm size stainless steel watch case fits perfectly on anyone, and matches your everyday outfit.

We understand the unbridled joy in unboxing an amazing gift. The watch box is designed with a subtle theme that brings out a sense of lustrous exhilaration. It comes with a lenticular printing of the Madroc Hood logo, with an illusion of depth, that moves when viewed from different angles.

 

 

Everybody has a story to tell; what’s your story?

 

DELIVERY

The estimated delivery of the watches from our manufacturing facility is in early December. Subsequent to a rigorous quality inspection process, the watches are estimated to ship out in  March 2021 via insured shipping, through FedEx or DHL services, depending on your country of residence.

WARRANTY

Every Madroc Hood timepiece is guaranteed against watch mechanics issues for up to 1 years from date of delivery. For warranty claims, simply contact us and we will arrange for rectification.

THANK YOU!

Thank you for taking the time to browse through our campaign. We look forward to having you join our global community of Madroc Hood watch-owners!

Risks and challenges

Our first project, the Madroc Hood customizable watch face, was successfully funded and delivered on time as per our promised timeline. Project and timeline management is a key part of our business, and our project delivery period of March 2021 is a realistic estimation, with buffers added in for shipping delays. Throughout the years we have sold over 800+ watches and there were no incident of warranty claims. This confidence has resulted in us giving a 1-year international warranty for the MADROC HOOD PERSPECTIVE collection. Should you have any concerns regarding a pledge for the Madorc Hood Perspective collection, drop us an e-mail at admin@madrochood.com. We will be glad to converse with you via e-mail.

story:
Our Story

Toucan Wear is a small company based in Lima Peru that specializes in colorful, quality, handmade shoes. We employ Peruvian families using locally sourced materials and hand make each pair in our family workshop. Our goal is not only to make great shoes you will love, but also give back to the country that’s given us the opportunity to live, work, and create something here. We are focused on sustainability and tie our economic performance to our social and environmental impact. We measure this success using the Triple Bottom Line, sometimes referred to as the 3 Ps: People, Planet, & Profit.

People: With our expanding customer base and your support, we are creating jobs that pay a fair wage. Peru is still a developing country submerged in poverty where the minimum salary is only about US$275 per month. We pay a fair price for our shoes so the family we work with can pay their dependents a livable wage. In addition, we have committed to help support 132 children at the Westfalia Orphanage, located just outside of Lima, by donating a percentage of every sale to this fantastic organization.

Planet: We live in Peru, home to the source of the Amazon River and The Andes Mountains, the second highest mountain range in the world. The environment is important to us. Since our manufacturing processes are quite simple, we can be certain we are not contributing to environmental damage.

Profit: Our economic performance directly ties back to our social responsibility score card. By selling more shoes and apparel, we can continue to help the community and environment around us. 



Why do we need your support?

Why do we need your support? We are looking to raise $25,000 to begin a full production run, as well as attend trade shows, gain brand recognition, and establish a larger, global distribution network. This initial funding will jumpstart our business by showing the world the quality of our shoes and the generational craftsmanship of handwoven Peruvian textiles. From here we will be able to create new partnerships with retailers and distributors around the world and expand in our ability to support the local communities that we've come to call home.


The Impact – Why is this important?

As a company, our triple bottom line philosophy— People, Planet, Profit— means we are committed to more than just making money. We actually live here in Peru and see the challenges that the poor and impoverished face each day. With this in mind, we have partnered with The Westfalia Orphanage,  home to 132 children plus staff. They receive no help from the Peruvian government and are constantly in need of food and supplies— getting enough food being the most difficult challenge they face each month. They are funded completely through donations by people like you.


Risks & Challenges

Like any manufacturing process, it presents its fair share of challenges. We have worked hard over the last eight months making sure we can achieve our goal of supplying you with a really cool, well made pair of shoes, while at the same time helping the children of Westfalia Orphanage to have a better quality of life .

Styles and colors

Help us spread the word

We can't do this alone. Please use IndieGoGo, Facebook, Twitter, hot air balloons, smoke signals— whatever you can do to tell your friends and family.

story:
Our Product

We have developed a full wood case for the iPhone, with 4 types of real wood (bamboo, cherry wood, rose wood, and walnut wood).  Many other cases out there contain plastic or other materials on the side or back, or are simply just skins.  Our product is also different from others on the market because our wood wraps around the sides, while still keeping a slim profile.  We wanted to give the case a full nature feel, using only wood and bamboo products.  Each case is handmade and slightly different - no 2 cases are exactly the same!

Design Pictures

Where we are in the process and timeline:

We have developed a business plan and are partially through the process of bringing this product to market:

Development (Months leading up to Indiegogo launch):

We have fully finished the development and specifications of the cases (including the new iPhone 6/6 plus).  Initial samples have been completed and reviewed for quality.  Everything looks great, with only a few minor tweaks needed.  We are expecting our final samples shortly.

Indiegogo Campaign (Now - Oct 31):

This is where you come into the plan!  We need the initial funds to create our first production batch of the cases.  Since the cases are of high quality wood and bamboo, they are more expensive to manufacture.  We cannot do this without your support.  Prices on Indiegogo are discounted to get our product off the ground.  They will retail for $39 (est) after this Indiegogo project and when we are in full production mode.

Production and Manufacturing (Nov 1 - Nov 14):

Depending on how successful the Indiegogo launch is, we estimate the manufacturing to take 2 weeks to complete.

Shipping (Nov 15 - 30):

Shipping begins, and you receive your new wood or bamboo case.

Risks and challenges 

Our main challenge is bringing this product to market on our limited budget. Other challenges include ensuring our initial production run is completed on time, and passes our quality check. We want to ensure our product meets our high quality standards. Shipping times may also vary, depending on the country you live in.

We have over 15 years experience in the technology, accounting and logistics industries, as well as a lifelong passion for entrepreneurship. We are confident we can overcome all challenges that will come up to bring this project to life.

story:
My Story

My name is Volkan Bozdik  

I born on July.01.1981

I started to work since high school.

My first;  USA visit was with WORK&TRAVEL Program When I was going to College

I went to Grand Canyon, ARIZONA 

Day times, I was a housekeeper and Evening times I  was a Waiter in Restaurant.

I worked in many places such as Pizzerias and even in a car dealership in Lakeland, FL.

I always wanted to own my own business so I did.

I opened my own company that imported Tiles and Natural stones for special projects and in retail market in Miami, FL.

The tile business was doing very well. I had a good life. The business grew so much so fast beyond my expectations! I was amazed and impress but my dream was to create a very unique shoe line for men as I enjoy shoes myself and had a collection of them. 

As a business owner, I never lost my humble spirit and nobody could even tell I was a boss because I would be running around helping everyone even carrying Tile boxes to customer’s vehicles.

One time a customer asked me who is the owner of this business in which I replay “I’m the owner” and he thought I was kidding because I was carry boxes and not asking my employees to do everything and I was friendly with my employees.

I couldn’t ask for more, I was happy and I was about to complete my dream of having my own shoe line! I was very excited! I made different designs and styles of men’s shoes and I was able to found a company in Turkey who was able to manufacture the shoes for me.

The accident

Everything was going great until disaster strikes! I was involved in a jet ski accident which nearly took my life away. According to witness, I crash in a wave next to a big boat and sank under water they could not find me so I spend nearly 5 min under the water. When they found me, I was unconscious and not breathing. They had to revive me and I was sent by helicopter to the emergency room.

I lost everything including 80% of my memory. My family is the only who tells me my history and remind me of my life before the accident.

As for my business, because I was in coma in the hospital my family couldn’t run it I, it was basically closed down. Everything I had was sold to pay for all my medical expenses.

I may have lost everything but not my spirit, hopes and dreams.

What We need

As for my shoes business, the manufacture had already manufacture the shoes and was ready to ship. I had major retailers such as Marshalls, that loved the shoes as it is pure leather, high-quality, very unique and fashionable line of shoes. If I have in stock they are willing to order from me.

The funds I need it’s for my first shipment which is about 35-40k to import from Turkey to the USA.

Your contribution not only will help me to fulfill this order but will help us to write the history of the brand.

The Challenge

My dream became even bigger because not only I will help people in my condition with part of the shoes profits but also to show that even disable as they claim I am, I’m still able to raise from the ashes and built a business.  

But to continue with the shoe production and to build the brand it will be more than the original asking funds but any help is very welcome

Other ways you can help

I believe in the power of people and maybe you are not able to financially contribute but I ask if you can please help us by sharing my story with your friends and family and also help us with your knowledge if you know about this business.

 

Thank you in advance for your help!

story:
ME & My Perception :

I believe every woman is amazing for what she does, the shoulders she gives to her partner, sacrifice she makes for her children and for the care she dedicate to her family. Each and every woman has her own story of love, care, difficulties, happiness and every woman deserves someone to appreciate her and make her happy!

                                           

How I came to be inspired for each piece :

Each piece of my designs has a strong woman’s characteristic behind and I symbolize those strengths and characteristics by their similarities to the characteristics of goddess, heroine or history legends. The short story and description is printed in the card attached to the pieces.

I have designed and hand-made jewelries using Swarovski Elements and designed my customized gift-cards and boxes. Please have a look at the pictures to be more familiar with me and my work .

I have started selling in small scope as I do not have the opportunity and facility to represent it locally or even internationally. I wish to continue my designs for jewelries further and broader with your kind contribution which would help me to bring this dream into reality.


                                           



                                                                                       

Special Perks for You:

I would give my full thankfulness and dedicate some of my works or future discount in-return to your contribution. Thank you in advance!

1) Perla Necklace

·  Swarovski Elements Pendant - 6mm

·  Bright Silver Plated Chain Brass -Approximately 22''

2) Aphrodite Necklace

Highlighting Determined, Perfectionist and Charming Look

·  Swarovski Elements Pendant - 22mm

·  Bright Silver Plated Chain Brass -Approximately 16''
* perfect length for showing off a V-neck 

·  Available Colors: Crystal Antique Pink, Burgundy-Blue Zircon Blend

3) Fiore Necklace (Limited)

Highlighting Determined, Perfectionist and Charming Look

·  Swarovski Elements Pendant - 8mm

·  Pendant Cage - 25 mm

·  Bright Silver Plated Chain Brass -Approximately 16''
* perfect length for showing off a V-neck 

·  Colors Available : Fuchsia, Light Rose,Blue Zircon

3) Freya Necklace

Highlighting Mysterious and Attractive Look 


·  Swarovski Elements Pendant - 18mm

·  Bright Silver Plated Chain Brass -Approximately 16''
* perfect length for showing off a V-neck 

·  Available Colors: Turquoise, Peach, Denim Blue

5) Athena Earrings 

Highlighting Sympathetic, Pleasant and Charming

·  Swarovski Elements - 10mm

·  Bright Silver Plated Chain Brass

·  Length-Approximately 7cm

·  Available Colors : Aquamarine, Light rose, Fuchsia

6) Elvira Earrings (Limited)

Highlighting  an Emotional, Humanitarian and Very Lady-like Look

·  Special Pairs of Earrings Highlighting Attractive Feelings

·  Swarovski Elements - 8mm

·  Length-Approximately 8cm

·  Available Colors : Fuchsia, Light Rose,Blue Zircon

7) Amitis Earrings 

Highlighting Determined and Attractive Look

·  Swarovski Elements - 4mm

·  Length-Approximately 5cm

·  Available Colors : Black Diamond, Aquamarine,Ruby, Rose,Amethyst 

8) Thalia Earrings

Highlighting a Gracious and Admiring Look

·  Swarovski Elements - 4mm

·  Length-Approximately 7cm

·  Available Colors : Black Diamond, Aquamarine,Ruby, Rose,Amethyst 

9) Chloris Earrings (Buds)

Highlighting a Classic and Calm Look

·  Swarovski Elements Width- 7mm

·  Available Colors: Aquamarine,Crystal,Violet,Fuchsia 

*You Can Choose One of the Colors Available.


*If You are looking for a special color, you might ask me first. I would try my best prepare for you.

Estimated Delivery:

*Estimated Delivery Time for all the Designs would start from March (varies depending on the location)
**If you wish to receive it earlier/before Estimated Delivery Time, I would find you a way!
(Depends on Availability of Materials/Piece +You might add on extra charges for express shipping-DHL upon your request for express)

**If you wish to receive it by Valentine's Day( I would try my best to make it happen! Depends on Availability of Materials/Piece  or You might add on extra charges for express shipping- DHL upon your request for express)

My future plan

I have sketched many designs but not launched all them s as I am waiting for an  opportunity. I plan to open my own brand shop in future and become a well-known brand. This is my dream which you have brought it into a reality and I will make my efforts to make it great and to be able to open my shop in the future.  

Please visit  Online Store and Stay Tuned as New Products will be Launched Soon!

Please click below on my fresh facebook page and support me with your likes:

Elvira Exclusive Jewelry

Your enquiries

Please send them to elvira.jewelry@gmail.com , We will glad to assist you!!

Good Day!

story:
Everyone Lives


The Brand

Everyone Lives is a multidisciplinary brand that indulges men & women, in a high fashion lifestyle, with authentic and traditional roots. These are NOT throwaway products! 

Mixing traditional Craftsmanship of Japanese Indigo Boros, with modern takes on furniture classics, Everyone Lives is a cultural cross-pollination, from all continents. 


The Concept

Disillusioned with disposable, cheap, Fast Fashion and High brow,  unaffordable yet low integrity design, We created a revolutionary new Business model. 

Everyone Lives is a design concept where the final product costs nothing to the consumer It’s 100% Free.  For obvious reasons we can, and will only release the full details of how this is financially possible, and who pays it at official launch in April 2015 at SHANGHAI Fashion Week.

We are currently fundraising so that our first full collection can be realized.

The product we have already created (in the video) are one off pieces, which we are currently selling. However when we launch the full brand in April, all of our product will be free .

The Campaign 

Everyone Lives, Indiegogo Campaign, is a crowd funding event, to produce 300 limited edition Tshirts.


The Tshirt will be lined with a unique all over print made up of the signatures of the pledgers.

$1

1$ Will help with setup funding of our free clothing concept, we'll give you a high five and give you a shoutout on facebook!

$5

With each donation of $5 your name will be printed inside each of the 300 tshirts. 

$15

With a donation of $15 you will receive a hand made limited edition porcelain display plate and your name inside each of the 300 Tshirts . 

Hand Crafted from high grade porcelain in Jing De Zhen, known as the "Porcelain Capital of the World".  It has been producing quality porcelain for 1700 years, including Ming and Hang dynasty vases.

$29

With a donation $29 you will have your name printed inside of each of the limited edition Tshirts will receive 1 of the limited edition Tshirts .

All the names of the Contributors will be turned into The classic Japanese indigo arch pattern, and printed internally (See image below).

$150

For a contribution of $150 you can come hand hang out at our studio, We will take you for dinner, and explain our Free Funding secrets.

You'll also have  your name printed inside of each of the limited edition Everyone Lives,  100% Zimbabwean, Cotton T-shirts. 

All the names of the Contributors will be turned into The classic Japanese indigo arch pattern, and printed internally.

Girls & Guys sizes Available

XS S M L XL

You will also receive a hand made limited edition porcelain display plate.


The Commitment 

In an age where information is king, and governments & Corporations dictate the modern modee, we aim to redress a little bit of the balance. 

We Commit 10% of net profits each season to a designated charity of your choice. We also support local business & address environmental issues through recycling, as well as through product longevity. We try our best to make a difference so that Everyone Lives. 


The Team

Everyone Lives is a New Design & Heritage Concept, from Danny Bartlett & Maurice Latzke. Bartlett the former Designer at Levis, Superdry, Jack & Jones, Esprit, Bench, Kuyichi, Fenchurch, and Latzke former Art Director, Designer & Journalist at 6 Magazine, Fuck You Brussels, Vantage Magazine & MTV.

story:
Short Summary

I’m sorry to beat a dead horse, but getting a job is hard. So is getting an internship. After starting my own business at 18 (5 years ago), I learned pretty quickly that presentation matters or no one will take you seriously. Once I started college I also found out I needed a fitting wardrobe for entering the professional world.  Urban Outfitters and Hot Topic just won’t cut it anymore. 

Now that you're in college, you need to take your wardrobe game up another level. Like to a I-wear-cool-ties-and-socks-to-interviews level of presentation. A sophisticated level of fashion that frames your youth not as inexperience, but as an interesting sign that “maybe this kid could bring us something new and doesn’t wake up at 3:00pm every day and throw on the nearest clothes”. After all, if a person dresses well, chances are they'll work well.

But not everyone lives in a city where stores with nice clothes or sold.  Not everyone has the money to throw down for every outfit at high-end business clothing stores, or even warehouse chains.  People come from different backgrounds and experiences, but once we look to enter the professional world you’re expected to show you can present yourself in a way that you take your work and your life seriously.

That's where RealPerson.Clothing comes in. You subscribe and then we send an awesome tie and sock combo to your door each month, along with shirt and pant suggestions based on your StyleID.

Where's all this coming from? Good question.

So 4 years ago when I was going into college, I started a digital agency. It's hard when you're 18 to walk into a potential client's office and win over their trust. While my team and I were competent, it was always important, like I can’t stress enough how super important, to look the part. If an 18 year old kid walks in and says he can make you a website but is wearing a sweatshirt, you'll shoo him away and tell him to go loiter elsewhere (like the 7-11 at the corner). But if they're wearing a tie, fitted shirt, and some awesome socks that show he's professional but still gets how to make things cool, you're going to at least let him talk.

My goal is to help gentleman approaching (or already in) their 20s dress well. If I've learned nothing else after 4 years in business, it's that when you dress well, you work well. And what better time to start dressing well than now, in college, when you're out looking for internships and jobs?  What better time to start than when you are aiming to start your professional life?

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is pretty simple and what you get is pretty awesome. Here's the run down:

What we need:

Website - covered by my team.

Digital advertising - collateral covered, but will allocate $600 to a Facebook ad campaign.

Video campaign - though my team is working on this free, the crew to produce the video still needs to be hired. And then we're going to allocate another $600 to a YouTube promoted video campaign.

Product - this is where IndieGoGo comes in. After vetting and ironing out details with several wholesalers, we need $3,000 to get our first combo shipment out.

Why $5,000 then? What is the point of the ads?

Since we're buying wholesale, our minimum order, depending on which vendor we actually go with, is anywhere between 250 and 300 items. So that means we need to get, ideally, that many subscribers to make sure that we're not wasting money on the orders. The $600 Facebook Ad campaign would promote the page and our introductory offer coupon (20% off if you prepay for a whole year). Based on my agency's experience with Facebook and YouTube Ads for eCommerce shops, that should generate a fair amount of subscribers, though probably not the full 300.

That's where you guys come in - when you donate, you aren't just helping us reach our goal on IndieGoGo. You're getting a crazy awesome subscription price for the perk you back, whether that's one month, three months, half a year, or a year! Hopefully we can get the initial 300 on IndieGoGo alone!

The other $800 will be set aside for incidentals.

    The Impact

    The impact on this project isn't as awesome as some others on here, we’ll admit that right away. We're not saving the world or fighting hunger or making an epic zombie movie.

    We're just making the young men of the world look a little better, regardless of where they’re from or their path in life. We want everyone to look good, bold and sophisticated as they look to enter the professional world.  And hopefully they’ll feel a little better, too.

    At the same time we also believe in providing affordable, work appropriate clothes. For a generation that's been through one of the toughest economic times in decades (and now looking to enter the workforce), we want to make sure getting socks and ties are the last thing they worry about when it comes to time and money.

    Why should we trust you to be the one to make us look awesome?

    I have religiously watched all Mad Men episodes, so I know style.

    Actually, though I have watched all Mad Men episodes twice, that's not why you should trust me. I started my first business when I was in 4th grade making trading cards by hand for a Yu-Gi-Oh rip off I invented. I sold, like, 3 game boards and about a dozen cards (at 50 cents each!) to my classmates, but gave away a lot of them, too.

    In 7th grade, I started a little school magazine - wrote all the content and made all the comics, too. It wasn't great journalism by any means - it was like a 13 year old's version of The Onion - but I was able to sell a few copies.

    Then when I was 18, I started Yellow Box Advertising. We currently have 6 people on our team, and have worked on over 100 projects for clients all over the country. Each year we've grown, and the advertising experience I've gotten there will be key to the success of RealPerson.Clothing.

      Risks & Challenges

      The only real risk we'll face is not raising enough money to make our first order. But, if that doesn't happen, then you're getting your money back because this campaign won't be getting funding.

      If we do raise all the money, though, the other risk will be making sure we reach a sustainable amount of subscribers. That said, so long as we have at least 300, the business won't be going anywhere.

      Another issue we could face is retention. What if we send out a tie that you guys think is ugly?! No worries. We'll take free returns. And hopefully, within a month or two of launching, we'll be able to roll out the StyleID feature that would allow you to choose from different style types each month. That would necessitate at least 900 subscribers though (3 separate StyleID categories (TBD) each with the minimum 300 subscribers).

      When it comes to choosing the items we ship, we'll be employing the help of fashion design students at select universities that we'll choose and contact.  They’ll provide us the taste and know how to choose the right designs to present you professionally, tastefully and the look to stand out amongst the competition. 

        Other Ways You Can Help

        So if you can't spring for any of the perks now, no worries! Just pass on this awesomeness and help get us out there!

        Here are some awesome links to share (be sure to follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook!):

        http://www.realperson.clothing/

        https://twitter.com/RPdotC

        https://www.facebook.com/pages/RealPersonClothing/310361335815965

        Did we mention you’ll be able to gift these subscriptions to people?  Yeah, you could make someone’s day as they try to get their life started.  That’s kind of awesome we think.

        PS - Sorry for the overuse of awesome throughout this piece, it's just a pretty awesome idea and is, therefore, worthy of much awesomes.

        Questions

        Do you have any guidelines for the Personalized Thank You reward?
        This is an important question.  Since we're offering this on Twitter, Facebook, and YouTube, all Personalized Thank You rewards need to fit the limitations and guidelines of each platform.
        For Twitter: within 140 characters. 
        For Facebook: no more than two sentences or under 200 characters.
        YouTube: no more than 3 sentences, or between 20-30 seconds.
        Please keep in mind the details you ask us to share!  We want to thank and congratulate as you ask us to, but we want to be mindful of privacy too!

        What size Coffee Mug do the coffee sleeves fit?

        Great question!  Per our supplier, they fit on 16oz to 20oz coffee mugs!

        Can I gift my perks/rewards or subscription to someone else if I don't want them?

        Absolutely!  What better way to surprise a gentlemen about to start looking for jobs or begin his first?

        Will you ship internationally?  

        At the start, unfortunately no.  We won't have the money to cover shipping. However if we received enough money on top of getting successfully funded, we would happily consider that as a stretch goal to meet!

        Would you ever consider a line specifically dedicated to young women?

        As of right now we're primarily targeting young men.  However, if we met our initial goal and received enough money on top of that, we would consider that as a possible stretch goal.

        How many times a month will I receive socks and ties and when during the month could I expect them?

        Once a month!  As of right now we can't say when during the month, but ideally you would receive them during the middle of each month.

        Who will you use to ship perks and clothing?

        We'll be using USPS and FedEx to ship everything.

        What universities are you considering for having undergraduate fashion design/studies students help you pick styles?

        There are two universities we'll be contacting shortly to enlist their aid: the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and Columbia College Chicago.  Our team is actually currently attending these universities, so what better way than to get them involved and give back?

        How many Socks and Ties combos and styles do you think you'll initially provide?

        We're planning on offering one preset style at the outset, and then we are looking to provide three different preset styles at within a few months after launch that'll you choose from.  We're also considering a couple different ways to have you, the backer or subscriber, get involved in choosing the style we send and possibly save you some money!

        If we raise enough money on top of our initial goal, we'll also consider offering more styles as a potential stretch goal.
story_txt:
Short Summary 
I’m sorry to beat a dead horse, but getting a job is hard.
So is getting an internship. After starting my own business at 18 (5 years
ago), I learned pretty quickly that presentation matters or no one will take
you seriously. Once I started college I also found out I needed a fitting
wardrobe for entering the professional world. 
Urban Outfitters and Hot Topic just won’t cut it anymore.  
Now that you're in college, you need to take your wardrobe
game up another level. Like to a I-wear-cool-ties-and-socks-to-interviews level
of presentation. A sophisticated level of fashion that frames your youth not as
inexperience, but as an interesting sign that “maybe this kid could bring us
something new and doesn’t wake up at 3:00pm every day and throw on the nearest
clothes”. After all, if a person dresses well, chances are they'll work well.
But not everyone lives in a city where stores with nice
clothes or sold.  Not everyone has the
money to throw down for every outfit at high-end business clothing stores, or
even warehouse chains.  People come from
different backgrounds and experiences, but once we look to enter the
professional world you’re expected to show you can present yourself in a way
that you take your work and your life seriously.
That's where RealPerson.Clothing comes in. You subscribe and
then we send an awesome tie and sock combo to your door each month, along with
shirt and pant suggestions based on your StyleID.

Where's all this coming from? Good question.

So 4 years ago when I was going into college, I started a
digital agency. It's hard when you're 18 to walk into a potential client's
office and win over their trust. While my team and I were competent, it was
always important, like I can’t stress enough how super important, to look the
part. If an 18 year old kid walks in and says he can make you a website but is
wearing a sweatshirt, you'll shoo him away and tell him to go loiter elsewhere
(like the 7-11 at the corner). But if they're wearing a tie, fitted shirt, and
some awesome socks that show he's professional but still gets how to make
things cool, you're going to at least let him talk.
My goal is to help gentleman approaching (or already in)
their 20s dress well. If I've learned nothing else after 4 years in business,
it's that when you dress well, you work well. And what better time to start
dressing well than now, in college, when you're out looking for internships and
jobs?  What better time to start than
when you are aiming to start your professional life?
   What We Need & What You Get What we need is pretty simple and what you get is pretty awesome. Here's the run down:
What we need:
Website - covered by my team.
Digital advertising - collateral covered, but will allocate $600 to a Facebook ad campaign.
Video campaign - though my team is working on this free, the crew to produce the video still needs to be hired. And then we're going to allocate another $600 to a YouTube promoted video campaign.
Product - this is where IndieGoGo comes in. After vetting and ironing out details with several wholesalers, we need $3,000 to get our first combo shipment out.
Why $5,000 then? What is the point of the ads?

Since we're buying wholesale, our minimum order, depending
on which vendor we actually go with, is anywhere between 250 and 300 items. So
that means we need to get, ideally, that many subscribers to make sure that
we're not wasting money on the orders. The $600 Facebook Ad campaign would
promote the page and our introductory offer coupon (20% off if you prepay for a
whole year). Based on my agency's experience with Facebook and YouTube Ads for
eCommerce shops, that should generate a fair amount of subscribers, though
probably not the full 300.
That's where you guys come in - when you donate, you aren't
just helping us reach our goal on IndieGoGo. You're getting a crazy awesome subscription price
for the perk you back, whether that's one month, three months, half a year, or a year! Hopefully we can get the initial 300 on IndieGoGo alone!
The other $800 will be set aside for incidentals.


  The Impact 
The impact on this project isn't as awesome as some others
on here, we’ll admit that right away. We're not saving the world or fighting
hunger or making an epic zombie movie.
We're just making the young men of the world look a little
better, regardless of where they’re from or their path in life. We want
everyone to look good, bold and sophisticated as they look to enter the
professional world.  And hopefully
they’ll feel a little better, too.
At the same time we also believe in providing affordable, work appropriate clothes. For a generation that's been through one of the toughest economic times in decades (and now looking to enter the workforce), we want to make sure getting socks and ties are the last thing they worry about when it comes to time and money.

Why should we trust you to be the one to make us look awesome?
I have religiously watched all Mad Men episodes, so I know style.
Actually, though I have watched all Mad Men episodes twice, that's not why you should trust me. I started my first business when I was in 4th grade making trading cards by hand for a Yu-Gi-Oh rip off I invented. I sold, like, 3 game boards and about a dozen cards (at 50 cents each!) to my classmates, but gave away a lot of them, too.
In 7th grade, I started a little school magazine - wrote all the content and made all the comics, too. It wasn't great journalism by any means - it was like a 13 year old's version of The Onion - but I was able to sell a few copies.
Then when I was 18, I started Yellow Box Advertising. We currently have 6 people on our team, and have worked on over 100 projects for clients all over the country. Each year we've grown, and the advertising experience I've gotten there will be key to the success of RealPerson.Clothing.

  Risks & Challenges 

The only real risk we'll face is not raising enough money to
make our first order. But, if that doesn't happen, then you're getting your
money back because this campaign won't be getting funding.
If we do raise all the money, though, the other risk will be
making sure we reach a sustainable amount of subscribers. That said, so long as
we have at least 300, the business won't be going anywhere.
Another issue we could face is retention. What if we send
out a tie that you guys think is ugly?! No worries. We'll take free returns.
And hopefully, within a month or two of launching, we'll be able to roll out
the StyleID feature that would allow you to choose from different style types
each month. That would necessitate at least 900 subscribers though (3 separate
StyleID categories (TBD) each with the minimum 300 subscribers).
When it comes to choosing the items we ship, we'll be
employing the help of fashion design students at select universities that we'll choose and contact.  They’ll provide us the taste and know how to
choose the right designs to present you professionally, tastefully and the look
to stand out amongst the competition. 



  Other Ways You Can Help 
So if you can't spring for any of the perks now, no worries!
Just pass on this awesomeness and help get us out there!
Here are some awesome links to share (be sure to follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook!):
http://www.realperson.clothing/
https://twitter.com/RPdotC
https://www.facebook.com/pages/RealPersonClothing/310361335815965
Did we mention you’ll be able to gift these subscriptions to
people?  Yeah, you could make someone’s
day as they try to get their life started. 
That’s kind of awesome we think.
PS - Sorry for the overuse of awesome throughout this piece,
it's just a pretty awesome idea and is, therefore, worthy of much awesomes.
Questions
Do you have any guidelines for the Personalized Thank You reward?
This is an important question.  Since we're offering this on Twitter, Facebook, and YouTube, all Personalized Thank You rewards need to fit the limitations and guidelines of each platform.
For Twitter: within 140 characters. 
For Facebook: no more than two sentences or under 200 characters.
YouTube: no more than 3 sentences, or between 20-30 seconds.
Please keep in mind the details you ask us to share!  We want to thank and congratulate as you ask us to, but we want to be mindful of privacy too!
What size Coffee Mug do the coffee sleeves fit?
Great question!  Per our supplier, they fit on 16oz to 20oz coffee mugs!
Can I gift my perks/rewards or subscription to someone else if I don't want them?
Absolutely!  What better way to surprise a gentlemen about to start looking for jobs or begin his first?
Will you ship internationally?  
At the start, unfortunately no.  We won't have the money to cover shipping. However if we received enough money on top of getting successfully funded, we would happily consider that as a stretch goal to meet!

Would you ever consider a line specifically dedicated to young women?
As of right now we're primarily targeting young men.  However, if we met our initial goal and received enough money on top of that, we would consider that as a possible stretch goal.
How many times a month will I receive socks and ties and when during the month could I expect them?
Once a month!  As of right now we can't say when during the month, but ideally you would receive them during the middle of each month.
Who will you use to ship perks and clothing?
We'll be using USPS and FedEx to ship everything.
What universities are you considering for having undergraduate fashion design/studies students help you pick styles?
There are two universities we'll be contacting shortly to enlist their aid: the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and Columbia College Chicago.  Our team is actually currently attending these universities, so what better way than to get them involved and give back?
How many Socks and Ties combos and styles do you think you'll initially provide?
We're planning on offering one preset style at the outset, and then we are looking to provide three different preset styles at within a few months after launch that'll you choose from.  We're also considering a couple different ways to have you, the backer or subscriber, get involved in choosing the style we send and possibly save you some money!

story:
Project “Kosh.UK”

Hi, Indiegogo! We offer you our new project “Kosh.UK”. Essence of our project consists in making, popularization,  made by  hand ecologically clean baskets and herein we need your help.

 

Main essence

We want to open the scale production of baskets  to do your interior and exterior more original and practical.

 

What can we you offer?

Handmade product  is made from willows by masters  using weaving technique that has not changed over the years and passed down from generation to generation.

We offer a variety of aesthetic shapes baskets that you can use for your needs and to complement the style of your home.

 Models

1

2

 

3

4

Individuality

One of our main rules is an individual approach to each customer. Shape, color, size of product entirely depend only on your imagination and needs.

 

Baskets(top view)

Why do we need your support?

We want to create a website where you can construct your baskets, including your preferences and peculiarities of its use. You can choose the shape, color and size, using a variety of decorations for a basket that you want. Your models we are going to produce.
