story:
Bismillahi Rahmani Raheem (In the name of God, the most gracious, the most merciful).

The first person to buy the colour me modest pink dress, will also get the black frills dress FREE, and the first person to buy the black frills dress, will also get the colour me modest pink dress FREE. Both dresses come with a free matching scarf each. This offer is only valid for the first person to buy the colour me modest pink dress, and the first person to buy the black frills dress. These dresses are limited edition pieces, so if you don't buy here, we will not produce them for sale in-store. We ship worldwide.

We want objective feedback, this is why we did not ask our friends and family to contribute to this campaign. If the amount contributed is still at zero when you are reading this, it is feed back to us, and we would translate this feedback to mean our designs are not as good as we think they are, but if you truly believe our designs are really good, and you want us to remain in business, please kindly show us your conviction by buying one or both designs and by helping us spread the word. Thank you.


The classic, modest, female clothing and accessories brand for you and me: 


  • You are a vibrant and very intelligent female from any and every part of the world and you love to, or want to live your life in full colour without compromising your beliefs and or standards.
  • You love timeless fashion, and your personal style can be described as modest classic.
  • You love designer clothing and accessories that are modest and classic, but most times the prices just don't make any sense to you.
  • You want a female clothing and accessories brand that will offer designer quality, classic, modest clothing and accessories without the "designer" prices.
  • You sometimes feel bad when a product or clothing item you already bought at full price, goes on sale for half the price you paid.
  • You want a designer quality, classic, modest clothing and accessories brand that will never make you feel bad about the price you paid for its products, because all the company's products are always offered at the lowest prices the company can bear, and so there can't be any further discounts in the future.
  • You love clothes and accessories made with real organic cotton, silk, wool and leather.
  • You love very elegant, designer quality long sleeve maxi dresses, long sleeve blouses, long sleeve tops, long sleeve coats and long sleeve jackets. You also love very elegant, designer quality maxi skirts.
  • You want a female clothing and accessories brand that will always produce very elegant, designer quality, long sleeve maxi dresses, long sleeve blouses and tops, long sleeve coats and jackets, as well as very elegant designer quality maxi skirts without the "designer" prices.

  • You sometimes and or often wear high heeled shoes, but you think six inch heels and higher are just not modest.
  • You want very elegant and classic high heeled shoes with heels not higher than 3.5 inches.
  • You know modesty is always in, because you believe modesty is not just about clothing, it is a complete way of life that brings out the best in you, and those around you.
  • You love this quote by Paulina Carmel: "Modesty comes first from the heart, then encompasses all aspects of dress, speech and behaviour. Modesty does not start with what you wear then affects your heart. Instead, it starts in your heart, and then affects what you wear."
  • You also love this quote by Imam Hafiz Bilal: "They say Islam is in the heart, not hijab or beard. They don't understand that when Islam is in the heart, hijab and beard come naturally."
  • I know all of the above describes you, because it also describes me, this is why Coloured Abayas was established. Please kindly support us, and help us grow Coloured Abayas into a global brand. We are offering limited quantities of two of our designer quality, classic, modest maxi dresses for pre-orders.








  • Coloured Abayas is the classic, modest clothing and accessories brand for you and me.
If you have any questions about sizes or you have other questions, please kindly send an email to colouredabayas@gmail.com or reach out via our Facebook page: www.Facebook.com/colouredabayas 

Please kindly share on Facebook, Twitter and other social media and help spread the word about Coloured Abayas: The classic, modest clothing and accessories brand for you and me. 

Thank you. : )

story:
Risks & Challenges

We've been worked to ensure all the details associated with designing, prototyping, and planning for production of our JFT 2.0 Straps are correctly managed and accounted for there is always the possibility of a few speed bumps interfering with the final delivery date.

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in manufacturing, transit times, or even a natural disaster, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is rectified and your rewards are on their way.

story:
Who We Are

We're an Independent Christian Clothing Line located in Miami, Florida. This world is in desperately in need of Jesus and Positivity, so that is why we want to Launch our Clothing Line. We want to make a difference in this world and point people to Jesus. When you wear our Apparel, you can help us spread God's Word and raise up conversations about God's love. 

Any Donation Amount Helps!

In order to launch our Clothing Line, we need your support!  We are raising funds to purchase apparel inventory, graphic design, create our website, and online advertising. We have big dreams and goals, but this is only possible with your support. Any donation amount helps, whether it's $1, $5, $25, $50 $100 or more.

Thank you for your support!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Make sure to spread the message and Follow us on Twitter and Instagram:

Twitter: @OneTruthapparel

Instagram: @OneTruthApparel

Again, thank you for your support.

story:
Come mai la campagna indiegogo?

Questa campagna nasce dal fatto che in molti mi avete richiesto delle magliette personalizzate e/o la ristampa della maglietta di Sdentato

Perchè dovrei contribuire alla campagna?

Perchè se non ho la certezza di raggiungere la cifra minima per stamparne il minimo ovvero 100 (50 sdentato e 50 con logo) non posso mandarle in produzione. Difatti se non raggiungerò la cifra minima i soldi verranno rimborsati a tutti!!!

Ho pensato di creare 4 tipi di ringraziamenti:

  1. Con 1 euro potrai sostenere la campagna
  2. Se donerai 10 euro avrai una maglietta che ti sarà consegnata a mano nel caso abitassi a Torino oppure a Lucca Comics 2015
  3. Con 15 euro riceverai la maglietta scelta a casa tua già spedita
  4. Se donerai 25 euro riceverai a casa tua entrambe le magliette

Cosa ci farò con i tuoi soldi?

 - 500 euro serviranno alla realizzazione delle magliette, 100 t-shirt a 5 colori costano circa 620 con l'iva

- almeno 50€ vanno in commissioni indiegogo e paypal se non di più...

Ecco il sito dove verificare il preventivo delle magliette: http://www.pubblicarrello.com/uomo-tshirt-manic...

story:
For as long as I can remember I've always loved sketch fonts. But over the years, I've become bored with always using the same one Sketch Gothic Bold over and over again. So one day I thought to myself... could I turn any typeface in my font library into a sketch font? Well the answer is yes, and if you have Adobe Illustrator CS4 or above I'll teach you how with this simple tutorial. (And if you don't have Adobe Illustrator, don't worry, you can still get the custom sketch font below)

If we reach our goal we'll give EVERYONE a bonus font!

The funds will go towards developing the training/tutorial materials and creating the custom fonts from scratch. If you LOVE sketch fonts... SUPPORT this project!!!

So with this simple tutorial, ANY typeface that you currently have in your font library can instantly be turned into a sketch font. And once you've setup your Adobe Illustrator file, you'll have the knowledge to make custom edits to get the exact effect you've been searching for. 

Sketch fonts are great for adding texture to your work and makes them ideal for high impact designs. If you love sketch fonts and you've always wanted to create you're own...you'll love this project. The perfect gift for the designer aficionado in your life.

Order your copy today!

story:
Stand out and be different with COBB & Co Watches

COBB & Co. Watches are the first wood watches you can wear for both casual AND formal situations.

Made from natural wood, medical grade stainless steel and genuine leather, COBB & Co. Watches are stylish wood watches different enough for any occasion.



Press

inStash - "If you’ve been in the market for a watch, but weren’t sure where to start, you may want to keep your eyes peeled."

That Should Be Mine - "The latest timepiece to have caught my eye are these rather excellent Cobb & Co. Watches which are a combination of wood and awesomeness."

Rant Daily - "Don’t sleep on COBB & Co.’s new launch of wood watches designed for any occasion. Let’s upgrade from the typical timepiece and actually get a conversation started while the watch does all the work."


Why COBB & Co Watches?

We created these watches because we saw wood watches being made, but we felt like there was nothing available that you can for both casual and formal situations.

A lot of wood watches use wood just for the sake of using wood. We wanted to make a wood watch where the wood was only used because it added to the look.

We wanted something that you would be comfortable to wear to work, to a meeting, to dinner, or out with friends.


About us

The brand COBB & Co. has a long history of innovation. COBB & Co started in 1853 as a horse and coach transport company. When it was founded, the founder Freeman Cobb was only 23. In the harsh Australian conditions, COBB & Co used superior technology in their coaches, had highly experienced horse teams, and had horse teams swap every 25kms so they could go places that nobody else could go, faster than anybody else could go. COBB & Co became synonymous with reliability and speed, and it quickly grew to be the nations largest transport company.

The young entrepreneurial passion, determination, and pure grit is what we strove to bring out in our initial range of watches.


Designing the watches

When we designed the watches, we had a few core goals

  • Use a natural wood
  • Use modern materials to bring out the best of the natural wood
  • 3D texture on the dial of the watch
  • Create something stylish that can be worn day to day

We started in December 2012 sketching and designing different concepts.

Once we had designs we liked, we spent a lot of time finding the right manufacturer who had experience in working with these materials. From there, we went through a number of different samples, and finally settled on our favourite 11 watches.

 

Specifications

Case: High grade stainless steel case, flat glass lens

Case Back: Screw caseback with etching logo

Stainless Steel: High grade stainless steel strap, butterfly clip buckle

Leather: Genuine top layer leather for outer strap, split leather for inner strap

Wood: Maple, Red Sandalwood, Green Sandalwood, Ebony

Movement: Quality Japanese Miyota Movement - 2115

Water Resistance: 3ATM (30 meters)

Warranty: 3 years

All our watches are made with medical grade stainless steel, a top quality Miyota 2115 mechanism, oblique dial ring, a fine ribbed pattern behind the roman numerals, and a recessed inner dial with a wood grain pattern. 

The back of the case and the buckle (on our stainless steel watches) are engraved with our logo. 

Our leather straps are genuine leather and made from top layer leather for the outside of the strap and split leather for the inside of the strap. The glass is hardened glass to resist scratching. 

We use four different types of wood. Ebony, Red Sandalwood and Green Sandalwood from Mozambique. Maple from North America. All of the wood is natural, and hasn't been finished with any paint.

Each watch is packaged in a matching gift box.

The watches are water resistant to 30m, but to ensure longevity of the wood, we recommend not to take them with you in the shower or when you go swimming.

Our watches come with a 3 year warranty.

 

 

 

Introducing the COBB & Co. Watch Collection

Here is a close look at each of the watches in our collection.

Red Sandalwood "Freeman Cobb" Stainless Steel Watch

The first watch in the COBB & Co. collection is our Red Sandalwood Stainless Steel watch. This watch is inspired by Freeman Cobb, who founded COBB & Co at the age of 23. By all accounts he was a high energy innovator who passionately fought for high standards in the business. This watch is a great everyday watch that’s different enough to draw comments, and stylish so that you can wear it to work.

Comes in a mahogany colored wooden gift box.

 

Green Sandalwood "Casual" Leather  Watch

Our second watch and my personal favourite is our “Casual Watch”. It’s made from Green Sandalwood, sourced from Mozambique; a brown, genuine leather strap, and a glossy stainless steel case. It’s distinctive look makes it perfect for casual gatherings and outdoor activities.

It comes in a stylish bamboo gift box.

It's available with a COBB & Co style dial or with a classic dial (no wood pattern on the watch face).


 

Black Maple Stainless Steel Watch

Our black stainless steel watch is made with Maple wood from North America. The texture on the dial really looks stunning on this watch, and the contrast between the wood and the glossy black stainless steel is sure to draw comments.

Comes in a stylish bamboo gift box.

Above: Black Maple Stainless Steel Watch

 

Ebony Gold "James Rutherford" Stainless Steel Watch

The Gold watch in our collection is framed with our stunning Ebony wood. This watch was inspired by James Rutherford, a growth hacker who took over COBB & Co. in 1861 and grew it quickly and massively from a bustling regional business to the largest transport company in the country at the time. The gold watch signifies his generosity, family values and leadership.

It looks amazing in it's black faux leather gift box.

Available in COBB & Co style with a wood pattern on the dial, or in classic style without the wood pattern on the dial.

 

Ebony Leather Watch

The Fifth Watch in our collection is a stainless steel, ebony leather watch. It has a stunning contrast between the case and the wood, and it’s classic look and feel make it a great dress watch or dinner watch. A must have in any set of 3.

Comes in a stylish black faux leather gift box.

Available in COBB & Co style with a wood pattern on the dial, or in classic style.


 

Black Ebony Leather Watch

The fourth watch in the COBB & Co. collection is the matte black, ebony wood, leather watch. It has a darker dial than the rest of our watches and is a great leather watch for everyday wear.

 

Comes in a stunning black faux leather gift box.

Available in COBB & Co style with a wood pattern on the dial and classic style, without the wood pattern on the dial.

 



The complete range...

We've created a collection of 11 watches that we absolutely love. Here is a look at the full range.



Sets

We created these watches with the idea that you could have different watches for different occasions. Here are a few of our favourite combinations.

1. Red Sandalwood, Green sandalwood, Ebony leather

 

 

 

2. Ebony Gold, Red Sandalwood, Black Maple

 

 

 

3. Green sandalwood, black maple, black ebony leather

 

 

 

4. Full set

The watch collection with the COBB & Co style dials.

 

 

 

What happens next

Once we reach our funding goal, we'll place an order for materials with our suppliers and begin production of the watches with our manufacturing partner. Watch production will take 40-45 days.

Once the watches are ready, they will be shipped to our distribution centers in USA, UK and Australia, which will take another week. From there, they will be shipped to you in about 1-5 days (Please allow an extra week for international orders).

We need your support

We've spent the last 6 months working on designing and creating these watches. We're super proud of them, but to make these watches a reality, we need your help.

To meet our minimum order with our manufacturer and to distribute these watches around the world, we’re at a point now where we still need $30,000.

When you pledge to support us, you'll get our heart felt thanks, you’ll get our watches at huge discounts off retail price, and (with your permission) we’ll add your name to the COBB & Co. Watches Founder page on our website.

One of the best ways you can help is to email this page to your friends, and share it on Facebook and Twitter.

Please helps us make this vision a reality, and let's get these watches on your wrist!

Rewards

1. Early bird: Choose any watch - $79 - Only 50 available

2. Choose 1 Leather Watch - $99 (RRP $169, Save $70)

3. Choose 1 Stainless Steel Watch - $119 (RRP $229, Save $110)

4. Choose any 3 watches - $270

5. Choose any 6 watches - $490

7. Complete set of 11 watches + Maple Leather Watch - $1000 - Only 2 available

8. Design your own COBB & Co Watch - $2,000 - Only 10 available

Please add $15 freight for shipping outside USA and Australia.

Available add ons

Watch strap adjustment tool - add $6

Add $6 to your pledge and we'll also send you a tool to adjust the strap on your stainless steel watch.

 

 

3 watch leather display case - add $35

Add $35 to your pledge and we'll send you a 3 watch leather display case for your watches.

 

 

6 watch leather display case - add $45

Add $45 to your pledge and we'll send you a 6 watch leather display case for your watches.

 

 

PLEASE HELP FUND US AND MAKE THESE WATCHES A REALITY!


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How do I chose which watch I want when I am ordering?

When you initially order you do not need to choose the colour. Once the campaign is successful, you will receive an email and you will be able to choose which watch you want there.

story:
HELP FOR THE PHILIPPINES
When we heard about typhoon in the Philippines we don't wordering long about that. First 50% of income from selling watches (trough two months) goes to the victims.

See our site: morewatch.webflow.com

Sign up our newsletter

Win special watch set! We choose one of Funder every week!

  • Week 1: 4-10.11 winner:  KAMIL from Sweden
  • Week 2: 11-17.11 winner __________
  • Week 3: 18-24.11 winner __________
  • Week 4: 25.11-1.12 winner __________
  • Week 5: 2-8.12 winner __________
  • Week 6: 9-15.12 winner __________
  • Week 7: 15-22.12 winner __________

It's time to help!

My name is Kamil and I have a dream that does not allow me to sleep for a few weeks. I would love to start helping others, but more than ever. I knew I have to raise the money., but how? If I collect them from people I spent it quickly, and again I would have to collect from the beginning. What if I earn them? I thought I'd set up online store with watches and part of the money I earned will be passed on to charities in the world. 




What I Need & What You Get

I need to start a bit of money, but if I don't earn the full amount, I will try to realized my idea, but it will be harder.

For anyone who can help me, I would like to say thank you. As part of this Funder will receive a special gift from me, depending on the amount that paid.

Where the funds go?

Mainly on the design and creation the first watches, building online store, some adverts, service and distribution.

Why it's important?

Therefore, it will help, especially poor children around the world. I also tried to obtain partners, patrons that helped me. Together, we can achieve when it really help a lot of people. All I need is just a start. And this is the most difficult, which is why I ask for your help.



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help by paying money, you can share the campaign and tell friends about it. I will be really very grateful. The simpliest to use are Indiegogo sharing tools.

Sending hugs!
Kamil

Sign up our newsletter

*I used to watch images Jolli Time. These are not my products. On my work will start by collecting the amount. However, they work on a similar mechanism of interchangeable straps and other watch parts.

story:
DESIGN

In the past year, we have partnered up with the most experienced watch makers in the world. We have developed multiple prototypes, gone through trials and errors, making a perfect piece for perfectionists. ​

This simple and elegant design is one of the best in the industry. London's craftsmanship is associated with its long culture and history, and is well-known all over the world. ​

Unlike many other watches, we use roman numeral "IV" for 4-hour position in stead of "IIII". Do you know why? 

A bit taste of history: London's Big Ben uses "IV" instead of "IIII" on the clock dial.​

We never fail to reflect London.

 

 

 

MANUFACTURING

 

We worked hard to ensure quality of our products. We believe that quality control assessments at each phase of production is the key to maintain high standards of our watches.

Intensive quality control and world-class watch manufacturing partners enabled us to provide you the watch with stainless steel surgical grade strength, high precision Swiss movement, and long lasting durability.​​

We are more than confident to give you 3-year international warranty for our high quality watches.

 

DIRECTLY TO YOU!

Have you ever wondered why those luxury watches on the market have very high price tags?

These luxury watches are sold in this business model. Traditionally, it involves several middlemen before it reaches you. ​

So what?

Price hikes! Yes, mark-up prices increase to, in some cases, more than 1000% of the original price. You get the very expensive price tag for these watches.​

But our business model is different. ​

It is simple. We cut out the middlemen to deliver you high quality, high-spec watches for a fraction of the price tags on today's market. Our prices start from £100.

Hope you get the difference.

 

 

QUALITY & SPECIFICATIONS - SUMMARY

 

Movement: Swiss movement by Ronda​

Case: 316L Stainless steel case​

Glass: Sapphire crystal glass, scratch-resistant​

Dial: 40 mm white dial​

Thickness: 6 mm​

Hand: 2 black hands (hour and minute)​

Strap: High quality genuine leather, optimized for well-aging​

Water resistance: 5 ATM or 50 m or 165 ft

 

INTERNATIONAL WARRANTY

 

We are so confident about the quality and durability of our watch that we will give you 3-year international warranty. It doesn't matter where you are, we've got your back.

Hassle-free, worry-free.

 

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

 

We make our timepieces in a perfect way, to suit each and every individual. We are 100% sure you would be satisfied with our watch. ​

In case we fail to meet your expectations and satisfaction, we are more than happy to provide you 100% refund. ​

So, why not have one now?

 

FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

​

All of our watches come with free international shipping. No extra hidden shipping fees.​

We don't use cheap unreliable shipping methods. We only use safe and fast international shipping with tracking. You will be provided a tracking code as soon as possible after your purchase.​

However, please note that we are not responsible for (possible) import taxes or duties of your residence country.

 

MEDIA GALLERY

 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We are aware that this is a complex campaign. There could be potential problems regarding to production and logistics. However, we are experienced and confident that we will overcome any problem encountered during and after campaign period. We have fully considered each and every aspect of the campaign, and troubleshooting team on stand by. 

We have been spending several months looking into production line, and optimising it to achieve high capacity, and high quality production in a short period of time. We have developed several prototypes, which are fully functional. 

Moreover, we have experienced logistics team to fulfill the rewards of the campaign without delays after production. We will keep you informed throughout the campaign, and update relevant information at the earliest possible moment. 

Thank you very much. We are grateful for your support, and we would like to take you to the next level of high quality watches. Join us for the journey!

No extra hidden shipping fees.​We don't use cheap unreliable shipping methods. We only use safe and fast international shipping with tracking. You will be provided a tracking code as soon as possible after your purchase.​However, please note that we are not responsible for (possible) import taxes or duties of your residence country. MEDIA GALLERY 

 

 

 

 

 

 




 
 
  RISKS & CHALLENGESWe are aware that this is a complex campaign. There could be potential problems regarding to production and logistics. However, we are experienced and confident that we will overcome any problem encountered during and after campaign period. We have fully considered each and every aspect of the campaign, and troubleshooting team on stand by. We have been spending several months looking into production line, and optimising it to achieve high capacity, and high quality production in a short period of time. We have developed several prototypes, which are fully functional. Moreover, we have experienced logistics team to fulfill the rewards of the campaign without delays after production. We will keep you informed throughout the campaign, and update relevant information at the earliest possible moment. Thank you very much. We are grateful for your support, and we would like to take you to the next level of high quality watches. Join us for the journey!

story:
Quality bracelets developed to provide inspiration. Made with premium and high quality materials, designed to last for years to come. After dedicating 2 years of hard work into bringing this project to life, we are ready to start a movement and share our vision. We are True North Brand.



 


 

In life we are uncertain where we stand, where we are going and what is the right path for us. Here at True North, our mission is to inspire you and remind you to keep moving forward when life gets tough, and to show you directions to the right path.


Life is a journey. True North exists to help you through life’s high and lows and to remind you to keep moving forward.


Meaning behind the bracelet's look


Our brand is driven by our belief that our innate purpose is nothing more than to be the greatest version of ourselves. It is a process of refinement, improvement, and enhancement. When you are aligned with the process and living your purpose, you have the potential of creating something amazing.

 


Featuring our most popular colorways, we are proud to introduce our first line of unisex inspirational bracelets.

 

 

Inspired by the “Explorers” around the world. In twenty years for now you will regret the things you didn’t do far more than the things you did. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.

  • Lunar Silver Metallic Arrow + Army Green Paracord
  • Gold Metallic Arrow + Army Green Paracord
  • Gunmetal Black Metallic Arrow + Army Green Paracord
  • Rose Gold Metallic Arrow + Army Green Paracord

 

 



Inspired by the "Entrepreneurs" in this era. Individuals who are constantly moving or pushing towards a goal, be it money, a personal target, and individuals who are working hard building their Empire. Black is an indicator of inner strength and determination. 

  • Lunar Silver Metallic Arrow + Black Paracord
  • Gold Metallic Arrow + Black Paracord
  • Gunmetal Black Metallic Arrow + Black Paracord
  • Rose Gold Metallic Arrow + Black Paracord

 

 



For the underrated culture of influencers.  Burgundy represents strength and bravery. It represents people who are not afraid to take risks and people who are achievers in the society.  It's true that first impression last; make sure its a good one. 

  • Lunar Silver Metallic Arrow + Burgundy Paracord
  • Gold Metallic Arrow + Burgundy Paracord
  • Gunmetal Black Metallic Arrow + Burgundy Paracord
  • Rose Gold Metallic Arrow + Burgundy Paracord

 



 

We believe in pure craftsmanship at the highest level. We want the design to look like a jewelry masterpiece and carry every aspect of precision, durability, versatility, reliability and quality of mind.

 

The Arrow

After months of research and testing, we finally found a supplier for our arrows that meets our standards.  

Made with

Zinc Alloy is versatile engineering material. No other alloy provides the combination of strength, toughness, rigidity, bearing performance, and economic castability. Precision, quality, and repeat performances are distinct zinc alloy advantages. Our arrow manufacturer are top rated and have been in the business for years.

We are so confident in the quality of our bracelets, that each arrow is backed by a 5-year warranty. Bend or break.

 

The Strap

Strong – Paracord with a 550 lbs. minimum breaking strength designed to be lightweight and able to hold up in rugged applications.

Durable – With outdoor use in mind, our paracord is resistant to UV Sunlight (no fading of colors), will not rot or mildew, and can withstand abrasion.

Versatile – Unlimited potential of uses, from survival applications to crafting, the uses are incredibly endless and you can’t ever have enough cord on hand.

Quality – Our Paracord is manufactured by certified U.S Gov. Contractors that supply Military Grade Paracord to the U.S Military. 

 

 

 

 

 





Quality bracelets usually come at an extra-inflated price. We want to make it easier to invest in premium accessories. In order to do so, we’ve implemented a direct-to-consumer business model that allows us to craft you a world-class product at only a fraction of the price.

This way, by avoiding all the middlemen we can offer you a luxury bracelet for less than $50.00.
 

 

Hi there! We spend a lot of time making sure we can have a nicely designed and well-made accessory. We have a strong background in filmmaking and a passion on “creating”. This time, we wanted to create something new and exciting, one-of-a-kind product for everyone.

We are not just a bracelet company. We aspire to inspire. We are a movement. Thanks for the love! – Al and Alvin

 






 

 

The risks and challenges for making these bracelets is low because we’ve spent a lot of time perfecting the bracelet, from picking the best quality strap and mold of the arrow. We have spent numerous times shipping in Canada, US and places around the world to make sure we can deliver on time. With your HELP, you will be wearing True North Bracelets in no time.

story:
Prevent the crudely named & embarrassing camel toe problem in your favourite clothes.

The SmoothGroove is comfortable, you don't know it's there.

The SmoothGroove product is the brainchild of Susan Laurie who, like thousands of other women, suffered the occasional embarrassment of camel toe.

Frustrated by the necessity to change clothes or put on a long top, Susan searched the internet, expecting to find a camel toe solution only to be disappointed that there was nothing available to save her blushes.

Susan decided she wanted to develop a product that would allow her and women like her to wear their favourite clothes, whilst ensuring a smooth profile and has worked for the last four years with inspirational women and top designers to create SmoothGroove.

Today SmoothGroove customers range from young club goers who love how it makes them look in their tiny dance gear, to ladies who use it for yoga, horse riding and ballet... the list is endless.

The SmoothGroove camel toe solution –

  • Is made from a medical grade polymer which moulds itself to the contours of the body, so it is extremely comfortable
  • Contains an antibacterial agent, so it is safe
  • Is washable
  • Comes with a satin pouch to store it discreetly in your wardrobe
  • Is available in White, Black and Clear

Indiegogo Plan

We're using Indiegogo to raise funds to design and develop a new retail 'hook' style packaging to help us get the SmoothGroove in shops near you! Currently SmoothGroove comes in a box and/or pouch, but in order for retailers to stock our product, they need a simple and lightweight packaging design solution.

We are starting to receive interest from retailers, so this packaging project will play an essential role as we grow our business.

PERKS

The SmoothGroove
 
 
 
SmoothGroove Camel Toe Posters
 
 
SmoothGroove Camel Toe Vest and T Shirt
 
SmoothGroove Essentials Kit
 
 
 
 

 
http://www.smoothgroovecommunity.com
 
 

Risks and challenges

Our principal challenge will be creating a packaging design that aids retailers' decisions to stock our product making it lightweight and able to fit in with retail space, whilst maintaining the up market style of the product.

We can overcome this challenge using the money we raise through Indiegogo  funding, as it will allow us to thoroughly explore the design options, working closely with expert packaging designers to ensure our new product can be the the best it possibly can be.

story:
The Veronica hat is an iconic, one-of-a-kind, timeless luxury essential. It can be dressed up or down and carries a simple, minimalistic elegance that makes every woman feel feminine and unique.

Dimensions

Diameter: 15-16" wide, Brim: 4.5" wide, Crown: 4" high.

Sizing

See chart at the bottom of the page

Manufacturing

Light-weight, hand-shaped white straw capeline with a conic bowler and law brim decorated with small fringes. It comes standard with a black cotton grosgrain band, hand-sewn both inside and outside. 

Available custom band colors: 

  • Black (standard)
  • Blue Navy
  • Pink
  • Taupe
  • Avio Blue

Pricing

STANDARD: $325 INDIEGOGO / $550 RETAIL

CUSTOM: $350 INDIEGOGO / $620 RETAIL

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

  

The Marie hat is a playful, slightly larger take on the classic Veronica hat. Its black and white straws make it a statement piece that will complement every woman's unique style with verve and glamour.

Dimensions

Diameter: 16-17" wide, Brim: 5.5" wide, Crown: 5" high.

Sizing

See chart at the bottom of the page

Manufacturing

Light-weight, hand-shaped black and white straw capeline with a conic bowler and law brim decorated with small fringes. It comes standard with an orange/red cotton grosgrain band, hand-sewn both inside and outside.

Available custom band colors:

  • Orange-red (standard) 
  • White
  • Black 
  • Red-purple  
  • Emerald green

Pricing

STANDARD: $325 INDIEGOGO / $550 RETAIL

CUSTOM: $350 INDIEGOGO / $620 RETAIL

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Please help us spread the word sharing our posts on:

 

 

 

Hat Sizing Chart

 

How to Measure your Hat Size (measure it, don't use other hats as proxy)

Use a flexible measuring tape. Wrap a measuring tape around your head about a half inch above your eyebrow, or exactly where the hat will sit on your head. Don't wrap the tape too tightly. You want it to fit comfortably. Compare the circumference of your head to our hat sizing chart. If you fall in between sizes, buy the larger size.

It is important that you measure your head, even if you’ve found a great fit with a certain size in the past, as hat sizes do vary brand by brand. 

Please email us at hello@rossi-rei.com if you have any questions about sizing. We'd love to help!

story:
#crownn

Hello Everyone,

Welcome to Crownn's Indiegogo page

www.crownn.co.uk 

Firstly why do you need Crownn?

I've always loved sunglasses, especially those from really luxurious brands! I have always wondered why most people only have one pair and that's all they wear - at Crownn we want to make it feasible to have multiple pairs of luxury glasses without breaking the bank!

Anyway, I came up with the idea for Crownn about 6 months ago when I became fed up that there was no wide range of brightly coloured glasses with that luxurious feel I was craving. All that existed was the kind you buy from street-market stalls, cheap and tacky glasses with rubbish lenses which really aren't that great for your eyes. I am also a massive fan of products that are Made In England, so looked very hard to find another British brand of sunglasses which entirely are Made In England. This was a struggle, and I found myself only finding a few companies which were making the very expensive handmade pairs.

So my mission was set to create;

  • A wide range of brightly coloured glasses.

  • An excellent high quality frame with protective lenses.
  • A luxurious, fun and fresh product at an affordable price.

 So, Crownn was born!

Alongside all this, we want to be more than just a sunglasses brand - a fun bright brand hosting pop-up shops and awesome parties worldwide, showing that life doesn't have to be 9-5! We will bring happiness and excitement  to you, not conforming with the stereotype of a stuffy boring brand. We want to break the mould and stand-out from the crowd, so why not join us along the way?


The frame is an exciting and unique design, we really wanted to create something different to everything else, yet not so outlandish as to be unwearable. They are a combination between the round lens and wayfarer frame. The exclusive hinges wrap around the front of the frame and there is also the awesome brand logo which is embossed into the inside of the arms.  We believe this really finishes them off nicely, creating a luxurious, and more importantly, an affordable product!

The frame is injection moulded with the highest quality plastic there is available. Most of the really expensive glasses on the market are made by drilling the shape of the glasses out of a block of acetate, but we have found another, more versatile and effective form of this acetate: Cellulose Acetate Propionate, which is a slight variation on the acetate block. What this really means is that the acetate is in granular form, which is then injected into a mould and out pop the Crownns! The benefits of using this type of plastic are its natural surface gloss, toughness and great impact resistance, along with also being hypoallergenic, as we don't want anyone to be stopped from wearing these sunglasses!

After extensive research, we came to the decision that we will be producing the lenses from CR-39, which will undoubtedly be the best lens for this frame. The lens will be CE registered, signifying that they are EU approved as eyewear, along with their UV400 rating - thus blocking all harmful UV rays, they are multicoated, which basically means it has an anti-reflective coating giving a clearer and crisper image, this multi-coating also makes them scratch resistant!

Also we will have a logo on either arm for the real things!

 

You may choose any of the colours from the wheel above for your perk, don't forget there is also a white.

Perks

We have a wide choice of perks for you to choose from! All of these perks will mark the beginning of Crownn's successful future in sunglasses making!!
Postage is free for all UK orders, although please add the stated amount for international shipping.

Every single pair of sunglasses will be coming with a really cool branded case and a branded cleaning cloth! So you have somewhere safe to keep your crownn's and the best way to clean them.

We also wanted to offer another perk, so we have designed a t-shirt for you to wear to match your glasses! You can choose the colour of the logo and print, Navy, red, pink and yellow. 

 


Personally my favourite perks are;

• The red limited edition highest quality micro-fibre lens cloth. Despite being our base-level reward, this still gives you a taste of the luxury Crownn products!

• The unique pair of multicoloured sunglasses! How amazing is this, having a pair of sunglasses that nobody else owns, ever?! They really are unique just for you!

• Saving the best until last, the real top reward would have to be the two pairs of glasses and the two tickets to the launch party! Perfect to share with a friend, or give as a gift ! This will be a fantastic opportunity to enjoy the high life in one of London's finest clubs embodying the luxury status Crownn affords.

 

 Why do we need Indiegogo?

We are fortunate to have found a manufacturer in the UK for our lovely frames to be made, assembled and packaged, alongside a lens laboratory here in the UK to ensure you get only the best possible lenses and the best protection for your eyes. Unfortunately, these come at a cost, and in order to secure our first orders and to get this exciting company off the ground, we are looking for your help through Indiegogo to help take us to the next stage, enabling us to produce the glasses at such an affordable price.

Eye Protection!

Rather than going into lots of boring details I'm just going to say the facts, everyones eyes need protection from harmful UV (Ultraviolet Radiation). Without this protection, this radiation can seriously damage your eyes! So why risk it? The way you can tell if your glasses are safe is to look for a CE mark, then you know they have been certified to a high level and actually protect your eyes!

The way you can tell if your glasses are safe is to look for a CE mark, then you know they have been certified to a high level and actually protect your eyes!

story:
Hi there! I am a student from the Boston area who has wanted to start a watch company for a number of years. Now, I am following my dream and launching Elementa. I founded and manage one of the leading watch blogs, itsallaboutwatches.com. Through my work on this site, my contacts in the industry and frequent watch reviews, I have learned what features and design characteristics people prefer and value in a watch. However, it's easy to find watches that one admires, but harder to find a good-looking, versatile, high-quality watch that's affordable. My goal is to bridge the gap between high-quality and affordability and pass it onto you, the customer. The name Elementa comes from the Latin word for element because we believe that our watches are 'always in their element' and shouldn't be limited to one situation. Principium is also Latin and translates to english as "first", because this is the first watch from Elementa.


Breakdown and Rewards

Essentially all of the money from this project is earmarked for the manufacture and production of the Principium. I am trying to raise $34,625. If the project is successfully funded the crowd-funding fees will amount to 9%, leaving me with $32,201 which will be spent as follows:

            1. $26,000 -- Production of 100 watches (can change)

            2. $3,000 -- Shipping (To customers and from factory)

            3. $1,500 -- Extra pieces (Bezels, dials, hands, straps, clasps, etc.)

            4. $500 -- Production of 100 boxes

            5. $1,200 - Post-production sales service and marketing


Rewards

            1) $325 -- (Limit 15) Early to the party! Get your Elementa Principium                        at $75 under post-campaign retail price!

            2) $350 -- (Limit 30) You're still on time! Get your Elementa Principium                    at $50 under the post-campaign retail price!

            3) $375 -- A little later.  Get your Elementa Principium for $25 under the                      post-campaign price!


Our funding is all-or-nothing. If we don't reach our goal, we won't produce the watches and we will refund all of our investors.


    Risks & Challenges

                1) Delivery time -- The delivery time may be delayed due to holdups in                   customs, production errors in the final product before or unforeseen                   problems sourcing components.

                2) We are expecting the watches to be delivered with very few or no                          defects due to the proven reliability of the movement, the                                      manufacturer's long history in producing high-quality watches and                      the quality control we will be doing. While there shouldn't be any                          defects on your watch, if there is it will be fixed under warranty.


      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you can't contribute, please share this project using facebook, twitter, etc. I would greatly appreciate it. 


      Specs.

      - 39mm case diameter

      - 46mm lug to lug

      - 316L stainless steel case

      - Screw-down crown

      - Luminescent markers, hands, and bezel pearl

                  - Will look white during the day and glow blue at night

                  - BG-W9 Swiss superluminova

      - 120-click unidirectional rotating bezel

      - 22mm lug width

      - 22mm rubber strap with fold-over clasp

      - Miyota 9015 movement

                  - 28,800 BPH (smooth second hand sweep)

                  - 24 jewels

                  - Automatic mechanical movement with a power reserve of 42+ hours

                  - Automatic and hand winding

                  -  The movement has a hacking function (second hand stops when the                     crown is pulled out to allow you to set the time more accurately)


      More Views

      Strap:


      Lug Side:

      With Finishing:

      Crown side of the case:

      Crown:

      Caseback:

story:
Premium women’s footwear designed in Portland, and delivered to you at wholesale.


To support us, click "Contribute Now" on the right, or click directly on any of the available rewards.

Our story

Based on the simple idea of beauty paired with functional storage, we design products for the modern woman with the goal to simplify her life. 

LUME has been producing premium all-weather footwear for the past year. Frustrated with retail, we created a way to make the products we love, get closer to the people who buy them, and sell them at a price point that changes the game. Here’s how we're doing it:

Premium women’s all-weather boots, designed in Portland...

For the past 20 years, our small team has been designing, manufacturing and bringing to retail footwear for some of the biggest brands in the world.  We have earned a reputation for obsessing over quality, fit, craftsmanship and the classic styling.

Delivered to you at wholesale...

If you purchased our boots at a retailer, you would pay $130. We’ll sell them directly to you for $60 - $70 a pair, shipped. We’re following this pricing model for everything we make.



After hitting the slopes, secure a key and go


Perfect for all gardens, urban or roof top


Tuck your iPhone or Android safely as you stroll across the Brooklyn Bridge


Going out to dinner, when you don't need a purse


The Emily - $70

Even if you don’t ride, the Emily will make the perfect fashion statement for any event.  Inspired by the classic equestrian boot it stands 14 inches tall for when you need more leg coverage or higher fashion.  The waterproof construction allows you to go from the rain and puddles, the garden, barn stalls and even to the snow.  Feedback from wear testers has put all of these possible scenarios to the test and these boots pass with flying colors.  I personally wish I would have created these boots while my daughter was still playing year round soccer.  They are perfect for that, too!

Features:

  • 100% waterproof construction
  • 7mm flex and resilient neoprene bootie
  • Durable handcrafted rubber overlay
  • Non Marking deep lug rubber outsole
  • Three seasons comfort rated to -30°F
  • Patent Pending insulated flex sleeve (pocket) to carry a Smartphone
  • Built in key clip to hold your keys safe
  • Height: 14in (size 8)
  • Size: Women's 6 - 11


The Sleeve - $60

We bring you the Sleeve by popular demand of Moms and Ladies everywhere.  These boots are also designed for the modern woman looking for style, comfort, warmth and functional storage. It stands 11.5 inches tall and the waterproof construction allows you to go from the rain and puddles, the garden, barn stalls and even to the snow.  Functional storage is again the added bonus with the built in pockets.  Some of the items that fit are a smart phone, ID, debit card or cash.  

Features:

  • 100% waterproof construction
  • 7mm flex and resilient neoprene bootie
  • Durable handcrafted rubber overlay
  • Non Marking deep lug rubber outsole
  • Three seasons comfort rated to -30°F
  • Patent Pending insulated flex sleeve (pocket) to carry a Smartphone
  • Built in key clip to hold your keys safe
  • Height: 11.5in (size 8)
  • Size: Women's 6 - 11


Tell me more about this quality.

Quality, style and function are the highest priority when designing and making any LUME product.  All of our styles have Icons printed on the back of the boots to easily identify the features:


I met Judy at a Hunter/Jumper show while promoting and selling the Jr. Sleeve, which are a huge hit with her little riders at her stables in Beavercreek, OR.  She’s been riding since she was seven years old so I knew Judy would be the perfect match to give the Emily a test run. She was amazed at all of the features but especially the quality of construction and comfort. I’ve had a high demand for the Women’s line for many months now but to hear it straight from an expert is always the best!  “I live in my barn boots and these are barn boots with a heel, “nothing better!”  She even washed them up and wore them into Portland for dinner.  


All of the boot pockets have been designed with a lower opening so that when out in the garden, your cutting sheers store safely away from your legs allowing you to free up your hands.


Awesome, I'm in. I love everything so how can I be a part of it?

We’re making stylish rubber and neoprene boots, with pockets, for woman because we make damn good boots and the demand for them is here and now.

When we've raised $95K, we can instruct the manufacturer to start production of the boots and bring them to you by early December, just in time for winter and the holidays.  The sizing and wear tests are done.  Quality control of the designs is dialed and women everywhere are anxiously awaiting the opportunity to own a pair of the Emily or the Sleeve.

What sizes and colors are you making?

  • Both the Emily and the Sleeve will be available in Women's sizes 6-11 (whole sizes only).
  • Color choices are Vivacious Pink, Emerald Green, Orange and All Black.  Pick your favorite color or that of your favorite sports team!
  • The Emily is 14 inches tall from the ground and the calf circumference is 14.5 inches. The pocket size is 5 inches deep.
  • The Sleeve is 11.5 inches tall from the ground and the circumference is 14.5 inches. The pocket size is 5 inches deep.

Order as many pairs as you wish.  They also make great holiday gifts!



Where we are in development:

We currently have completed our working prototypes,
Our size grading has been completed and over the past month we have conducted an extensive fit test.

As soon as the campaign is completed we will go into production and plan on shipping to our contributors the beginning of December, just in time for the winter season and the holidays.

Risks and Challenges:

This is not our first adventure. We have lived through many full production runs of high-quality products that have been selling very successfully. We have worked with our vendors, for years. We know what to avoid and also know the snags to watch out for.

Still, we know that experience doesn’t completely eliminate all the risks going forward.

Timing is the biggest risk.

Why we need your help:

By pre-ordering your boots from this campaign and backing us by choosing a Perk(s), LUME can produce and deliver the Women’s line just in time for the holidays with an early December arrival. As mentioned, we’ve already done all the necessary work that sometimes slows the process.  Fit and wear tests are completed, quality control of our style samples is finished.  The manufacturer is just waiting for the word to begin production.  So pledge today and spread the LUME word to all friends and family members!

Do you really know what you're doing?

Our Experience

LUME is a Portland, OR based footwear brand inspired by water and designed for modern women and cool kids.  With the help of my husband, a former award winning Nike Design Director and 20+ year industry expert, I have been able to bring this brand to life.  Paired with my 25+ years of sales and marketing (and being a modern woman with cool kids) we make a great team.

I’ve personally been telling our story for more than a year and the response is off the charts.

With the successful launch in 2012 with The Jr. Sleeve, a new kid’s product, designed for the junior explorer with 100% waterproof construction, we brought an innovative concept to the outdoor lifestyle market by incorporating a unique inner sleeve (pocket) into all of our products

Anything I can do to help?

After you support us, we would love if you helped spread the word. Email, Facebook, Twitter - whatever you prefer!

We can be found on Facebook, Twitter and at our homepage.

Don't hesitate to reach out to me. wrayann@lumefootwear.com

story:
Why Tighties Wallet?

We were frustrated with traditional wallets that seemed to have more material in them than functionality. All that material used to make a wallet made them thick bulky and clunky. Not something we wanted to put in our pockets and sit on or have bulging out. We also wanted something that was better than a traditional wallet. We also felt that wallets seemed overpriced from the big brands out there. We wanted something that we could use to organize our pockets or even a purse. An organizer that had everything you needed all in one place without a whole lot of digging or searching around at the bottom of your pocket or purse.  

We used rubber bands, elastic bands but they either broke, wore out, or just plain looked goofy. We wanted a different kind of wallet that was functional but wasn't like everything else out there,something that was small, compact, easy to use, stylish, kept our pockets organized and was fun. We wanted more than just a wallet. We wanted a pocket organizer. 


So we set out to do things a little different. What started as a simple sketch by Brooks in a notebook sparked something far better and more functionally designed as we put our heads toghther to design the perfect wallet.

With Joe's design background he was able to create the initial digital renderings of the Tighties.  After a few tweaks and sending the renderings back and forth the two brother in laws agreed on a final rendering which was sent to the manufacturer to make temporary sample molds. After months of talking mocking up prototypes, shooting ideas back and forth and working on drawings and renderings,Tighties was born. Why did we call them Tighties? Because they looked like a pair of tighty whitey underwear briefs for your credit cards and business cards. What started off as a pet name while we were developing the product ended up sticking. Not only for the look but also due to the fact that they keep your money, cards, business cards, receipts, keys and change tightly in place.


So what exactly can you put in your Tighties Wallet?

  • Credit cards
  • ID Cards
  • Membership Reward Cards
  • Business cards
  • Security or ID Badges
  • Money (Bills and Coins)
  • Keys
  • Receipts
  • Memory Cards
  • USB Devices
  • Grocery lists
  • Chewing Gum
  • Subway/Bus Pass
  • Metro or Subway Token
  • Small Pen or Pencil
  • Love Letters
  • A token or two
  • To-do lists
  • Your 3x5 notebook (moleskine, field notes, note, etc)
  • Tickets to the opera, baseball game, concert or Dungeons and Dragons tournament 
  • Pretty Much Anything You Carry In Your Pocket That You Want To Keep Together And Organized. Use Your Imagination. (If you come up with new ideas let us know and we'll add them to our list).

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

What's It Made Out Of?

Its non-toxic, recyclable, non porous, won't hold or attract odors, Highest FDA Food grade quality, strong, wont easily tear, freezer proof to -76°F; heat resistant to 450°F, waterproof- you can wash it in your dishwasher if  you need.

The nature of the material keeps your stuff where it belongs without sliding out. It will not discolor, its stain resistant and hygienic, Will not retain odors, won't tear, won't lose its shape, this thing is fold-able, expandable and flexible.


So How Much Will It Hold?

It is designed to hold 1-7 cards, 3-4 business cards and your cash. So you can carry it all with you or use it when you're going out and want something a little smaller maybe you just want to carry a credit card, id and some cash. We wanted to make something that was flexible. So you could use it to carry just an ID and cash if you're going out for the night on the town. Your Company ID badge and office keys, or all your cash and cards for day to day use.

We've put up to 17 cards in it as well as 8 bills,5 business cards and keys. The nature of the design and the material allows for expansion if you so choose.


Tell Me More About Your RFID Protection.

Today there is more and more issues with thieves stealing ID and credit card information. We have worked with our manufacturer to source the best quality RFID sleeves to block would be thieves from stealing your valuable information. They are slim and fit 1-2 cards each and slide perfectly into your Tighties Wallet.


Why Did You Add a Key Ring loop to It?

We wanted a pocket/purse one stop organizational tool. Our essentials when we leave the house today are our keys, wallet and cellphone. All which can be carried in your pants or purse.  The issue is when you have all that stuff in your pocket its moving around maybe scratching your phone's screen, making noise, not easy to access, etc. The other issue is that tracking down all 3 things as well as other items can sometimes prove difficult. We thought it'd be a good idea to combine a wallet and a key to make things simple allowing you to grab them and have them all together when you left your house and easy to pull out of your pocket without having to dig around too long.

The loop also allows you to secure your Tighties Wallet so you won't lose it. You can clip it to your belt, on a lanyard, or inside your backpack or briefcase. No wallet out there allow this much accessibility, flexibility and ease of use. 

If you are not into the key ring cable use it separately or you can even cut the loop off to make the wallet more symmetrical and cleaner. Use it with or without we don't really care, but wanted to give you the option. We think once you use it you'll love it. It is nice to have the essentials all together in one place.

 

 

What is the key ring loop all about?


If you don't want to use it with your Tighties it can be used by itself as a key ring. You can also use your standard key ring with Tighties if you so choose.

 

Is It Patented?

We are in the process of applying for a design as well as a utilitarian patent on the Tighties wallet. So don't plan on finding anything like this anywhere else. There's only one Tighties wallet. 

 

 

About Us

A lot of times people assume we are brothers. Probably because we are both tall, extremely good looking and both have a razor sharp wit. Sadly, we are not brothers (to other's and our own disappointment). But we are brothers in law. (Which is pretty much as close to a real brother as you can get without having the same mom).  We live on opposite sides of the country Joe is in the Bronx, New York and Brooks is in Boise, Idaho. We've been talking about doing something for a long time together. I mean heck Joe is an awesome designer and can create anything from thin air. He has an eye for picking just the right colors and styles to make projects perfect. He even designed the Tighties font from scratch.  

Brooks is a business guy who's started his own successful company and been involved international business for almost 10 years. So it just made sense that we finally collaborate on a project. We both have had many ideas (some of them good and most bad) that we've talked about turning into businesses or products over the years. We finally decided it was time to launch one of our good ideas together and so the Tighties Wallets project was born.


We don't come into this project without qualifications, so you can trust that we'll be able to deliver. What's that? You want to know what kind of qualificatoins? Ok, you want qualifications? Here you go:

 Joe has got a Masters in Design and has worked in the advertising world in New York for the past couple years with a lot of companies you know and love, and likely interact with on a regular basis. He has helped create campaigns for companies like Macy's, Lean Cuisine, Jetblue and Drumstick Ice Cream. He is currently working for a hip consumer goods company that makes products for your home as the in house designer.

Brooks has a Masters in International Business and has worked in the corporate world for the last 7 years. He recently launched his own company which has been a big success with products being sold all over the world, as well as being worn by some famous individuals like Snoop, Beyonce, Orlando Bloom, etc . Brooks has a background in marketing, manufacturing and sourcing.


 

Besides Contributing How Can I Help  Tighties?


We are so appreciative of any support we get. It would be huge if you would spread the word. Either by telling a friend, tweeting or putting the project on your facebook page. The more people that see this the more successful it will be and we can work on improving the product so you get the best possible product possible when we ship them out.

 

Thanks so much!!!!!

 

 

 Additional videos:
story_txt:
Why Tighties Wallet?
We were frustrated with traditional wallets that seemed to have more material in them than functionality. All that material used to make a wallet made them thick bulky and clunky. Not something we wanted to put in our pockets and sit on or have bulging out. We also wanted something that was better than a traditional wallet. We also felt that wallets seemed overpriced from the big brands out there. We wanted something that we could use to organize our pockets or even a purse. An organizer that had everything you needed all in one place without a whole lot of digging or searching around at the bottom of your pocket or purse.  
We used rubber bands, elastic bands but they either broke, wore out, or just plain looked goofy. We wanted a different kind of wallet that was functional but wasn't like everything else out there,something that was small, compact, easy to use, stylish, kept our pockets organized and was fun. We wanted more than just a wallet. We wanted a pocket organizer. 

So we set out to do things a little different. What started as a simple sketch by Brooks in a notebook sparked something far better and more functionally designed as we put our heads toghther to design the perfect wallet.
With Joe's design background he was able to create the initial digital renderings of the Tighties.  After a few tweaks and sending the renderings back and forth the two brother in laws agreed on a final rendering which was sent to the manufacturer to make temporary sample molds. After months of talking mocking up prototypes, shooting ideas back and forth and working on drawings and renderings,Tighties was born. Why did we call them Tighties? Because they looked like a pair of tighty whitey underwear briefs for your credit cards and business cards. What started off as a pet name while we were developing the product ended up sticking. Not only for the look but also due to the fact that they keep your money, cards, business cards, receipts, keys and change tightly in place.




So what exactly can you put in your Tighties Wallet?



Credit cards


ID Cards


Membership Reward Cards


Business cards


Security or ID Badges


Money (Bills and Coins)


Keys


Receipts


Memory Cards


USB Devices


Grocery lists


Chewing Gum


Subway/Bus Pass


Metro or Subway Token


Small Pen or Pencil


Love Letters


A token or two


To-do lists

Your 3x5 notebook (moleskine, field notes, note, etc)
Tickets to the opera, baseball game, concert or Dungeons and Dragons tournament 

Pretty Much Anything You Carry In Your Pocket That You Want To Keep Together And Organized. Use Your Imagination. (If you come up with new ideas let us know and we'll add them to our list).


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 





What's It Made Out Of?

Its non-toxic, recyclable, non porous, won't hold or attract odors, Highest FDA Food grade quality, strong, wont easily tear, freezer proof to -76°F; heat resistant to 450°F, waterproof- you can wash it in your dishwasher if  you need.
The nature of the material keeps your stuff where it belongs without sliding out. It will not discolor, its stain resistant and hygienic, Will not retain odors, won't tear, won't lose its shape, this thing is fold-able, expandable and flexible.

So How Much Will It Hold?



It is designed to hold 1-7 cards, 3-4 business cards and your cash. So you can carry it all with you or use it when you're going out and want something a little smaller maybe you just want to carry a credit card, id and some cash. We wanted to make something that was flexible. So you could use it to carry just an ID and cash if you're going out for the night on the town. Your Company ID badge and office keys, or all your cash and cards for day to day use.
We've put up to 17 cards in it as well as 8 bills,5 business cards and keys. The nature of the design and the material allows for expansion if you so choose.

Tell Me More About Your RFID Protection.



Today there is more and more issues with thieves stealing ID and credit card information. We have worked with our manufacturer to source the best quality RFID sleeves to block would be thieves from stealing your valuable information. They are slim and fit 1-2 cards each and slide perfectly into your Tighties Wallet.



Why Did You Add a Key Ring loop to It?



We wanted a pocket/purse one stop organizational tool. Our essentials when we leave the house today are our keys, wallet and cellphone. All which can be carried in your pants or purse.  The issue is when you have all that stuff in your pocket its moving around maybe scratching your phone's screen, making noise, not easy to access, etc. The other issue is that tracking down all 3 things as well as other items can sometimes prove difficult. We thought it'd be a good idea to combine a wallet and a key to make things simple allowing you to grab them and have them all together when you left your house and easy to pull out of your pocket without having to dig around too long.
The loop also allows you to secure your Tighties Wallet so you won't lose it. You can clip it to your belt, on a lanyard, or inside your backpack or briefcase. No wallet out there allow this much accessibility, flexibility and ease of use. 
If you are not into the key ring cable use it separately or you can even cut the loop off to make the wallet more symmetrical and cleaner. Use it with or without we don't really care, but wanted to give you the option. We think once you use it you'll love it. It is nice to have the essentials all together in one place.
 
 
What is the key ring loop all about?



If you don't want to use it with your Tighties it can be used by itself as a key ring. You can also use your standard key ring with Tighties if you so choose.
 
Is It Patented?
We are in the process of applying for a design as well as a utilitarian patent on the Tighties wallet. So don't plan on finding anything like this anywhere else. There's only one Tighties wallet. 
 
 
About Us
A lot of times people assume we are brothers. Probably because we are both tall, extremely good looking and both have a razor sharp wit. Sadly, we are not brothers (to other's and our own disappointment). But we are brothers in law. (Which is pretty much as close to a real brother as you can get without having the same mom).  We live on opposite sides of the country Joe is in the Bronx, New York and Brooks is in Boise, Idaho. We've been talking about doing something for a long time together. I mean heck Joe is an awesome designer and can create anything from thin air. He has an eye for picking just the right colors and styles to make projects perfect. He even designed the Tighties font from scratch.  
Brooks is a business guy who's started his own successful company and been involved international business for almost 10 years. So it just made sense that we finally collaborate on a project. We both have had many ideas (some of them good and most bad) that we've talked about turning into businesses or products over the years. We finally decided it was time to launch one of our good ideas together and so the Tighties Wallets project was born.

We don't come into this project without qualifications, so you can trust that we'll be able to deliver. What's that? You want to know what kind of qualificatoins? Ok, you want qualifications? Here you go:
 Joe has got a Masters in Design and has worked in the advertising world in New York for the past couple years with a lot of companies you know and love, and likely interact with on a regular basis. He has helped create campaigns for companies like Macy's, Lean Cuisine, Jetblue and Drumstick Ice Cream. He is currently working for a hip consumer goods company that makes products for your home as the in house designer.
Brooks has a Masters in International Business and has worked in the corporate world for the last 7 years. He recently launched his own company which has been a big success with products being sold all over the world, as well as being worn by some famous individuals like Snoop, Beyonce, Orlando Bloom, etc . Brooks has a background in marketing, manufacturing and sourcing.

 
Besides Contributing How Can I Help  Tighties?
We are so appreciative of any support we get. It would be huge if you would spread the word. Either by telling a friend, tweeting or putting the project on your facebook page. The more people that see this the more successful it will be and we can work on improving the product so you get the best possible product possible when we ship them out.
 
Thanks so much!!!!!
 
 
 Additional videos:

story:
[BIG SIP]

Some may fear that delicious gay shit. Some say "miss me with that." Well, you and I both know that those "some people"?  They are missing out, and it's best to take a big ol' sip of that sweet, sweet gay shit. 

  • 1.5" soft enamel pin featuring an anodized rainbow metal finish! Every pin will be unique and uniquely gay. Please note: The early bird backer perk still says hard enamel, but we'll be using soft enamel because of the complexity of the metal finish.
  • Pink rubber pin backs included, in case the front wasn't gay enough for you.
  • Shipping included for all US orders!
  • Support an independent artist! Lovingly designed by HockeyBabbler, a queer WoC based out of Seattle, WA!
  • Can't afford a pin? We'll also have 2" holographic stickers available! 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's a breakdown of how much money I'm asking for:

  • $367.40 - 100 pins manufactured and shipped to me
  • $100 - Postage Printing/Packaging/Shipping Materials
  • $300 - Estimated shipping for 100 pins, shipped individually to backers in the US domestically - this is a ballpark estimate as multiple variables will take effect here
  • $76.74 - 10% of the above for IndieGoGo platform fees + card processing fees

You get the above described pin(s) and/or sticker(s)!

Risks & Challenges

I've had one successful pin fundraiser here before, and I continue to sell these pins on Etsy. The downside is that the manufacturer I used before does not offer the metal finish necessary for this design to shine the way it's truly meant to, and so while they've come recommended, I can't personally speak to how well the design will turn out, what turnaround delays might happen, etc.

The other concern is that anodized finishes can be kinda finicky, and sometimes individual pins don't turn out looking as good as the rest of the batch. Because of that, I'm budgeting for around 25% of the pins not turning out as nicely. Any pins that don't meet my standards will be set aside and sold later at a discount as "seconds," and only the best looking pins will be sent to backers. If a larger percentage of the batch turns out poorly, I may send them back to be remade, and if that's the case I will, of course, notify all backers, just as I would for any other delay.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford a pin or a sticker right now, that's OK! Share news about the campaign on social media and tell your friends who might be into this!

story:
Short Summary

Self expression, beauty, nature and human nature alike are the things that inspire me the most. Join me in this journey of self-exploration and artistic quest. I am raising funds to start up a jewellery and fashion brand and I need your help to make my dream come true.

My name is Paula Adina and I’ve always been passionate about beauty and art. As a graduate of the University of Fine Arts, licensed in Design, I worked as a furniture designer, interior designer, I did some illustration and graphic design, visual identities and finally, web design, but none of these made me feel accomplished. I’ve always been drawn towards art, painting, colours, jewellery and fashion design. They’ve been obsessively messing with my mind for the last years. So, I went along with this obsession and I experimented a little with materials, textures, fabrics, colours and paint.

Inspired by the great fashion designers and also by the folk art, mesmerised by the beauty of the intricate hand embroideries and the uniqueness of the fabrics, I also tried to do some hand embroidery and clothing designs. As for the jewellery, I love the way raw, almost untouched by man materials such as wood and stone go along with the highly finished, glossy look of precious metal, gems and crystals.

Until now, all of my jewellery pieces, clothing items and embroidery work were merely experiments. Some of them you can see in the video and pictures attached to this campaign.  But now I decided I want to take all this to the next level and I need your help to do it.

(Skirt with hand made embroidery detail )

(Hand made bracelet with pieces of dried acrylic paint, glass beads and Swarovski pearls)

 

What I Need

The things that can give a boost to my artistic growth are the followings:

1. The first and the most important of all is support. I need encouragement and reassurance that I’m doing a good job and that people like and need my work. Without your appreciation I am nothing ;).

2. Materials (precious metals, beads, pearls, stones, crystals, fabrics, etc.)

3. One sewing machine.

4. Salary for a tailor or two to help me create more clothing items (for a period of two years).

5. A nice looking webshop for all the products to be displayed and sold on.

For all these I estimated that I need to gather around 30 000 dollars. Even if I don't reach my entire goal, I will still continue creating jewellery and fashion design, but at a slower pace. The money raised through this campaign, regardless of the amount, will go, first of all, on materials, advertising and rebranding.

What You Get in Return

Every effort and kind words and support will be gratefully rewarded. The time has come to let my "babies" fly away and find their home with their rightful owners and so, some of my work, along with my gratitude, will stand as a sincere “Thank You” for your kind help. Everybody will get the perks even if the targeted sum is not reached.

(Brooch in the shape of an insect, made from glass beads, onyx, Swarovski crystals and Swarovski pearls. Size: 4,5x4,5 cm)

(One of a kind brooch made from kyanite, quartz, pyrites and Swarovski crystal. Size: 3x2 cm)

(One of a kind brooch made from wood and Swarovski crystals.)

(One of a kind pendant made from wood and Swarovski crystals. Size: 7x2x1,5 cm.)

(One of a kind pendant made from wood and Swarovski crystals. Size: 7,4x1,9x1 cm)

(Unique pendants made from coal and Swarovski crystals. The coal is varnished and it doesn't leave stains. Due to the fact that no piece of coal is identical to another, they come in different shapes and sizes ranging between 2 and 4,5 cm. Every coal pendant comes with a 925 silver chain.)

(You can claim these 2,5x2,5 cm round shaped brooches in any colour you want. They are made from clay and acrylic paint and coated with a lair of varnish.) 

(Original acrylic painting on canvas. Size: 24x18,5 cm​)

(Original painting made in acrylics on canvas. Size: 40x30 cm)

(Original drawing in coloured pencils on 59x42,5 cm paper.)

(Original painting made in acrylics on canvas. Size: 120x80 cm)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not have the possibility for financial support, please share this, so it can get through to many people as possible.

story:
Hi, my name is Stephanie, and I'm the owner and operator of a costuming company called Sunny Creations. We do all sorts of cosplay and makeup, but our biggest clientele is the furry community. We make a metric ton of quality fursuits at affordable rates for folks who can't quite afford the "big name" suits. For some time, I've wanted to make t-shirts with our logo, but I never knew how to go about it without potentially sinking tons of cash into something that I may end up giving away. Suddenly, it hit me! The internet will assist! So here we are. My idea for the t-shirts (inspired by a customer) is to have one side read "Ask me about my fursuit!" and have our logo (pictured) on the other side. With any luck, we can meet our goal and have t-shirts in time for Fandomfest and later, MFF! T-shirts will be available in a unisex S, M, XL, XXL, and XXXL (L is not available where I will order them).

We've got some pretty great perks that just get better as you go higher! The highest is a full fursuit at a discount!

If there are production delays/shipping delays, backers will know about it! I will do everything I can to keep this project on track!
