story:
Our watchbands are designed to be your perfect companion every time, everywhere and in every occasion – no matter if you are going for a run in the woods, suiting up for work or slipping into your trendy party outfit. 

For us, WRBLS is about more than just making watch bands, it‘s about doing what we love and sharing it with others. 

We are crazy about fashion and technologies and eagerly awaited the release of the Apple Watch. When the Apple Watch was finally released, we were excited and disappointed at the same time. We immediately realized that the bands offered by Apple were both lacking an individual touch and a fair price. That’s when we decided to do something about it and founded the label WRBLS. 

We are driven by the will to provide Apple Watch users with unique, fashionable and fairly-priced bands. In our view the Apple Watch is more than just a watch. It represents an unique lifestyle and constitutes a sophisticated fashion item that lets its users stand out from the crowd.

That is why we are aiming at making this personal item even more personal by bringing our one-of-a-kind collection to you.

After a dozen of heated arguments and a bunch of fervid discussions, we finally came up with the first WRBLS collection featuring three different lines catering to different tastes: Urban Stylers, Business Casual and Sporty.

We used high-performance silicone polymer as base material – an extremely resistant, water and sweat repelling, tear-proof and durable material – and combined this with a state-of-the-art pin-and-tuck closure technology to ensure an easy swap of bands. 

The result is a band that perfectly fits to your wrist. The bands are coming in an individual and unique design. They can be easily swapped, quickly adapting your watch band to daily clothing and special occasions.

 ABSPIELEN

Image video: We resisted wind and weather to shoot our image videoChristy: Probably one of our most colorful designsScott: One of our urban styles designed to be your everyday companion

story:
AFTER BUYING AN ITEM, PLEASE EMAIL

crownv@crown-yourself.com

SPECIFYING WHAT EXACTLY YOU WANT

For example: If you ordered a t-shirt, email what colorway and size you would like.

(Use the reference below to figure out your size)

6 oz. 100% Cotton Tubular Jersey.*  Double-needle bottom hem and sleeves.  Shoulder-to-shoulder tape.  Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage.    Colored Heathers 50/50 Cotton Polyester

Body Width: S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24"

 

 

Crown Yourself

Crown Yourself is a new urban youth clothing company that combines technology and clothing into making shopping a fun and easy experience

Summary:

Through judgments and double glances, clothing is one of the most popular ways to present yourself. Combining the perfect pair of socks to the right sweatshirt can be an important part of your daily life.

Not only can we express ourselves through clothing but another key way we express our thoughts and ideas is through social media. From twitter, to facebook, to keek, there is always a place where you can post your thoughts, ideas, and pictures for friends and family and people with common interests to view.

Well Crown Yourself combines these two aspects of life and puts them together..

Colorways Include:

-White T-shirt with Black Image

-Black T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie with White Image

-Gray T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie with Black Image

 

               The Bearded King

Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie

(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

                                Crown OG Logo

 Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie

(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

                                Hookah Design

Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie

(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

 

                       Limited Edition Snapback  w/ OG logo stitched

 

Ultimate Goal:

What Crown Yourself will accomplish in the future is allow you to customize your own QR Code (Quick Response Code) which will come with a CY ID Card with your first purchase of our clothing.

Once you buy a product, it is shipped to your house containing your ID Card that consists of your QR Code that when scanned from your smartphone, will take you to your CY Member page in which people can view your recently purchased clothing, devotion to the brand, social media pages, and much more.

If one of the products you buy from us is appealing to your friends, theyll know just where to buy it (Buy scanning your QR Code)

PROBLEM:

  • The reason why I am starting this funding project is, with your help, to take one step closer in creating a customized website that allows full features of the member page to exist.

YOUR HELP:

  • By funding this program we take one step closer to the ultimate e-commerce website that will provide users with the ultimate member page and social media capabilities
  • It will spark a movement in people who believe in their brand and ours

OTHER COOL STUFF

  • Through these QR Codes, coupons and deals can be applied universally within minutes. For example, a future coupon can give you free shipping on your next purchase by scanning 10 Codes and the deal will be applied to you, Its that easy!

AFTER BUYING AN ITEM, PLEASE EMAIL
 crownv@crown-yourself.com
 SPECIFYING WHAT EXACTLY YOU WANT
For example: If you ordered a t-shirt, email what colorway and size you would like.
(Use the reference below to figure out your size)
6 oz. 100% Cotton Tubular Jersey.*  Double-needle bottom hem and sleeves.  Shoulder-to-shoulder tape.  Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage.    Colored Heathers 50/50 Cotton Polyester 
Body Width: S=18", M=20", L=22", XL=24"
 
 
Crown Yourself
Crown Yourself is a new urban youth clothing company that combines technology and clothing into making shopping a fun and easy experience
Summary:
Through judgments and double glances, clothing is one of the most popular ways to present yourself. Combining the perfect pair of socks to the right sweatshirt can be an important part of your daily life.
Not only can we express ourselves through clothing but another key way we express our thoughts and ideas is through social media. From twitter, to facebook, to keek, there is always a place where you can post your thoughts, ideas, and pictures for friends and family and people with common interests to view.
Well Crown Yourself combines these two aspects of life and puts them together..
Colorways Include:
-White T-shirt with Black Image
-Black T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie with White Image
-Gray T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie with Black Image
 
               The Bearded King

Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie
(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

                                Crown OG Logo

 Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie
(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

                                Hookah Design

Available in Black and Grey T-shirt/Crewneck/Hoodie
(Colors will be reversed on black garments)

 
                       Limited Edition Snapback  w/ OG logo stitched

 
Ultimate Goal:
What Crown Yourself will accomplish in the future is allow you to customize your own QR Code (Quick Response Code) which will come with a CY ID Card with your first purchase of our clothing.
Once you buy a product, it is shipped to your house containing your ID Card that consists of your QR Code that when scanned from your smartphone, will take you to your CY Member page in which people can view your recently purchased clothing, devotion to the brand, social media pages, and much more.
If one of the products you buy from us is appealing to your friends, theyll know just where to buy it (Buy scanning your QR Code)

The reason why I am starting this funding project is, with your help, to take one step closer in creating a customized website that allows full features of the member page to exist.

YOUR HELP:

By funding this program we take one step closer to the ultimate e-commerce website that will provide users with the ultimate member page and social media capabilities
It will spark a movement in people who believe in their brand and ours

OTHER COOL STUFF

Through these QR Codes, coupons and deals can be applied universally within minutes. For example, a future coupon can give you free shipping on your next purchase by scanning 10 Codes and the deal will be applied to you, Its that easy!

story:
http://www.chronovisor.ch

 

The CHRONOVISOR project was brought to life with your support last year!  

After generating interest in our vision, our project re-launched on other crowd-funding platforms in June, culminating in the successful delivery of all orders in the first week of November last year. 

We are proud to present to you our second timepiece – CVGM7102. Reaching further than ever before, CVGM7102 is a unique timepiece, offering a new vision of horological capabilities and design. The time-reading function offers more than conventional design. The hour indicator is illuminated by Swiss technology, giving the CVGM7102 a unique appearance. 

 

Wear the world on your wrist with CHRONOVISOR’s CVGM7102

 

Chronovisor CVGM7102: Available in a variety of colorways.

Collection with NBR Strap

Collection with Italian Leather Strap

The sculptural aspects of the design highlight the device’s innovative functional capabilities. CVGM7102 has a 24 hour sub-dial at 9:00. The ceramic bezel displays all global time zones, offering you the chance to instantly capture a glimpse of every single one, all at once. Displaying 24 global cities, representing the 24 major regions. From east to west, all corners of the world are rendered accessible to the wearer.

The ceramic bezel does not rotate - it is fixed in place, displaying all the names of the cities chosen to represent the time zones in a neat and stylish manner.  Is my business partner in Geneva awake or asleep? CVGM7102 is always ready for your next journey. These capabilities are consolidated by the aesthetic realization of CHRONOVISOR’s vision. A sophisticated design, which pays homage to the horological tradition upon which it is shaped, is combined with advanced modern technology. The innovation inspired by this harmony makes CVGM7102 the quintessential development in time-keeping technology. 

Powering the CVGM7102 is a self-glowing in the dark function. To provide the ultimate in night-time readability, CVGM7102 is equipped with self-powered gas tubes which can glow for 25 years with neither battery nor external light absorption. This luminous effect is 10 times brighter than luminous paint, guaranteeing maximum efficacy in reduced-light settings. CVGM7102 is installed with a self-winding movement. This caliber stores a 42 hour reserve and beats at a frequency of 21,600 vps. The accuracy and precision of the timepiece are consolidated by the inclusion of 21 jewels. The case of CVGM7102 is made of titanium. For maximum durability, it is coated with DLC (Diamond like carbon). Utilizing the same materials as high-end watches, CHRONOVISOR uses anti-reflective sapphire crystal, featuring a transparent sapphire caseback. Also, CVGM7102 is 100M water-resistant with a screwed-in crown design.

The CVNM7102 will be delivered to you in a luxurious presentation case. In addition to owning this piece of horological craftsmanship, you will receive an extra strap free of charge. This gift, crafted with genuine Italian leather, features Chronovisor’s signature stainless steel buckle with embossed logo, allowing your timepiece to be as versatile as it is eye-catching. Inside the presentation case, you will also find a 16GB Chronovisor brand USB flash drive, exclusively available to our supporters, and installed with the CVNM7102 user manual.  

 

FAQ   

1) Why choose Chronovisor?

To all of us at Chronovisor, this is not just a Indiegogo project, but a journey we hope to share with all of you. The Chronovisor team is comprised of experienced professionals who care deeply about the work they produce, and are dedicated to striving for the best. Our goal with this project is to develop a truly unique timepiece of the highest quality, and to make it available to all at an affordable price. All Chronovisor products are created with the finest materials, by a team of highly skilled horological professionals in Switzerland. Our timepieces undergo 360 hours of rigorous testing to ensure each one meets our high standards of quality and durability. We are committed to everyone who supports our vision and we are very serious about providing the very best in after sales service, which means even after purchasing your Chronovisor timepiece, we will be here to answer any and all questions or enquiries you may have.

2) What is the size of the watch?

The diameter of the case is 43mm and the thickness is 12.35mm.

3) Is the back of the case transparent?

Yes! The case back is transparent. The see through nature of the design means the inner mechanical workings of the watch can be viewed through the back. Sapphire crystal is used for the back case to ensure the best quality.  

4) Why use a titanium case?  

Due to its rarity, Titanium is usually more expensive than other types of metal, such as steel, aluminium and iron. Titanium possesses unique qualities which makes it the best choice when designing a durable and high quality timepiece. Titanium is hypoallergenic, non-magnetisable and is naturally resistant to rust and corrosion. it is among the strongest and most durable metals on the planet. In fact, Titanium possesses the highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element on the periodic table. The Chronovisor CVGM7102 utilizes these qualities, with each one being equipped with a titanium case.

5) What is Super-LumiNova paint?

Super-LumiNova is a luminescent pigment, which can be found on the inner bezel of the Chronovisor CVGM7102. It is a non-radioactive, photo-luminescent pigment, allowing the wearer to read the time in reduced light settings. While in the dark, the luminescence will decrease over time but will be restored as soon as the watch is once again exposed to light. Super-Luminova pigments can glow for approximately 8-10 hours in the dark.  

6) What is the watch movement?

Chronovisor is set with Miyota 8217 automatic movement. It is with 24 hour display function, 21,600 vibrations per hour and power reserved to 40+ hours. Miyota 8217 is a renowned automatic caliber in worldwide. The quality is excellent for both accuracy and durability

7) Is there a screw-in crown?

All Chronovisor timepieces are engineered with screwed in crowns. To adjust the time on the watch, the crown is connected to the movement by the winding system. The crown can be unscrewed before being pulled out and rotated. The screw-in crown is also the best design to protect the watch against water and guarantees the wearer the highest level of water resistance. Once the time has been adjusted, the crown should be pushed back in and tightly screwed back. 

8) What is the strap made of? 

Chronovisor uses nitrile-butadiene rubber (NBR) straps, and we believe it is the most comfortable rubber strap on the market. It is very soft yet durable and stain resistant. It will not pull the wearer’s hairs or attract lint. It is a great choice for swimmers, and stands up well to salt and sunlight. 

9) What is about the buckle? 

Unlike other watchmakers, Chronovisor does not use any OEM alloys. The buckle of the CVGM7102 is made of stainless steel, and is designed specifically for Chronovisor watches, emblazoned with an embossed logo. 

10) What’s included in the package? 

 Everyone who orders the CVGM7102 will also receive an extra strap (either NBR or Italian leather), a 16GB USB flash drive and a guarantee card.

11) What’s on the flash drive? 

The Chronovisor flash drive has the user manual installed on it. Not only this, its unique appearance and custom design is evocative of Chronovisor’s pioneering spirit and is exclusively available to those who order the CVGM7102. It is a small token of our gratitude for those who believe in our vision.

12) Will my CVGM7102 need a battery? 

 As an automatic watch, your Chronovisor CVGM7102 does not require a battery. It is powered by you! 

13) Will I need to keep winding the watch? 

Upon receiving your Chronovisor CVGM7102, you should turn the crown 40 times, which causes the ratchet wheel wheel to rotate. The mainspring will then be fully winded. Afterwards, you can wear your Chronovisor without having to wind it again.

14) Does it come with a warranty? 

We’ve got you covered! Chronovisor offers a 2 year limited warranty. During this time, any repairs that need to be made to your watch will be completed free of charge. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, or incidental damage.

15) When do I need to pay? 

Your card will be charged as soon as the campaign comes to an end. Once the funding goal has been reached and the campaign’s time has run out, all orders will be processed. You should see a charge on your account between 3-5 days after the campaign ends. 

16) Is the shipping charge included? 

Shipping to a number of countries and territories is included in the cost. If you wish for your order to be delivered to the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, France, Germany, Denmark, Switzerland, Netherlands, Canada, Japan, Hong Kong and Taiwan, the shipping charge will be included. For orders to be shipped to the rest of the world, there will be a shipping charge of US$30. 

17) Can you help me further if I still have a question?

No problem! Please submit any questions you have to info@chronovisor.ch

Risks and challenges

Chronovisor CVGM7102 is the second project we have launched on a crowdfunding platform. We are experienced professionals in the watch industry, and work closely with world class manufacturing partners. We have very high standards which must be met before we make any product available. After countless prototypes and a rigorous testing process, Chronovisor CVGM7102 is now ready to go into full-scale production.

We have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock solid production and strategy. We are confident that we will meet our projected delivery dates. We are, of course, aware that there is always the possibility that unforeseen circumstances may arise. Should we miss any projections, we’ll notify you straight away and let you know why. We will make it right as quickly as possible and do whatever it takes to fulfill our promises.

We would like to take this opportunity to thank all of our backers. Your supports means everything to us and we can assure you that we will provide you with the highest in quality and service.

Learn about accountability on Indiegogo

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Time-Peace is an intergalactic watch company aimed at helping people change their perception of time so they can stop worrying and start Being. Our goal is to create a shift in the way we view the world by realizing our interconnectedness in the present moment. The Time-Peace symbol is an integration of four universal principles that can help anyone live in the Now and create a foundation for peace.

Time is an illusion.
The only moment that ever exists is Now.

Perception creates reality.
You can change the world by changing the way you look at it.

Everything is interconnected.
All is one, so love everyone.

The Universe is in alignment.
You are where you need to be, so stop worrying and start Being.

The primary function of a Time-Peace is not to tell you the clock time, but to remind you to be present in the only moment that ever exists - Now. We're trying to help people free themselves from the effects of psychological time, the negative energy created when we resist or disassociate ourselves from the present moment to stress or worry about the past or future. However, we can still use clock time as a tool to function in society.

 

The InfiniTPeace

The InfiniTPeace is the first Time-Peace that lets you create your own peace of wearable art. These images walk you through the experience of building an InfiniTPeace. You choose your case, you choose your band, you choose your dial.

 

 

Choose Your Case

 

 

Choose Your Band

 

Choose Your Dial

Original Designs

 Time-Peace Symbol /// Time-Peace Symbol Invert /// TP Colorbrain /// TP Tiedye by KP
 

Co-Creation Peaces

Spiritual Self Confidence by Ryan Sulak /// TP Miami Bass by Freebase /// Space Is An Illusion by Joanna Paige

 

The InfiniTPeace's unique design and functionality makes it the perfect platform for collaboration with other artists and organizations interested in spreading our message. By supporting us Now, you will be providing yourself and others with the opportunity to own an InfiniTPeace with one of the first Original or Co-Creation dials, as well as other artist designs when they’re released.

 
 

Infinite Possibilities

We are all here with the ability to create our own inner peace and express it to the world. The InfiniTPeace is a celebration of expression, a reminder that you can create your own peace however you want. The possibilities are endless.

 

InfiniTPeace Specs

  • Case: Polycarbonate w/ hardened mineral crystal
  • Case Dimensions: 38 x 10 mm
  • Crown: Triple-gasket
  • Band: Polyurethane w/ steel buckle
  • Movement: Swiss Quartz, Miyota 2025
  • Water Resistance: 3 atm

 

Where We’re At

We’ve already built a prototype, and are in the process of finalizing the design of the InfiniTPeace. Your contribution will help us fund:

  • Product molding & tooling
  • Dial artwork filming & printing
  • First production run

 

Rewards

$1 - Thank You

Thank you for your support. As a backer of this project, you’ll receive updates on all the latest InfiniTPeace and Time-Peace developments. The Universe is in alignment.

$23 - Time-Peace T-Shirt

One Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white.

$50 - Early Dreamer 

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dial, and one limited-edition Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin." Only 150 available!

$55 - Early Dreamer Remix

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Co-Creation dial, and one limited-edition Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin." Only 150 available!

$60 - Original 

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dial.

$65 - Co-Creation

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Co-Creation dial.

$80 - InfiniTPeace & TP T

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dial, and one Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white.

$99 - Lucid Dreamer

One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any three Original or Co-Creation dials.

$118 - Original x 2 

Two InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dials.

$127 - Co-Creation x 2 

Two InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dials.

$333 - Family Pack

Four InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dials, and four Time-Peace t-shirts in your choice of black or white.

$999 - Ultimate Dreamer

Get the entire InfiniTPeace collection! One InfiniTPeace in each of the available case and band colors with all nine Original and Co-Creation dials, plus one Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white, one limited-edtion Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin," and an interdimensional pizza party with the DreamTeam.

 

Early Dreamer Special: As a special bonus, our first 300 "Early Dreamers" will receive a limited-edition print of artist Benjamin Phillip's master-peace "Yggdrasilkin" with their InfiniTPeace.

Time-Peace T-Shirt: You can also get one of these unisex Time-Peace crew-neck t-shirts in your choice of black or white.

Dreamer’s Choice: Three Co-Creation dials are already set, but as supporter of this project you can be a part of the design process by voting on a fourth and fifth Co-Creation dial! Choose between any of these six artist designs.

Some Dream Some Sleep by Labrat777 /// The Shroomtard by Lofty305 /// The Rasta /// Frosty Starlight by Flow /// Tropical Boy Edition by Chalk /// White Noise 2012 by Yo Sammity

 

Our Vision

Since we believe that perception creates reality, we want to help people realize that they can change the world simply by changing the way they look at it. Instead of perceiving the Earth as billions of individuals, we want people to see it more as a collective organism. We believe that our perception of time is the key to realizing this interconnectedness. While raising awareness and understanding, the InfiniTPeace will help shift people’s focus to the present moment by providing the Time-Peace symbol and philosophy as a reminder through the time-telling device that defines our lives.

 

Thank You

Convincing people that a watch can actually help change the world has been the greatest challenge Time-Peace has faced since its fruition. The InfiniTPeace campaign is an attempt to spread the word that challenges not only us, but everyone collectively. In order to reach as many people as possible we are inviting family, friends, our fans, blogs, and independent writers to help us share our message. With your help, we can make our dream of restoring a peaceful consciousness to the world a reality. Thank you so much for your support. It’s time to stop worrying and start Being.

 

FAQ

Does the InfiniTPeace tell the clock time?

Yes. The primary function of the InfiniTPeace is to remind you to embrace the present moment. However, it does tell the clock time.

Are all of the pieces interchangeable?

Yes. The band, case and dial can be easily changed at any time.

How will I be able to customize my InfiniTPeace once I pledge?

Following the end of the project on January 23, you’ll be contacted by the DreamTeam to confirm your case, band, and dial choices.

Where can I view larger images of the Original and Co-Creation logos?

You can view larger images of all our designs in the project Gallery or the Co-Creation album on our Facebook fanpage.

How can I vote on the last two Co-Creation dials?

Once you pledge, we will contact you with a survey asking for your choice for the final Co-Creation designs.

Is the watch unisex?

Yes. The InfiniTPeace's case is universally sized at 38 x 10 mm.

How long does the battery last?

The battery lasts one year, and Time-Peace offers a free lifetime warranty on battery replacement.

When will the InfiniTPeace ship?

The InfiniTPeace will ship in June 2013.

Do you ship to my part of the world?

Yes. Time-Peace is the world's first intergalactic watch company and ships to anywhere in the Universe. No matter where you are, the time is always Now.

Is there a shipping charge?

Shipping to the United States is free. There is a $15 charge for international shipping.

Where can I view past collections from Time-Peace?

You can see the entire Time-Peace collection in the Collection album on our fanpage.

Does Time-Peace have a website?

Yes. You can check out our website at www.time-peace.org or visit our Facebook fanpage at facebook.com/timepeace.
story_txt:
Time-Peace is an intergalactic watch company aimed at helping people change their perception of time so they can stop worrying and start Being. Our goal is to create a shift in the way we view the world by realizing our interconnectedness in the present moment. The Time-Peace symbol is an integration of four universal principles that can help anyone live in the Now and create a foundation for peace.
Time is an illusion.The only moment that ever exists is Now.

Perception creates reality.You can change the world by changing the way you look at it.

Everything is interconnected.All is one, so love everyone.

The Universe is in alignment.You are where you need to be, so stop worrying and start Being.

The primary function of a Time-Peace is not to tell you the clock time, but to remind you to be present in the only moment that ever exists - Now. We're trying to help people free themselves from the effects of psychological time, the negative energy created when we resist or disassociate ourselves from the present moment to stress or worry about the past or future. However, we can still use clock time as a tool to function in society.

 
The InfiniTPeace
The InfiniTPeace is the first Time-Peace that lets you create your own peace of wearable art. These images walk you through the experience of building an InfiniTPeace. You choose your case, you choose your band, you choose your dial.
 

 
Choose Your Case

 
 
Choose Your Band

 
Choose Your Dial
Original Designs

 Time-Peace Symbol /// Time-Peace Symbol Invert /// TP Colorbrain /// TP Tiedye by KP

 
Co-Creation Peaces


Spiritual Self Confidence by Ryan Sulak /// TP Miami Bass by Freebase /// Space Is An Illusion by Joanna Paige
 
The InfiniTPeace's unique design and functionality makes it the perfect platform for collaboration with other artists and organizations interested in spreading our message. By supporting us Now, you will be providing yourself and others with the opportunity to own an InfiniTPeace with one of the first Original or Co-Creation dials, as well as other artist designs when they’re released.

 
 
Infinite Possibilities
We are all here with the ability to create our own inner peace and express it to the world. The InfiniTPeace is a celebration of expression, a reminder that you can create your own peace however you want. The possibilities are endless.

 
InfiniTPeace Specs

Case: Polycarbonate w/ hardened mineral crystal
Case Dimensions: 38 x 10 mm
Crown: Triple-gasket
Band: Polyurethane w/ steel buckle
Movement: Swiss Quartz, Miyota 2025
Water Resistance: 3 atm

 
Where We’re At
We’ve already built a prototype, and are in the process of finalizing the design of the InfiniTPeace. Your contribution will help us fund:

Product molding & tooling
Dial artwork filming & printing
First production run

 
Rewards


$1 - Thank You
Thank you for your support. As a backer of this project, you’ll receive updates on all the latest InfiniTPeace and Time-Peace developments. The Universe is in alignment.
$23 - Time-Peace T-Shirt
One Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white.
$50 - Early Dreamer 
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dial, and one limited-edition Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin." Only 150 available!
$55 - Early Dreamer Remix
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Co-Creation dial, and one limited-edition Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin." Only 150 available!
$60 - Original 
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dial.
$65 - Co-Creation
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Co-Creation dial.
$80 - InfiniTPeace & TP T
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dial, and one Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white.
$99 - Lucid Dreamer
One InfiniTPeace in your choice of case and band colors with any three Original or Co-Creation dials.
$118 - Original x 2 
Two InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original dials.
$127 - Co-Creation x 2 
Two InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dials.
$333 - Family Pack
Four InfiniTPeaces in your choice of case and band colors with any Original or Co-Creation dials, and four Time-Peace t-shirts in your choice of black or white.
$999 - Ultimate Dreamer
Get the entire InfiniTPeace collection! One InfiniTPeace in each of the available case and band colors with all nine Original and Co-Creation dials, plus one Time-Peace t-shirt in your choice of black or white, one limited-edtion Time-Peace print of Benjamin Phillip's Master-Peace, "Yggdrasilkin," and an interdimensional pizza party with the DreamTeam.
 



Early Dreamer Special: As a special bonus, our first 300 "Early Dreamers" will receive a limited-edition print of artist Benjamin Phillip's master-peace "Yggdrasilkin" with their InfiniTPeace.


Time-Peace T-Shirt: You can also get one of these unisex Time-Peace crew-neck t-shirts in your choice of black or white.

Dreamer’s Choice: Three Co-Creation dials are already set, but as supporter of this project you can be a part of the design process by voting on a fourth and fifth Co-Creation dial! Choose between any of these six artist designs.



Some Dream Some Sleep by Labrat777 /// The Shroomtard by Lofty305 /// The Rasta /// Frosty Starlight by Flow /// Tropical Boy Edition by Chalk /// White Noise 2012 by Yo Sammity
 


Our Vision
Since we believe that perception creates reality, we want to help people realize that they can change the world simply by changing the way they look at it. Instead of perceiving the Earth as billions of individuals, we want people to see it more as a collective organism. We believe that our perception of time is the key to realizing this interconnectedness. While raising awareness and understanding, the InfiniTPeace will help shift people’s focus to the present moment by providing the Time-Peace symbol and philosophy as a reminder through the time-telling device that defines our lives.
 
Thank You
Convincing people that a watch can actually help change the world has been the greatest challenge Time-Peace has faced since its fruition. The InfiniTPeace campaign is an attempt to spread the word that challenges not only us, but everyone collectively. In order to reach as many people as possible we are inviting family, friends, our fans, blogs, and independent writers to help us share our message. With your help, we can make our dream of restoring a peaceful consciousness to the world a reality. Thank you so much for your support. It’s time to stop worrying and start Being.
 
FAQ
Does the InfiniTPeace tell the clock time?
Yes. The primary function of the InfiniTPeace is to remind you to embrace the present moment. However, it does tell the clock time.
Are all of the pieces interchangeable?Yes. The band, case and dial can be easily changed at any time.
How will I be able to customize my InfiniTPeace once I pledge?Following the end of the project on January 23, you’ll be contacted by the DreamTeam to confirm your case, band, and dial choices.
Where can I view larger images of the Original and Co-Creation logos?You can view larger images of all our designs in the project Gallery or the Co-Creation album on our Facebook fanpage.How can I vote on the last two Co-Creation dials?Once you pledge, we will contact you with a survey asking for your choice for the final Co-Creation designs.
Is the watch unisex?
Yes. The InfiniTPeace's case is universally sized at 38 x 10 mm.
How long does the battery last?The battery lasts one year, and Time-Peace offers a free lifetime warranty on battery replacement.
When will the InfiniTPeace ship?
The InfiniTPeace will ship in June 2013.
Do you ship to my part of the world?
Yes. Time-Peace is the world's first intergalactic watch company and ships to anywhere in the Universe. No matter where you are, the time is always Now.
Is there a shipping charge?
Shipping to the United States is free. There is a $15 charge for international shipping.
Where can I view past collections from Time-Peace?
You can see the entire Time-Peace collection in the Collection album on our fanpage.
Does Time-Peace have a website?
Yes. You can check out our website at www.time-peace.org or visit our Facebook fanpage at facebook.com/timepeace.

story:
CONCEPT

We never really understood why hardly any watchmakers, not even premium brands, are offering real customization options. Car manufacturers certainly know how to do it. Sneaker brands too. So why not watches? 

The explanation is pretty simple. It’s complex, time-consuming and expensive. And why bother, if you can just convince your customer to go with the standard offering. But nothing really worth doing is ever easy. And with 20 years of production experience with limited series of custom and promotional watches, and our recent successful endeavour with the Flash Automatic GMT, we’re ready to take on the task. And the best thing is, that for you, it will be neither complex, time-consuming or expensive. The customization process is easy and playful, and the price is way below standard watches with the same premium components that we use. 

 

 

 

 

DESIGN

 

 

Our goal with Miang Copenhagen Bespoke was to design a truly customizable watch with an elegant and sporty look as well as obvious traces to our Danish design heritage. And we wanted to do it using nothing but custom-designed components. With so many interchangable parts and design combinations we knew, that we had to come up with an extremely strong design system. For this challenging task we asked one of Denmark’s leading industrial designers, Mr. Jan Egeberg, to help us out.  

 

 

We worked a great deal with surface treatments for the watchcase, which is both brushed and polished, creating different looks dependent on the way surrounding light falls on the case and the angle from which you look at it. Finally, the case is paired with a monumental crown. 

 

 

The shape and characteristic surfaces emit a meticulous visual appearance and superior legibility. This sense of precision continues in each of the customizable parts allowing for a varied yet always complete design language, no matter which combination you go for. 

 

The lightness of the titanium watch case combined with its curves that follow the wrist naturally, makes the watch extremely comfortable to wear.

 

 

Bezel options in natural, black PVD and red gold PVD titanium as well as in solid carbon fiber.

With the interchangeable bezel and quick-change straps you can easily alter the appearance of your watch quite dramatically and go from sports watch for the tennis court to an elegant timepiece worthy of your following gala event. 

 

CUSTOMIZING OPTIONS

 

 

The vast amount of customization options gives you an almost unlimited number of different looks to choose from. But don’t worry. We’ve made the process fun and easy. Have a go at www.miangcopenhagen.com

 

 

 

Lume on dial and hour- and minute hands.

 

PERSONAL ENGRAVING

 

Your watch is delivered with a personal laser engraving of your choice at no extra charge. Your message is accompanied by your watch’s individual serial number. 

 

 

Your engraving can consist of 30+25 characters (including spaces)

 

built for...

 

Love you...

 

Congratulations...

 

QUALITY

Grade 5 titanium

We wanted to make a watch from the finest materials and components out there.

For the watchcase, the crown and buckle we decided on Grade 5 titanium. Titanium is a great and luxurious material that’s 3 times stronger than steel but at half the weight. And it’s allergy-friendly too. Unlike other titanium types, Grade 5 can be polished to a mirror-like finish. A feature we implemented on several of the surfaces.

 

 

Sapphire crystal

Sapphire crystal is priced for its near diamond hardness making the glass extremely strong and scratch-resistant with a superior optical transmission. The backside of the glass is coated with anti-reflective properties to reduce glaring. Both front and back of the watch are equipped with this sapphire crystal.

 

MOVEMENT

 

The fine finishing automatic movement as seen through the sapphire glass exibition window.

 

The Miang Copenhagen Bespoke is built on a mechanical movement with automatic winding that’s powered by the movement of your wrist. No need for batteries or hand winding.

When you are in the market for a high quality movement, there are really just two places to go: Switzerland and Japan. We chose the Japanese fine finishing movement ca. 8217 from Citizen-owned Miyota. Compared to a Swiss ETA or Selitta movement, the quality of the 8217 can easily compete. It just comes with less of the overhead that always goes along with a “Swiss-made” tag, which means that we can offer great quality at a really great price. We customized the movement by electroplating the rotor in a stunning blue color and engraving the “M” logo.

 
 

STRAPS

 

 As with everything else with this timepiece, we handpick the best materials for our straps – no matter where this takes us around the world. We get our calfskin in whole hides from Italy, our suede in Denmark and salmon leather from Brazil. All straps are hand-stitched and lined with soft and comfortable suede on the backside.

 

Salmon leather from Brazil

 

Tan calfskin in whole hides from Italy

 

Black calfskin in whole hides from Italy

 

Straps are supplied with buckles in the same color as the watch case body.

 

Understated: In order to avoid spoiling the beautifully polished surface of the buckle, we have chosen to engrave the logo on the backside rather than on the usual front.

 

PACKAGING

 

We firmly believe that this watch will be your new favorite timepiece. For this reason we decided to give it an exclusive travel pouch with room for your watch, extra strap, bezel, screws and the enclosed screwdriver. This allows you to easily change the look of your watch, even when you’re traveling. No need to bring several watches for different occasions. 

 

Naturally, your customized watch will arrive fully assembled.

 

The travel pouch shown with an optional strap and bezel.

 

Customs duties, VAT & shipping

 

All watches are shipped with either UPS, DHL or Fedex depending on destination country. Shipping charges to backers doorstep are included in the pledge (so called incoterms DAP - delivery at place). Customs duties, fees and VAT are not included in the pledge and must be paid separately by the backer, if applicable.

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

 

THE FUTURE OF MIANG COPENHAGEN

 

We created Miang Copenhagen with the goal of establishing a watch brand that gives the creative freedom and personal style choice back to the wearer. Individual watches with the potential of many changing looks – essentially offering multiple watch designs in one. And we are offering it without expensive middlemen.

This business model saves our customers more than 50% compared to the traditional retail model! 

And our concept works! Our first watch is sold online to clients all over the world, and the next step is to make our website and watches even more accessible to our global fans of customizable watches. A showroom and boutique in our native Copenhagen is also on the drawing board.

 

 

WARRANTY

 

 

Every Miang Copenhagen watch comes with a 2-year international warranty. In fact we believe so much in our product that we provide each watch with a 100-day money back guarantee – no questions asked!

 

THE TEAM

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

 

Several things can potentially obstruct and delay a project of this kind. Every component except from the movement is custom made, made by different manufacturers before its assembled to each order. The biggest risk of this process is a delay with a supplier, which in turn can delay the entire production. 
We have more than 20 years of experience with production of small and custom watch series and excellent personal relations with our trusted supply partners, built through more than 50 travels to Hong Kong and China. This, combined with our unique experience with our first successful bespoke watch project in 2015, we know better than any, what it takes to minimize risks and potential delays. We already have physical prototypes (not just 3D prints), which also minimizes the risk of delays considerably. We’re ready when you are!

story:
What we are about…

The inspiration behind the idea of BROOKLYN ROOTS clothing & apparel e-commerce site...

I wanted to create a clothing line to represent New York as whole. Each and every borough has its own unique style and makes it one of the top tourist destinations in the world. I am blessed to have been created here. So, I felt that there might be others who share my passion, or maybe visited and wanted to take piece of New York back with them to where they live. We will have other designer lines that are not NY in subject as well to accommodate the masses. We will offer our clients the chance to work with our designers to create their own design. If it be their name, company or even a slogan. We will help create it so they can have it printed by our factory for their enjoyment.

​I myself was born and raised in Brooklyn New York and had many great memories as a kid growing up in this amazing city. I believe even if I moved away from Brooklyn, that there will always be a spot in my heart that will never leave and bring me back to where I belong.

Getting this site off the ground means the world to me. I have created hundreds of amazing designs that I want to share with all, and to have them display it with as much pride as I put into making them.

All who get involved will help me create what I have put my heart into and make it become a reality. I know this e-commerce site will succeed because I know my work ethic and determination that nothing will get in my way of becoming one of the best clothing sites on the web. It does start with your help.

What we do..

About Brooklyn Roots Direct to Garment T-Shirt Printing Process

Our Direct to garment printing (or DTG Printing) is a process of printing on clothing using modified inkjet technology. DTG printing applies specialized textile inks directly into the fibers of the clothing that is being printed. This creates high quality products for our customers.

One of our DTG printers at our printing order processing plant is located in Yorkville New York.

 

 

Here is a sample of a T-Shirt from one of our designs in the "BROOKLYN COLLECTION" which currently has forty five different designs. We carry over 300 designs and counting on our BROOKLYN ROOTS WEBSITE.

 

These are the types of clothing we carry our amazing designs on.

 

Our designs are guaranteed to turn heads. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $20,000 for BROOKLYN ROOTS to be where I want this clothing and apparel company being. Where I know, it can succeed.

Where that money will help…

Website Development: We have started to design the website and have about 50% complete. We will need some of the funds to complete this E-Commerce site to be efficient and customer friendly.

Website Hosting and Maintenance: We need to constantly be involved with the up keep. This is as important as ever to keep the customers engaged with what’s new and available.

SEO of Our Website: To become in the top of any search engine so we can be found and generate more potential customers. This is a job in its self and requires an outsourced company to help with this part of our website.

Software: there are several out there to help boost our business. Designing or customer database management.

Marketing: I know with the right exposure and marketing my designs will be on demand. We will be doing a marketing campaigns in several publications and websites. We will launch many flyers that will be distributed to several targeted areas.

Video ads: We will shoot professional video commercials to run on YouTube, our website and other websites to display our site and what we have to offer.

Social Media Ads: We want to do boost FaceBook ad campaigns to generate new customers to the site. We will be on Twitter, Instagram and Youtube advertising our amazing site.

Office supplies: This is to help run and maintain the office in a proficient way.

This is where the money will go to make BROOKLYN ROOTS succeed.

 

PERKS to those who help with our goal will be as such:

$1000 Platinum Foundation Member: For your incredible $1000 donation, we want you to know we appreciate your generosity! For your contribution, you'll receive (along with our undying appreciation):

• Company Logo Decals

• 2 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections

• 3 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections

• 1 hoodie of your choice from any of our collections

• 3 custom designed and printed t-shirts: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)

• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Platinum Foundation Member Involvement

• Recognition on our website and social media.

$500 Gold Foundation Member: For your incredible $500 donation definitely deserves a WOW! Thank you! For your contribution, you will receive:

• Company Logo Decals

• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections

• 2 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections

• 1 hoodie of your choice from the collection

• 2 custom designed and printed t-shirts: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)

• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Gold Foundation Member Involvement

• recognition on our website and social media.

$250 Silver Foundation Member: For your incredible $250 donation (woot woot!) you'll receive:

• Company Logo Decals

• 2 t-shirt of your choice from any of our collections

• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections

• 1 hoodie of your choice from the collection

• 1 custom designed and printed t-shirt: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)

• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Silver Foundation Member Involvement

• recognition on our website and social media.

$100 Bronze Foundation Member: For your incredible $100 donation (awesome, thanks!) will get you:

• Company Logo Decals

• 2 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections

• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections

• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Bronze Foundation Member Involvement

• recognition on our website and social media.

$50 Welcoming Member: For your $50 donation, you'll get:

• Company Logo Decals

• 1 t-shirt of your choice from any of our collections

• recognition on our website and social media.

$25 Welcoming Member: For your $25 donation, you'll get:

• Company Logo Decals

• recognition on our website and social media.

$10 Welcoming Member: For your $10 donation, you'll get:

• recognition on our website and social media.

Every little bit helps. We would like to thank you by giving you a shout out on our website and Facebook page. We want everyone to know how thankful we are for your help!

 

The Impact

Every dollar counts in reaching our goal. We appreciate all those who plan on donating to my dream and know it won’t go unnoticed.

 

Risks & Challenges

We know our $20,000 goal is the right amount to help achieve what we need to succeed. If for any reason, we don’t reach that goal, this website will still move forward and grow to where we need to be. We take whatever we raised and put a plan together that will be of a great impact to what we want.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know every helping hand counts to our success… so please know even if you can’t contribute in a dollar amount there are other ways to help us grow… share on social media for us…. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools as well… thank you for your time and interest!

 

Brooklyn Roots Clothing & Apparel

I believe even if I moved away from Brooklyn, that there will always be a spot in my heart that will never leave and bring me back to where I belong.Getting this site off the ground means the world to me. I have created hundreds of amazing designs that I want to share with all, and to have them display it with as much pride as I put into making them.All who get involved will help me create what I have put my heart into and make it become a reality. I know this e-commerce site will succeed because I know my work ethic and determination that nothing will get in my way of becoming one of the best clothing sites on the web. It does start with your help.What we do..About Brooklyn Roots Direct to Garment T-Shirt Printing ProcessOur Direct to garment printing (or DTG Printing) is a process of printing on clothing using modified inkjet technology. DTG printing applies specialized textile inks directly into the fibers of the clothing that is being printed. This creates high quality products for our customers.One of our DTG printers at our printing order processing plant is located in Yorkville New York.  Here is a sample of a T-Shirt from one of our designs in the "BROOKLYN COLLECTION" which currently has forty five different designs. We carry over 300 designs and counting on our BROOKLYN ROOTS WEBSITE. These are the types of clothing we carry our amazing designs on. Our designs are guaranteed to turn heads. What We Need & What You GetWe need at least $20,000 for BROOKLYN ROOTS to be where I want this clothing and apparel company being. Where I know, it can succeed.Where that money will help…Website Development: We have started to design the website and have about 50% complete. We will need some of the funds to complete this E-Commerce site to be efficient and customer friendly.Website Hosting and Maintenance: We need to constantly be involved with the up keep. This is as important as ever to keep the customers engaged with what’s new and available.SEO of Our Website: To become in the top of any search engine so we can be found and generate more potential customers. This is a job in its self and requires an outsourced company to help with this part of our website.Software: there are several out there to help boost our business. Designing or customer database management.Marketing: I know with the right exposure and marketing my designs will be on demand. We will be doing a marketing campaigns in several publications and websites. We will launch many flyers that will be distributed to several targeted areas.Video ads: We will shoot professional video commercials to run on YouTube, our website and other websites to display our site and what we have to offer.Social Media Ads: We want to do boost FaceBook ad campaigns to generate new customers to the site. We will be on Twitter, Instagram and Youtube advertising our amazing site.Office supplies: This is to help run and maintain the office in a proficient way.This is where the money will go to make BROOKLYN ROOTS succeed. PERKS to those who help with our goal will be as such:$1000 Platinum Foundation Member: For your incredible $1000 donation, we want you to know we appreciate your generosity! For your contribution, you'll receive (along with our undying appreciation):• Company Logo Decals• 2 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections• 3 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections• 1 hoodie of your choice from any of our collections• 3 custom designed and printed t-shirts: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Platinum Foundation Member Involvement• Recognition on our website and social media.$500 Gold Foundation Member: For your incredible $500 donation definitely deserves a WOW! Thank you! For your contribution, you will receive:• Company Logo Decals• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections• 2 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections• 1 hoodie of your choice from the collection• 2 custom designed and printed t-shirts: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Gold Foundation Member Involvement• recognition on our website and social media.$250 Silver Foundation Member: For your incredible $250 donation (woot woot!) you'll receive:• Company Logo Decals• 2 t-shirt of your choice from any of our collections• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections• 1 hoodie of your choice from the collection• 1 custom designed and printed t-shirt: we'll help you design your own custom printed shirt (advertise your business, or just make some fun shirts for your friends!)• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Silver Foundation Member Involvement• recognition on our website and social media.$100 Bronze Foundation Member: For your incredible $100 donation (awesome, thanks!) will get you:• Company Logo Decals• 2 t-shirts of your choice from any of our collections• 1 long sleeve t-shirt from any of our collections• Receive a certificate to hang with pride showing your Bronze Foundation Member Involvement• recognition on our website and social media.$50 Welcoming Member: For your $50 donation, you'll get:• Company Logo Decals• 1 t-shirt of your choice from any of our collections• recognition on our website and social media.$25 Welcoming Member: For your $25 donation, you'll get:• Company Logo Decals• recognition on our website and social media.$10 Welcoming Member: For your $10 donation, you'll get:• recognition on our website and social media.Every little bit helps. We would like to thank you by giving you a shout out on our website and Facebook page. We want everyone to know how thankful we are for your help! The ImpactEvery dollar counts in reaching our goal. We appreciate all those who plan on donating to my dream and know it won’t go unnoticed. Risks & ChallengesWe know our $20,000 goal is the right amount to help achieve what we need to succeed. If for any reason, we don’t reach that goal, this website will still move forward and grow to where we need to be. We take whatever we raised and put a plan together that will be of a great impact to what we want. Other Ways You Can HelpWe know every helping hand counts to our success… so please know even if you can’t contribute in a dollar amount there are other ways to help us grow… share on social media for us…. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools as well… thank you for your time and interest! Brooklyn Roots Clothing & Apparel

story:
What is the ChairAmiGo™ Project?

     Hi! we are the Dreyer Family and we created a patent pending accessory which universally attaches to the millions of collapsible “sports chairs” in use today.  Our goal is to use it to create one sustainable American textile manufacturing job by the end of this year. To do this, we need your help by Sept. 30. 

Please view our video for a demonstration!

Why get involved?

     1. It's a great product/gift!

     2. Your involvement not only helps to launch a new business and an innovative idea, it helps create and sustain real jobs for a local textile manufacturing company which was started several years ago by workers who lost their jobs when their previous company sent all its manufacturing overseas. Part of this project is to prove that manufacturing in America still works! It’s a small project, but we have to start somewhere.

     3. If we can get 300 preorders by Sept. 30th – we will “prove” the market, and put this product into larger production.  Our goal is to create one sustainable full time American textile manufacturing job by the end of this year.  Next year we hope to grow.

What We Need & What You Get

     What we need is simple! Orders! We simply need people to watch our video and order the product if they would like to have one for themselves or give one (or more) as a gift.  We structured and timed this as an opportunity to do some early Christmas shopping! The Sept. 30 deadline allows us time to deliver the first 300 in time for Christmas.

      We decided to be serious about this and make a minimum threshold of 300 units. If we can’t hit that, we can’t realistically reach our goal of creating one sustainable textile job and will call off the project to reevaluate.  So please don’t hesitate – if you’d like to be part of this, please jump on board today and invite all your email, Facebook, Twitter, etc. friends. Remember if we don’t reach our funding goal, you recieve a full refund of your contribution within 5 days of the campaign deadline of Sept. 30th.

Product details

     Quality Construction: Each ChairAmiGo™ is constructed of rugged 600 Denier nylon fabric with a waterproof interior coating. The special pressure clips are originally made for the upholstery industry and are made to stand up to abuse.  In other words, we use only the highest quality materials to go with the highest quality American craftsmanship.

     Color: We have selected Black as our initial color, which will coordinate with the widest variety of logos, team colors, etc.  

     The poncho which we provide in the standard package has a suggested retail value of over $25 by itself. This poncho is made in China and is provided as a bonus to help get the ChairAmiGo™ off the ground.  

     (Chair-ity-AmiGo™ contribution for 25 sold actually represents over 50% of our profit, rather than the 30% mentioned in the video.)

Personalization

     The ChairAmiGo™ can be embroidered, printed or otherwise personalized in any number of ways. Initially, we are creating personalized button zipper pulls.

It is very important that you supply us with either a logo or the 3 initials for a monogram (in the exact order you want them) by email – include identifying information, so that we can match your button with your ChairAmiGo™ order.  The zipper pull is a 1¼” circle so keep that smaller size in mind. Once we have our website setup correctly we will make this process more efficient.  Please bear with us as we work within our current limitations. (the image to the right is close to actual size)

NEW! We have partnered with a local embroidery shop to offer mongrams embroidered in a silver colored thread as well. Again, you must contact us with your initials and identifying information so we can link it with your ordered perk. 

      We have also created a “Promotional Reseller 10-pack” option specifically designed for order by embroidery shops, promotional vendors and others, to personalize and resell to others. Those orders come WITHOUT the personalized button zipper pulls; because it is assumed you will personalize them in other ways.  

Please get involved!

     If you like the idea, but can’t order right now, PLEASE help us spread the word! That may be more important and helpful than anything!  Use the Indiegogo share tools!

     Please don't hesitate to order! we need to get early orders and build momentum for the campaign to be successful.

Thanks again for your interest, support, willingness to help and your initiative! 

- The Dreyers

story:
The Purple Buddha Project in Laos, one of the most bombed countries in the history of mankind, is upcycling remains of weapons of conflict into jewelry, with a strong messages embedded into each piece.

Made with fair-trade artisans to spread awareness of the situation of Laos, a donation of 9 meals for each jewelry piece sold is made to schools in Southeast Asia that sponsor children that attend school free of cost.

If you are intersted in writing about Purple Buddha Project, please contact us at Admin@purplebuddhaproject.com

Press Kit Dropbox Link


Working with local cooperatives, we upcycle and recycle remains of weapons of conflict into jewelry. Transforming an object traditionally symbolizing negativity into change, we fuse history and a strong message into each our our jewelry pieces. We believe that our jewelry can be a catalyst for conversation and awareness of the situation in Laos.

**The project to upcycle war scraps was founded through the RISE (Rural Income through Sustainable Energy) Project that sponsors Ban Napia, Laos through collaboration between Helvetas, Sunlabob, and the Laotian government

MAG (Mines Advisory group) Community Liaison staff have worked with both the artisans and the scrap metal suppliers, educating them on safety precautions. 

* Sources of the aluminum used to make the jewelry include the stabilization fins of cluster bomb casings, flares, certain fuses and parts of fighter jets.


We believe that employment and a job is the most reliable and sustainable way to inject change into a country rather than any other form of assistance. In order to create a stable form of income, we work to collaborate on modern design input as well as by providing market access to their goods.

With the purchase of each jewelry piece, we make a donation of nine meals to a school in Southeast Asia that sponsors children to attended school free of cost. The children of these heavily bombed countries are the least deserving of having to suffer the consequences from the mistakes of the past.


          

The Purple Buddha Project was established after a year long backpacking trip by the founder around the world to better understand himself. Initially started in a dorm room , the Purple Buddha Project has come a long way from its' founding, establishing itself firmly in Cambodia today. With three years experience of having created a unique product in not so ideal environments, we have the absolute confidence in creating a memorable collection in Laos.

"Peace Comes From Within." Ring

"You Deserve Your Love." Ring

"The Mind Is Everything." Ring

"What We Think, We Become." Ring


"The Way Is Not In The Sky; The Way Is In The Heart. - Buddha " Adjustable Bracelet

"Do Not Dwell In The Past, Do Not Dream of The Future, Concentrate The Mind On The Present Moment."Adjustable Bracelet

"You Will Not Be Punished For Your Anger, You Will Be Punished By Your Anger." Adjustable Bracelet

"Peace Comes From Within. Do Not Seek It Without. " Adjustable Bracelet


"Peace Comes From Within. Do Not Seek It Without. - Buddha" Necklace

"We Ourselves Must Walk The Path. - Buddha" Necklace

"What You Think. You Become. - Buddha" Necklace

"No One Saves Us, But Ourselves. - Buddha" Necklace

"Be Content With What You Have; Rejoice In The Way Things Are" Bangle

"Wisdom Is Found In Pain And Chaos" Bangle

"When I Let Go Of What I AM, I Become What I Might Be."

"You Deserve Your Love." Bangle

"Everything Has Beauty, But Not Everyone Sees It" Bangle

"Wherever You Go, Go With All Your Heart." Bangle

If you see something that you like, please pledge through the side bar on the right by clicking the perk box (the dotted line as shown in the diagram above). You will then be taken to the Indiegogo payment processor. Please contact us if you have any questions or in need of assistance. - Thank you!


All necklaces come with a 24" long silver chain included in each package.
Bracelets are adjustable in sizing.





We attempted to initially have the project in Laos in 2016, however due to our inability to offer the product at an affordable price point and based on supplier communication issues, we discontinued the product. 

Having gone through the learning curve, we want to bring back the project into Laos with everything that we’ve learned over the last 4 years operating in Cambodia.

story:
Our vision

Our vision is to produce hand-made scarves for all occasions, custom designed by YOU - our supporter. All scarves are made from best yarn and available for mixing in lot of beautiful colours. We spent almost 6 months in designing, prototyping, choosing the right materials, sizes… just to bring our idea into the life. Our shaL scarves are only one of its kind, made with passion and love.

Our motivation

Last winter we were struggling to find ideal and unique scarves, thus we decided that it’s time for change. We wanted scarves that will look beautiful wearing in the city as well as for the hill. After six months of hard work, we finally found our way - ideal scarves with remarkable style.

What makes shaLs so great?

Custom designed by you

With our shaL designer you will be able to design all your own shaL scarf in variety of colours and strip sizes. Smallest strip size is 5 cm and with no limit in number of combinations (max. shaL scarf length is 230 cm, i.e. 46 strips).

Hand-made by team of our skilled professionals

Our skilled professionals love what they do and they are good at that! We pay extra attention in choosing our team members and this is rewarded by extraordinary quality of our product.

Top quality Red Heart yarn

Red Heart is one of the most trusted brands of yarn in US. For over 75 years Red Heart yarns stand for quality, largest colour selection, fashion and above all else, crafted with love.

Support of local economy

All shaL scarves are hand-made by our passionate teams in small provincial city in east part of Slovakia. Production in this region helps to cut increasing number of unemployed people and opens vision for better future.

29 248 649 430 possible combinations of strips and colours

Tremendous amount of unique combinations ensures that there will be no same shaL scarf produced – amazing, isn’t it? Uniqueness of our shaLs is therefore guaranteed.

Our colours:

 Time frame

April 2013 - start and first concepts

May - July 2013 - ideas and detailed concept specification

August - September 2013 - yarn testing, size and style specification

October - November 2013 - initial samples, branding and design

November 2013 - campaign preparation

end of November 2013 - campaign launch

beginning of January 2014 - shaL designer launch

middle of January 2014 - campaign end 

end of January 2014 - start of first deliveries 

end of February 2014 - all perks will be delivered

Why we need you?

We really love what we have created since last 6 months and believe you will love our shaL scarves as well. Now, we need your support and help to get shaL scarves into production (in meantime we are working on yarn sourcing in bigger amounts, shaL web designer, logistics, our production teams organization, etc.)!

Questions? Feel free to ask at info@shalscarves.com

story:
Welcome to Moon and Star Hijabs, a sustainable, ethical, modest fashion line!

 

 

Moon and Star Hijabs is a handmade hijab and modest clothing line. Every piece is sustainably and ethically made from the fabric to the thread to the materials used to ship the clothes to you. The shipping materials are 100% compostable--even the labels! When you buy from Moon and Star Hijabs, you know that you're making a responsible choice for both the Earth and for everyone who played a part in bringing these clothes to you.

 

All clothes and hijabs are designed and created by Emma Kimble-Maerki, a Muslim woman based in Portland, Oregon. There's something for everyone, even if you aren't Muslim. Modest fashion is for everyone, and you're guaranteed to find a piece you will love.

Hijabs will be stocked and restocked on a regular basis. To begin with, the fabrics for the hijabs will be jersey, silk, and woven hemp. As time goes on, new fabrics will be added such as chiffon, satin, and ribbed fabrics. Clothing will be a little different.

Custom clothing orders will be open unless there's an personal emergency that I must attend to. These clothes can be whatever style you please. It could be a maxi dress or a mini skirt, and all body sizes and shapes are welcome! Whatever you like to wear, I can make it for you. But the exciting part comes with the different seasons. With the changing seasons, new collections will come out. These items will be available in a limited amount in both plus size and standard size options. Once they're out of stock, they're gone! I will keep them in a portfolio on the website so that you may custom order these pieces if you need to.

Hijabs will be in the typical 72 inches x 27 inches, however I plan on adding maxi scarves and square hijabs as well. 

Even the thread and the packaging I use is ethically and sustainably made and sourced. I have done meticulous research to make sure I'm delivering on these promises. And, fun fact, I will be offering international shipping to anywhere in the world!

You may be wondering however, what's the goal dollar amount and what exactly are your dollars going to fund? 

The goal dollar amount is 2,500 USD. Here is a list of what your hard earned money will go towards:

  • Serger Machine
  • Website
  • EIN number
  • LLC
  • Quickbooks
  • Fabrics to start out with
  • Thread to start out with
  • Mailers
  • Tissue paper
  • Shipping labels
  • Branding stickers
  • Studio space
  • Dress forms (mannequins)
  • Pattern making paper
  • Ability to keep international shipping at a good price
  • Multiple types of needles--machine needles and hand sewing needles as well.

A lot of these things may sound cheap and not expensive at all. But due to the nature of my business model, the things I need to launch are going to be a bit more expensive than if I was going to typical stores or bulk ordering from huge factories in China and Bangladesh.

As a side note, my clothes are aimed at female adults, but I am more than willing to make clothes for people of any gender or age! Don't feel like you're excluded because of who you are!

You may be looking at this campaign and feeling disappointed because you can't toss a dollar my way. That's okay! You can help make this a reality by:

  • Getting the word out! Social media, word of mouth, however you wish! Let people know about me and send them here!
  • Follow my instagram account at moonandstarhijabs

If you've gotten all the way through this, YAY! Thank you so much for reading this and considering making my clothing line a reality.
story_txt:
Welcome to Moon and Star Hijabs, a sustainable, ethical, modest fashion line!  Moon and Star Hijabs is a handmade hijab and modest clothing line. Every piece is sustainably and ethically made from the fabric to the thread to the materials used to ship the clothes to you. The shipping materials are 100% compostable--even the labels! When you buy from Moon and Star Hijabs, you know that you're making a responsible choice for both the Earth and for everyone who played a part in bringing these clothes to you. All clothes and hijabs are designed and created by Emma Kimble-Maerki, a Muslim woman based in Portland, Oregon. There's something for everyone, even if you aren't Muslim. Modest fashion is for everyone, and you're guaranteed to find a piece you will love.Hijabs will be stocked and restocked on a regular basis. To begin with, the fabrics for the hijabs will be jersey, silk, and woven hemp. As time goes on, new fabrics will be added such as chiffon, satin, and ribbed fabrics. Clothing will be a little different.Custom clothing orders will be open unless there's an personal emergency that I must attend to. These clothes can be whatever style you please. It could be a maxi dress or a mini skirt, and all body sizes and shapes are welcome! Whatever you like to wear, I can make it for you. But the exciting part comes with the different seasons. With the changing seasons, new collections will come out. These items will be available in a limited amount in both plus size and standard size options. Once they're out of stock, they're gone! I will keep them in a portfolio on the website so that you may custom order these pieces if you need to.Hijabs will be in the typical 72 inches x 27 inches, however I plan on adding maxi scarves and square hijabs as well. Even the thread and the packaging I use is ethically and sustainably made and sourced. I have done meticulous research to make sure I'm delivering on these promises. And, fun fact, I will be offering international shipping to anywhere in the world!You may be wondering however, what's the goal dollar amount and what exactly are your dollars going to fund? The goal dollar amount is 2,500 USD. Here is a list of what your hard earned money will go towards:
Serger Machine
Website
EIN number
LLC
Quickbooks
Fabrics to start out with
Thread to start out with
Mailers
Tissue paper
Shipping labels
Branding stickers
Studio space
Dress forms (mannequins)
Pattern making paper
Ability to keep international shipping at a good price
Multiple types of needles--machine needles and hand sewing needles as well.
A lot of these things may sound cheap and not expensive at all. But due to the nature of my business model, the things I need to launch are going to be a bit more expensive than if I was going to typical stores or bulk ordering from huge factories in China and Bangladesh.As a side note, my clothes are aimed at female adults, but I am more than willing to make clothes for people of any gender or age! Don't feel like you're excluded because of who you are!You may be looking at this campaign and feeling disappointed because you can't toss a dollar my way. That's okay! Getting the word out! Social media, word of mouth, however you wish! Let people know about me and send them here!
Follow my instagram account at moonandstarhijabs
If you've gotten all the way through this, YAY! Thank you so much for reading this and considering making my clothing line a reality.

story:
Short Summary

Hi,  My name is Jodi Bondi Norgaard and I am the founder of Dream Big Toy Company and the Go! Go! Sports Girl line. I didn't intend to go into the toy business five years ago, but imagine browsing the store for toys with your 9-year-old daughter, and she picks up a doll wearing a half shirt, bellybutton ring, eye shadow and it's name on the hang tag is 'Lovely Lola'. "Mommy, is this doll for me to play with?" she asks. That's what happened to me, and it inspired me to create the Go! Go! Sports Girl doll collection. I made the Go! Go! Sports Girls to empower girls to be active, promote healthy life skills, and encourage creative play through sport over fashion and body image. 

Beginning this spring, I will launch a series of books to go along with six of the dolls. They will be sold individually and as a doll/book set called Read & Play.  The books and dolls in the series encourage all girls to dream big and work hard to achieve their goals and have fun while doing so.  All six Read & Plays recently won the highest award in the toy industry, the Oppenheim Toy Portfolio Platinum Award.


Here is where I need your help.  BRANDING!  I am pretty positive parents aspire for their daughters to be more than a 'Lovely Lola', and I want to give them a choice. Consumers will have the final say! I have been told by a few toy buyers from large retailers that the Go! Go! Sports Girls aren't 'girly' enough, not mainstream because they are not fashion dolls.  Well, I am out to prove them wrong. Change is never created by mainstream ideas and I am creating change!  In just the last four weeks I have received over 4,000 pre-orders for the Read & Plays and books!  

I am looking for $7,500 to help with branding, marketing and advertising. Here are the Go! Go! Sports Girl goals:

  • Build awareness through paid ads on social media
  • SEO on sites targeting moms
  • SEO campaign to drive target audience to website
  • PPC campaign to target Read & Play and book launch by zip code, demographics and life stage
  • Update current website  
The Go! Go! Sports Girls have had great success in the media with articles in Shape, Self and Parenting Magazines and features on The Today Show and Fox and Friends to name a few. I have been asked by FOX host, Gretchen Carlson, to be a member of her 'Female Power Panel'.  I know the Go! Go! Sports Girl line has a powerful message!  
Can you help make some noise about the Go! Go! Sports Girls and spread the word? Together we can make a difference in an area needing great attention. To tell girls they are strong, smart and spirited, and to help develop our future women leaders.  Move over Barbie and princesses, it is time for a change and we are ready to make it happen!
