story:
Short Summary

Our dream is to create a classic watch with an original concept.

Time is the most important resource in our life.

We must remember this.

We must remember this every time we look at the clock.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to confirm the hypothesis that people are interested in this product. We set a fixed target of 9 900$. We want to get a minimum of 150 sales. This will allow us to make a pilot version and enter to the market.

The pilot version contains 3 models:

  • BRONX collection ( our brand )
  • NOW
  • REMEMBER YOU WILL DIE

We want to suggest you to become the first owners of our watches.

Start a great story with us!

story:
Light is energy. Light is what separates the modern from the old. Light attracts. Light illuminates. Light is everything. Be light.

@ The Cosmopolitan Las Vegas. Thanks Matt Cali 

Laser Lapel is an upscale men's fashion accessory. Much like the recessed ambient lighting found on luxury vehicles and yachts, Laser Lapels create a high-class style that is unmistakable. Any night out can turn epic with an attractive indirect accent light behind your jacket lapel. Laser Lapel is well made and easily attaches to your favorite jacket. No alterations necessary.

As with any new business, we are focused on creating visibility in the marketplace to promote name and product awareness. We intend to pre-sell a few thousand lapels on Indiegogo and then continue our product and brand development, along with direct marketing promotions (and some partying) in Las Vegas, Miami, New York, Austin, Los Angles, Paris, London, Madrid, Rome, Mexico City, Hong Kong, Toronto and Dubai. We also have an amazing line of women's accessories planned, and several opportunities for licensing / cross brand promotion. *patent pending

The Lapels have 36 hours of continuous radiant light (per replaceable battery) and easily attach with 3M 2 sided tape.

http://www.laserlapel.com/           #LZRLPL            info@laserlapel.com


The greatest hurdles we see in our near term are with scaling and logistics. All of our manufacturing has been sourced to China. We can produce several thousand in a relatively short amount of time, but we may need to source from multiple suppliers if an exceptionally large order is placed.

story:
SCURO watches philosophy is simple :  

To create a timeless sport watch in a lightweight and strong titanium case that is powered by a high quality automatic mechanical movement with the goal of bringing you premium quality products at fair pricing.  

Since 2016, we have launched 2 Kickstarters successfully, raising over 160K and delivering to over 500 backers.  

After a year of designing, finding a manufacturer capable of producing the design, and product testing - we are proud to present SCURO Volante watches.

Titanium  

Titanium is the most commonly used for aircraft or military applications due to its high strength and low weight, the best among all metals. Titanium is also hypoallergenic, meaning it is perfectly safe for the human body. In fact, doctors use it for hip and knee replacements for this very reason.

Forged Carbon  

Forged carbon is created under extreme pressure to offer the lightest, yet strongest material available. It is created from carbon fiber strands and forged to achieve its legendary strength to weight ratio, unmatched even by titanium. Scuro Volante watches are made from the same materials used in a Fighter jet, F1 Race Car, Lamborghini, Bugatti Veyron and many ultra-luxury watches. The Volante is extremely strong, but also deceptively light. ( Watch weight - 65 grams with forged carbon case-sides and rubber straps )

DLC - Diamond-Like Carbon coating  

A DLC-finish will harden your timepiece, making it more resistant to shocks and scratches. The finish will also keep its polish or sheen no matter what kind of abuse you subject it to.

The Dials  

Custom matt carbon fiber dial with special smokes effect on the side.

Sapphire crystal 

We used only high quality, anti-reflective coating Sapphire Crystal (Front & caseback)

CURVED CASE DESIGN  

We opted for a 4 pm crown position, this design allows for your wrist to move and flex naturally without even the slightest abrasion. We custom made the case with a convex design for optimal fit and comfort in everyday wear.

Each watch case is meticulously constructed with the latest CNC technologies. It is then individually handcrafted to bring out the contrasting brushed surfaces.  

Deep concave dial rim with applied 3D indexes filled with superluminous.

Supreme Quality Miyota Automatic Skeleton Movement 8N40 with Small Second Running Time 42 Hours power reserve.  

A) WINDING THE MAINSPRING Automatic winding watch can also be hand winded by turning the crown clockwise in Normal position. Wind several times clockwise. It will start to move naturally.  

B) SETTING THE TIME  

1. Unscrew the crown and pull out to the 1st Click Position.  

2. Turn the crown to set hour and minute hands.    

3. After the time has been set, push the crown back and screwdown to the Normal position.

  • Case diameter : 42 mm  
  • Lug to lug : 52 mm  
  • Thickness : 13.5 mm  
  • Case Material : Grade 5 All titanium  
  • Caseback : Titanium with sapphire.  
  • Weight : 67 grams  
  • Bezel : Exchangeable skeleton case-sides  
  • Crown : Custom designed screwdown titanium  
  • Crystal : Sapphire crystal with AR coating  
  • Movement : Japanese Miyota 8N40 automatic movement  
  • Dial : Carbon fiber, multi layered applied indices filled with superluminous ( Free upgrade to Swiss Super-Luminova )  
  • Strap Material : Premium black rubber strap with titanium buckle.  
  • Water Resistant : 20 ATM/200M ( TESTED )  
  • Warranty : 12 Months

We do things differently. By using a disruptive, direct-to-consumer model we cut out distributors, wholesalers and retails stores. This way, by avoiding all the middlemen we can offer you a limited edition luxury sports skeleton watch for less than US$239.  

The Indiegogo prices are a one-time offer and are only possible because this is a pre-sale campaign. You are getting the watches practically at factory price. We, on the other hand, are able to finance production thanks to your pre-payment and make our new watch collection known on the international crowdfunding platform. A true win-win situation, don’t you think?  

The combination of the Indiegogo offer and the new concept has lead to a price that is almost revolutionary. Never have there been a watch made of such unique material at such a comparable price.

4 Styles Available  

We have 2 different models in this line of Scuro Volante :  

  • SV - 1 : Brushed titanium with red hands.    
  • SV - 4 : Black DLC with blue hands.

NEW OPTIONS :  

FULL CARBON FIBER DIAL IS NOW AVAILABLE.

  • SV - 1 : Brushed titanium with red hands.    
  • SV - 4 : Black DLC with blue hands.

Styles Available  

SV - R1 : Heat treated titanium case with rose gold hands.  

Each and every heated ti case has a different color effect.  

As a result, every single watch we have ever produced, and will ever produce, is entirely visually unique in it’s appearance, due to the variations of heated process.  

That means, even if you own two watches of the same model, there will still be visible differences between them – and forms a big part of what we consider to be the charm of owning a Volante S.E heated ti case.

We anticipate to begin delivering rewards in April 2019 . Quality assurance will take place in conjunction with delivery ensuring we ship perfect watches in a timely manner. We will ship the watches worldwide by registered parcel. ( Please contact us If you require a specific courier service. ) On shipments with a value of less than 800 USD to the United States, no taxes will be due (de minimis regulation). (Changes in regulation reserved). Some countries may charge an import duty for purchasing an item from overseas. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable in your region. In order to assist you in calculating duties, please visit : https://www.simplyduty.com

Contact us  

Please feel free to contact us at ( strstyle33@gmail.com ). We will always be here to answer any questions you may have.

Risks & Challenges

There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a new product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed. However with this being our third product launch, we can confidently say that we are experienced in this process and have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible.

In the event of delays to milestones or reward deliveries please note they will be shared promptly and a revised schedule provided.

Thanks for believing in us! 
Team Scuro

story:
OUR STORY

We started off as your average football fanatics, painting faces and tailgating religiously. One particular game day our team was down, to say the least. With no way to recover, defeat was inevitable. In an act of 4th quarter desperation our lucky game ball was sacrificed. Cut open, carved into a mask and worn as a sign of solidarity. At that moment the impossible began to happen, our boys on the field emerged with an unstoppable momentum that has become one of the most legendary comebacks in football. Did we stumble onto the greatest game winning secret in the history of the sport? Maybe, maybe not. We'll never know. Some angry asshole threw it into a BBQ shortly after the game. As we celebrated our victory deep into the night, an idea was born.

We started making more, first for ourselves and then for others. We learned to make molds and started pouring them from latex, painting and customizing them for our friends and fellow tailgaters. Sharing our balls felt good.

So here we are, asking for your help to share our balls with the world. Backing us will help build more molds, buy materials and acquire team licensing so we can make our balls even more special. 

Choosing Your Rewards

We are offering perks in packs of 1, 3, 5 and 10 Ball Headz. Once you decide how many you want, find the perk with your color in it. We will ask you to choose and confirm your color so you the balls you want. Make sure to look at the perk picture - it shows you what color options are in that perk. If you dont see your color option at check out - make sure your in the right perk :)

Simple as that!

Bonus Rewards

At the end of the Campaign the Ball Head color that has the most backers will get a bonus Ball Head with their order! In addition, we'll make sure that team is the first to get liscening! That means team logo branded Ball Headz!

 

 

Risks and the Nitty Gritty?

We have spent the last year perfecting this product just in time for football season. We have finalized all quotes for our first production run funded by this Indiegogo campaign and we are already set up with a fullfilment provider who will handle our packing and shipment of rewards.

With that said, like with any project, there is risk in bringing a new product into the world. It is possible that our reliance on supplier and manufacturing vendors could result in unforeseen delays.

Do They Come In Different Sizes?

One size fits all! Our Balls are made from 100% Natural Rubber Latex which means they are  durable and will stretch to fit any size melon. If you have a latex allergy don't lose hope - We are working on latex free balls!

story:

Kind Regards,

Wringer Socks

story:
Standard Sunglasses (LEFT) are expensive and don't ergonomically fit your face measures.

Valni #UNICO (RIGHT) shows how  our custom made sunglasses perfectly fits you being built on your own measures, 

Our technology recognize your unique face measurements and readjust the sunglasses size and shape delivering an ergonomic light and aesthetically pleasant sunglasses that perfectly fits you.

STEP 1 Snap two pictures one front and one side. Our own app is able to recognize your face measurements in order to proportion perfectly your #UNICO sunglasses to ergonomically match your face.

STEP 2 Choose your favorite sunglasses across our range of models and shapes iand nsert your initials. They will be engraved on the temple of your very own bespoke sunglasses

STEP 3 Just wait 3 to 5 days allowing us to produce,here in Italy, and receive directly at your door your Valni #UNICO custom made sunglasses in its iconic and elegant package. 

UNICO line are high quality sunglasses custom made on your very own face measurements.

#CLASSICO line are high quality sunglasses in an up to trend design such as the iconic WAYFARER personalized with your initials. 

All Valni components are from high quality certified suppliers same used by the major luxury fashion brands and are all 100% made in Italy. 

ACETATE FRAME: We choose a completely sustainable acetate from MAZZUCCHELLI® (global Leader) that performs same as traditional  acetate for aesthetics and performance and when “touched” it gives a pleasant effect of “warm and silky” while being completely 100% recyclable. 

OPTICAL LENS: CR90 from ZEISS® and are globally known as the top quality sunglasses lenses for good and relaxed vision and  UV400' protection is guaranteed by the CE certification. Additionally you can choose between a standard UV400 or Polarized lenses based on your preferences

STAINLESS STEEL HINGES: designed and built in Italy to ensure maximum resistance to mechanical stress.

PERSONALIZED : On the right temple your very own Initials are engraved to add an elegant touch to your custom made sunglasses.


Our fold-able pouch is handmade in Naples by skillful artisans trained to make the luxury fashion bags that made Italian style and quality worldwide famous.

Its design answers the need of a practical yet elegant item that can be easily stored in your pocket instead of the standard bulky ones

PACKAGING: has been designed and developed internally by us for Valni. Its Iconic opening system is inspired by "LAMBORGHINI® SUPERCAR"  and built using gold cardboard from FEDRIGONI® the world leader of luxury paper.

 Valni Brand is designed for our customer with the objective of bringing exclusivity and quality made in Italy

story:
For three generations, we have been manufacturing shoes for luxury brands all around the world.

Now we feel it’s time to make our own thing (because, well, we’re good at it).

We have spent the last year designing the perfect shoe that redefines casual elegance. Our creative vision was to blend classic styles with the latest innovations, giving our traditionally handcrafted shoes a modern edge. Reinventing classic Italian styles, we have made an incredibly lightweight, versatile and practical footwear.

You don’t have to make the choice between stylish, smart or comfortable - Corsini is the perfect shoe for every occasion: shine at work, make a statement at a dinner party, or sport them on a fun vacation. No matter what you wear - a pair of Corsini will always complete your outfit.

You will receive our fully customizable high-end shoes delivered right to your doorstep. We break the traditional retail model: no middlemen, no inflated prices. We offer you the highest value for your money despite our high-quality work and unique craftsmanship.

Set the right tone for your holidays with these vibrant suede leather shoes! Classic yet fashion forward, our elegant models are extremely diverse and versatile. By using bright and bold colors and a variety of combinations, Corsini shoes are an absolute head-turner.

Corsini makes wearing socks optional. Thanks to our revolutionary, completely natural, anti-bacterial treatment, your shoes won’t smell and will stay fresh throughout the day. Our long-lasting formula is hypo-allergenic and does not use synthetic ingredients.

Side note: this treatment has been thoroughly tested by some of our very own. 
(Worked like a charm.)

 

Corsini shoes are made out of the best quality Italian suede from Florence. Each pair is handcrafted and individually quality controlled. We took two favourites from our archives and added character to them with smart details such as the strong grip rubber sole, a distressed leather welt and an array of bold colorways. Choose between two modern styles; the ETTORE derby and the PIERO moccasin. They are so adaptable that they will easily complement different looks in your wardrobe.

Explore our material origins with the map below: we can ensure you that all our high quality materials are produced in Italy and that all stages of the production are realized in our factory in Fucecchio, Tuscany.

Our leather is from the heart of Italy, from the go-to location of luxury leather brands. Our super smooth finish rubber soles come from Ancona, Le Marche area. Eveything is carefully assembled in Fucecchio by our family owned factory. Our lab tests and antibacterial treatments are done in Brescia. We oversee the whole production from our headquarters in Milan.

 

Choose from one of our trendy and bright color combinations or if you can’t stop loving a classic we created quite a few super chic and elegant color combos. You will be in style wherever you go!

 

You’ll get your pair of premium leather shoes with the advantage of wearing your very own design. If you choose this pledge, you’ll be able to fully personalize your Corsini shoes and yet for at a fraction of the market price!

story:
HISTORY 

Hi Indiegogo! , I’m Belen Trivelli from Chile, and I will like to invite you all to take a ride through “Domado”. 

Since I was little, I was inspired by fashion and by the sport of horse racing. The combination of these two elements is how Domado was created.

I’ve been involved in this sport because family owns this kind of horses and they have transmitted this passion of betting, beauty, majesty and elegance of racing horses through a lot of generations. 

All my life I’ve been surrounded by animals and I have a huge respect for them.

So I decided to create products based on horses, without making them suffer. That was my biggest challenge, making  each product 100% cruelty free respecting the life and freedom of horses.

DOMADO

Domado is a chilean brand of exclusive handbags that use Horse Hair as the principal material for its confection.

I choose handbags, because I´m a believer that they are body complements, they have personality and speaks for themeselves, handbags give life to our body. 

PROCESS

Domado handbags have a long step by step process of confection. First comes all the process of cutting, selecting and washing the hair. 

The creative side of this is the technique I found after a long investigation. After several trials and errors, I didn’t give up. And I achieved the process that let me work with the hair as I wanted to. The technique Domado uses is "Felting", a very unique process, that  allows you to create exclusive designs, because each hair is different from the other.

I can assure you that all the materials that compose a Domado handbag are well selected and handcrafted by the best Chilean artisans. 

COLLECTION

Domado presents you the line "Por los palos". This is the purse that accompanies you to leave the routine and go out with personality and elegance. This concept is used in the horse racing when the horse and the horseman try to leave the pack  in order to win the race.

Por los palos is very versatile, it doesn’t matter if you use it as a shoulder, cross-body or clutch bag, you name it.

MESSAGE

If you have a Domado handbag you will stand out from the crowd, not only for having an amazing design bag, but most importantly for supporting animals’ ethical treatment.

The message is really simple:  I am not an entrepreneur, I am a women of vision,  I  am  a change maker. "So if you believe in Domado, this is your time for betting for me, betting for horses, betting for a life". 

Let’s make a change! 



____________________________

PERKS

(to buy you have to go to the right side of your screen and choose the link of your favorite "perk" to contribute or buy your Domado Handbag)

 (Para comprar debes dirigirte al costado derecho de tu pantalla en donde se encuentran las distintas ofertas llamadas "Perks", las imagenes a continuacion son representativas de los links mencionados) 

Thanks!

Domado Postals

"Betting for a life" KIT 

EARLY BIRD:  Limited edition "Por los Palos" One Side

"Por los Palos" One Side

EARLY BIRD:  Limited edition "Por los Palos" Both Sides

"Por los Palos" Both Sides

"Por los Palos" Both Sides "Personalized"

Top Line "En el Partidor"

Complete Domado Collection

____________________________

SPECIFIC DETAILS


_________________________________

Historia

Hola, Indiegogo, soy Belen Trivelli de Chile, y los invito a todos a conocer Domado.

Desde que era pequeña, nació en mí el amor por la moda y el deporte de la hípica. La combinación de estos dos elementos es la base de como nace domado.

Me he visto envuelta en este deporte ya que mi familia posee este tipo de caballos y nos han inculcado siempre  la pasión por las apuestas, belleza, grandeza y elegancia  de los caballos de carrera por muchas generaciones. 

Toda mi vida estuve rodeada por animales y tengo un gran respeto hacia ellos. Es por eso que decidí crear productos basados en los caballos, sin hacerlos sufrir. Si ese fue el desafío más grande, hacer un producto 100% libre de crueldad respetando la vida y libertad de todos los animales. 

Domado

Domado es una marca chilena de carteras exclusivas, que utiliza el crin de caballo como materia prima para su confección. 

¿Por que carteras? Porque soy una fiel creyente que las carteras son complementos de nuestro cuerpo, tienen personalidad al caminar y hablan por si solas, las carteras le dan vida a nuestro cuerpo.

Proceso

Las carteras de domado son sometidas a un largo proceso de confección. Primero se encuentra toda la etapa de cortado, seleccionado y lavado del pelo.

El lado creativo es la técnica conseguida después de una larga investigación. Luego de muchas pruebas y error, nunca me di por vencida y logre dominar la técnica que me permito crear los futuros productos. Esta técnica es la del fieltro, proceso que te permite crear planchas uniformes del material.

Te puedo asegurar que todos los materiales que utiliza una cartera Domado son bien seleccionados y hecho a mano por los mejores artesanos chilenos. 

Colección

Por los palos es la cartera mas pequeña que te acompaña a dejar la rutina y salir con personalidad y elegancia. Este concepto es utilizado en la hípica cuando el caballo y el jinete se abren del grupo de carrera para ganar. Por los palos es una cartera muy versátil, no importa si la ocupas tipo hombro, cruzada o clutch, tú eliges. 

Mensaje

Si tienes una cartera Domado vas a destacarte del resto no solo por tener un maravilloso diseño si no por  apoyar a los animales y su buen trato.

El mensaje es muy simple, yo no soy una emprendedora, soy una mujer con visión, soy una generadora de cambios, por lo tanto si tú crees en domado este es el minuto de apostar por mí, apostar por los caballos, apostar por la vida.

Hagamos un cambio!

story:
Get TWO awesome bags for less than $300!

We wanted to make a set of classic, beautifully simple, heritage quality every day carry bags, with just a touch of modern design. Our combo package (3rd reward down) gets you two of these tough and attractive bags.

Why You Want These Bags... 

  • 18oz Heavy-Duty Waxed Canvas. Long-loved for its rugged character. Waxed canvas is a thick 100% cotton fabric that’s saturated in wax. It's the OG weatherproofing fabric.
  • Full-Grain Vegetable Tanned Leather Straps and Accents. The strongest, most durable, highest grade leather we could get. It only gets better with age.
  • Honeycomb Ripstop Lining. Each Extra Mile bag is fully lined with an eye-catching bright red ripstop fabric. It's light and durable, giving these bags a distinctive look.
  • Brass Metal Hardware. No dinky, easily broken, plastic buckles, zippers, or hardware on these bags. We went all metal to make sure these bags last.
  • Bottom Lash Tabs. Got something too large to fit in your bag? No problem. Extra Mile bags have two full-grain leather lash tabs. These let you tie down a tripod, jacket, boots, bedroll, or tent to the bottom of your bag.​

 

We sent our prototypes around the country to be tried and tested by people like you in the field. Here's some of what they had to say.  

 

FEATURES 

The drawstring top with cover flap keeps everything you need inside and out of the elements. Weather resistant, 18oz waxed canvas, full grain leather and stitch-and-rivet construction make this bag extremely durable. 

Belts and buckles look great and deter pick pockets, but we also wanted fast convenient access to our stuff. We applied heavy duty, hidden ring snaps for your convenience, while keeping the belts and buckles fully functional. 

COMFORT

Extra wide, adjustable, shoulder straps disperse the weight of your bag and load adjusters give you a customizable carry profile that makes the bag fit your body for all-day comfort. 

Wide leather shoulder straps and load adjusters to comfortably carry your load.

At a lean 20L, the drawstring rucksack is perfect for school, work or an overnight trip. 

INTERIOR

The main compartment comes complete with a padded laptop sleeve, a zippered pocket for your electronics and admin pockets to keep you organized, all in a honeycomb ripstop lining that totally pops. Like we said... the Extra Mile.

EXTERIOR

Two exterior side pockets are great for water bottles and a full size pocket on the front gives you easy access for your journal or snacks, without having to open the main compartment.

When it comes to utility, nothing beats a duffle bag. The full grain, corded leather handles and removable shoulder strap make it easy breezy to carry. 

At 30L this handsome duffle is great for a trip to the gym, or a weekend away. 

FEATURES

Whether you're loading it into your 4x4 or catching a cross country flight, the Extra Mile Duffle is ready for wherever you're headed. 

INTERIOR

Full grain leather pocket trim and poly ripstop inner-lining

Keep your stuff organized, inside and out, with multiple pockets for your passport, tickets, cables etc. the eye catching lining is just one more reminder this simple, stylish bag is anything but basic.

 

 BEST VALUE 

Individually these bags are fantastic for anyone who needs a backpack or duffle for their every day carry. Together they are an eye-catching, all purpose combo that covers 90% of the trips we take. A matching pair will set you and your bags apart. Pre-order your Pack Animal Extra Mile Bags now. 

The Extra Mile Bags were inspired by Swiss Military Rucksacks used in the high Alps in the 1950's and 60's. Just like those, our bags use simple, fail proof design, that focus on minimalistic practical features and heavy duty craftsmanship. Weather resistant, 18oz waxed canvas, full grain leather and stitch-and-rivet construction make the extra mile bags practically indestructible.

Sustainable Quality

By supporting quality products that last longer, industry uses fewer resources and creates less waste while actually saving you money in the long run.

Over the years we’ve owned dozens of backpacks and bags, lately we've noticed a trend toward more complicated, technical or tactical bags with lots of bells and whistles you don't really need, while not even delivering the durability and style you want from a bag that you'll use every day. The Extra Mile Bags change all that. 

Everything you want to know about these bags. Dave goes the extra deep, on the extra mile bags! 

 

Specs

Project budget

This is a projected budget provided by the creator and may be subject to change.

Risks and Challenges

We are living in strange times and 2020 is full of surprises. Earlier this year our Rally Pack Kickstarter delivery was delayed due to Covid19 and that wasn't fun. BUT, we have nailed down one of the best manufacturers of waxed canvas carry goods in the world and we are optimistic that all will go as planned.

This isn't our first rodeo, in fact we have raised over half a million across two brands and 5 kickstarters. We always deliver, are very transparent with the process, and our backers love the final products.

Delays can also occur if we get a lot more backers and have to make lots more bags. Though this is a risk, it is comes with ready solutions. Doubling our goal will not double our delivery times. Doing 10X our goal, will not 10X delivery times. But if more bags have to be created, more raw materials will have to be sourced and manufacturing and shipping times can increase. If that happens, we will communicate an accurate delivery schedule as soon as we know it. Delays like these won't affect the quality of the final product.

Give us a try and enjoy the ride!

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Most backpacks use inexpensive fabrics like nylon for their whole bag, while nylon is a strong fiber, over time it breaks down and bags like these are replaced again and again. Not ours, built to last.

Sustainable materials

Cotton canvas is one of the most durable, natural fiber, fabrics in the world. A mixture of natural waxes protect the bag even more helping it last longer while minimizing the "fast fashion" effects on the environment.

Environmentally Friendly Factories

We have visited and know personally our factories and know they are abiding by the highest standards of environmentally conscience manufacturing.

Sustainable Distribution

Recycled and recyclable packaging!

Brass Metal Hardware. No dinky, easily broken, plastic buckles, zippers, or hardware on these bags. We went all metal to make sure these bags last.

Bottom Lash Tabs. Got something too large to fit in your bag? No problem. Extra Mile bags have two full-grain leather lash tabs. These let you tie down a tripod, jacket, boots, bedroll, or tent to the bottom of your bag.​
 We sent our prototypes around the country to be tried and tested by people like you in the field. Here's some of what they had to say.  
 

FEATURES The drawstring top with cover flap keeps everything you need inside and out of the elements. Weather resistant, 18oz waxed canvas, full grain leather and stitch-and-rivet construction make this bag extremely durable. Belts and buckles look great and deter pick pockets, but we also wanted fast convenient access to our stuff. We applied heavy duty, hidden ring snaps for your convenience, while keeping the belts and buckles fully functional. COMFORTExtra wide, adjustable, shoulder straps disperse the weight of your bag and load adjusters give you a customizable carry profile that makes the bag fit your body for all-day comfort. Wide leather shoulder straps and load adjusters to comfortably carry your load.At a lean 20L, the drawstring rucksack is perfect for school, work or an overnight trip. INTERIORThe main compartment comes complete with a padded laptop sleeve, a zippered pocket for your electronics and admin pockets to keep you organized, all in a honeycomb ripstop lining that totally pops. Like we said... the Extra Mile.EXTERIORTwo exterior side pockets are great for water bottles and a full size pocket on the front gives you easy access for your journal or snacks, without having to open the main compartment.When it comes to utility, nothing beats a duffle bag. The full grain, corded leather handles and removable shoulder strap make it easy breezy to carry. At 30L this handsome duffle is great for a trip to the gym, or a weekend away. FEATURESWhether you're loading it into your 4x4 or catching a cross country flight, the Extra Mile Duffle is ready for wherever you're headed. INTERIORFull grain leather pocket trim and poly ripstop inner-liningKeep your stuff organized, inside and out, with multiple pockets for your passport, tickets, cables etc. the eye catching lining is just one more reminder this simple, stylish bag is anything but basic.  BEST VALUE Individually these bags are fantastic for anyone who needs a backpack or duffle for their every day carry. Together they are an eye-catching, all purpose combo that covers 90% of the trips we take. A matching pair will set you and your bags apart. Pre-order your Pack Animal Extra Mile Bags now. The Extra Mile Bags were inspired by Swiss Military Rucksacks used in the high Alps in the 1950's and 60's. Just like those, our bags use simple, fail proof design, that focus on minimalistic practical features and heavy duty craftsmanship. Weather resistant, 18oz waxed canvas, full grain leather and stitch-and-rivet construction make the extra mile bags practically indestructible.Sustainable QualityBy supporting quality products that last longer, industry uses fewer resources and creates less waste while actually saving you money in the long run.Over the years we’ve owned dozens of backpacks and bags, lately we've noticed a trend toward more complicated, technical or tactical bags with lots of bells and whistles you don't really need, while not even delivering the durability and style you want from a bag that you'll use every day. The Extra Mile Bags change all that. Everything you want to know about these bags. Dave goes the extra deep, on the extra mile bags! 

 

SpecsProject budgetThis is a projected budget provided by the creator and may be subject to change.Risks and ChallengesWe are living in strange times and 2020 is full of surprises. Earlier this year our Rally Pack Kickstarter delivery was delayed due to Covid19 and that wasn't fun. BUT, we have nailed down one of the best manufacturers of waxed canvas carry goods in the world and we are optimistic that all will go as planned.This isn't our first rodeo, in fact we have raised over half a million across two brands and 5 kickstarters. We always deliver, are very transparent with the process, and our backers love the final products.Delays can also occur if we get a lot more backers and have to make lots more bags. Though this is a risk, it is comes with ready solutions. Doubling our goal will not double our delivery times. Doing 10X our goal, will not 10X delivery times. But if more bags have to be created, more raw materials will have to be sourced and manufacturing and shipping times can increase. If that happens, we will communicate an accurate delivery schedule as soon as we know it. Delays like these won't affect the quality of the final product.Give us a try and enjoy the ride!Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designMost backpacks use inexpensive fabrics like nylon for their whole bag, while nylon is a strong fiber, over time it breaks down and bags like these are replaced again and again. Not ours, built to last.Sustainable materialsCotton canvas is one of the most durable, natural fiber, fabrics in the world. A mixture of natural waxes protect the bag even more helping it last longer while minimizing the "fast fashion" effects on the environment.Environmentally Friendly FactoriesWe have visited and know personally our factories and know they are abiding by the highest standards of environmentally conscience manufacturing.Sustainable DistributionRecycled and recyclable packaging!

story:
Solid Titanium Bar Necklace

At Solid Titanium, we make awesome stuff out of rare metals to present your TRUE inner world. We all have struggles, big or small, Fortitude Necklace is designed to show your inner fortitude and express how strong you are to overcome them. 

Made of a single piece of 100% Grade 2 (CP2) solid Titanium. It has a unique hammered finish and gives you a solid feeling! 

Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. Fortitude Necklace is elegant and captures your inner strength in the world's strongest metal: solid Titanium!

Hammer finish by hand. Each hammered part is different and unique, just like you.

Each piece is handmade from a solid piece of Titanium.

What's so special about Titanium?

Titanium is an awesome natural element! It's widely used for aircraft manufacturing, medicine, and aerospace engineering. Today, it is one of the most sought after materials for jewelry making! 

It has the highest strength-to-density ratio than any element. (Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense and superior strength.) Ultralight. Super strong. Lasts forever! 

Fortitude Necklace is hypo-allergenic and bio-compatible! Titanium isthe most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body and the only element that our body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it. It is absolutely safe for those who with allergy sensitivities. 

Fortitude Necklace will never rust or tarnish. Its excellent resistance to corrosion is nearly equivalent to platinum. Wear your own symbol of strength anywhere and anytime! 

Unlike other types of necklaces, titanium has a naturally modern and sleek look that’s perfect for any fashion-forward men or women.  

Detail Shots

The Fortitude Necklace completes any outfit with a contemporary style and shows your inner strength. It looks unique and solid from each angel. 

Smooth solid edges.  

The front and back are hammered with a unique style and can be worn on either side with the same effect. 

It looks sterling under the sunlight and gives you a solid and STRONG feeling.

Design

Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication, also, it is the core of Solid Titanium. We aim to create something simple, unique and bold, which could capture your inner strength in the world's strongest metal: solid Titanium!

Specifications

Pendent:

Solid Grade 2 (CP2) Titanium

Size: 2.6*0.3*0.2 inches 

Colors: Moonlight Silver & Ocean Blue

Weight: 12g

Necklace: 

Features: waterproof, color-safe, hypoallergenic and super strong 

Size:  Adjustable (15.7~23.6in)

Diameter: 1.5 

Two colors are available now. The moonlight silver is very unique and goes with everything. Ocean blue finish after a thermal treatment is premium and fashion. 

Timeline and Expectations

April: Super early bird orders ship

May: Early bird orders ship

April - May: Regular bird orders ship

Why Help Us?

At Solid Titanium, we believe that within each of us lies our TURE SELF. You can be a friend, husband/wife, boyfriend/girl friend, bother/sister, son/daughter, or employee all at the same time, but these are just an aspect of you. They don't represent the inner yourself. 

To know your inner self is to know your values, goals, motivations and beliefs. Not what you have been told by others, but what you have discovered for yourself.

Our goal is to help you find your inner self and untap your personal excellence. We have the prototypes you see here. I've been wearing it for months and it did build my confident and my strength to overcome my struggles in life. We are asking for your help to get us to the minimum order quantity from the manufacturer. In exchange for your pledge, we're offering the first run for a significantly discounted price. Click the back this project button and help us make the Solid Titanium Fortitude Necklace a reality.

Why I made Solid Titanium Fortitude Necklace

One year after I was born, I was left to stay with my grandparents while my parents needed to struggle for life in another city. I could only see them once a year during the holidays. My mom gave me a necklace with a jade pendent when I was five, an age when kids started to know more about the world. The jade necklace was small and simple, but it meant the whole world to me. It had witnessed all my happiness, tears, struggle, weakness, fortitude and the TRUE side of me in the following years.

However, one day when I was a sophomore in high school I carelessly dropped it from my hands and it was broken into pieces. I was suddenly lost.  I remembered that jade necklace when reminiscing the bright and confident self with a strong heart. I really wanted to buy one that can last forever just to have for myself. But I couldn't find a durable, strong and affordable but simple jewel anywhere, so I determined to make one. 

I researched all of the main materials for making jewelries. Precious metals are pretty expensive and unaffordable for most people. Jade is easy to break. Regular metals are either allergic or corrode. After few weeks of research, I finally found the material I was looking for: Titanium, the strongest element and completely bio-compatible. 

In the following month, I read more about Titanium jewelry, visited manufacturers, and worked with manufacturers to solve all the challenges and focused on the concept of the necklace I want to make: Resolve to have more fortitude with the Necklace made of the strongest element in world! 

When the prototype was shipped to my office, my colleagues were immediately drawn to it. Everybody wanted to try it on. Here are what they said when they tried the necklace:

"The design is so unique and distinctive. In some way, it's so straightforward and simple. I like the way it reflects solid lights from many different angles." -- Ken

"The solid Titanium necklace is so light, but with a solid feeling. It's so amazing! I can feel the strength it delivers to me!" -- Joe

Now, I'm wearing it everyday. We all have struggles in life, but this necklace represents my inner strength to overcome them. I believe it will help you to have more fortitude too.

What is it about Titanium? Maybe it's the clean and straightforward color? Maybe it's the strongest element? Maybe we have some other connection to it? I'm not sure, I just know it's the thing people want to wear and touch the most.

Pledge now and help us bring the Solid Titanium Fortitude Necklace to life!

story:
Hello everyone! We’re Michael and Ralph, the founders of Noble. We're Montreal Natives united by a passion for design and an obsession with top grain leather.

We need all the help we can get to reach our goal and more! We can't wait to thank you for your help!

If you would like to reach us, feel free to email us at info@staynoble.co or go to noblelaunch.com to live chat with us! We would love to hear from you!

Thank you!

story:
TYNI WALLET

A while back we launched our Tyni Wallet campaign on Kickstarter and it was a hit! Everyone loved the wallet with it's SPECIAL CASH SLOT and ability to HOLD MULTIPLE CARDS but we are constantly looking to improve. Since we came out with the perfect wallet the only change we could do was add RFID protection. Now we are offering you, Indiegogo Backers to be the first to get your hands on the best slim wallet ever with or without RFID.

  • Tyni RFID only available in black napa.
  • Tyni without RFID is available in premium black, blue, brown, gray napa  or black saffiano leather. 

Tyni wallet, a sleeve wallet that is slim, simple and elegant. A convenient wallet for your everyday needs. Tyni wallet holds CASH, CARDS and MORE. All while staying slim for front pocket carry.

Tyni Wallet was designed with function in mind: To hold cash while keeping the wallet slim and everything in it secure. We asked ourselves, “What can we do to make a better wallet?” Whether you want to store receipts or cash, keys or cards, there is a slot for everything.

 

Super Slim & Stylish

2.8" by 3.8" / .60 ounces / Premium Napa and Saffiano Leather

Available in RFID or without RFID protection.

10 bills and 5 cards in each wallet. Save your pockets and get the Tyni Wallet!

Features

Why TYNI WALLET is better - TYNI WALLET has the best of everything and none of the bad. It is slim with features to store all that you need. We have designed this wallet with pockets to meet everyday needs, while maintaining the appearance and quality of a high end wallet.
 
Cash Slot - Holds up to 30 bills.
 

Cash slot open on both sides for quick and easy access.

 

Easily deposit and withdraw cash.

 

Card slots - Hold up to 8 cards.

Stylish front pocket.

 

Two slots: Quick draw card slot and Multiple card slot.

 

Quick access to cards.

 

Say "YES" to...

  • Holds cash well, a lot of cash 
  • Super slim, simple and secure 
  • Modern and elegant design 
  • Functional features 
  • Premium Nappa leather
  • RFID protection (optional)

Say "NO" to...

  • Card cases: Slim, but do not hold cash very well.
  • Bifolds / trifolds: Hold a lot but too bulky.
  • Metal wallets: Modern look, but uncomfortable and bulky.
  • Elastic wallets: Adapts to needs but, not aesthetically pleasing and leaves too much exposed.
Super slim with multiple cards and cash.
 

What We Need & What You Get

We need a minimum of $1,000 do get our first batch of Tyni Wallets with RFID protection.

As a  perk of helping us reach our goal you be the first to get your hands on one of our Tyni Wallets and slim your pockets.

Risks & Challenges

With the experience from our Kickstarter campaign, we feel confident in our ability to execute everything to run a successful campaign and deliver the product in a timely fashion.

Quality is our main priority and there are no exceptions. Quality control will be done throughout the process to prevent any delays. We want to be in control as much as possible so we have decided to do all post-production in house.

Customer service is very important to us and we want to keep everyone as happy as we can, from the time you pledge to the time you receive your wallet and use it for years. We promise to respond to comments and concerns as quickly as possible.

Please help make this successful by sharing. 

THANK YOU FOR TAKING THE TIME TO VIEW OUR CAMPAIGN.

story:
HEADSTRUMENT is a wearable device that allows the user to “speak” / sing using music and sounds- as their own voice.

     HEADSTRUMENT works along with the natural acoustics of the human vocal tract- its special radiators safely transfer ANY sounds you choose into your voicebox; substituting the normal tone produced by vocal cords. You then "whisper" words; this adds diction and actual vocal expression (speech) to the sound! 

     Imagine being able to create the sound of singing through the body of a violin, or talking like a guitar… “Robot Voice”? “Special Effects?” HUGE.
 

 

     These are just a few examples; any sound can now be modified in this unique way. The variety of orchestral and synthesized tones is limitless, and we demonstrate many in our video (above). The video content was intentionally recorded WITHOUT any audio processing or effects; we wanted to showcase HEADSTRUMENT "live"- and we're REALLY looking forward to see what our customers, artists and industry "pros" will be able to do! Acappella groups and choirs are gonna have a field day with this one.
 

 

Why Indiegogo

     We’re going all the way with HEADSTRUMENT, and are very happy to have come so far this quickly. We have researched all our sources for components, manufacturing, packaging and continued support. Patent, Trademark, and Copyright devices are in place, distribution and marketing platforms are ready and waiting… now we’re here. 

Musical instrument history keeps evolving, now there's this.

     This is NOT software, or a gadget that processes and then reproduces your voice through a microphone & speaker. All of the sounds emanate from your MOUTH; in real time, at full-room volume. No amplifier is required, nor any type of "talkbox tube”; -this is completely different!

     HEADSTRUMENT is lightweight and wireless (USB capability, too). It fits comfortably around your neck, and it easily is taken off / put on (like a set of headphones).

     Simply pair any Bluetooth® enabled device with HEADSTRUMENT- and then have fun choosing whatever sound(s) you wish to say / sing. Select from our included sound library catalog; or easily create your own, too. A built-in memory bank also lets you have your FAVORITES ready "on-the-fly", perfect for live / improv applications.The bright LED lights flash and pulse in time with the sound –a built in light show! The versatility and “wow factor” is enormous- the initial response and feedback has been phenomenal. 

Medical / Therapy...
     Another BIG reason we are passionate about HEADSTRUMENT- the possible applications for helping layrngectomy patients or those with speech impediments (across the spectrum)  could very well be a game-changer. The typical "electrolarynx device" hasn't changed hardly at all for decades.  Again, this is truly unique and different. To realistically experiment and perform official, backed trials- is going to require money & exposure of our product- two areas where social media, crowdfunding, and compassionate people will make that happen. Together, maybe we can help "birds to sing again- or even for the first time". Please, deeply consider that aspect. 

Risks & Challenges

     This invention is hard to sell, because it's hard to describe. However, once people "get it", it is evident the enormous impact that we could have- in a variety of markets. What an EASY way to make music, in a way that's unlike anything currently available! For now, know that a great deal has already been done to address the risks and challenges associated with this product, and its upcoming placement in the market. For sure, we'll be facing the usual things: availability of components, tooling and manufacturing, areas of improvement, lags from distribution, etc...-we're accounting for these and expecting them to a certain degree..

     The REAL challenge may be for unanticipated issues that could surface, however- we have redundancy and backup solutions in place; confident in allowing ALL of our steps the attention they merit during this process. Obviously, NOT clearing the [crowdfunding] goal will be the biggest "risk". 


     The funding from this campaign solidifies the completed reality of and continuing dedication towards this exciting invention. Of course, we will consistently maintain transparency and communication with you, the backers, and our expanding online community- now and in the future.

Pledge, like and please share...

It's a fact: ALL contributions get us closer to clearing our minimum and busting through the finish line, first. If everyone who sees this campaign donates ONE DOLLAR; we will easily achieve that strong finish! If you believe in the product- and you dig it is much as we do, let your friends and online community know about it. This is a group effort- we thank you for reading this far and checking it out- please help spread the word- 60 days is plenty of time... if enough people know about it!

-Justin R.-

P.S. -Here's one just for fun.
story_txt:
HEADSTRUMENT is a wearable device that allows the user to “speak” / sing using music and sounds- as their own voice.

     HEADSTRUMENT works along with the natural acoustics of the human vocal tract- its special radiators safely transfer ANY sounds you choose into your voicebox; substituting the normal tone produced by vocal cords. You then "whisper" words; this adds diction and actual vocal expression (speech) to the sound! 
     Imagine being able to create the sound of singing through the body of a violin, or talking like a guitar… “Robot Voice”? “Special Effects?” HUGE. 

 
     These are just a few examples; any sound can now be modified in this unique way. The variety of orchestral and synthesized tones is limitless, and we demonstrate many in our video (above). The video content was intentionally recorded WITHOUT any audio processing or effects; we wanted to showcase HEADSTRUMENT "live"- and we're REALLY looking forward to see what our customers, artists and industry "pros" will be able to do! Acappella groups and choirs are gonna have a field day with this one. 

 

Why Indiegogo
     We’re going all the way with HEADSTRUMENT, and are very happy to have come so far this quickly. We have researched all our sources for components, manufacturing, packaging and continued support. Patent, Trademark, and Copyright devices are in place, distribution and marketing platforms are ready and waiting… now we’re here. 

Musical instrument history keeps evolving, now there's this.
     This is NOT software, or a gadget that processes and then reproduces your voice through a microphone & speaker. All of the sounds emanate from your MOUTH; in real time, at full-room volume. No amplifier is required, nor any type of "talkbox tube”; -this is completely different!
     HEADSTRUMENT is lightweight and wireless (USB capability, too). It fits comfortably around your neck, and it easily is taken off / put on (like a set of headphones).
     Simply pair any Bluetooth® enabled device with HEADSTRUMENT- and then have fun choosing whatever sound(s) you wish to say / sing. Select from our included sound library catalog; or easily create your own, too. A built-in memory bank also lets you have your FAVORITES ready "on-the-fly", perfect for live / improv applications.The bright LED lights flash and pulse in time with the sound –a built in light show! The versatility and “wow factor” is enormous- the initial response and feedback has been phenomenal. 
Medical / Therapy...     Another BIG reason we are passionate about HEADSTRUMENT- the possible applications for helping layrngectomy patients or those with speech impediments (across the spectrum)  could very well be a game-changer. The typical "electrolarynx device" hasn't changed hardly at all for decades.  Again, this is truly unique and different. To realistically experiment and perform official, backed trials- is going to require money & exposure of our product- two areas where social media, crowdfunding, and compassionate people will make that happen. Together, maybe we can help "birds to sing again- or even for the first time". Please, deeply consider that aspect. 

Risks & Challenges
     This invention is hard to sell, because it's hard to describe. However, once people "get it", it is evident the enormous impact that we could have- in a variety of markets. What an EASY way to make music, in a way that's unlike anything currently available! For now, know that a great deal has already been done to address the risks and challenges associated with this product, and its upcoming placement in the market. For sure, we'll be facing the usual things: availability of components, tooling and manufacturing, areas of improvement, lags from distribution, etc...-we're accounting for these and expecting them to a certain degree..
     The REAL challenge may be for unanticipated issues that could surface, however- we have redundancy and backup solutions in place; confident in allowing ALL of our steps the attention they merit during this process. Obviously, NOT clearing the [crowdfunding] goal will be the biggest "risk". 
     The funding from this campaign solidifies the completed reality of and continuing dedication towards this exciting invention. Of course, we will consistently maintain transparency and communication with you, the backers, and our expanding online community- now and in the future.

Pledge, like and please share...
It's a fact: ALL contributions get us closer to clearing our minimum and busting through the finish line, first. If everyone who sees this campaign donates ONE DOLLAR; we will easily achieve that strong finish! If you believe in the product- and you dig it is much as we do, let your friends and online community know about it. This is a group effort- we thank you for reading this far and checking it out- please help spread the word- 60 days is plenty of time... if enough people know about it!
-Justin R.-
P.S. -Here's one just for fun.

story:
There is something great about baking and eating cake; just the thought of it is nice.

We have created this t-shirt concept that gives you the ability to always shop the ingredients’ needed for cake baking.

The idea is a t-shirt collection with illustrations where all ingredients’ for a specific cake is printed. It gives you the opportunity to spontaneously bake cake. It’s a nice feeling to always have cake close, at the same time tree really great illustrations has come from it.

We create illustrations by, first testing the different cakes to choose the right one. Then we bake the cake, while we document it so we can make the baking instructions on the website. Now the artwork is made, for this MakeCake invites various artists to create an illustration from the MakeCake guidelines, we hope you love them.

The collection

The colours

 

The funding

We're asking for 3799 $ the reason for this big amount is to get the right quality t-shirt. in order to get the right quality t-shirt we need to print a big quantity.

So we hope you love the concept and will support and wear the MAKECAKE t-shirt with pride.

The future

Our goal is to make a t-shirt collection each year and create a new way to use the artwork on you t-shirt. We hope to become a forum where people post pictures, recipes and ideas for the MakeCake concept. Maybe we will expand the concept so it’s more than cake but also other delicious foods.

Please share

If you love the project please share it with you friends!

story:
New Wood Wallets Available NOW!

Visit www.altowallet.com

 

 

From the Creators of Alto Longboards

The Alto Wallet is a patent pending wallet, created for the 21st century.  It’s infinitely customizable, easy to use, expands to carry what you need, and is durable enough to never lose its brilliance. 

When developing the Alto Wallet, we strove to create a no-compromise minimal wallet that looked amazing and could adapt to your life in today’s fast paced society. 

The Alto Wallet is perfect when you need to carry your essentials but don't want to be held down! Stop wrapping your cards with an elastic band!!

*** All funds raised will go directly into upgrading our existing machinery so we can make these wallets and continue to push the limits of our longboard design.***

*********************************************************************************************************************

*Important*

Credit cards WILL be charged initially, Paypal will hold the funds until the campaign closes.   If our funding goal is met by November 29th, 2012, we will recieve funds from Paypal and begin production to hopefully start shipping before Christmas.

If we DO NOT make our goal by November 29th, 2012, all credit cards charged during the campaign will be fully reimbursed.  This is an all or nothing campaign.  

If successful, a survey will be sent to confirm all color and design choices. 

*********************************************************************************************************************

Pre-Order an Alto Wallet!

Help us reach our goal and be one of the first in the world to have this brand new patent pending wallet!  We've tried to provide enough options so you can make your wallet just the way you want it!!

$ 30 – Alto Classic Wallet

Choose from the following colors!

Select one or two vibrant colors to make your wallet.

Includes:

  • 2 Alto Classic solid color plates (any color).
  • 1 High quality elastic shock strap.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping.

$ 50 – Alto Engraved Wallet

Choose from the following designs!

NEW designs to choose from!

Select one or two vibrant colors, and one detailed Alto engraving to create your wallet.  (excludes LE World Map).

Includes:

  • 1 Alto Engraved plate (any color and Alto design).
  • 1 Alto Classic plate (any color).
  • 1 High quality elastic shock strap.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping

$75 – Alto Limited Edition Wallet

***Limited production number on each wallet. ***

Includes:

  • 1 Alto Limited Edition -World Map- engraved plate (any color).
  • 1 Alto Classic plate (any color).
  • 1 High quality elastic shock strap.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping.

$105 – Alto Custom Wallet

You send us the design you want!  We will work with you to create your perfect wallet.

Includes:

  • 1 Custom Engraved plate (any color).
  • 1 Alto Classic plate (any color).
  • 1 High quality elastic shock strap.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping

$225 – Group Pack

5 Alto Engraved wallets.

Includes:

  • 5 Alto Engraved plates (any color).
  • 5 Alto Classic plates (any color).
  • 5 High quality elastic shock straps.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping.

$2500 – Company Pack

30 Alto wallets with your company logo engraved (must be 2-color vector image)

Includes:

  • 30 Alto Engraved plates (any color).
  • 30 Alto Classic plates (any color).
  • 30 High quality elastic shock straps.

North America shipping included. Add $10 for International shipping.

 

What makes this wallet different?

Customizable

With an assortment of vibrant colors and a selection of unique Alto designs, there are over a thousand different wallets possible.  But we didn’t want to stop there!  To be truly customizable we had to give the power to the people.  We are offering a limited reward level that allows you to express yourself to the world, and carry your most personal possessions in something truly unique to you.  With your help, we can streamline this process and offer it as an option to everyone in the future!

Since our wallets are made to look amazing, we needed to innovate a way to create this wallet without covering it up.  What’s the point of a customizable wallet if you can’t see it!

 

Adaptable Capacity

The Alto Wallet gives you the ability to carry everything you want, and in an instant, carry only what you need.  If you start with a typical slim wallet, the instant you push its capacity to the limits you are often making a permanent decision.  Your wallet is now stuck since you’ve stretched all the pockets to double their intended size. 

The Alto Wallet makes the most out of its minimal design by providing you complete control over exactly what you’re carrying.  Finally you have the freedom to switch between minimal and not so minimal, in a matter of seconds.  The Alto Wallet can adapt to any situation; whether you’re going out for a jog, or going out to a club, this wallet adapts to you and your lifestyle.

 

Fits Your Life

The Alto Wallet has been carefully refined; it’s thin, light, flexible, and highly durable.  It’s no coincidence these features are identical to credit cards, cash, and most anything else you put in your wallet.  You can see below that the contents of a wallet can outweigh the wallet itself.  These features make it legitimately comfortable to sit on and also make it perfect for sports like snowboarding, skiing, longboarding and more.  

 

Keeps You Organized

The Alto Wallet provides several ways to keep your essentials safe and organized.  The main compartment was designed to be easily accessible and allow you to see everything in your wallet at a glance.  Efficiently select items from your wallet by manipulating your cards like you would folders in a filing cabinet.   

The inner compartment enables you to keep things separate from the main compartment.  The band is perfectly sized to tightly store one or multiple cards.  This makes it convenient to store your most used card(s), or your least used card(s).  This wallet gives you the freedom to use it how you want, and to change as often as you like.

The last compartment is on the outside of the wallet, which provides extremely easy access and storage.  Perfect for short term items like receipts, movie tickets, plane tickets, business cards, etc. The band is secure and will hold items in place wherever your wallet goes.

 

Versatile

There are more ways to use the Alto Wallet than we can show, but here are a few examples.  These features and more, make this wallet a dream for the jet setter or backpacking traveler.  The wallet’s functional yet minimal design will continually impress you with its versatility.  Experience the world with a wallet that won’t hold you back. 

 

Behind the Design

Over a year and a half ago, we challenged ourselves to create the perfect longboard.  With little more than a bandsaw, contractor’s table saw, and some other basic power tools, we began this impossible journey.  Obsessively devoting ourselves, we created a longboard in our own vision and after several months this vision started to come into focus.  It took several more months until we achieved a design we were truly satisfied with.  This turned out to be an important lesson for us; the knowledge that anything is possible with enough hard work and perseverance.  Comparing our first longboards to the ones we create now, it’s obvious to see how far we’ve come.

Building by hand and starting from scratch meant we had complete control over the functionality and design of our longboards.  However, this also meant we would generate a considerable amount of waste.  As our longboards got better, so did our woodworking skills and soon we were able to find ways to put our scrap material to good use; creating unique cutting boards, trays, and coasters.  We inevitably began challenging more complex projects, like a wallet made from handcrafted wood and carbon fiber.

The feedback we received from our early prototypes was quite positive but also a bit of an eye opener.  Turns out lots of people disliked their wallets as much as we did.  Realizing we had an opportunity to make people lives better, we decided to ramp up prototyping and take this design challenge head on.

The Alto Wallet was created with a ridiculous amount of perseverance, attention to detail, and belief in ourselves to create a better wallet… in a world full of wallets.  We don’t take short cuts, we don’t sacrifice quality, and invariably this means we are always choosing to do things the hard way.  Based on all our past experiences, we have seen that challenging ourselves is often the best way to create something entirely new.

story:
Without having to read this whole pitch, the point of this project is to cut out the middle man and support veterans. If we control our own production, we will be more agile and better able to serve our customers while providing more to the charities we believe in. If you can spare a few bucks please do and you will get a kick ass shirt, or a few, in return. Thanks.

-Mike Harvey
SSG-11B

 

Our Mission

Pride & Honor Clothing Company is a veteran owned business that provides high quality clothing and apparel for veterans and patriots. Pride & Honor currently donates $1 from all orders to the Wounded Warrior Project and other charities. 

We decided to try our luck with IndieGoGo to try and get funding to give our business an extra push in the right direction so that we can continue to provide outstanding products and give back to the war fighter community. 

With your help, we will be able to take control of our shirt production and keep it all in house. This will allow us to continue to offer great products and give us the flexibility to offer custom shirt products to military units, charities, public service departments, etc.

Below are the first of our unreleased signature series shirts.


The Impact

In addition to building the P&H brand, having our own production equipment will also let us get back to helping families of the fallen and war fighters and public service officers who have been injured in the line of duty through the revival of our t-shirt drives in which all proceeds are donated to the service member or their family. 

With our new equipment we also plan on creating custom shirts for other military units, police departments, fire departments, charities, etc. Below is an example of shirts we have done in the past.

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $13,000 USD to purchase our own t-shirt printing/silk-screen equipment and supplies allowing us to take control over the production of our shirts. This crucial step will allow us to continue to build our business and better serve our customers by bringing our costs down and passing those savings on to our customers.

With these funds and cost savings we will continue to build our brand as well by releasing 3-5 unseen shirt designs.

You can see a list of our perks at the right. The ammounts range from $25 - $500. Please help us out if you can.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know it is impossible for some to help out as money may be tight. If it weren't, we probably would not be here looking for help either. So if you cannot contribute I ask that you please share this with your friends and family to help get the word out so that we can meet our goals.

Thank you for taking the time to read this and to consider our project.

Sincerely,

Mike Harvey

Below are shirts from our military line.

story:
What is Life is People?

Life is People is a people project using visual arts & media to encourage, inspire & embrace the beauty & value of every individual, by capturing it & allowing them to experience it.

You may see the project for yourself by visiting: http://lifeispeople.com


Why Donate?

We launched the project on Nov. 07 (11-07-11) making our first initial push with a fully functioning website as well as a small run of tees to help provide some financial backing. We hope to raise enough money with this apparel campaign to create a self-sustaining resource which will then help us properly fund the equipment we need and get it our idea on the road. By taking our idea on the road it grants the opportunity to have a nationwide impact rather than just locally.


Where Will The Money Go?

Your contributions will go towards funding the incentives from this campaign and the design and production of a line of Summer apparel for the Life is People project through Released Clothing. Anything received over our goal will be used in areas we see fit to help continue and grow the project.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Listed below are examples of the rewards offered in this campaign.
