story:
My name is Axel Grivory. I was born in Paris, France, and as far I can remember, I have always been passionate about creation, design, and all kinds of objects and accessories.

Although I was born in Paris, I grew up in a multicultural context. After my high school degree, I attended a French-American business school, graduated from a Master degree in Luxury brand management, and joined the family business working as Area Manager in the perfume industry.

After 15 years of career, I wanted to tackle a new challenge and started an 18 month  Executive MBA program. It convinced me to start my own company. Having my own watch brand would no longer be only a dream. I would turn my experience of travelling the world in designing fine watches.

I made a rough sketch showing the main lines of the design I had in mind.

The next stage was to find the right development studio that would turn my drawing into a technically designed 3D rendering, including all the features of a fine Swiss-made timepiece.

Of course, I needed a website, a Community Management, budgets for communication and production, as well as access to the market.

At that point, crowdfunding appeared to be THE solution to all these needs.

I ran a Kickstarter campaign and successfully managed to gather the 25000 € to get started.

That is only a first step, and I now need the support of the Indiegogo community to help me achieve my dream and keep designing more extraordinary watches inspired by the beauty of the world.

That is the real DNA of SPRINGER & FERSEN, sharing with you my experience through compelling designs and watchmaking excellence.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Thanks to a past successful campaign, we could develop our first watch, make prototypes and launch our website.

In order to further develop the brand, we need to gather about 160 000€. 

The price of a Rangiroa World Diver (RWD) includes:

- The watch kit (bracelet, case, crowns, bezel, etc.)

- The movement (SwissTech S24045)

- The watch box (lacquered wood)

- A 2-years International Guaranty card

- and, the Springer & Fersen The club membership card.

Any additional money will be reinjected in the company to develop a new model, develop a retail network, and why not start developing an in-house movement!

 

Your Impact

By supporting us, you will have on your wrist the testimony of the success you contributed to building, embodied in a unique original designed swiss-made luxury watch.

Moreover, you will contribute to free the creativity in a field (unfortunately)  dominated by group company mass-produced standardised pieces.

Also, you will enter a club dedicated to discovering the world and its beauty through an original watch concept.

Besides, translating the world's beauty into the lines of a mechanical watch is also a tribute to the majesty of nature, its force but also its fragility. And if you think of it, what is eco-friendlier than a mechanical watch? If you take care of it, it is almost immortal, no need to change the batteries, nearly no impact on the environment beyond the initial production.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to build a sustainable watch brand, able to face the trials of time. To achieve that, we need the help of the Indiegogo community so that the dream does not stop at the Rangiroa World Diver.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, the main help I am looking for is money. However, not everybody can afford such amount of money, and you may very well want to help us although our product is not matching your style. If you like our adventure, still cannot buy the watch, tell everyone else you know a marvellous piece of design has appeared and that they have a chance to have it on their wrist.

And if among you, some are distributors, commercial agent or have ways of helping in selling our watches, we will, of course, be grateful the support you could have granted us!

 

 

RANGIROA WORLD DIVER

automatic GMT Dual Time


 

 

  • Swiss made
  • 30 atmospheres (300m/1000ft) water-resistant
  • GMT Dual Time
  • Time zone indicator

 

  • 44mm stainless steel case 
  • Unidirectional ceramic bezel with engraved figures, to measure diving times
  • Domed sapphire crystal
  • Stainless steel screwed case back
  • Stainless steel and silicone screwed crowns
  • Stainless steel and silicone bracelet
  • Stainless steel folding buckle

 

  • Movement:  Swiss Tech S24045
  • Frequency 28 800 Alt/h
  • 29 jewels
  • Display by means of hands: Hour, Minute, Second, second Time-zone
  • Dual Time
  • Date display at 4h30 window
     

RANGIROA WORLD DIVER is an automatic watch and therefore works without a battery: the mechanism winds up thanks to an internal oscillating rotor. Regular maintenance is, however, recommended to ensure the proper functioning and the longevity of your watch. All the elements (back of the case, crowns) are screwed to ensure maximum water tightness.

RANGIROA WORLD DIVER is proposed in four colours: Fenua Black, Deep-sea blue, Tiare White and Taporo Lime.

The collection

Fenua Black refers to the name of mountainous islands in Polynesia; the high islands created by volcanic rocks. The velvety black colour of the bracelet contrasts elegantly with the high shine of the black ceramic bezel.

Deep-Sea Blue speaks for itself. Its deep hue of classic royal blue mirrors that of the deep sea waters, full of wonders that one can admire in Rangiroa.

Tiare White is inspired by the velvety petals of the Tiare flower, a Tahiti icon. Here it is highlighted and modernised by a touch of luminous grey for the second time zone indicator.

And finally Taporo Lime, taporo is the Tahitian name of the small limes found in French Polynesia. A luminous, vivid and colourful shade of green.

 

The case back is engraved with a manta ray stylised as a Polynesian tattoo. The manta ray is, in Maori mythology, the temple where Taaora, supreme god creator of all things resides.

Rangiroa World Diver case back

 

Each watch is presented in a Deluxe white lacquered wood box,

 

Sketches of the Deluxe white lacquered wood box

 

with an International 2 years guaranty card (parts and labour), and a Springer & Fersen membership card.

Each timepiece is designed in Paris, and conceived and made in La Chaux-de-Fonds, in Switzerland.

 

Your benefits with preordering your Rangiroa World Diver (RWD) now:

If you need any help with ordering your reward, please consult Indiegogo help centre, and if you have any questions, remarks or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us at contact@springeretfersen.fr

 

RANGIROA WORLD DIVER

The story behind the watch
 

 

The story of this watch begins in January 2009, when with my friends we decided to discover French Polynesia and Rangiroa in particular for about two weeks.

One day, part of the group decided to stay at the village and chill out, and the other part of the group, myself included, decided to go to the Blue Lagoon and swim with myriads of inoffensive small sharks. So we called a taxi boat, customary there, and set sails (or rather engines) to the Blue Lagoon, on the other side of the Rangiroa atoll.

On our way to the Blue Lagoon

On our way there, we were in for a treat: we saw sea turtles, manta rays, colourful fishes coming to the shallow waters to reproduce... and we spent half the day there. In the middle of the afternoon, we realised we had missed our taxi boat and that we were stranded on this isolated part of the atoll. The sun was starting to set, and we had no way to communicate our location to anyone.

Finally, we saw a fisherman passing by with his boat and signalled him our presence. He came to our rescue and accepted to take us back to the village. Little did we know he was not coming back from fishing but rather from partying on a motu (small flat island made of coral sand) nearby and had a few too many drinks. On our way back we got lost in the dark - of course, it had to be a moonless night-, the boat engine broke, and the fisherman spent the time singing and shouting "I am the Captain of the vessel!" at the top of his lungs. As for us,  we were part laughing, part anxious, part downright scared because we didn't know if our "Captain" was indeed able to take us back to safety.

After what seemed like an infinity, with the only noises surrounding us the clapping of the water caused by fishes hunting and fighting, we finally reached the village where the part of our group who had stayed had organised a welcoming party and set a fire on the beach to try to guide us home.

That day certainly is the day that made me realise the power of the elements, its beauty and its mysteries and although it was a hard time living it, it remains probably one of my fondest memories from those holidays.

 

RANGIROA WORLD DIVER in the making
 

When I had to choose the first destination for SPRINGER & FERSEN, that day and the wonders we experienced came to my mind. The first stop on this world tour would be Rangiroa, famous for its diving spots. And naturally, it had to be a diver watch.

And so RANGIROA WORLD DIVER was born: out of passion, work and will to share with you the world, and the beauties I see in it.

From the first idea and the raw sketches from early 2018,

First sketches for Rangiroa World Diver

I worked with Mickaël Bourgeois, from atelier Novodess, and Rab Issa from Hour Label, who adapted the design I had in mind into a watch model and, for the first time, what was just a concept so far was turning into something tangible:

First 3D simulations

 

FEBRUARY 2019

After a few more changes, I received the first prototypes. Then began the shooting process. Everything took place in Brussels, at my parents', with my sister shooting the prototypes:

Our homemade photo studio

And our first visual (Thank you, Mom, for sacrificing your first hibiscus of the year!)

 

APRIL 2019

After changing our movement to SwissTech S24-045 and working hard on finding all the right suppliers, we are allowed to use the SWISS MADE label!

SUMMER 2019: Real tests in Rangiroa!

Chance is on Springer & Fersen's side: my cousin is going to Rangiroa for his honeymoon and has accepted to take the Rangiroa World Diver and on a test drive, where the story began.

Rangiroa World Diver going back to its roots

SEPTEMBER 2019

Rangiroa World Diver's first feature in the press!

L'Eventail - September 2019

 

 

Acknowledgements
 

First and foremost, I would like to thank my family warmly for their continued support and their unwavering faith in Springer&Fersen and me,

I also would like to thank: Mickael Bourgeois (Atelier Novodess), Rab Issa (Hour Label), Bryek Horlogerie, François-Marie Neycensas (Reservoir Watches), Dominique Misson (L’Eventail), Olivia Hervy (WeWork labs manager) and Diane Sakhakini for their help, their suggestions and guidance, Audrey Grivory for her help with the pictures, visuals, digital conception and texts, Marie-Christine Lesage for her advice and support, Yvon et Caroline Grivory for their help with testing Rangiroa World Diver in real conditions, Florent Grivory for his encouragement and advice,  and Jean-Pierre Grivory, my dad, who taught me that when the goings get tough, the tough get going.

To all of you, I am most grateful.
story_txt:
My name is Axel Grivory. I was born in Paris, France, and as far I can remember, I have always been passionate about creation, design, and all kinds of objects and accessories.
Although I was born in Paris, I grew up in a multicultural context. After my high school degree, I attended a French-American business school, graduated from a Master degree in Luxury brand management, and joined the family business working as Area Manager in the perfume industry.
After 15 years of career, I wanted to tackle a new challenge and started an 18 month  Executive MBA program. It convinced me to start my own company. Having my own watch brand would no longer be only a dream. I would turn my experience of travelling the world in designing fine watches.
I made a rough sketch showing the main lines of the design I had in mind.
The next stage was to find the right development studio that would turn my drawing into a technically designed 3D rendering, including all the features of a fine Swiss-made timepiece.
Of course, I needed a website, a Community Management, budgets for communication and production, as well as access to the market.
At that point, crowdfunding appeared to be THE solution to all these needs.
I ran a Kickstarter campaign and successfully managed to gather the 25000 € to get started.
That is only a first step, and I now need the support of the Indiegogo community to help me achieve my dream and keep designing more extraordinary watches inspired by the beauty of the world.
That is the real DNA of SPRINGER & FERSEN, sharing with you my experience through compelling designs and watchmaking excellence.

story:
Bambuud Original Duffle

Made with Bamboo Canvas, The Bambuud Signature Duffle is more durable and the most eco-friendly bag on the market.  Style combined with purpose was the driving power behind this idea. 

What We Need & What You Get

We hope to meet our goal of $15,000 just in time for the holiday season!  The Bambuud Signature Duffle is the perfect gift.

With the range of buying options, you will be able to please yourself with an awesome deal, or stretch your deal even further by taking advantage of your Family Pack.

The Future of Bambuud will not stop here, this is just the beginning.  With this funding, we hope to gain exposure to introduce a full lineup of bags, ranging from travel totes, diaper bags, and traditional gym bags.  For the time being, however, the Signature Bag will easily take care of your every day needs.

Front Zipper PocketButtoned Pockets on Both SidePerfect Size for Airplane Carry-OnTwo Sleeve Pockets InsideSecured Zipper Pocket inside

Why Bamboo?

story:
Having enjoyed massive success on Kickstarter, 100% funding within 48 hours... we are now on Indiegogo!
This is to allow those that might have missed out the chance to pre-order a Patrolman Enforcer wristwatch, for delivery to your door in April 2018.

The PATROLMAN brand is composed of serving Police Officers with over 15 years of prior experience in Product Design and engineering.

In a sea of bland, plastic digital wristwatches, we set about designing a wristwatch with more of an identity for Police Officers.

A custom design, high quality materials, interwoven with useful features all go towards assisting a Law Enforcement Officer in the execution of their duties.

THE WATCH
The Patrolman Enforcer is a CUSTOM DESIGNED surgical grade stainless steel analogue watch.

Unlike many of the affordable watch campaigns that you’ll see, we don’t use a generic off-the-shelf case, every part of the watch has been designed and built to our exacting standards and specifications through months of research and development.

CASING
Our 42mm diameter cases are made from high-grade 316L Surgical grade stainless steel that is finished with a matte black PVD coating. This finish gives the watch a tough, durable coating that will shrug off the majority of knocks during the rigours of duty.

The 316L stainless steel used surpasses marine grade, so has all of the anti-oxide properties you would expect whilst remaining tough and light, resulting in a solid and substantial timepiece.

Following on from numerous prototypes, we decided to move away from the conventional twist lock case back, favouring the much higher end finish of a micro-screw lock case. This provides a superior waterproof seal and allows every watch to be perfectly aligned.

We have built our watch to the toughest specifications we can accomplish, therefore the Patrolman Enforcer is designed to handle being scratched, battered and used relentlessly.

WATCH BEZEL
The Patrolman Enforcer features sapphire crystal, making the watch face almost unscratchable in action and compares favourably to anything you’ll find on a digital or high street quartz watch.

The 316L stainless watch bezel protects the Sapphire glass by giving the crystal a recessed, protective lip all the way around. Should the watch be caught on any surface during a volatile incident- the protective lip takes the brunt of the force, rather than the sapphire crystal.

From experience, this is an area that has ruined many a good watch face whilst on duty.

THE CROWN
The crown is embossed with our Patrolman logo and is used for setting the date and time of the watch. It's protected by smooth case contours, resulting in a more comfortable day to day wear whilst offering extra resilience to the crown in the event of the watch being dropped.

The watch has a water resilience of 10 ATM (100m water resistant), making the Patrolman Enforcer ideal for recreational activities or light water work.

THE MODEL
For the Indiegogo campaign, we have decided to re-release the White & Blue version of the Patrolman Enforcer. This has proven to be fantastically popular choice and provides the best all round visibility for on and off duty wear.

For our Kickstarter campaign we ran with two models, but such was the popularity in White & Blue, that we have decided to offer this as an extension Indiegogo campaign.

*Any 'Solid Blue' model images are just for illustration purposes and not being offered as a selection during this campaign.*

We have demonstrated a side by side comparison of the W&B Enforcer watch in both daylight and night conditions.  C3 SuperLuminova is applied to the majority of the watch dial and hands but due to the lume value degrading when mixed with colour, pure white is the most vivid area.

MOVEMENT
As avid watch collectors, we know the draw of a good automatic watch. However, for our watch we needed a movement that was supremely reliable, built to withstand hard knocks, whilst maintaining pinpoint accuracy for Policing duties.

After considerable research, the Japanese Miyota 2105 Quartz movement was the perfect choice for our watch- it's tried, tested and has a proven track record in numerous big brand watches.

With its built in shock protection, the watch will maintain laser accurate timekeeping, no matter the situation that you find yourself in.

Due to the Patrolman Enforcer being a high quality quartz movement, the watch is capable of being thrown in a locker for long periods of time and still be ready to go as soon as the watch is put back on.

THE STRAP
Each watch comes with a beautifully soft black genuine leather strap with integrated grey stitching. The strap tapers from 4mm at the watch lugs, down to 3mm at the buckle to aid comfort.

The 22mm strap has been custom designed and manufactured to our specifications and includes some custom details that we thought worked well for a Law Enforcement Officer in the field.
One of these details is an engraved dual retention clasp system, designed to aid watch retention in highly volatile situations.

In support of our Blue Family, we have incorporated a blue leather sliding keeper. A small detail that lends its self to the overlying theme in representing the brotherhood that Police Officer’s share.

WATCH BACK CASING
The upper centre section is intentionally left blank to allow you to have your collar number engraved onto the back, to create a personal, one of a kind watch.

To facilitate the engraving of your collar number, we've made a guidance card to be included with every watch. This gives exact instructions to be followed by any professional engraver, so no matter where you are in the world, you can have a standardised finish at very little cost.

In the OPTIONAL EXTRAS SECTION towards the bottom of the page, we will refer to completing the engraving of your collar number ourselves prior to shipment at a small additional cost.

PRESENTATION BOX
A presentation box has been created just for the Kickstarter project. The clean, black watch box protects the watch in a modern and understated fashion.

It’s a true homage to the entire ethos of the build, choosing class over brashness. The inside features a dark grey embossed lining and a black honours ribbon to support the warranty card. The watch sits proudly on a large padded cushion, protecting the watch whilst not in use.

WATCH REVIEW
The Patrolman Enforcer has been reviewed by the independent watch review site, please click here to view the full review :
http://watchroundup.com/reviews/patrolman-enforcer/

An excerpt taken from the WATCH ROUND UP review:
"Extremely comfortable on the wrist, light and didn’t catch on my backpack straps when taking it on and off. It also had the opportunity to flex its muscles and prove to me its toughness when I slipped on a steep rocky pitch and went down pretty hard. The watch took a pretty hard hit against the granite rock face… there wasn’t a scratch on it! The PVD coating and the recessed Crystal did their job as promised."

OPTIONAL EXTRAS
1. OUR 22MM CUSTOM THIN BLUE LINE NATO STRAP:
Should you wish to order our additional Thin Blue Line NATO strap, you will be given that option upon purchasing.

2. PROFESSIONAL ENGRAVING OF YOUR COLLAR NUMBER ON BACK CASING
Further more, we have been working with an extremely proficient engraving company, to allow us to engrave your collar/badge number ourselves at a small additional charge.

This will be at the completion of the Indiegogo campaign and prior to shipping.

SUMMARY
The Patrolman was always designed to be a dark, moody looking timepiece with functionality and usability at the forefront of the design.

The custom Police touches incorporated into this watch are not replicated in any other watch on the market and that is something that we are very proud of.

The Thin Blue Line holds great symbolic and emotive significance to our team. Its subtle, understated incorporation is therefore central to the design process of our watches.

ON THE WRIST
The 42mm design is such a wearable size, it sits comfortably and proportionately on almost any wrist.

TIMELINE
Our Patrolman watches have been a huge success on Kickstarter, with over 220% funding in just 30 days! Since this time we have received a large amount of pre-sales through our website www.Patrolmanwatches.com

We are prepared for the increased production and are in a fortunate position of being able to take on additional pre-sales through Indiegogo.

The Patrolman Enforcer was designed in the UK but is being manufactured in China, by the same manufacturer used by several well-known watch companies. The watches take several months to manufacture, as you might expect of a totally custom timepiece, but we will keep you updated all the way, right up to delivery at your door in April 2018.

The timeline we've put together factors in Chinese holidays as well as allowing for unexpected delays. Throughout the manufacturing and quality control phases, we will keep all backers updated here as well as on our Facebook page.

We can also be closely followed via our Instagram and Twitter pages so please do follow us for regular updates.

WATCH TESTING AND COMPLIANCE
While we wanted to deliver an affordable piece, we were also laser focussed on the quality of the materials and finish. We have made sure that all of our watches meet the strict EU compliance standards.

WARRANTY
Every Patrolman Enforcer watch comes with a 12 month warranty against manufacturing or movement defects.

The watches are all individually inspected prior to shipping out to you, but if for any reason the watch you receive has a manufacturing defect that has gone unnoticed, we will repair or replace the watch for you.

SHIPPING- WORLDWIDE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
The Patrolman Enforcer is aimed at Law Enforcement Officers all around the world, we therefore will ship worldwide.

When backing the project, you'll be asked where in the world you'd like your watch shipped to and the appropriate fee will be added to your pledge. We'll contact you when the project funds to get your address.

SHIPS FROM THE UK
The Patrolman Enforcer ships from the UK via courier to anywhere worldwide. If you're outside the EU, you'll need to confirm any import duties you may be required to pay with your local customs office.

Funding period
30 days After this time all watches will be sold at the expected retail price of £185 GBP
($243 USD/ €210 EUR) via on our website: www.patrolmanwatches.com

Risks and challenges
We have taken every precaution to ensure that we can deliver on schedule.

Following extensive tests with numerous manufacturers and countless prototypes, we found a manufacturer who impressed us hugely with their decades of experience in manufacturing watches for a number of high end watch companies.
We have worked with our chosen factory on rounds of prototypes and each have been delivered on time and to the correct specification.
story_txt: Having enjoyed massive success on Kickstarter, 100% funding within 48 hours... we are now on Indiegogo!This is to allow those that might have missed out the chance to pre-order a Patrolman Enforcer wristwatch, for delivery to your door in April 2018.The PATROLMAN brand is composed of serving Police Officers with over 15 years of prior experience in Product Design and engineering.In a sea of bland, plastic digital wristwatches, we set about designing a wristwatch with more of an identity for Police Officers.A custom design, high quality materials, interwoven with useful features all go towards assisting a Law Enforcement Officer in the execution of their duties.THE WATCHThe Patrolman Enforcer is a CUSTOM DESIGNED surgical grade stainless steel analogue watch.Unlike many of the affordable watch campaigns that you’ll see, we don’t use a generic off-the-shelf case, every part of the watch has been designed and built to our exacting standards and specifications through months of research and development.CASINGOur 42mm diameter cases are made from high-grade 316L Surgical grade stainless steel that is finished with a matte black PVD coating. This finish gives the watch a tough, durable coating that will shrug off the majority of knocks during the rigours of duty.The 316L stainless steel used surpasses marine grade, so has all of the anti-oxide properties you would expect whilst remaining tough and light, resulting in a solid and substantial timepiece.Following on from numerous prototypes, we decided to move away from the conventional twist lock case back, favouring the much higher end finish of a micro-screw lock case. This provides a superior waterproof seal and allows every watch to be perfectly aligned.We have built our watch to the toughest specifications we can accomplish, therefore the Patrolman Enforcer is designed to handle being scratched, battered and used relentlessly.WATCH BEZELThe Patrolman Enforcer features sapphire crystal, making the watch face almost unscratchable in action and compares favourably to anything you’ll find on a digital or high street quartz watch.The 316L stainless watch bezel protects the Sapphire glass by giving the crystal a recessed, protective lip all the way around. Should the watch be caught on any surface during a volatile incident- the protective lip takes the brunt of the force, rather than the sapphire crystal.From experience, this is an area that has ruined many a good watch face whilst on duty.THE CROWNThe crown is embossed with our Patrolman logo and is used for setting the date and time of the watch. It's protected by smooth case contours, resulting in a more comfortable day to day wear whilst offering extra resilience to the crown in the event of the watch being dropped.The watch has a water resilience of 10 ATM (100m water resistant), making the Patrolman Enforcer ideal for recreational activities or light water work.THE MODELFor the Indiegogo campaign, we have decided to re-release the White & Blue version of the Patrolman Enforcer. This has proven to be fantastically popular choice and provides the best all round visibility for on and off duty wear.For our Kickstarter campaign we ran with two models, but such was the popularity in White & Blue, that we have decided to offer this as an extension Indiegogo campaign.*Any 'Solid Blue' model images are just for illustration purposes and not being offered as a selection during this campaign.*We have demonstrated a side by side comparison of the W&B Enforcer watch in both daylight and night conditions.  C3 SuperLuminova is applied to the majority of the watch dial and hands but due to the lume value degrading when mixed with colour, pure white is the most vivid area.MOVEMENTAs avid watch collectors, we know the draw of a good automatic watch. However, for our watch we needed a movement that was supremely reliable, built to withstand hard knocks, whilst maintaining pinpoint accuracy for Policing duties.After considerable research, the Japanese Miyota 2105 Quartz movement was the perfect choice for our watch- it's tried, tested and has a proven track record in numerous big brand watches.With its built in shock protection, the watch will maintain laser accurate timekeeping, no matter the situation that you find yourself in.Due to the Patrolman Enforcer being a high quality quartz movement, the watch is capable of being thrown in a locker for long periods of time and still be ready to go as soon as the watch is put back on.THE STRAPEach watch comes with a beautifully soft black genuine leather strap with integrated grey stitching. The strap tapers from 4mm at the watch lugs, down to 3mm at the buckle to aid comfort.The 22mm strap has been custom designed and manufactured to our specifications and includes some custom details that we thought worked well for a Law Enforcement Officer in the field.One of these details is an engraved dual retention clasp system, designed to aid watch retention in highly volatile situations.In support of our Blue Family, we have incorporated a blue leather sliding keeper. A small detail that lends its self to the overlying theme in representing the brotherhood that Police Officer’s share.WATCH BACK CASINGThe upper centre section is intentionally left blank to allow you to have your collar number engraved onto the back, to create a personal, one of a kind watch.To facilitate the engraving of your collar number, we've made a guidance card to be included with every watch. This gives exact instructions to be followed by any professional engraver, so no matter where you are in the world, you can have a standardised finish at very little cost.In the OPTIONAL EXTRAS SECTION towards the bottom of the page, we will refer to completing the engraving of your collar number ourselves prior to shipment at a small additional cost.PRESENTATION BOXA presentation box has been created just for the Kickstarter project. The clean, black watch box protects the watch in a modern and understated fashion.It’s a true homage to the entire ethos of the build, choosing class over brashness. The inside features a dark grey embossed lining and a black honours ribbon to support the warranty card. The watch sits proudly on a large padded cushion, protecting the watch whilst not in use.WATCH REVIEWThe Patrolman Enforcer has been reviewed by the independent watch review site, please click here to view the full review :http://watchroundup.com/reviews/patrolman-enforcer/An excerpt taken from the WATCH ROUND UP review:"Extremely comfortable on the wrist, light and didn’t catch on my backpack straps when taking it on and off. It also had the opportunity to flex its muscles and prove to me its toughness when I slipped on a steep rocky pitch and went down pretty hard. The watch took a pretty hard hit against the granite rock face… there wasn’t a scratch on it! The PVD coating and the recessed Crystal did their job as promised."OPTIONAL EXTRAS1. OUR 22MM CUSTOM THIN BLUE LINE NATO STRAP:Should you wish to order our additional Thin Blue Line NATO strap, you will be given that option upon purchasing.2. PROFESSIONAL ENGRAVING OF YOUR COLLAR NUMBER ON BACK CASINGFurther more, we have been working with an extremely proficient engraving company, to allow us to engrave your collar/badge number ourselves at a small additional charge.This will be at the completion of the Indiegogo campaign and prior to shipping.SUMMARYThe Patrolman was always designed to be a dark, moody looking timepiece with functionality and usability at the forefront of the design.The custom Police touches incorporated into this watch are not replicated in any other watch on the market and that is something that we are very proud of.The Thin Blue Line holds great symbolic and emotive significance to our team. Its subtle, understated incorporation is therefore central to the design process of our watches.ON THE WRISTThe 42mm design is such a wearable size, it sits comfortably and proportionately on almost any wrist.TIMELINEOur Patrolman watches have been a huge success on Kickstarter, with over 220% funding in just 30 days! Since this time we have received a large amount of pre-sales through our website www.Patrolmanwatches.comWe are prepared for the increased production and are in a fortunate position of being able to take on additional pre-sales through Indiegogo.The Patrolman Enforcer was designed in the UK but is being manufactured in China, by the same manufacturer used by several well-known watch companies. The watches take several months to manufacture, as you might expect of a totally custom timepiece, but we will keep you updated all the way, right up to delivery at your door in April 2018.The timeline we've put together factors in Chinese holidays as well as allowing for unexpected delays. Throughout the manufacturing and quality control phases, we will keep all backers updated here as well as on our Facebook page.We can also be closely followed via our Instagram and Twitter pages so please do follow us for regular updates.WATCH TESTING AND COMPLIANCEWhile we wanted to deliver an affordable piece, we were also laser focussed on the quality of the materials and finish. We have made sure that all of our watches meet the strict EU compliance standards.WARRANTYEvery Patrolman Enforcer watch comes with a 12 month warranty against manufacturing or movement defects.The watches are all individually inspected prior to shipping out to you, but if for any reason the watch you receive has a manufacturing defect that has gone unnoticed, we will repair or replace the watch for you.SHIPPING- WORLDWIDE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPINGThe Patrolman Enforcer is aimed at Law Enforcement Officers all around the world, we therefore will ship worldwide.When backing the project, you'll be asked where in the world you'd like your watch shipped to and the appropriate fee will be added to your pledge. We'll contact you when the project funds to get your address.SHIPS FROM THE UKThe Patrolman Enforcer ships from the UK via courier to anywhere worldwide. If you're outside the EU, you'll need to confirm any import duties you may be required to pay with your local customs office.Funding period30 days After this time all watches will be sold at the expected retail price of £185 GBP($243 USD/ €210 EUR) via on our website: www.patrolmanwatches.comRisks and challengesWe have taken every precaution to ensure that we can deliver on schedule.Following extensive tests with numerous manufacturers and countless prototypes, we found a manufacturer who impressed us hugely with their decades of experience in manufacturing watches for a number of high end watch companies.We have worked with our chosen factory on rounds of prototypes and each have been delivered on time and to the correct specification.

story:
Empowering Rural Women | Costa Rica | Sustainable Sewing

Project "Miss Manos"! Help us fund our project & change lives!

Sewing the Seeds of dignity and independence.


Our Mission: Empowering women and improving their quality of life through a shared initiative. A fair-wage sewing venture that creates beautiful eco and animal friendly handbags and accessories. 

Learning some new techniques

Hello Indiegogo Friends and Pura Vida!

For the past 6 years GG2g, which is located in Milford, Connecticut, has been successful at making handbags and accessories from a variety of recycled, animal-free materials. At the height of the business we were in over 150 stores! But significant business interruptions with contract manufacturers had a major impact on our company’s operations. At that point we decided to try to turn our problem into a positive! With orders still coming in we made a (painful) choice to stop all production, try to resolve our manufacturing issues, while continuing to develop our product lines. 

As fate would have it, in 2012 I was given the opportunity to participate in a Women's Empowerment Fellowship Program through the U.S. State Department, the University of Connecticut and the University for Peace, Costa Rica. Through the fellowship process, I met my counterpart (and soul sister), Natascha Moscoa (founder of HipN’Verde) in Costa Rica, and a shared vision was discovered.

By working together we realized we could change the lives of women in under served-populations and a new idea was born. Natascha already had an established group of women to sew her line of fabulous eco-friendly handbags but had the opposite issue that we did - People to sew, but few orders coming in. The lightbulb goes on! 

It was an epiphany; we would join our companies and focus on 360 degrees of sustainability by establishing a social enterprise to further our already Green mission!

We saw an opportunity not only to continue on with sustainability, but to weave into our mission the elements of caring and compassion, which would benefit women in underserved populations!

To make both the sourcing and sale of our bags include caring and compassion, we also made a decision to donate a portion of our retail sales proceeds to Farm Sanctuary, who work to end cruelty to farm animals and promote compassionate living through rescue, education and advocacy.  

Miss Manos - We have chosen the name carefully, with one word in English and one word in Spanish. "Miss" being a respectful nod to the feminine, and "Manos" the Spanish word for hands. We felt it important that the name reflect our cross cultural, dignity building and artisan made endevour.

 

 

 

 

The Sewing Studios:

Our initial idea was to bring everyone together under one roof but as I have just learned on my recent trip, Costa Rica is a very family oriented society and it is very common to have 3 - 4 generations living under one roof which means that there is always someone needing care within the home.

For rural women in Costa Rica, it is therefore best for each woman to work primarily from her home, and have a central sewing studio with specialized sewing machines and a meeting room.

When a woman is working from home, she is free to tend to her family's needs and sew when it fits in her daily schedule.

Making some samples 

 

With the Funds

We will use the funds to update each woman's sewing studios. Things like good sewing scissors, additional sewing feet, plastic bins for storing fabric (lots of critters in the jungle that like to nest in fabric), better lighting, fans for cooling (so hot there!). In the moment there are four women who each have an industrial sewing machine in their home (donated by a German NGO, Futouris), each machine is in need of repair and a tune-up. We need to purchase 3 speciality machines that are used for sewing handbags and we need to move an initial cache of salvaged fabrics from one point to another. We also need a little start up money for new tags, and postcards, and to buy some lining fabrics and hardware. If you are someone who likes details here is an itemized list:

  • Shipping reclaimed fabrics and all hardware in my current inventory

from USA to Florencia de San Carlos, Costa Rica $1000

(One time cost, in the future these fabrics will be salvaged in CR)

  • Purchase of 3 sewing machines specific to handbag industry

          1 Post sewing machine $800.

          1 Top stitch machine $800.

          1 Industrial serger $1000.

  • Purchase of Handbag components:

        Various hardware, lining fabric (organic cotton), backing fabric, fabric stiffners, zippers, labels.  Etc. $5000.

  • Promotional material: 

New tags, labels, postcards, e-commerce site, $3000.

  • Workshop upgrades:

For 4 workshops - Scales, lamps for machines, large plastic storage bins, fans for each workshop, new scissors, cutting surfaces, etc. $3000

  • Tune-ups for all 4 existing machines in Costa Rica

(These machines are 1.5 years old and were donated by Futuris, 

a German NGO) $400.

                                                                 Total ............... $15,000.oo

How the Project will Work:

1. Natascha and I will be designing bags, choosing fabrics, getting the word out, and garnering orders from U.S.A and abroad.

2. In Costa Rica, Natascha will act as a designer and coordinator overseeing fabric selections, cutting and giving each women a specific task to complete.

3. Our shop forman, Ruth (affectionately called Tia Ruth) will see that everyone understands the sewing and construction concepts, deadlines and complexities of the current sewing order and make it happen.

4. Quality control will then be implemented (that's Natascha's job) and goods will be shipped to the USA (to me) for North American orders, and directly to the customer for European orders.

5. Good news!!!! - We have LOIs (letters of intent) from 7 resellers already!!!

Where Exactly are These Sewing Studios?

Pénjamo, Florencia de San Carlos, Alajuela, Costa Rica - Pénjamo a small village inside of Florencia de San Carlos. The canton of San Carlos encompasses a major portion of the Llanura de San Carlos (San Carlos Plain), a wide expanse on the Caribbean side of the Central Mountain Range. San Carlos is noted as the home of Arenal Volcano, one of the most active volcanoes in the world. The canton's principal economic activities include the production of oranges, yuca, pineapple, sugar cane, beef and dairy products.

 

Arenal Volcano, San Carlos, Costa Rica

 

 

Down the Road

We see the Miss Manos project as a means to lift these hardworking women from poverty and also as an opportunity for community development. As the studios grow we would like to implement some educational and community development programs and projects. There are many issues that need to be addressed in Pénjamo but we feel a strong start is with the women who show leadership skills.

One of the beautiful aspects of this venture is that by paying a fair wage to these women we can quickly change their current situation which will then spill out into their community. In the near future we would like to offer workshops on the environment, childcare, banking, and computer skills. 

We have many connections to strong, successful women leaders through our group of Fellows from the US State Department Fellowship program and through the University of Peace in San Jose, who have agreed to come and give workshops. Should this venture be successful we would like to implement this model in other parts of South and Central America and the Caribbean.

Thank You(s)!

Special Thanks go out to four creative geniuses!!!

Film maker Adrian Correia for making an amazing video for us (and in the middle of a crazy filming schedule).

Graphic Designer Anna Rubino for her passion about our project and her "getting it" interpretation for our graphics.

Designer Alison Grieveson for her limitless talents, unwavering willingness to help and for being her lovely self! We owe you all big!!!!

James Fairweather without you none of this is possible. You get the "Husband of the Year Award", again. Love you!

To the lovely women of San Carlos for being there! Your intrepid hearts and willing spirits drive us forward!

Special Thank's to Blue Attack-Latin Vibe (Original Mix) for our music video, by Blue_Attack is licensed under a Creative Commons License. 

https://soundcloud.com/blue_attack/preview-blue-attack-latin-vibe

 

Risks and challenges

We know that there will be challenges along the way but we have a wonderful team of positive-minded women. We can meet our challenges head on. 

Since we will be shipping from Costa Rica to the U.S. and Europe, we know that we have some learning to do regarding import/export regulations. At this time I'm working with an import broker to figure out the best way to handle any situation that may arise.

On a very positive note the U.S and Costa Rica share a very amicable relationship and trade is encouraged. 

We anticipate some delays in shipping in the first few months of production and will allow for that by 1) Giving our clients a realistic expectation regarding delivery date 2) Allowing for time delays in our own estimated deadlines.

The U.S. and Costa Rica have different methods of doing business and cultural differences, but we feel fortunate to have had the opportunity to learn about and address those differences through a course at the University for Peace in San Jose. 

We also feel confident that should any unanticipated problems arise that we have the support of family, coworkers, peers and a myriad of knowledge at our fingertips through the amazing women from our Fellowship. 

Natascha and I are seasoned professional with a shared goal. We feel that our commitment and drive will carry us through any rough patch we may encounter.

 

Thank You!!!!!!

story:
Although the project was not funded - we are         moving forward with it and the 1-decision               bracelets will be available for purchasing soon!

For more details and updates, mail us on:

1decisionbracelet@gmail.com

Or join our facebook group: 

1decision bracelet

Thanks again for your support,

The 1Decision Team



*************************************************************************

*************************************************************************

*************************************************************************


Get yours now! click on the link below  for a special EARLY BIRDS price of only 27.5$ for each bracelet when buying a per!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/1decision-bracelet/contributions/new?perk_amt=55&perk_id=2014915

*************************************************************************

1Decision Bracelet - It's All about saving lives

What is the 1Decision Bracelet?

The 1Decision Bracelet is A real-time Child safety bracelet for parents and children of all ages.  It is the first and only complete end-to-end family real time alert Device which will alert you the second that your child is out of the range of the bracelet.

It’s size is adjustable to fit any wrist, with beautiful design and colors. The 1Decision Bracelets connects to each other using RF technology, alerting you with a silent vibration the second that your child is out of range. 

While designing the 1Decision Bracelet we wanted to create a fashionable product that will seamlessly blend into your everyday life.

WHY? 

Just imagine how many times you have been so busy. It could be your day job, housekeeping, daily chores, Social networking and even the kids. It can happen to the best of us. It only takes one second to get distracted. Unfortunately sometimes the consequences of getting that distracted can be severe. You might leave your child in a car, lose them in a crowded place, or be the victim of something much more serious such as child-kidnapping. It is a nightmare situation for any parent.

So How Does It Work?

Let's imagine for a moment that you are on your phone talking to a friend or your boss, While you're distracted by the conversation - your child wanders off and is completely out of your range. Within 10-15 minutes of this happening it could already be too late. This scenario would not happen with the 1Decision Bracelet! The moment that your child wanders out of range, 

* The range can be set by the parent  to 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 or 50 meters radius.

Your Bracelet will vibrate, alerting you On time! You don’t need you smartphone to connect to it or any additional Apps,You don't need WiFi or 3G on.

This is what makes this 1Decision Bracelet absolutely priceless.


The 1Decision is a unique product. you will find nothing else quite like it on the market today:

• It is the first and only complete, end-to-end, family real-time alert device that alerts you the second that your child is out of range.

• The 1Decision Bracelet does not rely on any other devices, smartphones or apps  (!!!) So there is no delay in receiving an alert.

• The 1Decision bracelet was designed to be comfortable and fashionable for both kids and parents. You will hardly know it's there. 

• The 1Decision bracelet has a unique option that enable you to set the desired range between you and your child.

• Comes in a range of trendy designs and colors It is designed to fit properly and comfortably on both yours and your child’s wrists, and is highly convenient.

• Not requiring any additional hardware or apps also means no WiFi or Apps downloads required for it to work, does not need to rely on a thing but the other bracelet.

• Cost effective, less than half the price of any similar product.

The 1Decision Bracelet set consists of 2 bracelets. One for you and One for your child. These bracelets remain connected wirelessly using RF technology. This allows parents to be connected to their child with no leash on their back and without worrying that the child would disappear in couple of seconds.

*The technology we are using allows to connect one or more parent bracelet to several child bracelets.
In case you have more than one child or if you would like more than 1 parent bracelet you can easily order as many additional child / parent bracelets as you like.

Everyone thinks to themselves: “This will not happen to me.”, unfortunately, the truth is that it can happen to everyone, even to to the best and most responsible parents.  

The Beginning of 1Decision:

We have started this project by developing RF chips that can be paired with each other and send/receive RF signals. Then, we have succeeded to set the RF chip to alert when the other RF device was out of range.

Your help:

We believe that it is very important to keep the price of each Bracelet as low as possible, so you can keep your children safe. We have been talking to many different manufacturers all over the world and the only way we can effectively keep the price of the units down is by purchasing many components (RF chips, boards etc..). This inventory requirement is the single biggest reason we need your help. Help us save lives.

Risks and challenges

1Decision has already developed a Prototype of Two Bracelets that works perfectly.

Currently, we are using several different RF devices with different fixed ranges (imposed by the industry) and attempting to find a happy compromise between the different ranges. We have are currently designing a custom RF inlay for this Bracelet So it could be adjusted to every parent needs (larger/smaller ranges). 

Because Children are going to use the bracelets and since we are aware to the fact that children can be messy - We aim to create the Bracelet Water resistant so could be used without a need to worry about a thing.   

You can be sure that 1Decision Bracelet will work all the Time.


**************************************************************************************************************************************************


**************************************************************************************************************************************************


Question:

How do I choose the color of the bracelet?

Answer:

After purchasing a colored bracelet – just comment with the color you want on our page and we will take care of the rest

(We will also send you an email with a summary of your order)

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

I have more than one kid. Can I use the 1Decision Bracelet with more than one child?

Answer: 

Yes! Since we are using RF technology you can purchase as many child 1Decision bracelets as you like and we will configure them to work together with 1 or more parent bracelets. Of course that the same answer applies for adult bracelets as well).

Just purchase a set of bracelets (parent + child) and buy as many additional bracelets as you like from our perks.

Don’t worry - We will contact you shortly after your purchase via email and summarize your order.

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

Do I need to use an app or handle any kind of programming/configurations in order to use the bracelet?

Answer:

 No. the use of the 1Decision bracelet does not require any additional apps or special configurations and does not rely on your phone being next to you with sufficient buttery or anything like that. Everything can be set directly from the parent’s bracelet and it is super easy to use!

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

What sort of material is the bracelet made out of?

Answer:

 The 1Decision bracelet is made of highly resistant silicone.

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

Are the bracelets waterproof?

Answer:

Yap! The 1Decision bracelets are waterproof!

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

Does it have user replaceable batteries?

How long does each battery charge last, and how do we know when the battery runs low?

Answer: 

The buttery can hold between 48 to 72 hours of connection than, they can be recharged using the 1Decision’s bracelet charger.

The 1Decision bracelet has a red led light to indicate when the battery runs low.

_________________________________________________________________________

Question:

How can I be sure that my child won’t take it off?

Answer:

Actually that’s one of the main things we had in mind when designing the 1Decision bracelet. The bracelet is designed with a special band that makes it difficult to be taken off unless you know how to.

1decisionbracelet@gmail.com
Or join our facebook group: 1decision bracelet
Thanks again for your support,
The 1Decision Team

1Decision Bracelet - It's All about saving lives

What is the 1Decision Bracelet?
The 1Decision Bracelet is A real-time Child safety bracelet for parents and children of all ages.  It is the first and only complete end-to-end family real time alert Device which will alert you the second that your child is out of the range of the bracelet.
It’s size is adjustable to fit any wrist, with beautiful design and colors. The 1Decision Bracelets connects to each other using RF technology, alerting you with a silent vibration the second that your child is out of range. 
While designing the 1Decision Bracelet we wanted to create a fashionable product that will seamlessly blend into your everyday life.
WHY? 
Just imagine how many times you have been so busy. It could be your day job, housekeeping, daily chores, Social networking and even the kids. It can happen to the best of us. It only takes one second to get distracted. Unfortunately sometimes the consequences of getting that distracted can be severe. You might leave your child in a car, lose them in a crowded place, or be the victim of something much more serious such as child-kidnapping. It is a nightmare situation for any parent.


The 1Decision bracelet aims to change all of that. It uses reliable and safe RF technology, similar to what is found in many devices as different remote controls (Medical devices, Cars, Toys, and even your TV remote)
So How Does It Work?
Let's imagine for a moment that you are on your phone talking to a friend or your boss, While you're distracted by the conversation - your child wanders off and is completely out of your range. Within 10-15 minutes of this happening it could already be too late. This scenario would not happen with the 1Decision Bracelet! The moment that your child wanders out of range, 
* The range can be set by the parent  to 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 or 50 meters radius.
Your Bracelet will vibrate, alerting you On time! You don’t need you smartphone to connect to it or any additional Apps,You don't need WiFi or 3G on.
This is what makes this 1Decision Bracelet absolutely priceless.




What makes the 1Decision Bracelet different?The 1Decision is a unique product. you will find nothing else quite like it on the market today:
• It is the first and only complete, end-to-end, family real-time alert device that alerts you the second that your child is out of range.
• The 1Decision Bracelet does not rely on any other devices, smartphones or apps  (!!!) So there is no delay in receiving an alert.
•	The 1Decision bracelet was designed to be comfortable and fashionable for both kids and parents. You will hardly know it's there. 

•	The 1Decision bracelet has a unique option that enable you to set the desired range between you and your child.

•	Comes in a range of trendy designs and colors It is designed to fit properly and comfortably on both yours and your child’s wrists, and is highly convenient.
• Not requiring any additional hardware or apps also means no WiFi or Apps downloads required for it to work, does not need to rely on a thing but the other bracelet.
•	Cost effective, less than half the price of any similar product.
The 1Decision Bracelet set consists of 2 bracelets. One for you and One for your child. These bracelets remain connected wirelessly using RF technology. This allows parents to be connected to their child with no leash on their back and without worrying that the child would disappear in couple of seconds.
*The technology we are using allows to connect one or more parent bracelet to several child bracelets.In case  you have more than one child or if you would like more than 1 parent bracelet you can easily order as many additional child / parent bracelets as you like.

story:
Campaign was canceled and all money were refunded to the backers

The Soul Campaign was not performing as expected and we made a decision to refund all the money to the contributors. We will continue working on Soul app and will significantly expand it’s possibilities in the future. Sign up to Soul newsletter on our website to keep updated for future releases!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We have become used to tracking our daily steps, weight loss, and sleeping hours, but we have forgotten to follow the most precious thing: our time. Motivational speaker Jim Rohn famously said that we are the average of the five people we spend the most time with. How about starting to track the time you spend with the people around you?

Have you ever heard: “You don’t spend enough time with me”? Or have you ever said to someone, “I would like to spend more time with you”? But how can we keep track? What is “enough”, and what is “more”? Of course, we can pick up a pencil and paper and start calculating the time in an old-school way…. Umm, thanks but no thanks.

That’s why we created Soul. Soul is a completely new concept of tracking that redefines the meaning of time. Soul is both an App and a stylish Sensor that helps track and share moments with our soulmates because we believe that every minute counts!



Here in Concepter, we work a lot and we love what we do. It takes a lot of time to create, test, and produce our amazing products. Sometimes we even forget to eat or sleep or eat again. And especially to have Netflix and chill with our #bae, #bf, #bff, #bestie, or #bro’s.

One night while inventing our new gadgets that help people make their pictures perfectly Instagrammable, we had this crazy conversation: How much time do we spend with each other? How much time do we spend with our family members? Soulmates? Best friends? Old friends? Loved ones? Where would we rather be now?

And the most important one: Should we create a tool that can count time even if nobody gets more than 24 hours per day?

Yup.

Please welcome the world’s first tracker that encourages you not to meet the deadline, but to meet the loved one.



 

We have already premiered the Soul concept and prototypes at the biggest consumer electronic show in Las Vegas earlier this year and received a warm feedback from the world's best media and industry experts. We also received a Best of CES 2016 nomination by Engadget as a Best Offbeat Product. Flattered.



Our main goal is to motivate people to have more personal time together instead of mindlessly switching from one task to another all day long. It’s not about productivity, efficiency, focusing, speeding up, slowing down, or even leaving the comfort zone. 

This is not something you can learn from self-improvement books. This is about spending time with the important people in our lives. What can make us happier than a friendship stronger than your home wi-fi signal?


Click here to get a SOULMATE PACK (x2 Soul trackers)

Concepter Soul is both an App and Sensor (band or keychain). They work together to detect other Souls, e.g. Soul apps on smartphones (this is free and always will be, yay!). Also, it can detect Soul Sensors on keychains or wristbands (get one of them right now for your own pleasure or as an unusual gift idea for any occasion. You’re welcome!). When people come within 15 feet of one another, apps or gadgets sync automatically, and begin tracking the total time being spent together. Soul Sensor delivers this information to an app. It only takes a minute to revise the time reports.


Soul has a free supporting application for iOS that allows users to connect with Facebook friends, track time spent together, challenge each other on leveling up their friendship (the more time you spend together, the higher level you achieve), and provides various analytics on time spent with other people. Soul does not track time with other people while sleeping. We’ve built our automatic sleep tracking method similar to other sleep tracking apps. Our Android version will be available on Google Play in June 2016.

Our Android version will be available on Google Play in June 2016.




Soul Sensor is a  tiny, stylish keychain or wristband that provides accurate information on time tracking, saves smartphone battery life, and suits as a great gift. The Soul App uses the GPS location of your phone which can be inaccurate sometimes. For example, it does not take into account different floors of the building, and can count the time in one spot (geographically) as time spent together. This does not happen to a Soul Sensor. If your phone is discharged, you are moving too fast or your smartphone does not have a proper GPS connection. In this case, Soul Sensor could be a very handy tool.

Both the Soul Sensor and an App work 24/7 and activate automatically when Soul devices are detected within the radius. You don't need to turn on/off Sensor or start tracking activity manually.

Click here to get a SOULMATE PACK (x2 Soul trackers)




Soul Sensor is compatible with:

  • iOS 8+: iPhone (released 2011 or later): 

  • iPad (released 2012 or later): 

  • iPod Touch 5th gen.

  • Android 4.4 KitKat or newer with the Bluetooth Low Energy

Concepter Soul is Open Sourced! Are you interested in the time-tracking feature in your App? Would you like to add time-tracking feature to your wearable or Bluetooth device? Or even make your own time-tracker? Contact us regarding the API or electronics KIT.

Are you performing Social Study Research? You can easily upload tracked data in .xls format directly from the app!


We store your data safely on our servers and check everything twice. Only you have access to your personal data. Your account and data can be deleted upon your request. Happy face emoji.


Concepter Soul is both a useful App for smartphones and a stylish Sensor. You can use it as a key chain, wear it as a cool accessory, or put it in your wallet or pocket. You can take it anywhere!

By the way, Soul is a great and unusual gift for any occasion as you give your time to someone special.

Soul has an additional feature - key finder! You can see how far or close your Soul Sensor is in our app interface.

Anything else?

Yup. With the help of Concepter Soul App you can:

  • See people you spend the most time with;

  • Set up your goals and mark important people as soulmates;

  • Check daily and weekly progress;

  • Use “Let’s meet” feature to keep in touch;

  • Send private messages to your soulmates;

  • Get free weekly reports on how you invested your time;

  • Improve your lifestyle;

  • Be happier and make other people happy!



You might want to know if the Soul App is as accurate as the Sensor? Unfortunately, it is not. In short: The Soul App is guessing the time you’ve spent with others while the Soul Sensor is tracking the actual time.

The crowdfunding campaign is like a rose ceremony in the world of startups. So here we are, just a group of passionate innovators, standing in front of the IndieGoGo crowd, asking you to love us. This is what you get in return:

In order to provide our customers bigger choice and even better Soul experience, we need a little bit of your help. Funding us with $100,000 will help us add new leather band options to the Soul Sensor fans. Available color combinations: black Sensor with a black leather band, and metallic Sensor with a natural color leather band.

Do you want to get a Soul Sensor for free? No Problem! Share the link to the Soul’s campaign page using the IndieGoGo share button. If any of your friends will purchase Soul sensor using the link, we will automatically add one extra Soul to your purchase.

Please note:

  • Only one free Soul Sensor can be added to each order;

  • If you are one of our Beta testers or an early supporter from our website - we will automatically add one Soul Sensor to your order.


Conсepter is a tech company based in Ukraine, that creates innovative products in the field of mobile technology. More than 5000 IndieGoGo and Kickstarter backers know us already because of the successful projects like iblazr and iblazr 2 - the world's first smart portable LED-flash for gadgets. Thank you for your support!

For the past year, our team has been working on a completely new concept of tracking to redefine the meaning of time.


Concepter is a small team of individuals who are very passionate about technology. We know how to take responsibility of our backer’s money, and are always extremely transparent in our communication with our supporters. The most accountable people for the Soul product are:

 

We would like to thank all our soulmates, contributors, beta testers and supporters. And especially:

  • Alex Sidenko for directing a great video 

  • Taras Miskiv for being our camera man (director of photography)

  • Ruki for the support during the hardware prototyping;

  • Balcony Garment for giving us their beautiful pajamas;

  • Myroslava Dronuk, Volodymir Ryaboshlik, Ilya Kych, Dmitry Slinkov for being great hollywood actors;

  • And everybody who cheered us up along the way!

  • Max Moshkovsky for making mechanical engineering for soul tracker.


Do you have any ideas how to make Soul better? We’d love to hear from you: info@concepter.co


FAQ:

Q: I would like to get another Soul sensor to my existing perk.

A: You can adjust your the Perk you have chosen and add additional $35 to your reward. We will recognise that as an additional Soul and will add it to your shipment.

Q: Why would anyone prefer to use Sensor instead of tracking time with the App only? I mean, what functionality does the wearable provide compared to an App?

A: Smartphone tracks time via GPS, which is more of guessing time, rather than of actually tracking it. Smartphones don’t take into account different floors of the building, and is not good at tracking while you move. While the Sensor shows the actual time you've spent with others.


Q: I wish it had a display, could inform about the time and be able to perform some other smart features, like receiving phone notifications and such!

A: We decided to keep it simple, stylish and inexpensive. The goal of the product is to motivate spend more time with people and less time with gadgets, that's why we don't want to distract you with display or notifications, like any other wearable.


Q: Does everybody need the Sensor and/or an App to track time spent together? Some people might not be into this kind of stuff or aren't tech-savvy, but it would be lovely to track time with them somehow. Will you enable manual inputs?

A: We’ve built a fully automatic time tracking system. That is why you need to add other people in the App as friends - it’s easy because we can sync with your Facebook or phone contacts.

FAQ:
Q: I would like to get another Soul sensor to my existing perk.
A: You can adjust your the Perk you have chosen and add additional $35 to your reward. We will recognise that as an additional Soul and will add it to your shipment.
Q: Why would anyone prefer to use Sensor instead of tracking time with the App only? I mean, what functionality does the wearable provide compared to an App?
A: Smartphone tracks time via GPS, which is more of guessing time, rather than of actually tracking it. Smartphones don’t take into account different floors of the building, and is not good at tracking while you move. While the Sensor shows the actual time you've spent with others.
Q: I wish it had a display, could inform about the time and be able to perform some other smart features, like receiving phone notifications and such!
A: We decided to keep it simple, stylish and inexpensive. The goal of the product is to motivate spend more time with people and less time with gadgets, that's why we don't want to distract you with display or notifications, like any other wearable.

Q: Does everybody need the Sensor and/or an App to track time spent together? Some people might not be into this kind of stuff or aren't tech-savvy, but it would be lovely to track time with them somehow. Will you enable manual inputs?
A: We’ve built a fully automatic time tracking system. That is why you need to add other people in the App as friends - it’s easy because we can sync with your Facebook or phone contacts.

story:
About us

FOOLSTOOL: italy-based craftwork company that produces eco friendly furniture and furnishing in alveolar cardboard, with smart design and huge visual impact (www.foolstool.com).

DAVIDE PAGLIARDINI: born in 1989 in San Marino, now based in Milan, teacher at NABA Nuova Accademia di Belle Arti in Milan, visual and motion designer freelance, handmade lettering artist (www.davidepagliardini.com)

About the stool

Designed by Mauro Rognoni it's produced with craftwork process, made in Italy, cutted and assembled by Paolo Marchetti. It is all composed with recyclable materials: alveolar cardboard and vinilic glue. It is a multifunctional product, usefull at home or in commercial space, shop windows, kindergardens. Light and strong, it can be moved easily.

Due to the work of international artists, it gains much artistic value than a simple stool.

What is "lettering"?

It's the art of composing words and periods with an artistic method, studying the shapes of the fonts, the proportion between spaces, voids and drawn parts; lettering add an aestetic value to communication.

Foolstool feat. Davide Pagliardini

Foolstool give to product's decoration the same importance than design or materials. The collaboration with Davide Pagliardini it's the attestation of this. The Davide's style will give a special and original feature. Where did you saw another furniture like this?


Where the spoil goes...

story:
"A clogged filter can burn out the blower motor, damage the heat exchanger & cost you hundreds of dollars in wasted energy" -familyhandyman.com

Think for a minute how much more your utility bills are during the months you run your furnace or Air conditioner? If you are like most home owners your Furnace or Air conditioner is running 10, 20 or 50% more than it should be. What is causing that and what is it costing you? There is an air filter inside every home HVAC system! When that filter is clogged with dust up to 50% less air is reaching your equipment. That means the equipment will have to run that much more to cool or heat the same amount of air.

Our MERV 9 filter design allows for the stopping power of a high end filter, but with the air flow of a cheap one!


Reducing Costs & Emissions

If you check out the on-line the experts they will tell you to change your “90 day rated” filter every month. Woven fiber Glass and Pleated fabric are the most common type of filters purchased in the market place today. Purchasing 8-20 of these filters a year contributes greatly to landfills (and their carbon emissions). For every 1% of households (1.23 million) that use a 1 year Castle filter we could save up to 212,790 cubic feet of land fill every year. That's over the size of 220 School Busses. Lowering your waste doesn't just come from purchasing fewer filters, but because 50% of what makes every Castle Filter is recyclable!



Why Castle Filters Work Better

Paper & fiberglass filters work on the premise of plugging up small holes with particles to prevent dust from getting on your HVAC unit. Every hole that gets plugged is one more hole that isn't allowing airflow.

Side view of a standard household HVAC pleated filter.

Castle Filters have 400% more surface area for dust & other particles to collect. Because the internal foam is treated with a sticky material, you don't have to sacrifice stopping power for airflow.

Side view of a Castle Filter! More surface area & greater air flow means less hassle.



How We Can Make it Happen: With Your Help!

Castle Air Filters is a patent pending HVAC air filtration system. The design is based upon the revolutionary No Toil air filtration technology trusted by offroad enthusiasts & professional action sports athletes the world over. Convenient Air Filter Maintenance has always been our goal & with you help we can do so much more.

Our facilities & staff are all ready for Castle Filters. Once funded we can order the foam & recycled plastic needed for this large scale of a project. Funding will also be used to have the injection moulds manufactured. We have the capability to manufacture 100% of the materials for all filters under 20". All 20" filter casings will be sourced from another company. This product is proudly manufactured 100% in the United States.

All We Need Is Your Help!

Our materials are sourced – our product is tried, tested & true. We need YOUR help! Our only two obstacles right now are spreading the word about Castle Filters & funding the project. 



Thank You For Visiting!

We hope you can make a contribution to Castle Filters. Even a small contribution of $1 or more can make a huge difference in the future of Castle Filters. We have many ideas for stretch goals – including buying 100% of the required equipment (instead of sourcing) as well as offering more size options. The future of Castle Filters is in your hands! We want to be able to have an annual subscription service for our customers that is as convenient as our product. Thank you again, and please stop by here or our Website for updates!



Test & Results

Download The Product Comparison Study

See the science as to why Castle Filters are a better choice for your home, wallet & environment: Download this informative PDF with the test results that back up our claims.

All claims made are according to our scientific research performed by LMS Labs – a certified lab that does filter testing/certifications for the worlds largest retailers & manufacturers.
